comments: I had the cancel reservation second day, when i booked the place the host was responding my messages normally but after the cancellation he texted back days after. About the area is only information that it‚Äôs central located, but it‚Äôs totally unsafe and dangerous especially for female travelers, it‚Äôs not cool and dishonest that even never mentioned before! Use the taxis when you want to go outside is not a solution. About cleaning, the coffee machine is never washed before and generally average. I do not recommend this place.
fantasticÔºÅ

I've stayed here for 2 months. Elena's apartment is great, and is in the best location in Athens. I've been in Athens 4 times, and I've always stayed in Kolonaki, and this apartment is right next to the center of the area, yet it's in a quiet part of it. The apartment itself is spacious enough, clean and has all the things you might need. I also appreciate Elena's communication: the dryer was broken, so she got a new one in just a few days. Thank you for a great stay!
good locationÔºÅ The view in the room is greatÔºÅ So comfortable to live.
Modern, stylish and the view is to die for. It's rare that we find a place that makes us feel at home as much as Aris' Luxury Suite. The lift is small but hey, this is Athens ;)

As senior citizens arriving from New York, we were a little apprehensive about what to expect. However from start to finish we had a splendid experience. The taxi was arranged by Aris with cheerful Thomas the driver, and as we arrived at the building we were received graciously by Ilaria who took us upstairs and showed us around the apartment. In the evening we were delighted to meet Panos, who works with Aris, who dropped by to chat and ask us to let him or Aris know if there was anything we needed. This gave us a tremendous sense of confidence that our host will be there in case we needed any help. The apartment was smart and elegant and had large glass windows allowing us to have a magnificent view of the Acropolis and Parthenon at night. It is located at a walking distance to all the famous sights of Athens, we even went shopping to the central market.
Communication with Arris was excellent.
We strongly recommend stay at this apartment.
Srini and Nalini

Beautiful, clean and comfortable spot in the heart of the city. Couldn't ask for a better place. Within walking distance to everything -- we didn't take the train (which is also very close)  once and walked all around the city from this central location. In a very busy area but on a hidden side street and high up enough to be very quiet and peaceful. Better than pictures. Perfect spot!

Yagos was extremely helpful and got back to me right away whenever we had any questions. It was really easy to get around the city from this location. The neighborhood was a little sketchy but from what I saw of the city, a lot of it is the same so you should just be aware of your surroundings. I thought it was a great place to stay in Athens.

Stayed at Aris' for 2 nights, what an amazing place! Central location, beautiful apartment with all the amenities with a breathtaking views of Athens.
Check in was effortless and Aris was accommodative to store our luggage after checkout until our late flight to give us another afternoon to explore Athens.
Highly recommended, thanks!

We loved our stay at Aris's place! The view was spectacular, the location absolutely perfect (we walked everywhere!), and Aris made check in and check out easy! We appreciated the help in coordinating rides to and from the airport as well! If and when I travel back to Athens, I'll definitely first be checking to see if we can stay here again!

Ce fut un plaisir de s√©journer dans cet appartement spacieux et joliment d√©cor√© (sans parler de la terrasse!). L'appartement se situe dans le quartier anarchiste, en plein centre ville. Nous vous le recommandons vivement! Concernant notre h√¥te, Yagos fut efficace et tr√®s sympathique.
Appartement tres agreable, terrasse magnifique, quartier anim√© mais appartement tres calme. Nous etions 3 adultes parfaitement √† l'aise.

Absolutely amazing nocarz. Agis and Dimitri were wonderful hosts - communicative and helpful. Agis is very thoughtful and provides a website with a list of restaurants, super markets, things to do, etc. They also gave us a nice bottle of wine during our visit!
The place itself is extremely nice. Very modern, tastefully decorated and has all the accommodations you need. And of course, the view of the Acropolis is simply breathtaking. I highly, highly recommend this place if you are in Athens and want to spend a little bit more money! Great apartment, great hosts.

Wow - this place was perfect. We were extremely happy in this apartment, it was clean, tidy and perfect for our family of four. Thelma was an excellent host, who responded very quickly to emails, and took the time to explain things to us, including things to see in Athens, and directions to the Metro. We have been travelling for two months now, and it's fair to say that this is the best accommodation we have had yet.

Bonne communication de la part de Thelma, elle a r√©pondu √† toutes nos questions une fois arriv√©s sur place. Elle nous a transmis un plan pour se rendre sur place. Tr√®s disponible pour des probl√®mes ou des questions. Bel appartement, une heure √† pied poir se rendre au centre-ville ou 10-15 minutes en metro. Je le recommande fortement aux familles ou entre amis. Super-march√© tr√®s pr√®s √©galement.

Agis arranged for a driver to come pick us up at the airport, and after an exciting trip through Athens George met us at the apartment.  We weren't sure what to expect as this was our first trip to Greece, however the flat was completely unbelievable, the view was spectacular and the location perfect.  It is a few steps to Acropolis, shopping in Plaka, some of the best restaurants in Athens.   Agis, George and Gina were all very wonderful to deal with and very attentive...this place is amazing,  we were fortunate to find the perfect spot for our Greece Vacation.
Great place to stay. Christina is extremely responsive and well prepared. There are map and instructions.  I wish it was closer to the metro as taking a cab in and out can be a bit costly.
good

Christina made check-in extremely easy! Her apartment was GORGEOUS and extremely clean. Everything was updated and the decor was beautiful and trendy. The location was perfect as it was close enough walking distance to everything my friends and I could possibly need (we did not take public transport/cabs during our stay). I will be staying here if I ever have the opportunity to visit again!!

The apartment is situated in the clothing district in the heart of historic Athens, so very convenient, but also safe. Our host Dimitris was very welcoming and helpful. He willingly helped us during the stay with local information. There were three of us, my husband, my brother and myself and we found the apartment spacious, nicely decorated and equipped with two bedrooms a dining area, a kitchen and a shower-room cum toilet, so very adequately spacious.

appartement tr√®s bien situ√© √† proximit√© de l'Acropole et des quartiers anim√©s. les deux chambres sont tr√®s agr√©ables et spacieuses. seul b√©mol une cuisine un peu petite. tr√®s bon accueil de Dimitri. Une bonne adresse

We had an amazing time in Athens, and the flat was all we could hope for and more!! It was in an excellent location, it was spotless, and it was lovely! There is a bakery just across the street that is amazing. Supermarket is not far, and the walk to the acropolis is not long either! Vesna and Kostas left a bottle of wine for us and had laundry soap that we were free to use. It was excellent. I can't say enough good things. We would definitely love to come back to Athens and stay here again.

Roula's appartment is FANTASTIC! Comfortable and clean - exactly as you can see in the pictures. The location of the house is within walking distance to Metro station and also several bus stations. There is a mini supermaket in front of the house that is open until 11pm and is very handy.
Roula has provided us very useful info about Athens. When we arrived in Athens her daughter was waiting for us in the apartment. She gave us a quick tour of the place and let us to check out at 4pm on our departure date.

Vesna is a great host. She communicates very well with you. The apartment is clean, well equipped and super comfy. Everything was as described and more. I highly recommend it. Thanks for everything!! :)

Flat was centrally located within 2-3 minutes walk to the Acropolis so we were able to walk everywhere even though the metro station was only a 5 min walk away.  Directions and ease of access to airport via train was excellent.  There is a small grocer across the street and the kitchen is fully equipped.  The apartment was tidy and clean upon arrival.  Ralou was kind and kept in contact throughout the stay.  The only thing that could have been improved was the shower.  It had a very slow drain and even with a short shower we were standing in 1-2 inches of water.  We did figure out the second to last night that if you don't turn the water all the way on in relieved the problem.  I did let Ralou know and she offered to have a plumber come out but we really didn't want someone in during our stay.  I am sure she will have it addressed before the next customer.  Overall our stay was very comfortable, our host was friendly, and we would highly recommend.
The host was extremely hospitable. I have never seen a warmer host than Ralou. She made sure that we had no problems while we were staying at her house.
Nice, comfortable apartment, good location

My husband and I were visiting Athens for the first time at the end of May. We absolutely loved Vesna's apartment. It's cute, clean, and close to all the major attractions. We walked everywhere and felt safe all the time. Vesna was helpful with all our travel arrangements and advice how where to eat and what to see! We will absolutely be back next time we are in Athens!
The location is perfect, you have access to most historical sites. There are also great restaurants around the neighbourhood.
Ralou was very accommodating and went above and beyond to make sure I had a great stay. She really wanted you to feel like a local and experience the culture!
Love the location and how quiet it was! Nothing to complain besides the lack of mirrors. There is only one mirror in the apartment which located in the bathroom.

My husband and I arrived late at night and Georgia was there waiting for us at the apt to explain everything! We even got homemade tractional deserts! Thanks for everything we really enjoyed our stay! And you can't beat that view! We would've slept on the balcony if we could! Thanks for everything!
Fabulous apartment. Has everything you need. Good location. Dimitris was very helpful. I would recommend it to anyone

Dimitris' apartment is fantastic. Very clean and comfortable with all of the amenities you would need, including air conditioning in each room. Well priced in a great location right in the heart of Athens, within walking distance to all of the main sites. Dimitris was a great host. He spoke English extremely well and is easy to get in contact with. We highly recommend this apartment for any stay in Athens.

Had everything you needed, it was clean and very comfortable and Dimitri, the host,  was very accessible, if we ever needed anything he responded immediately. The apartment was in a quiet little street yet close to everything eg transport, shops and places to eat.
Excelente todo ....llegamos bastante tarde y Dimitris estaba esper√°ndonos , nos explic√≥ todo , el piso muy limpio y c√©ntrico.

Very well located, the apartment is nice, clean and with all needed things.
Plus, Dimitris provided a baby cot for our little girl !

this was our first experience with nocarz and it was PERFECT!. The listing was accurate Dimitris has been a great host throughout out trip. He even went that extra mile to make us as comfortable as possible. Helped us in booking taxi's whenever required and was always very prompt in his response

The location of the apartment is also amazing. We couldn't have found a better place to stay in Athens than Dimitis's apartment

This apartment was as described & in a very handy location. Hosts were quick to respond whenever we needed them. Balcony was nice for sitting outside & Friday street market and close by bakery were great. We recommend it...

Ranias apartment is a great place to stay when visiting Athen, this is really close to Acropolis and the city center itself. It is a beautiful neighborhood where you can walk in charming old streets with lots of restaurants and shops. The roof terrace with view over Athens and its surrondings are a great place to relax and eat. Highly recommended.

Holy Moly you must stay here for countless reasons.
1) If there was such a classification as Super Duper Host then she‚Äôd be on it. We followed her advice on 3 food recommendations. All were excellent. In fact we gave the name of one of the restaurants to our Athenian friends to try out. There was a nation wide public employee strike on our day of departure. It included transit workers. The streets were jammed. Taxis hard to find. She arranged to have a taxi pick us up on time and get us from the Acropolis to the airport in one hour.
2) The house is located at the foot of the Acropolis literally. The last road before the rock starts. The neighborhood was created for the stone masons who rebuilt the Parthenon. It‚Äôs been in the family since 1932. The unit itself is nice with two air conditioning systems. Everything works well. Good shower.
3) Finally the roof. For this reason
Alone I would come back. You have a 180 degree panoramic view of the City.

Had a lovely few nights at Vesnas. Close (about 20 minute walk) to the acropolis museum. Where you can find lots of restaurants.
We also enjoyed looking after the stray cats opposite building to the bedroom window! üê±
Prima, super schoon en compleet appartementje in erg leuke wijk. Dichtbij Acropolis, maar toch weg van toeristische drukte. Leuke caf√©s, eettentjes voor locals

What a fantastic stay! Vesna and her husband were very kind and generous hosts‚Ä¶Costas met me at 10pm to help me check in, and they provided tons of helpful information whenever I had questions‚Ä¶I worked from their apartment and the WiFi was great, I clocked it at about 60mbps‚Ä¶the location in Koukaki neighborhood is phenomenal! Within walking distance to tons of bars and restaurants, but away from the super touristy acropolis area‚Ä¶don‚Äôt hesitate to book this apartment, you‚Äôll love it!

My stay at this flat was great. Michalia was a brilliant host and arranged every little detail meticulously. Great communication and overall very pleased with the experience. Seamless procedure from beginning to end. Flat offered at a very competitive price and monthly discount is a huge bonus.
The flat is as shown in the pictures. Super clean and spacious and a joy to live in. Natural light and outdoor space makes this the ideal place for the traveler. Kitchen and living room are conveniently arranged and decorated with attention to detail. Located in one of the best Neighbourhoods of Athens. Safe and with close proximity to shops and restaurants. Near some of the hotspots of the city albeit at times a bit noisy due to traffic.
I will definitely be returning here for business and for holidays and will be staying in much alias apartment again.
I highly recommend both the flat and the host.
Niko

Property is good BUT Host and her relatives are a NIGHTMARE to deal with. The Internet was left unpaid on 3 different occasions, the boiler broke down and it took them 2 weeks to replace and I was left with no hot water, the place was not professionally cleaned and the owners sister came and went as she pleased, constantly disturbing my stay.
I rented the property for 4 months, i spent over EUR 10,000 and in the end I was accused of stealing a room aroma diffuser and a plastic coffee shaker both worth 7 euros.. Upon replacing them, despite the fact that I had not taken them I was accused of stealing towels. Luckily I had receipts of all the sheets, pillows and towels I bought the day I arrived in Athens and was able to win the case with nocarz. I will be carrying this matter further however and will be suing for defamation. On the basis of the character and lack of manners that this family has (owner and her despicable sister Marinela), I would advise you to spend your money elsewhere. There are some lovely places around the area that are owned by people that are not homophobic like the owners of this flat. AVOID at all cost! Not worth the risk..

Would highly recommend. Nancy and Nasir are perfect hosts and the flat is very cosy and homely with nice unique touches. It's a 20 min journey to the centre of town but we didn't find it a problem as the metro is really good in Athens. Top nocarz.
Great place to stay. Location is ideal especially if you want to visit the Acropolis area and the Plaka area by foot. Marilia‚Äôs place is also clean and spacious and really comfortable.

Great apartments, roomy and clean.
The rooftop terrace was a wonderful place to chill out between our trips.
Great communication, we really enjoyed ourselves and would recommend the D&Y Boutique Athens nocarz to everyone!

Il mini appartamento si trova in una zona residenziale di Atene un po' fuori dal centro, ma con una breve passeggiata di 5 minuti si raggiunge la stazione della metro di Attiki e da l√¨ in 5 minuti si √® in piazza Syntagma. Lo spazio √® perfetto per due persone ed √® molto pulito e curato. La comunicazione con l'host √® stata precisa e puntuale. Lo consiglio caldamente!

Spiro's place is the perfect place for your Greek vacation.  20 minutes walking distance to the Acropolis and to restaurant's.  The house was clean and comfortable.  We arrived late in the day and were met by the apartment.  We had a great time.

Amaxing location & personal touches by our host Anna!
Loved our house in the Plaka district of Athens!

Anna es una excelente anfitriona. Nos recibi√≥ con productos griegos y nos proporcion√≥ informaci√≥n y recomendaciones muy acertadas para hacer nuestro viaje mas ameno y mejorar nuestra estadia en Grecia.
El apartamento de Ana estaba limpio, organizando y muy acogedor, con una ubicacion excelente para visitar los principales sitios de interes. Ademas hay restaurantes y comercios cercanos. Lo recomiendo.

I‚Äôm happy to add to the praise from previous guests for Karolos‚Äôs apartment. Stylishly renovated, quiet and with views in multiple directions, it‚Äôs a very comfortable choice for a stay in Athens.
From our point of view, the apartment was well located for exploring the caf√©s and bars (and bookshops!) in Exarcheia, and only a few minutes on foot from Lycabettus hill and the trendy boutiques of Kolonaki. Special recommendation for a morning coffee from The Coffee Tree just around the corner.
Communication with Karolos was quick and straightforward.
Highly recommended!

Great location as it‚Äôs really close to the metro station. Nice coffee shops / restaurants and markets located around the apartment building. Older elevators and common area in building but clean and safe.
This is a wonderful stay. The house is comfortable and beautiful. we like it.we can see a good view when we sitting in the balcony,drinking something and relaxing ourselves

Just not what I expected. washer/dryer combo had instructions in Greek with very small fonts. Host came and had to pull it out to get the cord to connect to a plug on the other side of the wall....once I figured it out, the washer worked well but the dryer part was annoying and difficult. The host offered hangers to dry clothes out on the balcony area but by that time it was almost time to check out

Our stay at Rozalina's place was indeed an unforgettable experience. Everything was in walking distance of less than 10 minutes. The Acropolis hill, restaurants with delicious food and excellent service, bars, metro stops. The house had everything we needed for our stay and excellent view, located in a cute and quiet area that gave us more the impression that we are in a greek island rather than in the very center of a big city. I definitely recommend Rozalina's for a sublime experience in Athens.

My husband and I had a wonderful stay at the apartment. It is clean, nicely decorated, spacious and in a great location.  Rosalina helped us settle in (she even helped us order food for delivery our first night) and ordered a taxi for us at check-out.  Her notes are very helpful and she was also available to answer any other questions and provide more recommendations as needed. The apartment has a full kitchen which was a big bonus compared to staying at a hotel, and has a gorgeous view of the Acropolis from the living and dining room areas. The bathroom is also big; with a spacious shower that never ran out of hot water or water pressure (you learn that these things can be a rare find in Greece).  The apartment is located right at the beginning of the pedestrian-only streets of Plaka where all the great restaurants, bars and shops are located.  When we find ourselves back in Athens, we will definitely stay here again!  Thank you Rosalina for everything!

I chose this apartment for its brilliant view to Acropolis and amazing decoration to prepare for my wedding and for my first night. It was much better than what I expected from the pictures. Very comfortable and convenient location. I will definitely go back one day.
Lovely apartment. Fantastic location. Communication and check in was easy. I would recommend to anyone.

This apartment is beyond belief. Its location, size, cleanliness, and facilities are truly amazing. Marina was a great host, with very quick responses, especially when we had a problem, which she was able to resolve without fuss or delay. Our whole trip was great.

This apartment was the perfect beginning of our adventure in Greece- perfect hostess, location, view, sleeping and, I know it sounds weird but if you know,  you know, perfect bathroom/shower. We are 2 weeks in to our adventure and are still talking about this apartment!!

Marinas apartment was in the heart of Plaka a beautiful neighborhood full of amazing food and culture. We walked everywhere easily for sightseeing and meeting up with tours. We enjoyed every meal in the local tavernas and found sanctuary from the hot sun in the air conditioned apartment which was tastefully decorated. Highly recommend!

Ilias is the nicest host. He answered right away and he made sure we had everything we needed. The apartment has a great view with everything you need for the stay. Great transportation opportunities, shops and restaurant nearby. I recommend this apartment if you're looking for a place to stay in Athens.
Thank you, Ilias!

Our stay in Angeliki's place was perfect. The flat is very pretty and the view is amazing. Angeliki's mother Ionna welcomed us and she was really nice and flexible with the hours. The area, Exarchia, is young, lively and full of nice places. If you are going to Athens, this is definitly the place to stay in !

Very cool and unique place to stay for a couple nights in Athens. Everything was great. Angeliki's mom stocked the fridge with breakfast food for us for all three days which was very cool. Communication was great and the view for the balcony was amazing. It honestly looks exacally like the photos.

It will be unfair to say that the place wasn't clean and beautiful as I never saw it. The location is amazing that's why I chose it. What happened was that I arrived very late and tired from a very long flight, I followed the instructions for self-check-in but the key wasn't there. The host didn't respond to my texts and calls,  it was late too, I guess fair enough, however she should have made sure that the key was there. I couldn't find a hotel and it was very stressful. She responded the next day, apologized and refunded me. Mistakes happen, I hope she'll be more responsive and professional with her next booking.

We stayed at Efi's place on our trip to Athens, and it was a delight. It's located in easy walking distance to Acropolis and Plaka, furnished in a lovely design with complete amenities. Really great stay, thank you!
Everything was perfect ! The view is really amazing, we had a great time there.

We were a family of 3 (two adults and an 8 yr. old) We felt very welcome at Rich's place, everything was as described. Communication was fast, friendly and thorough. Cold drinks in the fridge, fresh fruit, bread were so thoughtful. Great location! Close to Metro and lots of restuarants, clubs/bars. We even walked to many of the sights. Great neighborhood with lots to do but located on a quiet street. Two bedrooms with doors and fold out couch in the office were all comfortable and clean. its a little complicated to get in, but the instructions were very useful so follow them carefully and bring a flashlight if you check in at night. The balcony is nice and big, great for relaxing and so is the living room.  We loved our stay here and would totally recommend it to others. Great price for a great place!

Nous remercions chaleureusement Angeliki pour sa serviabilit√© et gentillesse lors de nos quatre jours pass√©s. Elle nous a donn√© de pr√©cieux conseils sur les balades √† faire autour d‚ÄôAth√®nes et notamment la visite de Heraion Bay et son site arch√©ologique qui nous ont enchant√©s. Nous recommandons son studio avec une immense terrasse avec vue extraordinaire sur la ville et les monuments d‚ÄôAth√®nes en particulier le Parth√©non et l‚Äôacropole. Ce fut un s√©jour enchanteur et atypique. Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir lors d‚Äôun prochain s√©jour. Tout a √©t√© parfait !
Sehr sch√∂nes Zimmer im 4 Stock mit wundersch√∂ner dachterasse und Aussicht zur Akropolis. Gerne wieder

Such a nice and easy experience! Markella & Angeliki doing their best to be absolutely great hosts. Both were always available by messenger. The check in/ out were very clear and explained. Even they were flexibility in time :)
I think the area is not for everyone who comes to Athen, we felt safe in the neighborhood and would definitely book it again.
Amazing view over Athen and Akropolis, even under shower :)
The apartment offers everything you will need. Nice cafes, bars, restaurants and supermarket are around the corner.
Even good to reach by feet, bus..
We loved it, thank you so much üíõ

Absolument pas d√©√ßus de notre s√©jour chez Rich, l'appartement est conforme √† la description, pas de surprises, ou plut√¥t des bonnes comme le calme et la localisation...la station de m√©tro est vraiment toute proche, Gazi aussi (lieu anim√© avec restaurant, bars, activit√©s...) donc un vrai centre ville sans les inconv√©nients, vraiment au calme.
Sinon RAS sur la propret√© et le reste, vous aurez tout ce qu'il faut lors de votre arriv√©e (gel douche, shampoing, lait, eau, bierre, vin, fruits, sel poivre, huile, sucre, caf√©...).
Tr√®s bon restaurants dans le quartier.
Nous n'avons pas vu Rich, mais il est cependant dispo au besoin.
Je confirme donc le bon rapport qualit√©/prix de ce AirB&B

Don't scroll any further! If you have the opportunity to stay here with Dora, book it, book your room right now! I can't explain to you how amazing Dora really is. A couple of weeks ago my friend and I traveled on a last minute trip to Athens and we count ourselves so lucky to have found her. She was a gem! Anything we needed, she was there. Dora gave us great recommendations for both tourist attractions and local secrets, she helped us make the most of our days in the city, so we left having done everything we wanted and more.  She is the sweetest person you will ever meet with a heart that truly wants to make your experience the best it could possibly be. We left feeling spoilt and rejuvenated while having gained a friend, and what felt like a wise mentor to cherish through life. The apartment is a place of dreams, clean and eclectic, with a spacious room that easily transforms into your home while you are there. The view off the balcony that is linked to your room is spectacular and makes you feel like you are truly apart of the bustling haven that is Greece!

Rich‚Äôs apartment is absolutely great:
location is calm, everything is clean, the space is great for 3 to 6 people. It‚Äôs within walking distance from great places (~20 min), subway stop straight to the airport is 4min away.
Rich is very helpful !
I recommend his place !!
We loved our stay in Rich's apartment.Its like a home away from home. Its very clean and have everything we need. Rich is a great host. Highly recommended.
We enjoyed the quiet apartment and the lovely terrace on a pedestrian street. Rich is an attentive and very responsive host. I would recommend this place without hesitation!
excellent appartement tr√®s confortable et tr√®s bien √©quip√©. Rich nous a donn√© plein d indications tr√®s utiles. je recommande
Everything was great! It was close to the station and the house was clean and good. I want to visit here againüòä
The home was very central and can be considered as a very good place for 6 people.
The place was perfect!  We loved our stay and would def recommend!

My wife, my daughter and I spent five days of beauty, light and colors in Athens also thanks to the home of Soula. Of the apartment, we enjoyed the space, indoor and outdoor, furniture, paintings and mosaics. We did not know Soula in person, but we have known and loved her taste and her generous hospitality. Therefore, we highly recommend this apartment, where we hope to be back.

I can't really add much to the superlatives other reviewers have used to describe Soula's flat, but I can say it was the best nocarz experience we have had from start to finish, and we have always been pleased with our nocarz experiences. The flat is loaded with amenities and Soula's attention to detail in predicting our needs was much appreciated. The location can't be beat, and the flat is roomy and quiet, just what the four of us needed after long days soaking up all Athens has to offer. If you visit Athens, and everyone should, make sure you stay in Soula's flat; I can't imagine a better place to stay, and Soula is always looking out for you.

Nous avons √©t√© bien accueillis malgr√© un retard d'une journ√©e d√ª √† un probl√®me de ferry...
L'appartement est identique aux photos, c'est-√†-dire d√©cor√© avec soins, tr√®s bien √©quip√© avec des mat√©riaux d'excellente qualit√©. R√©sidence s√©curis√©e (interphone, ...) de haut standing avec un appartement par √©tage.
Terrasse tr√®s plaisante et arbor√©e.
Le quartier est calme, bien situ√©. L'Acropole est facile d'acc√®s √† pied.
Pour se rendre √† l'a√©roport, il est n√©cessaire de prendre un taxi (notre h√¥te s'est charg√©e de le retenir).
EXCELLENT SEJOUR !
Dora is extremely nice and understanding. You are sure to have a good time if you stay at her lovely house.

Our hosts George and Fani were wery friendly and welcoming. Small and neat apartment is in a quite district on a street with low traffic. It is neither touristic nor business but traditional residential area - just 15 minutes walk to Sintagma - central square, 10 minutes to National archaeological museum. Free wi-fi - sometimes it's an advantage (when You do not want to stay unreachable).
It was just a coincidence that my wife and I and our hosts are architects - so, we had common interests.
Next day after we were back to Moscow our 7-years old daughter said she wants back home... to Athens.

Amazing little place in the heart of Athens, 10 minute walk to everything fun. Maria provided us with maps and recommendations. The restaurant she suggested was one of the best meals we had in Greece. Very clean, very comfy and the little balcony was perfect for a glass of wine and a book. Bathroom was a little small and the hot water takes 10-15 minutes to heat up.

Maria, thank you so much for your lovely hospitality!
The flat was as described. Maria was very helpful. We spent the new years eve together in a bar. You have a lot of space in the flat

First, Maria is a very welcoming and pleasant host. She saved us a parking spot on the street and after showing us the apartment she also showed us around - where the supermarket, bakery and recommended restaurants are. She also provided a highchair and some toys and books for our kid.
The apartment is very spacious and the courtyard is nice and spacious too, as shown in the pictures.
The location is fantastic - 6 minutes from the Evangelismos metro station and 3 minutes from the marble stadium. If you don't mind walking - everything is at reach by foot, including the Acropolis, Syntagma square, Monastiraki flea market and even mount lycabettus.
The price and flexibility were also fair.

We had a great time and would definitely recommend it and stay there again if in the area.
Appartemment spacieux avec climatisation. Le necessaire pour cuisiner. Bien situ√©! Bonne communication avec Maria.

I cannot recommend Pygmalion and his place highly enough! You should come to Athens just in order to stay here. It is a gorgeous spacious tastefully decorated flat just as the photos reveal, plenty of space for 2 or 3, but I had it all to myself as the rate is so affordable. It is super convenient to the metro and a very peaceful neighbourhood with a fairytale restaurant wee I had my best meal in Greece! I loved the place so much I extended my stay by a night.
Pygmalion is a very gracious and accommodating host and responds very promptly to all queries and goes the extra mile for a guest (i.e. he kindly called the bus station for me to see if they found a lost item). We spent a lovely afternoon together for a coffee - he is full of stories and has a traveller's spirit :)

Very nice and confortable place in the heart of Athens. A lot of good bars and restaurants pretty close. Maria was very nice and the communication with her was easy. We really recommend the appartment. :)
We enjoyed a lot our stay ! The apartment is really clean, nice and the terrace really big as described! The host took a lot care of us with food advices.

Amazing place: decorated with taste, a large terrace that is comfortably usable and set up on a way that provides some privacy.
The kitchen is well equipped and the park Pedion Areos is just a few minutes away, providing for nice walks in the mornings and evenings.
What a wonderful place! Great location, good size and comfortable, would stay again!

The host agreed to share the apartment with us while he was there. Though he was very nice and friendly. The apartment is clean, nice. well-equipped, and comfortable for us (we are a 4 member family), especially the view from the root top was absolutely amazing, you will have a 360 view of Athens center. I will definitely recommend this place to my friends!!!
Great stay very hospitable people

Der Jacuzzi ist ein 5x 2m 31grad heisser Pool mit D√ºsen. Mega romantisch bei Nacht! Es ist sehr ruhig und hat jeden Komfort. Der Supermarkt ist nur 50m entfernt!
3 Schlafzimmer, eins mit Bad inkl Wanne.
Extra Bett im Wohnzimmer + riesige Couch.
√úberall Flatscreens und Netflix.
Balkon und Dachterasse!

Perfect location! The apartment is super nice and the view is amazing!
The host is super good!

Pygmalion was friendly, communicative and replied promptly to any queries we had when I came down with a flu and had to look for a local doctor. The apartment was simply perfect. Neat, tidy and well-equipped. Located in a safe residential area of Athens within walking distance to a metro station and a number of supermarkets as well as restaurants. Highly recommended
Everything was perfect. Great stay!

Andronike's appartment is very well located, 5 minutes from the akropolis.
It is very clean, very quiet. We were 2, but it's also ideal for a family with 2 kids.
Andronike was very quick in responding to any question, and all went very smoothly.
We really appreciated our experience there!

I stayed in Haris' apartment with my parents on a small city break in Athens. The place was beautiful and the location great for walking to main attractions but without being based in the most touristy areas. The apartment itself had beautiful old tiles and high ceilings and the most amazing patio, but still felt modern, nicely decorated and homey, and had everything we needed. We felt very welcome because of Haris' approach and his provision of various breakfast items. Would definitely recommend this place!

Harris's place has a great vibe to it, the apartment's location is in the center without being noisy and is well located for great evening hang out at local bars and restaurants or touristy sightseeing (5 min to acropolis park).
The apartment is decorated in good taste and has lovely architecture and design pieces without being to fussy or effortful in these aspects.
The kitchen was well equipped and with heaps of things left for us to make our stay easy and tasty.
It's easy going while stylish in a relaxed manner and has a strong feel of a space which is taken care of with attention.
Harris was very helpful and flexible with our check in when we needed some flexibility. In terms of value for the money it seemed like the best deal we had through the whole trip and Harris made the experience feel personal and us welcomed. We highly recommend
Maya & Ori

This is a great place to stay in Athens - excellent central location, quiet at night and comfortable accommodation. We stayed for 4 nights and were sad to leave. Excellent for a family as the living room and bedrooms are quite separate, so activity in the living room doesn't disturb those in the bedrooms. We would stay here again!
We loved staying here!!!! Very quiet and comfortable! Close to Plaka!!

Todo muy bien. El alojamiento est√° a dos pasos de Acropolis. el departamento est√° limpio y Andronike respond√≠a r√°pido y estaba al pendiente en todo momento.
En su alojamiento tiene todo lo necesario para estar perfecto y muy c√≥modo.
Cerca existen restaurante, super etc. el super plus es que la Acr√≥polis est√° a dos pasos literal.
Ampliamente recomendable.
Anfitri√≥n muy comunicativo, nos dio soluciones para algunos contratiempos al momento. Gran ubicaci√≥n y facilidad de acceso a la vivienda. Repetir√≠a.
Great location, surprisingly quiet for the location. Close to Metro, also has a mini mart which was convenient. Quick walk to major attractions!

Illias' place is beautiful, and exactly as described in pictures. It is in a neighborhood within walking distance to the Acropolis and other sites, yet off of the beaten tourist path, so I felt like I got to see the real Athens.
Illias is such a wonderful host, I have stayed in many nocarz places, and he really went above and beyond. When I arrived he showed me things about the house I needed to know, and left a delicious salad his mother had made. He checked in to make sure everything was going ok, and when I asked him if there was a place I could do laundry, he took care of it. Then he even sent me walking directions to the Metro Stop I needed to get to the morning I left.
I give Illias, and his flat the highest recommendation. Would definitely stay again.

Thankyou for a lovely stay at your property. The place was beautiful and tidy and everything was as descibed and expected, the only downside being the wifi which we were expecting to be working. As it was our first stop in europe it made meeting up with the rest of our travel buddies difficult and also difficult to let our family know we had arrived safely. Aside from that I would not fault anything. We really appreciated that you took the time to show us on a map where all the main sites were, as this made it much easier for us. Thanks for being a great and helpful host!

We loved the area and the place.
The apartment was quite clean, roomy and comfortable for three of us. It has been decorated with an eclectic artistic sense that made for an enjoyable experience; lots of interesting details. The kitchen is well equipped, although we didnt make use of it during our stay.
We also enjoyed the nearby park and sampling many of the restaurants in easy walking distance.
But maybe the best part of the stay was Ilias' communication style. He did a great job of anticipating any concerns or issues, ensuring our stay would be excellent and truly memorable.

Our experience with Maria was amazing and super organized, easy and everything we had hoped for. Maria is a wonderful contact host. She is always on top of things via email. She ask arranged for her neighbour to pick us up and drop us back off along with explanation of the apartment utilities, direction and location. We couldn't have asked for a better experience. The apartment is clean and complete in all essentials. Highly recommend it. Thanks for everything!

Tr√®s joli appartement,tr√®s propre et moderne.
L'accueil se fait jusqu'√† tard (nous sommes arriv√©es apr√®s minuit).
Tr√®s bien situ√© juste en bas de l'acropole.
Parfait
2√®me s√©jour  dans cet appartement,tout √©tait parfait comme d'habitude!
Very nice apartment, new, great location, she even arrange pick up at the airport by his friend danilo who told us about the apartment and plans in Athens... 100% recommended

We had a great time at Maria's. Good location. 15 min walk into Plaka and surrounds. The local area had some wonderful food/restaurants too.
Maria was very helpful with our arrival and departures. The apartment was fantastic for us. Everything we needed.

Acropolis walk apartment is certainly walkable to Athens sights but a little farther away than we realized. We generally found it took us 15 minutes to get to and from the Acropolis metro station. There were things we wanted to see which are farther away (in the area of Monistraki square) so we used the metro to get there. The apartment is very spacious, and yes, the patisserie across the street is exceptional. It made a good home base for us while in Athens. There are also restaurants in the neighborhood which are worth checking out, and Maria offers some recommendations for those. If you need maps, guidebooks, etc she has them all on site. A great stay in Athens!

What a wonderful stay at Ilias‚Äô home. This is full of little pretty things. We had a perfect stay and a very good communication. This is kind of big artist flat with high ceilings and vintage decoration. I feeled at home.
We were 4 adults and 4 kids, and that was super for 3 nights.
The home is close to everything : Acropolis by foot (15min), supermarket by the corner, and a pedestrian street full of good nightlife for drinks and food, a dozen of restaurants just 5-10min away.
Thanks Ilias !

Maria was super responsive to all my questions. The apartment was immaculate. Having Danilo pick me up from the airport combined a knowledgeable tour guide with efficient door-to-door service.
The only downside on the whole stay and this is a problem with my height and the apartment design was that I had to duck in the bathroom. (I‚Äôm 6‚Äô8‚Äù or 205 cm tall)
The free bottle of wine was a nice touch.
I recommend Maria‚Äôs apartments to anyone.

This apartment was a short walk to the Acropolis and just outside the main tourist parts of Athens. It was beautifully decorated, clean, and modern. It had great amenities and Maria even left us a bottle of Greek wine to welcome us! Although she wasn‚Äôt there for check in, she provided us with a contact in the building who was extremely nice and helpful, making check in a breeze!

Great place to stay with restaurants and grocery stores close by. The bakery across the street is awesome and has a wide selection. The apartment is nice sized, the refrigerator is full sized, the washing machine worked well, and the kitchen was stocked so that you can actually cook a full meal with several larger pots and pans. The only issue we had was the Internet being a little spotty at times. If you're visiting on vacation and you spend most of the time sightseeing, this would not be an issue. However, if you are a digital nomad and work online, it can cause some difficulties. Overall, we would definitely recommend it to other travelers.

Really enjoyed to stay here. Maria & Costa great hosts. I recommend this apartment to anyone who plans to stay in Athens. Close to everywhere and there is an amazing bakery across the apartment. They even left a bottle of Greek wine which is very nice. Clean, comfy and secure apartment.

Maria is a great host and her apartment is very spacious and comfortable. It's at a very good distance from the center in a nice area. She even let us a welcome detail that we appreciated a lot. Thank you Maria!
El apartamento es c√≥modo y limpio. A 15 min andando del museo de la acr√≥polis, en un barrio con muchas opciones de cafeterias y restaurantes.

Doros was incredible. He met me at the apartment, showed me around and answered all of my questions throughout my stay. I couldn't have asked for a better host! The apartment is exactly like it is pictured. The building is a bit older but the location and price can't be beat. If I'm ever back in Athens, I will be contacting Doros!!

Nous avons √©t√© vraiment ravis de l'accueil que nous a fait Doros pour notre s√©jour √† Ath√®nes! Il est de tr√®s bon conseil, son logement est id√©alement situ√© et il conna√Æt des bars du meilleur acabit dans la capitale grecque!

Our stay in Doros' place was wonderful. He is a very caring person who told and showed us all around and gave us tips that helped saving money as well.
The place is in a central region so you can choose how you go to places: take a bus right across the street, walk (20 minutes to the historical center) or if you're really really lazy a cab won't break the bank :). It's very safe around too! Exarchia square is 5 minutes away and has a great and cheap souvlaki.
This was my first nocarz experience but I'm pretty sure it will be hard to beat. Kudos to Doros for that.

I stayed here on 6-9 November (4D3N). Location was not that straightforward from the airport but Doros gave good description on how to arrive at the apartment. He was kind to be searching for me at the neighborhood at our agreed arrival timing.

Apartment was very good considering the price. It was large, spacious and with all necessary amenities to make it complete. The living room was also filled with all the guidebooks which the guests are allowed to use. There was also a small balcony for use. Location was at a quiet place with 10 mins walk to the nearest metro station. The only issue was that there's a need to turn on the water heater for 10-15 mins before going for the shower.

Doros was a very kind host who took time to explain his best to his guests. He also followed me to the mobile shop to get the data SIM card after arrival at his apartment. He was very responsive to messages sent as well.

Generally, I will recommend friends and relatives to stay in this apartment.

Great place. Nice homey details. Nice authentic design and feel. There is everything you might need for a family. The streets around are great to walk. Tassos was very welcoming, we had time to have a genuine talk and he gave us great hints. We felt at home rapidly. Great experience. It is hot for Athens is hot even if you use Tassos‚Äôs shading technique :) The fans work great but it is still hot. The terrace is a plus! I recommend highly.

It is not my first time at this great place. Tassos is very accomodating. Always helpful and very responsive. The place is well located. There are great places around to eat and discover. it can be hot but the fans and the shading work great!  I highly recommend.

We have spent a very good time in kika's house. Her appartment is amazing, the same we can see ont the pictures. Very easy from the airport, and the neighbourhood is very attractive. We didn't see kika but she was very reactve by mail. I totally recommend her place.

Kika's duplex apartment is gorgeous, showing exquisite taste. While she wasn't on site, Kika made sure that all of our needs were attended to and checking in and out happened smoothly. A beautiful view from the balcony featured the Acropolis and the surrounding mountains. The maisonette is outside the usual tourist areas, which might be a disadvantage for some but was a plus for us. A great place and a great value.
Elpidoforos gave us a warm welcome and very nice advises for our visit. The appartement is old but still clean and fonctional, with a good location.
Simple and clean apartment. Doros was very helpful in all aspects!
Great location and local tips. Best host ever!

Doros's place is a very nice renovated apartment of the 1960's located near Exarchia in Athens and close to Viktoria station (5' walk). The location is a nice choice for discovering Athens as a tourist but also very authentic. The apartment has everything you would need for a stay (for  a week or more) and a nice balcony. Doros is a great host. We recommend this place with no doubts !

What a great apartment, and what a great host!
Theodore gave us all the info we needed before we arrived and always responded quickly to our messages.
When we arrived at his place he was there to meet us, showed us around, and provided a written guide to the area. He also kindly took the time to go over the map with us and make personal recommendations for things to see and do and places to eat.
The apartment was spotless and looked exactly like the photos and we were amazed by the HUGE terrace with a view. The kitchen had everything we needed and all the supplies I expected to find, from toilet paper to extra blankets, were on hand for us. The location was excellent, just a short stroll from the metro station in a neighbourhood that felt very safe, even late at night. There was a beautiful street market with all the produce you could imagine on Saturday morning and several restaurants recommended all within a 10 minute walk. The supermarket was just around the corner.
We really enjoyed Athens and there was just too much to do in the five days we were there, so I'm sure we'll be back. And we'll be sure to stay here again too.
I would recommend Theodore's 'Apartment in the Sky' without reservation.
Thanks, Theodore!
A beautiful Acropolis view from the balcony! Perfect location for exploring Athens! The close proximity to the Metro and shops meant I could make the most out of my short stay in Greece.

We loved Apartment in the Sky! Amazing balcony and close location to the metro. It was only 2 stops away from the Acropolis area with all of the historical sites, shopping, and many restaurants. It was pretty quiet over by the apartment, which was nice. It‚Äôs on the smaller site, but perfect for 2 people and very cozy.
Theodore was an awesome host, setting up transfers for us and providing lots of information. We would definitely recommend!

Great apartment for a couple for a short stay in Athens! The large balcony is a bonus and the view of the Acropolis and surrounding Athens is amazing during the day and at night! Although the inside is not the biggest, this did not matter to us as it‚Äôs located a couple of minutes walk away from a metro station which takes you to anywhere you need to go in Athens, so we didn‚Äôt spend lots of time inside the apartment! The areas seems very safe and there are some nice bars and restaurants close to the metro station too which is handy if you don‚Äôt want to go into the city centre. Theodore was a great host and check-in was very straight forward. His book of recommendations was incredibly helpful and gave us lots of ideas of where to go! I‚Äôd recommend this place if for a short break in Athens!

Manolis was very friendly and flexible - I arrived in the middle of the night.  The apartment had atmosphere and the outdoor terrace made it feel much larger. The surroundings had everything you could ask for; you could take a jog up to the Lycabetus hill, find nice shops, caf√©s and restaurants within some 100 meters and easily walk down to the city center in a quarter of an hour.
Accueil et emplacement parfaits!
Everything was absolutely perfect, the location was terrific, and Evi was so welcoming and accommodating upon check-in.  I would highly recommend to anyone!
Great value with easy access to where you want to be in Athens. Clean and comfortable . Great host.
The location & decoration are great! Cozy & clean home. We had a lovely stay!

Pros:
1. Good for bachleors
2. Convenient check in
3. Good forspending a night
4. Great view
Cons:
1. Small in size
2. Beds not convenient for more than one couple
3. Not a great idea if you are looking to spend more time in the property
4. Must check exact amenities being promised like breakfast etc. which is not provided

Timmi's apartment is beautiful. It is clean and calm and modern. There is very good transport into Athens centre and the area is relatively quiet. We didn't meet Timmi as we arrived very late due to flight delays, but her lovely daughter greeted us and was very helpful. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a very sophisticated apartment in Athens at a really great price, thanks Timmi!!!

Apartment was excellent and a unique experience given that its a former interior designer /architects office. Timmi and Mena helped with getting us setup, familiarising us with the city and organisined airport transfers for which we are grateful. We took Taxis to and from the main tourist district for under 5euro. Overall a great stay in Athens. Thanks Timmi!

Bel appartement et tr√®s bonne communication avec Timmi avant notre arriv√©e!
Elle a su nous arranger un transfert avec une amie √† 3h du matin pour nous remettre les cl√©s.
Merci beaucoup!
Nous recommandons!!!
Great place to stay! Cool neighbourhood, great view. Highly recomandable

Great apartment. Very central location and exceptionally helpful and friendly. Francis' assistant Christine took care of us and we was very accommodating. If we stay in Athens again we will stay at this apartment.

ŒúŒµŒØŒΩŒ±ŒºŒµ Œ¥œçŒø ŒΩœçœáœÑŒµœÇ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÄŒµœÅŒ¨œÉŒ±ŒºŒµ œÄŒøŒªœç Œ∫Œ±ŒªŒ¨.  ŒöŒ±Œ∏Œ±œÅœå Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÄœÅŒøœÉŒµŒ≥ŒºŒ≠ŒΩŒø. ŒïŒæŒ±ŒπœÅŒµœÑŒπŒ∫ŒÆ Œ∏Œ≠Œ± Œ±œÄœå œåŒªŒµœÇ œÑŒπœÇ œÄŒªŒµœÖœÅŒ≠œÇ œÑŒøœÖ œÉœÄŒπœÑŒπŒøœç.

This is a beautiful location. Central to Athens nightlife as well as all the historical sights. The owner keeps a very close eye during your stay. I had a few people over to use the restroom and was warned about needing to pay fees for any damage to the property. It was a little off putting, but worked out. Lol

Katerina was a great host.  She's personable and makes you feel right at home.  Her home is beautiful with all the comforts and looks just like the photos.  She's a very interesting person and a classic pianist so you'll see some musical equipment, cd's and interesting books throughout the house.  The neighborhood is lovely and just steps from the Acropolis and restaurants and shops.  We had a great time!
Quiet neighborhood close to the Acropolis and restaurants. Spacious and comfortable neoclassical home. As advertised.
This was a beautiful place with breathtaking views!  Super clean and comfortable and a great host!  Highly recommend :)
It wasn‚Äôt too easy to find only because this was my first time here but the room was very nice.
Great place with a spectacular view of the Acropolis! Perfect location!!
ËÄÅÊàøÂ≠êÔºåÊå∫Âπ≤ÂáÄÔºåÈù†ËøëÁ•ûÂ∫ôÔºåÈù†ËøëÂçöÁâ©È¶ÜÔºåÈù†ËøëÂæàÂ§öÊôØÁÇπÔºåÊ≠•Ë°åÂà∞ÂìàÂæ∑ËâØÈó®ÂíåÂÆôÊñØÁ•ûÊÆø‰πü‰∏çËøúÔºåÊé®Ëçê„ÄÇ
The place was amazing! Very comfortable, fun, and convenient location. Just a short walk to the acropolis and restaurants. I will be sure to contact Katerina when I come back to Athens!!

The neo-classical structure of the house was the highlight. A very tastefully maintained house. The location was great, a 10 min walk to Acropolis and the museum. Down the street are some nice restaurants. Katerina was kind enough to arrange for taxi when we required.

Logement tr√®s agr√©able, avec beaucoup de personnalit√©. Tr√®s proche de sites remarquables et de diff√©rents quartiers sympas. Petits bars & restos sympas tout pr√®s. Katerina est tr√®s disponible. Merci √† elle pour ses d√©licates attentions d'accueil!
Fantastic apartment with the most beautiful views ‚Ä¶ perfectly located for a stay in Athens ‚Ä¶ a must for anyone that wants to be in the best location for site-seeing

We had a fantastic time in Athens in George's apartment. The flat is larger than expected, very comfortable and very clean. The flat is in a great area; lots of restaurants and within walking distance of all the attractions. George was easy to contact and an overall great host! Highly recommended!

Katerina‚Äôs flat is in a great location. It is set in a quiet street and yet the bustle of Plaka and the Parthenon is a 10 minute walk away.
We needed a taxi to take us to Piraeus to catch a ferry and Katerina kindly organised this for us.

We stayed in Katerina's place for just one night.  Although these were last minute plans, Katerina was graciously able to accommodate us. The apartment is more like a home. I have stayed in many nocarz's but this is the best one so far.  Tastefully furnished and designed with beautiful personal artistic touches.  It has everything you need.  Of course, Koukaki is a great neighbourhood. Feels like a village inside the bustling city.

Lovely home in a great area! Loved all of the artwork, super clean and Katerina was so helpful with recommendations for places to eat, shop, visit.
Will definitely stay here again!
Thank you very much, everyone loved it! especially the Parthenon !!! this incredible feeling

Great place to stay while visiting Athens.  Centrally located to the train, restaurants, shopping, all the sites and tour buses.  Sandy was an excellent host.  Met us at the train station, showed us around, provided us all the information we needed and more.  Loft had plenty of room for the three of us.

El studio es muy acogedor con unos lindos jardines, Romanos esta muy pendiente de sus hu√©spedes y su ayuda es muy √∫til, al igual que su mam√° Maria; perfecto para estad√≠as cortas en un barrio interesante donde se puede tener una mejor idea c√≥mo viven los locales.
Great place to stay pictures do not do it justice. Great area close to everything.

Romanos was very friendly and communicative regarding our stay. When we arrived he welcomed us to this beautiful oasis in Exarchia. He gave us a wonderful info about the area and what to do while in Athens and had made an extensive map of places to visit while in town. Kallidromiou is a perfect stay if you like bars cafes and cosy restaurants. In brief one of the best experiences we've had with nocarz so far, and that says alot! Thank you Romanos and your family for a fantastic stay! Hope to come back real soon again! /Tova & Chia

Room clean and spacious. Accommodation very pleasant and bathroom is great. Very easy to get to tourist places as near metro, and also on the airport line. Great places nearby for food. Great value for money

It was a great stay. Even if it was a room in a shared apartment, it still felt like I had my own private space.
Nick was so friendly. Location not in the middle of the center but its only 15 minutes walking distance.

We loved this fab little spot - in a fab neighbourhood for restaurants and bars - next to Steffi Hill which was lovely to climb and had a great view of the city!
A lovely flat, easy check in. Many thanks.
it was perfect! great location, lots  of space, fully equipped, and great communication with barbara.
Wonderful location, very cosy and artistic home! We simply loved it and hope to come again!
Truly a beautiful apartment. Full of private treasures . Excellent location, and at the same time quite. Enjoy the view of the acropolis every night . So good I would send my mother!

This place was the perfect location! It literally feels like you‚Äôre living in Athens. The best part is the rooftop view of the Acropolis. We would drink our coffee up there in the morning and feel so lucky to be there. Also the place is so close to all the best tourist things like the Temple of Zeus, Acropolis, Plaka & Monistiraki

Thank you for a lovely stay in Athens. Great location, a home from home and lovely welcome on our arrival. Easy walking distance to the Acropolis and an amazing view of it from the apartment roof terrace. Close to so many restaurants and shops and yet once inside the apartment you can enjoy peace and quiet.

Nick is a great host! He collected me from the metro station when I got in so I wouldn't get lost finding his apartment in the dark. When I had problems with my key, he swapped it immediately. He offered some tips on good places to eat near his place, invited me to use the fridge/oven, and also checked in with me during the week to make sure everything was okay.

As for his apartment, it was the perfect location for my trip to Athens. He lives close to the metro station which gets you directly into downtown in about 10 minutes; he's also close to the conference centre, which was important as I was in town for a conference. The room was clean and a good space - it looked as is shown - and also has it's own keys to get in. The bed and pillows were comfortable and the desk was useful for working on my laptop. It was also great to have a private bathroom, rather than having to share. There was a little bit of noise from about 6 am on one or two of the mornings from the upstairs neighbors, but it really wasn't a big deal for me. As a solo female, I felt safe in the area, even when returning to his apartment late at night.

Nick's place is a great alternative to a hostel or hotel and I would recommend you stay with him! I know where I'll be going when I return to Athens!
It was a hassle-free stay! Nick even met me at the train station and helped me with my bag as we walked to the place. Walked to all the key sites in Athens from there. Would stay here again. :)

Amazing spot- lots of character, comfortable, and clean. Romanos was so helpful and kind. Thoughtful touches to the apartment- cold water, fresh oranges, delicious food upon arrival. Would definitely stay again.

We finished our Greek trip in a peaceful place in the heart of the alternative neighborhood, really young with plenty of bars and restaurants. We really liked it, close to everything for visiting. The welcome was done by Romanos' mum really kind with little attentions really appreciated. We recommend it for sure !

Nick was very helpful. He suggested places near by and helped us chek in early. Communicating with Nick in English was easy.
His place is close to a metro and bus station. Also you get taxi in no time. It's close to the main market area of the city.

Beautiful and spacious apartment which felt like a home. Grand old style building on a lively square which was exactly what we were after. Lots of bars, cafes and restaurants nearby - and with the metro just outside super well connected. We arrived during a cold week but Isabella left us heaters and there are air cons in the bedrooms that also provide heating so we managed to stay warm enough. Overall, highly recommended. Would love to return.

The nocarz and Sofia were both fantastic! Unfortunately my wallet was stolen on the way to the nocarz from the airport and Sofia did everything possible to help me! She even took me to the police station and helped me arrange everything with my credit card. The flat is exactly as pictured and is only 5 minutes to the metro plus 15 to the Acropolis. Such a great value for money! Would highly recommend this flat to everyone!
We had a nice stay, feeling like a local in a neighborhood with a lot of variety and close to the public transport

Het appartement is geweldig! lekker ruim, mooi terras, leuk kleurrijk ingericht en van alle gemakken voorzien. De buurt is fantastisch met lekkere restaurants en alle bezienswaardigheden op loopafstand. Alexander is een heel goede host. Wij werden opgewacht bij het appartement en kregen goede tips voor restaurants. Ook reageerde Alexander heel snel bij vragen en is flexibel. Wij hebben een geweldige tijd gehad en raden dit appartement zeer aan. Wij komen graag nog eens terug!

I stayed here for two weeks, and it was really wonderful. I was greeted with a bottle of wine and so many interesting recommendation, the host is so lovely and thoughtful. The neighborhood is idea for me - quiet with cute cafes and places to eat, but also really close to all the main attractions. Loved it!

Definitely, this accommodation will not disappoint anyone - I staid at Orestis‚Äôs flat for nearly an entire week at the end of November, and was more than thrilled to find out that both my expectations about the flat as well as about being situated in a very agreeable quarter of Athens were fully fulfilled! Grab your breakfast (delicious Greek sweets and a coffee sprinkled with cinnamon) in the bakery just two houses around and go back to the flat to enjoy. The balcony will be sunlit around noon, so if you consider to sit there, better take a kind of breakfast-brunch! The gorgeous sight of the Akropolis can be admired already when you walk for some minutes only,  and the flat is such a good starting point for any walk to the ancient places of interest! Orestis gave me such nice tipps about where to go to in Athens, and even some details about greak mythology and history or about culinary specialties like Rakomelo - really an extraordinary likeable host! I enjoyed my stay in Athens and in this accommodation fully - thumbs up!!

Vacance en famille √† 4 √ßa √©t√© en absolu notre meilleure exp√©rience nocarz! Sofia est une h√¥te parfaite, attentionn√©e, gentille qui pense √† tout. l'appartement est un vraie bijoux, tr√®s beau, avec vraiment tout ce dont on peut avoir besoin et m√™me plus. La petite terrasse sur laquelle prendre le petit d√©jeuner est tr√®s belle et la d√©co compl√©t√©e par les peintures de chats de Sofia tr√®s belles. l'appartement est silencieux et le quartier √©l√©gant et central. Tout a √©t√© parfait je recommande!!

We absolutely loved this space! There were nine of us in the travel party and we couldn‚Äôt have felt more welcomed! The location was great with plenty of activities nearby. We are all mid to late 20s and were huge fans of the surrounding bars and lounges. The street art in the area was a nice touch. Also, we loved the quick tour of the neighborhood when we arrived. I would highly recommend this location!

A wonderful flat in an amazing location conveniently placed between the vibrant centre and posh Northern suburbs.
You will find it difficult to leave the flat and explore the city as its outdoors space and breathtaking views are a heart stealer.
highly recommended to anyone visiting thw city.

Marika was very accommodating. We had a long day ahead of us as we landed at 9AM after 14hrs of travel and Marika along with Lia‚Äôs help made it very smooth and easy for us upon arrival. Marika booked the transport from the airport through Niko, who was also helpful. We ended up using him for other taxi trips that we needed reliable transfers. (Port transfers early in the morning)

We stayed for 3 nights in Athens and the room worked out very well! It's a small space but we were out exploring all day. Plus the beauty and spaciousness of the patio was breathtaking. This is a very private space with a few offices located on the lower floors and Marika‚Äôs owns a few spaces in the upper portion of the building. Very clean and the bathroom seems very new and we enjoyed taking showers after our long days in Athens.

Our first two days were spent visiting them major sites and on the third day we took a day trip to Hydra (strongly recommended if you are heading to the Cyclades islands and want to see a small piece of the Saronic islands).

Enjoy the beauty of the Acropolis at sunset if you have a chance, the sun setting on the ruins is fantastic and I will surely never forget. If we're ever back in Athens, I will surely book here again.

The neighborhood that we stayed in was magnificent. The description on the booking was very accurate on the apartment being in a very central location, also the metro was very close to us so you have the freedom to get anywhere. Though the apartment was a bit smaller than we expected all the amenities were brand new and very modern. Also, the view from the terrace was breathtaking. It was magnificent to wake up to the Acropolis and it also looked gorgeous in the nighttime. This is a nice and convenient spot for a couple.

Danae was awesome and very considerate of us arriving early. The apartment was amazing. Modern. Clean. Felt right at home. And so close to everything that we could walk around day or night. Neighborhood was safe.

The view and the location are amazing! Starting and ending days on the balcony with the view of the Acropolis was incredible. The space was small but enough for 2 and encourages you to go outside on the balcony. The A/C felt great in the summer heat and the retractable awning was a nice touch. There is no kitchen here but being in Plaka means you have many restaurants nearby.
Muy bien ubicada. R√°pido acceso a la acr√≥polis y al metro.

Ilias & Danae's place is quite simply the perfect spot to explore the central area of Athens. It is a well equipped, attractive place (with a lovely balcony) in an equally attractive neighbourhood with plenty of restaurants and cafes nearby. Our hosts were very helpful with tips, arranging transport and making our trip to Athens easy and hassle-free. Highly recommended!

The flat is in a super location. It is a quiet street in a residential area right next to the Acropolis. It is surrounded by a number of excellent small cafes and bijou shops and is in perfect walking distance from all of the main central attractions. Everything you might need (small supermarkets, quiet bars, cafes, recycling point, and a few top end eating places famous across Athens), is two minutes away - look no further. Akropoli and Syngrou-Fix metro stations (red line) are both very close.
The balcony is a perfect size for two or three to sit out and have a glass of wine, and the flat has been decorated tastefully and with minimum clutter. The kitchen and bathroom was perfect for my 4-week stay.
Throughout my stay, Ilias and Danae were superb hosts and always very quickly responded to any queries through the nocarz site.
If you want to stay somewhere very close to the centre, but get a feel for an old Athenian neighbourhood that isn‚Äôt overrun with tourists, this is a perfect choice.
Thank you both for starting my move to Athens so perfectly!
Lenka and Tamara's home is spacious and comfortable and in a great location in Athens for tourist purposes. Walking distance to everything we wanted to do and easy access from the airport via metro.

fantastic location,  restaurants and bars right outside the door, and a load more great bars, 5 mins walk. Athens a very walkable city, we walked everywhere from the apartment,  didn't need public transport at all. fine big apartment,  as others said, could do with a lick of paint here and there, but overall I think good value for money. only reason we wouldn't stay again was no air conditioning, which we did know about beforehand,  but we didn't think it would be such an issue for us.

Rio's place is top notch and his hosting is perfect. On arrival he showed us around the neighbourhood and was never far away if we needed any advice or help! The place was immaculate and just perfect for what we needed! Highly recommended
Lovely and comfortable apartment within walking distance to historic attractions and public transport. The host was very kind and helpful.

We stayed at Lida's apartment for a month and it felt like home from the very first day. the view is amazing and the place is very well equipped! And actually looks better than the pictures :)
Lida was very nice and easy to communicate!
we will definitely come again!
Thank you for everything ‚ù§Ô∏è
Perfect stay in Athens in this stylish apartment. The interior is impeccable and the area is wonderful. If you only have time for a short stay in Athens, stay here!
What an amazing location!
Great place to stay. Close to everything. Easy separate access. Would stay again
Great location, highly recommended
Amazing location, close walk to everything

We loved our stayed at Despoina‚Äôs annex. It was a place of real calm and serenity whilst being right in the middle of the old town and super close to all the big attractions and shops. I‚Äôd highly recommend staying here whilst in Athens.

Great value! 10-20 mins walk from all sightseeings. I never took public transport during my stay in Athens. Rio, his wife and their son are all very nice! Friendly neighbourhood as well! "Sorry for keep you waiting for the first day, Rio. You should have had more football time with your boy!"

Makis was an extraordinary host. He made our stay extremely comfortable and he made sure that all our plans would fit perfectly. He also gave us some recommendations for restaurants and guided tours, and his apartment is really in the center of Athens! It was ideal.

I wish I had met Makis but as I was delayed I only spoke to him on the phone and he seemed lovely. His house is so cool and quirky. It's in a great area. You can see the Acropolis from his sitting room window and there is a fantastic view from his roof garden. It is minutes walk from the metro at Monastiraki which means it is perfect for accessing the airport. The bedroom is at the back so it is very quiet in spite of the action on the street. I felt instantly at home there. I would certainly hope to stay here again the next time I am in Athens.
Perfect Place! Thank you Michael for all your help. I strongly reccomend.

Loved staying here! Rio's family were so so accommodating. Would definitely stay again if I return to Athens. They also recommended a fantastic Greek restaurant nearby where the food was just incredible. Thanks again!!
Beau s√©jour, bien situ√© , tout ce qui faut
100% recommended.
Awesome little loft apartment close to everything. On a quiet side street. Highly recommend!

I was very happy with this apartment, it had plenty of room and all necessities I needed.
Contact with Panagiotis and Roula was fast and I got very clear advice and information about how to get to the apartment (all the way from the airport).
I was told to be in touch if there was anything I needed to know, that was really nice and made me feel welcomed.
Checking out was flexible which I also appreciated.

Les appartements sont tr√®s agr√©ables et situ√©s dans un quartier central.
Costas est un h√¥te exceptionnel, tr√®s aidant et compl√®tement disponible et r√©actif.
The appartments are very nice and placed in a central district.
Costas is an extraordinary host, very helpfull and completly available for us.

Greg est un h√¥te de qualit√© qui nous a accueuilli avec le sourire. Ils nous a donn√© plein de conseils concernant la ville et les visites √† faire.
L appartement est tr√®s agr√©able et proche du m√©tro qui se trouve √† 5min √† peine de marche. En une station vous voil√† a Syntagma. Une sup√©rette toute proche et un supermarch√© √† 5min √©galement, tr√®s pratique.
N'h√©sitez pas !

The apartment was clean and spacious, exactly how it's portrayed in the pictures. The neighborhood felt safe and it was nice being a few minutes away from the tourist area so you can get a feel for what it's like to really live like a local. Greg was also a great host, he answered all of my numerous emails and questions and when we hit a travel delay he made sure to stock the fridge with breakfast and even bought a traditional New Years cake for us so we wouldn't miss out! You're close to everything you need and you have all of the comforts of home.
Nice place in a very especial neighborhood. Totally in the center with the beautiful Olympieion a few steps away!
Rios place was right in the middle of everything you would like to see in Athens.  Also the breakfast spot just down the road is amazing and I can thank Rios wife for that recommendation.

I had a pleasant experience in Athens thanks to Greg's apartment and his  hospitality.  The apartment was very clean and the photos are close to the reality. The location is perfect, close to the touristic objectives.

A beautiful apartment with a view of the Acropolis. Very comfortable, clean, and conveniently situated in the Plaka, a beautiful old neighborhood with lots of souvenir shops and restaurants. All the major sights are within easy walking distance, as well is the Metro to the airport.  The apartment is old-fashioned--the hot water system and the hand-held shower take a little getting used to--but for us that added to its charm. We appreciated that the host  offered suggestions for sights and eateries to visit in the neighborhood. This apartment might be problematic for a light sleeper; the pedestrian traffic outside mostly dies down by 9 or 10 p.m., but occasionally a noisy lout will make himself heard later in the evening. This wasn't an issue for us, however, and being so centrally located was well worth a little background noise. We really loved this place and were sad to leave. We hope to come back!
Excelente todo

The apartment is perfectly located in the heart of Athens. The view to the Acropolis is overwhelming - therefore we enjoyed having breakfast on the balcony. We had a warm welcome by Kelly: she gave us useful hints for our stay and answered patiently all our questions. We highly recommend this place.

If you are planning to travel to Athens, look no further. You must stay at Magda's place. Magda is such a great host. She checked in with us ahead of time and arranged airport pick
up. Her place is in the heart of Plaka right near all the great restaurants, shops, the Acropolis museum and the Acropolis. The apartment is spacious with a comfortable bed, nice living and dining room and kitchen. Definitely recommend staying at her place !!!
Aggeliki was a wonderful host! Her apartment was really comfortable and the kitchen was great! The location is awesome, just down the street from a few cafes and restaurants.

This place has amazing views as others have said. Aris was there once we arrived, brought some food for the group of 7 that was in our party and was not even annoyed when we had to call him at 6:00 am on Sunday because we locked the door and left some personal belongings in the room. I would highly recommend this place and hopefully you are the lucky one that gets to stay in the room with the view that we spend every evening on. Thank you Aris !!!

Id√©alement plac√© l'appartement est confortable et conforme √† la description.  La vue de l'acropole sur la grande terrasse est √©poustouflante. L'appartement fait vite oublier les escaliers assez raides pour y acc√©der. Nous avons √©t√© bien accueilli et l'emplacement de cet appartement permet de tr√®s belles visites.
Aris is a generous and accommodating host. His home provided generous amenities and his refrigerator was well stocked.
This flat is perfect ! Aris was very nice and availabe. we recommand.

The place is very nice, spacious and comfortable. Easy to find and easy to check-in. Terrace is amazing, view is as on pictures. Several secured parking spaces within 100 meters which is very comfortable for travelers with car. Btw, there is a very nice library of various books on various languages in one of the bedrooms, I enjoyed very much reading one book about Ancient Greek art in English during midday rests.
