From the minute we arrived and stood on the balcony with that amazing view we were in love. The apartment had everything we needed. The beds were comfortable and it was fantastic to have a kitchen with washing machine! I would highly recommend this apartment for your stay in Athens.

Perfect apartment, quite bug terrace with a view to Acropolis. Gorgeous view during the evening time!
The apartment has everything you need and there are plenty bedrooms with private bathrooms.
Kitchen is small but cosy.
Check in and check out is very easy.
The apartment is located in the city center, in the areas of cafes, bars and restaurants. It can be a bit noisy because of the parties nearby, but at the same time everything is very close.

Lefteris was a friendly and helpful host. We loved the flat. The terrace was a lovely place to chill. The flat functioned really well and was stylish. The area was really good. Quiet, with good interesting cafes and restaurants, some had good live music on certain nights. There is a good supermarket in same street.
We loved Athens and the Athenians as a whole. We would want to try and stay with Lefteris again if we come back to Athens.
Everything worked perfectly. The terrasse was beautiful. Outside kitchen charming. Zannis was quite nice ‚Äì can also recommend his well sorted shop around the corner.
Amazing owner and so helpful. Stunning place
Everything was just as described. The apparent was very nice and in a great location.

- Excellent location with amazing view to Acropolis.
- Apartment is clean and well sized (5 guests felt very comfortably)
- Host was very helpful

Panos has been extremely helpful. He spent more than one hour helping me buying the boat tickets, when I found it difficult to pay via credit card.  And again waited for us a longtime at the flat.  (Please note the metro comes every half an hour.  Adult ticket is 8 euro, child ticket 4 euro). The flat is highly recommended, very central.  (If you want medium to hard mattress, this flat may not be fore you)

Phaidon and the apartment were both great! The location was amazing - incredibly close to the metro, great bars, and restaurants. My family and I had a great time exploring the area and felt very safe and Phaidon couldn't have been more helpful. He let us know about things before we knew we needed to know them (e.g. that a transportation strike was happening) and went out of his way to answer our questions and requests. The shower was a little tight but that's likely to be expected in older cities like Athens. If (but hopefully when) I come back to Athens, I'll definitely try to stay here again. I loved this city!

Our first nocarz experience was great!  Phaidon's place is roomy and has the conveniences of a whole, clean and well managed apartment.  Its location is just perfect for tourists - you can walk to most central locations such as the Acropolis, Plaka and the Acropolis museum and many more, equally you can walk to bars/restaurants used by the locals (Phaidon has a great guide to the best ones).  There's a min-mart just around the corner and also a bakery - freshly baked croissant in the morning if you want - take them over to the coffee shop(s) and have your morning fix.  Phaidon is a super, flexible and responsive host, he even arranged to arrive early one morning and was our personal Athens/surrounds tour/activity planner!  Thank you :)
God lejlighed med god beliggenhed.

Nice accommodation in the heart of Athens at the foot of the Acropolis. Comfortable and well-equipped apartment for 4-5 people. Everything worked great. The host is kind and responsive, information and a map of the area have been prepared. WiFi works well. Ideal location - Acropolis, Plaka, Syntagma Square, Monastiraki and many other sights within walking distance, metro 5 min, various public transport 10-15 min. There are shops nearby for food and an infinite number of cafes with national cuisine and restaurants, as well as fast food places. The beach can be reached in about 30-40 minutes. Convenient access to the airport.
We definitely recommended!
Very practical and calm appartement! 5mn from acropole entrance, all basic shops nearby. I recommand!

Phaidon was a great host, super responsive and was very helpful, be it sharing local recommendations or questions about the apartment. The apartment was as advertised and location is great, easy access to almost everything with the metro stop just steps away. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay there!
Perfect location, absolutely stunning loft space, very clean, beautifully decorated. Corinna and Stratis are top notch hosts, fast, helpful, and really friendly. Definitely would stay again!
Apartamento super bem localizado, seguro e espa√ßoso. Perto de muitas atra√ß√µes tur√≠sticas e linhas de metr√¥, com bastante coisas para fazer √† noite por perto. Recomendo bastante :)

I was very happy with everything. Antonis made me feel like home. Location is great - lazy people can use metro (very near), active people can easily walk to Akropolis, Plaka or Syntagma, it takes about 25 minutes by foot. Neighborhood feels safe and quiet.

The studio is equipped with everything you may need - microwave, fridge, stove, washing machine, TV, DVD player... etc. It has a terrace, which makes it even more comfortable.

I would recommend this place without hesitation. No drawbacks. Thanks, Antonis!
We had a very short stay in route to Santorini, but really enjoyed this location and view. The apartment was very cozy and we had everything we needed to enjoy the city.

Room was clean, good supplied, not luxuries and small but all was ok.
Nearest neighborhood was not interesting, mostly auto workshops :) but close to metro, and not that far from Acropolis.
Be advised that apartment is very near of busy street but the balcony door kill notices if closed.
Air-condition blew directly on bed but after some tweaks we adjust it too.
Generally it was very nice stay.

I'm very happy that I've chosen Antonis' place. It was my best experience on nocarz.
Charming studio with all requied and great location. There was no one problem during my stay.
And Antonis was very hospitable and friendly, thanks him a lot.

You want to stay in this place for the location and superb views of the Acropolis. We went to restaurants that had views only to realize that our patio had the best views and we ended up ordering delivered food in our big private patio and enjoying the views. The location is 2 minutes from the museum and 5 minute walk to the Acropolis. Plenty of restaurants nearby and close to most site seeing places. The apartment itself is cozy and equipped with most necessities.

Lovely apartment with views of the Acropolis in fantastic location. Close to great restaurants, walking distance to all tourist sites. Easy check in, Aristides was very helpful and responsive. We enjoyed our short stay.

Thaleia was a great host and the apartment was just what we needed for our quick stay in Athens for the night. The location is awesome--a quick 10 minute walk from the metro station and on the blue line, so it has good access to the airport. You can even get a peek of the acropolis from the awesome balcony. The rooms were both a comfortable size and the beds provided a great night's sleep. the neighborhood is really quiet, which was just what we needed after a long day of travelling. The hot water was a little tricky, so be sure to ask for specific instructions on that. Other than that, everything was great and I would highly recommend Thaleia's apartment for your Athens visit.
It is a nice apartment in a perfect location with a very hospitable host. The host helped out with all we needed and always replied quickly.

Le mega plus: l‚Äôemplacement √† 2 pas de l‚ÄôAcropole, dans une rue n√©anmoins calme. Suivez bien les instructions pour trouver l‚Äôentr√©e.
L‚Äôappartement est tr√®s rudimentaire parcontre.
La terrasse sur le toit offre une belle vue. Bon accueil, possibilit√© de laisser les valises la journ√©e si vol tardif.
Je recommande pour les voyageurs voulant avoir un emplacement id√©al √† bas prix mais pas √† ceux soucieux de la qualit√© et confort de leur logement.
We really had good night here, you can drink and enjoy Acropolis night view at rooftop. It just take 5 min to Acropolis. I really suggest this place to you everyone.

Extremely well located at the foot of the Parthenon, it's a cosy apartment and the rooftop view doesn't disappoint. It should be noted this a highly touristic area, but it still has its charm. Be sure to eat at To Kafeneio around the corner !

Wonderful place to stay in Athens! It was a wonderful location, close to all the sites, while still being in a quiet part of town. A mere 20 or so minute walk to the base of the Acropolis! And we loved the rooftop garden where we enjoyed breakfast looking at the Acropolis in the morning! Deni was very helpful with suggestions on how to transport ourselves to the apartment from the Athens airport which was greatly apprecieated. Highly recommend this place!
Very good location, nice roof garden, clean and basic Appartement. Thank you!

Location is fantastic! Right in the Plaka with several restaurants, bars, and shops nearby. It is also very near the Acropolis, other major historical sites, and museums, and is just a short walk from several major metro stations. The apartment itself was hard to find initially and check-in was a little tricky as no one was there to meet us or show us the apartment (although admittedly our flight was delayed and we arrived quite late at night). The bathroom layout was also unusual. Our host, however, was very responsive to email and sent pictures to help us find the apartment.  I recommend this place for short stays in the Plaka area.
Thank you so much! He is the nicest man! I enjoyed athens life so much. He has so nice view looftop and gardens. He and his mom so kind and I felt like get a family. Thank you.
We had a nice stay at Denitsa‚Äôs place. Very well located in the heart of Plaka. Thank‚Äôs a lot!

pros
- location
- terrace
- warm water + functionning wifi
cons
- the room is like an oven (more than 28C) and the AC is antique and not functionnal (several fans in the room show this is not a new issue). The host advised to turn to the max the AC in the living room but it didnt help.
- stuffy + lingering strong cold tobacco smell in the whole flat

This is an excellent property managed extremely well by the host. The location is unbeatable. The property itself is exactly as advertised. Thank God the air conditioners worked extremely well because Athens was going through a heat wave when we were there. Everything is within a short walking distance of this property.  The property is in the exact center of everything.   The host's recommendations for stores for activities and for restaurants was was detailed and excellent.  Is both checking and check out were incredibly easy. I could not recommend this property higher.
The studio is amazing! It's just in the central of Athens and not far always from the Piraeus port. Host is very nice.

The Loft is so beautifully decorated, we felt like we had our own private paradise hidden in the middle of the city. The Loft was immaculately cleaned, everything we needed was provided including coffee, bottled water and even some fruit. Francee met us at the train station and walked us to the accommodation. She provided a city map and recommendations for restaurants and sight seeing, such a friendly welcome to the city of Athens. Honestly cannot fault a single thing about The Loft. If you're staying in Athens you need you stay here, you will not be disappointed.

Gorgeous two bedroom apartment, decorated with beautiful tropical plants, footsteps away from Plaka.
Most of all, Francee made us feel like family, was extremely helpful with restaurant suggestions, and even wrote us with helpful information about the islands we were heading to after our stay.

Thank you Francee for a fabulous stay in Athens! From beginning to end, Francee was proactive, friendly and communicative, and remained extremely flexible throughout. The little touches are what really made this nocarz stand out. Your apartment was absolutely stunning, a real gem, super clean - and in a fabulous location right by Monastiraki square, and within minutes of more excellent restaurants than we could fit on our itinerary! We took the metro from the airport straight to the square and walked to the apartment in a couple of minutes. We loved the Arcopolis, but go as early in the day as you can to avoid the crowds. Don't miss the museum there either. Top eateries include Tylixto for wraps and Lukumades for dessert two doors down. Elvis for souvlaki. Ceci for Chinese and Little Kook for sweet treats and amazing decor. Thank you So much Francee, we hope to return soon!
Excellent!

Perfectly clean, silent and comfortable space for 2, for sure pleasant in sunny summer heat, just bit dark on a rainy day. Near to Akropolis, park, Akropolis Museum and nice restaurants. There was a lot of different food for breakfast, cookies oil etc & grapes, but this was the first place on our holiday where we didn't get local farmed food and fresh bread etc from bakery.
Had a beautiful stay, and felt right at home in her charming space.  The courtyard was gorgeous and a welcoming place to enjoy our morning coffee before exploring Athens.
ŒåŒªŒ± ŒÆœÑŒ±ŒΩ œÄŒøŒªœç Œ∫Œ±ŒªŒ¨ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÑŒø Œ¥ŒπŒ±ŒºŒ≠œÅŒπœÉŒºŒ± ŒµŒØŒΩŒ±Œπ œÄŒøŒªœç Œ∫Œ±ŒªŒ±ŒØœÉŒ∏Œ∑œÑŒø.

We had a brilliant time staying at Anna's apartment. It was spacious and clean, and equipped with everything we needed and more. We loved sitting out on the little balcony to have breakfast in the morning, or a beer in the evening. The location is absolutely perfect - tucked away on a quiet street so there's no trouble sleeping at night, but within easy walking distance from all the main sights and great restaurants and bars. (In fact, the location is so good that apart from the trip to and from the airport, we only took the metro once during our stay!) Anna is a great host as well - she has a massive file full of recommendations for things to see, places to eat, etc. and although we didn't meet her in person, her messages were really welcoming and she was super quick to respond to any questions we had. We'd definitely stay here again if we return to Athens!

Panos ,organised everything for us to make our stay although only for a few hours easy , from taxis to and from Port And Airport next day ,as soon as we pulled up he was there greeting us showed us the apartment and gave us a informative short guide to what we could do in a short space of time, answer all our touristy questions to negotiate Athens with ease .
Panos provided a welcome pack of essentials so we didn't need to find a Super Market we could get on with our adventure in Athens .
The view of the Acropolis from the outside balcony was amazing as we watched it illuminate as dusk falls a sight I will never forget . Thank you Panos

The location is great, very easy to get everywhere. The large balcony from which you can see the Acropolis was a great space to use for morning , afternoon rest and recharging and late night cap. Everywhere was very clean and Panos, your host, very helpful.

We are full-time travelers and spent a month at Panos's place with our two small dogs. We loved the amount of space and that you feel like you're at home and not a rental. There is another balcony to the rear which makes the apartment very sunny, our dogs could lay out in the sun even in January. Panos definitely deserves his 5 stars for communication, he responds quickly & thoroughly, walked us through the apartment, gave us tons of information on Athens...he's an incredibly nice guy. His mother lives around the corner so if you have an urgent need she can help immediately. Because we were there for a month we had the chance to chat with her, now we know why he's such a nice guy. The apartment is perfect for someone who wants to experience real Athens but also be close enough to conveniently visit the tourist sights, whether in the city or along the coast.
Other items:
Panos has every TV series ever made and if that's not enough, you can also watch Netflix.
For those with a car, the parking spot is around the corner, is off the street and under cover. We have a large vehicle and it fit perfectly.
We loved the street market on Saturday, there's a fish section that looked diverse (we don't eat meat so only glanced at) and fell in love with the vegetables. The produce was some of the freshest and largest we've seen at very low prices. There is a Friday market in the opposite direction, we didn't shop at it so I don't know how large it is. There are bakeries, supermarkets, cafes - everything you need is close by.
The house is super clean, nice, full of details useful for the guest... and all of this at reasonable price. In one word... PERFECT! Brava Vasiliki

I stayed in Giannis place for 4 nights. Overall, it was great. You are about 7 mins walking distance from the subway station(Thisso) and 10 to 20mins from the major attractions. There are a lot of restaurant near the house. The room was clean and the bed is comfortable. The house is quiet both during the day and in the evening. Giannis is a very nice host and he invited me to join couple lunches during my stay. He also picked me up from the subway station and walked me to his place. The only improvement I would suggest is to have a stronger wireless router since the signal can be a bit weak sometimes. Overall, this place is lovely and Giannis is a great host.
This place is certainly for an artist or creative who wants to feel right at home! When I come back to Athens, I will be staying here again.

The flat was great. It had all that we needed for our stay in Athens. It was convenient to the city center and close to many things. There is a nice family run grocery store just 1 minute walk away with all the essentials you'll need. The view from the roof top is wonderful. The apartment is on the third floor.

The hosts are very professional and easy to communicate with, the room was the most comfortable we had all holiday! Perfectly located for exploring the city, the metro is only about 300m from the apartment and will get you pretty much anywhere you want to go!

Nous avons pass√©s un agr√©able moment dans l'appartement d'Evrykleia. Tr√®s bien accueilli √† la sortie du m√©tro par sa tante, ce fut de ce fait, confortable  pour nous arrivant tout droit de l'a√©roport. L'appartement est tr√®s propre, et ne manque de rien! tout √©tait parfait! Merci beaucoup!!
Description was accurate. Hosts were very welcoming. Most importantly they kept communicating well with me to make things easier.

Our stay was very nice and Eva and her family were very welcoming. They received us personaly and helped us organize our trip. I would highly recomand this nocarz !!
Thank you to you all, maybe at another time !!
It was a very nice stay, the flat s near all the important places of the city, we did everything by foot and it was very nice. Eva and her family were very helpful, thanks a lot !!

El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, genial para pocos d√≠as en Atenas. Aunque el edificio est√° un poco deteriorado tiene una ubicaci√≥n excepcional: Kolonaki es el mejor barrio para alojarse en Atenas, tranquilo, elegante, lleno de comercios y a un paso de Sintagma. Y Athanasios es un super anfitri√≥n: comida casera (hecha por su mam√°) de bienvenida, un mont√≥n de datos y consejos para disfrutar de Atenas y siempre dispuesto. Muy buena comunicaci√≥n. Tuvimos la mala suerte que no funcionara el lavarropas pero Athanasios ya lo reemplaz√≥ as√≠ que los futuros hu√©spedes gozar√°n de uno nuevo.
Gracias a las recomendaciones de Athanasios pudimos conocer una isla hermosa y tener un taxi seguro que nos llevara de madrugada al aeropuerto. Cosas que solo puedes conseguir con un gran anfitri√≥n. Gracias Thanasi!

The apartment is well situated in central Athens, but very quite as it faces into a courtyard. It was a wonderful, well air conditioned flat to rest from the heat and activity of the city. The elevator was essential for our luggage.
Athanasios was very attentive to our needs, made arrangements for a car to pick us up from airport for a reasonable rate- the driver also checked us into the apartment which was a great help. They provided us with a wonderful pdf of invaluable suggestions for dining and places to go throughout the city. We would definitely stay again the next time in Athens. Thanks again!
Rowena & thanasi were great hosts. Very attentive and reachable.  The apartment was very nice and comfortable and also very well located.  Recommend highly!

Eva‚Äôs place is excellent! The apartment is amazing, super comfortable, well equipped, has just everything you need and more! She is an incredible hostess, always at your disposal! Hope to come back onde day!
Evrykleia was very communicative and helpful. In our opinion, a little small for over 3 people, but a good location and with everything you would need
great location. multiple balconies. elevator. clean. reasonable size. would definitely stay again!
Great place- convenient location. Really good and quick communication. Would definitely recommend!

Wow

This is fairly easy to keep concise.
Jerry's appartment is amazing.
Modern
immaculate
everything you need.
The photographs do not do it justice.
Its right in the middle of 'real' athens, not partiularly touristy.
It was great eating in places where the native greek people are eating and enjoying themselves.
It was just perfect.
Jerry was an amzing host and looked after us as if we were staying in a 7 star hotel, which to all intents and purposes - we were!

Thank you Jerry, we will certainly be back.
So greateful!!!

The entry to the building is a bit unassuming but the room itself is exactly as depicted in the photos.I really enjoyed the neighborhood and the tips given to me by Jerry upon my arrival.Highly recommended and I am returning next week for a return visit
This is the second time I've stayed here in the past month.I can't say enough about Jerry,his place or the neighborhood.Highly recommended !

Nadine's apartment was so comfortable, clean and cosy. It had everything we needed. It is really close to walk to the Acropolis.  It was quiet at night and very close to really good cafes, restaurants and bars right on your doorstep.  Nadine is a wonderful host.  She knows everything about Athens and other places too. She is a wealth of information.  She also gives you your privacy.  The places she recommended were really good. I highly recommend Nadine's apartment.  Great location and great host.

What an amazing experience it is staying with Nadina!
The apartment is spacious and located in a fantastic area. Close to bars food and walking distance from all the historic sites.
Nadina even took us out for a traditional Greek night. Fabulous host made us feel so welcome and treated us like we had been friends for years.

It was our first try with airbandb, Nadina has been so nice and so patient to take the time to answer all our crazy question lol.  She was the perfect host. The appartment was just perfect, clean and realy love the location with all those nice restaurant. Next visit in Geece I will go back at Nadina place for sure. Thanks Nadina and hope see you in montreal or Greece.

We had a fantastic stay at Nadina's place and such a fun trip to Athens thanks to her excellent recommendations!!  All communication was lightening fast and she met us to check-in and check-out plus gracious gave up her time and showed us a ton of recommendations from food to sights.  The apartment was clean and spacious for our family of 5 and located in a great area of Athens.  We felt very safe and were able to walk everywhere.  If you are looking for a place to stay in Athens, book this apartment!  Not only do you get a fantastic, clean, apartment but it's also like getting a personal tour guide.  Thank you for making our trip to Athens magical, Nadina!

Panagiota is a lovely woman. She was so helpful. We got in late at night and she waited up for us to make sure we arrived safely and got into her place. She made sure we were doing well each day and asked if we needed anything. She is kind and considerate. Her place is very lovely and is exactly as it is described.

We are very pleased with our stay in Athens, especially for the luck to have found a very nice and confortable apartment like this one and a very kind welcoming from the Versaweiss. They answer us in few minutes from our request, they arrange very fast all the things for our arrivals (we sent a request to them only arrived at the airport!), they gave us information about restaurants and things to do. The apartament it's adorable and charming, big, with a very nice balcony with some coloured flower, bright, equipped with all comforts, and is located in a neighborhood full of cute bars and restaurants, in the centre of the city,  very close to all the most important touristic attraction, services and lines. Versaiwess are also, very interesting artist! It's not possible ask for more!  We hope to have the opportunity to come back again. Absolutely recommendable!

Tr√®s bon accueil, Dimitri a pris le temps de nous donner de bons conseils pour notre s√©jour. Le jour du d√©part il nous a propos√© de laisser nos bagages dans son local pro tout pr√®s de la location en les acheminant lui m√™me.
L'appartement est spacieux en plein centre ville √† proximit√© des sites antiques.

Claudine et Pascal
H√¥te arrangeant, logement bien situ√©, commerces et bars / restaurants √† proximit√©, logement agr√©able

George was a pleasure to work with. I would recommend this location without hesitation.
Amazing flat, great location, so clean, so cute, easy to find, easy check in. 10/10 recommend

Wir hatten einen wundervollen Aufenthalt in Athen. Die Wohnung ist klein, aber total gem√ºtlich und die Dachterasse ist der absolute Wahnsinn. Ismini war nett und wunderbar flexibel. Auch die Umgebung hat uns gefallen, das Viertel ist alternativ und es ist immer was los. Nur zu empfehlen!

Wonderful weekend in greece @ Dion's cosy and well equipped, perfectly
located apartment. Walked everywhere with a smile on my face!

I've stayed at many nocarzs and I can say without exception that Lefteris' place is the most magnificent- It truly looks better than the photos which says a lot. You feel like you're in a tv show or movie set- a place that when you're watching makes you say 'places like that don't really exist'. But they do !! A private paradise behind a red metal door on an unassuming street 10 minute walking distance from the Acropolis. Everything was pristine and the place is truly a one of a kind gem. And the area was super- probably 20 great restaurants within a 5 minute walk- we hard a tough time choosing which to visit !
Lefteris was beyond helpful- he offered to show us around town, he left us an iPhone to use for local calls and maps, an iPod for the internet, he brought us a power adapter when we needed one, and he called and texted several times to make sure everything was exactly as we wanted. You could not ask for a better host. 10 out of 10 and then some :))))))

Me and my boyfriend had a great time in Massimiliano's house. The apartment was 15/20 min by foot from Acropoli, 5 minutes walk from Syngrou-fix metro station and from different and useful bus stops. The apartment is very cozy and clean, there is everything you could need inside, even the chance to make coffee with coffee's machine with only 50 cent. Massimiliano sent us a lot of information about Athens and how to reach home from the Airport.
Him and Nicoletta are very kind person and they solve our needs.
Totally recommended :)
Overall very nice apartment in a good neighborhood

The interior is a little bit outdated what makes it slightly overpriced to me. The toilet flush only worked in very long intervals, which can be relevant if you are more than too people.
The neighborhood is quiet and central.
The communication with the host was swift and uncomplicated.
Overall we were happy with our short stay.
A great apartment with superb views from the terrace. Good location (3min walk from Attikia metro station). Highly recommended.
Really great house. Spacious and welcoming. Also, Christos is a really nice person.
What a wonderful apartment. We LOVED the 360 degree rooftop views with gorgeous breeze. Dimitris was very attentive, and ensured his Mama helped us settle in.
Dimitris place was very clean and organized. He left us beer and water in the fridge and the wifi was excellent. Not the nicest neighbourhood but very close to the subway about a 3min walk.

We had an incredible time at Dimitris', it had everything we needed for an extended 2-month stay and we immediately felt right at home. The apartment is extremely spacious with a huge living area/studio, large main bedroom (with balcony), big kitchen & bathroom (with bath) and even a rooftop to chill on in the evenings. The AC in the bedroom was a lifesaver over the summer, and Dimitris was super friendly and responsive to any questions we had. Needless to say the location was perfect: Kypseli is the best, and Dimitris' is just a walk across the park to Exarcheia too. We look forward to staying again.
Leonidas's place was perfect for us, the neighborhood, the coziness and comfort, the easy distances to other parts of the city, and of course the truly exceptional view.

Really lovely place in a great area of Athens! The room was spotlessly clean and a very comfortable place to come back to after exploring the city each day. The view is as wonderful as advertised, particularly at night!
Location-wise it is excellent with all the main sites within walking distance and plenty of nice bars and restaurants nearby if you prefer to stay closer to home.
Leonidas left the keys with the cafe opposite the flat for when I arrived and also provided very clear instructions for everything I'd need for my stay, along with contact details just in case. Very reliable host who kept in contact throughout my stay.
Absolutely amazing view! Great location - walking distance to everything. Good size and clean. Would definitely stay there again.
Amazing place to stay in the middle of Athens!! The view of the Acropolis is great!

L‚Äôappartamento di trova in una posizione centralissima per visitare Atene, √® pulito e con una vista eccezionale sulle Acropoli (al tramonto √® uno spettacolo!). Io e la mia famiglia ci siamo trovati benissimo, Katerina √® stata gentile e super disponibile a darci tutte le informazioni utili per rendere il nostro soggiorno ottimo (ci ha anche avvertito di uno sciopero dei trasporti, dandoci tutte le alternative possibili)... Questo vale pi√π di tutto! Se passeremo di nuovo per Atene torneremo qui! Grazie di tutto!

George and Hafiz truly are super hosts!!! From the moment I booked the apartment until the moment I checked out they were in communication with me to make sure I had everything I need. I arrived to Athens early and Hafiz met me to all me to drop my bag. They checked in to see if I had settled in ok. There was everything that you could need in the apartment.   Nice touches like an iron, first aid kit, clothes pins as well as an umbrella. Could not have picked a better place to stay. Everything you would want to see in Athens was within a 20 minute walk and there are great eating establishments right around the corner. This is the best place in Athens for solo travelers.

Katerina's flat is a gem  -- from her warm hospitality and attention to the details that ensure a comfortable stay; to the gorgeous view of the Acropolis; to its central location for exploring Athens; to its cleanliness and stylish, calm aesthetics!  Katerina is indeed a super host!!  Her responses to any questions I had before our stay were always timely and informative.  She welcomed us with a seed cake, a bottle of wine, and all these breakfast goodies in the fridge!  Her recommendations on what to see and where to eat were spot-on!   We loved staying here and would love to do so again!
Easy to find place and located centrally. Really cute with good view!

We absolutely loved staying here! The views were great, the area is great and there are plenty of places to eat and shop around. Kalliope was a fantastic host; told us a great bakery to go to and where we could get some groceries. I would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to anyone coming to Athens! Thank you so much Kalliope for a great stay!
Beautiful elegant flat with amazing enviable view! Great position close to all beautiful sights of Athens, really kind host - The lesson is clear: RECOMMENDABLE

Kalliope‚Äôs place was as describe and the small touches as biscuits to welcome us and yummy oranges and apples were great.
I would recommend her penthouse for sure if you are staying in Athens.

Appartement spacieux et tr√®s agr√©able. Literie impecable, linge de lit et de toilette fournis,c'est pratique! Rien √† dire sur la propret√©! Great view !

Kalliope's penthouse flat offers a breath-taking view that's better than on the photos; the central location means you can visit everything on foot while enjoying a Greek district, eating in local restaurants and getting a taste of the real Athens. Thank you Kalliope for your kindness and for being so welcoming.  All we want is to come back!  we recommend to all who want to enjoy a big appartment, rooftop views, central access, and authentic Greek kindness.

Viaje espectacular, nos encant√≥ Atenas. La amiga de Marika L√≠a nos acogi√≥ con mucha energ√≠a y felicidad. No hay nada malo que decir del piso, muy acogedor y funcional, aunque peque√±ito.  Repetir√≠a sin pens√°rmelo dos veces !

We had a very nice two-day experience in Athens. We were two adults and four little children.
Thanesi is extremely kind and the Apartment was simply great for us.
The decoration, cleanness and location (10min from Acropolis) were flawless. Thanasi also helped us to find and book a nice nearby restaurant with view to the Acropolis as well.
The location is amazing, the apartment is small but really good, it has everything you need!marika was really nice!
The place we stayed at looked like the pictures posted. The owner was very nice and gave us great suggestions on where to go eat and places to see.
Great host, who makes more than needed to feel you good in a city

It was in a great location, a view of the Acropolis from bed! Shower was always hot, air con worked brilliantly. Very clean and tidy. A short walk to a mini market, bars, restaurants, street food, anything you needed!
Excellent communication and great hospitality. The flat is clean, comfortable and well equipped. It makes our stay in Athens a very pleasant one.
everything was perfect as in the description, very clean and comfortable.the host is veryhelpfull and the location is not too far from main attractions

Ticks every box, stylish, lovely large apartment in a quiet yet trendy non tourist part of Athens. Lots of public transport options at your doorstep. Have travelled to over 65 countries and this would have to be one of the best value and perfect locations to stay in. Great little local places to eat and have coffees.
A big thank you to Vassilis who went out of his way to make sure we had everything we needed and some great local tips too! Would absolutely stay again !
Fantastic place to stay, centrallylocated with great view
As always, it was a great to stay at Thanasis' apartment next to the Acropolis. This is our second visit and we got again a great deal. Cheers!
We have great time in Athens. Evans is excellent host and everything was as in the description. Recommendation for Evans!

This place was a true gem in Athans. We had an amazing view of the Temple of Zeus which paired nicely with wine and snacks each night on the patio. Athanasios also had amazing recommendations for food, drinks, and other things to enjoy. Would definitely recommend this place to others, and we hope to be back!!

Appartement parfait, tous les sites du centre d'Athenes sont accessibles √† pied. John pr√©voit tout pour nous rendre service, transport depuis la marina et jusqu'√† l'a√©roport moyennant un d√©dommagement.
Nous avons pass√© un excellent s√©jour avec nos 2 enfants.

Athanasiois‚Äôs place is an amazing deal for the price and amenities provided. Everything is modern, bright, and comfortable. There was even breakfast food waiting for us in the fridge. His recommendations were spot on as well. We love eating where the locals do and that‚Äôs exactly where he sent us. Highly recommend!!

The location of the place is excellent, it is so close to all of the sights, restaurants, shops and local transit. The acropolis is at your feet and everything else is easily walkable. The place itself is huge! There was so much space and it is made to feel like you are at home, especially the bed which was so comfortable! The extras added such as drinks and breakfast made it even better! I would definitely recommend this place to anyone coming to Athens to stay!
Amazing location in the heart of Athens within easy walking distance to all the sites. Athanasio and his co-hosts are extremely hospitable!
Marvelous location, good flat (only the net access could be a bit more stable), kind host. Excellent headquarter to discover Athens.  We can recommend it to anyone with love.

Nice flat, but really noisy balcony as it is close to a main street. Even with the windows closed you can here the traffic noise during the entire day (and night). But, it's centrally and really close to Acropolis (and metro) and the host is really welcoming and allowed us to store our lagguage until late afternoon.
Really beautiful!
Great location, clean an excellent communication with Athanasios
Lives up to superhost rating

Johns location was unique!
We had great communication throughout, and john was very attentive throughout our stay.
Cleanliness could‚Äôve been a bit better, but overall we would recommend this place.
Thanks John!
Great place with walkable to great restaurants and the acropolis.

We stayed here for 13 nights and felt right at home. The bed was really comfortable and sheets were high quality. The bathroom had plenty of space for our toiletries and there was lots of room in the closets. The balcony was a great bonus. It was near a busy intersection that was pretty noisy but the location and convenience more than made up for it. Would definitely stay here again.

Perfect place, great view. Nice, quiet, close to center. Fast communication, easy access. Recommend, thank you!
Great location, we were able to walk to everywhere we needed! You can‚Äôt beat the view from the balcony especially at night! Great stay!

I and my friend had a great stay in Theodore's studio. Even though we didn't have chance to meet Theodore, but his mom greeted us and made us feel being at home. Also, we felt Theodore really cared us. He messaged us everyday to check if we were doing ok and if we need any help. Studio was very clean and everything you would need will be there. Easy access to transportation, bus stop is only less than 200m from the studio.

The welcome was really great. home from home with Kosmas. Some nice little touches of hospitality which makes all the difference when you arrive in a new place  --cake , delicious home made jam and a bottle of wine. If you want to visit Athens, this is the place to stay, Location is excellent for visiting Acropolis.  Every thing is new and and crispy clean. Most sites can be easily accessed by foot or by metro.

Kosmas is a fantastic host. He met us at His lovely home when we finally arrived at 23.00 at night. The kitchen was stocked with fruits, some snacks, cereal, and welcome bottle of wine and tsipouri. A wonderful welcome.
The home was very nice. Beds were comfortable. Air conditioner cold. Private garden lovely. A welcoming and comfortable home. We came as a family of five - two adults and three children. We all fit comfortably and enjoyed our stay.
The location was a great little neighborhood with bakery, cafes, and nice restaurants just down the block. The metro is a pleasant few blocks away. And the Phillipanos Hill park is just a block away. We often enjoyed our walks home through the park from the Acropolis area in the evening.
As a host, Kosmas really stepped up. We were scheduled to leave Athens by train. Kosmas heard of a workers strike that was planned on the day of our departure. He contacted us with all of the information and scheduled an intercity bus for us instead so we could get to our next town in Greece. He also arranged an early morning taxi to pick us up from the home that morning. He truly went above and beyond as a welcoming and compassionate host. He made our visit to his beautiful city extra special.

Miltos nous a attendu et accueilli tr√®s chaleureusement. Il nous avait laiss√© de l'eau, du jus d'orange et du caf√© et nous a bien expliqu√© l'usage de l'appartement qui est √† la fois confortable ( 2 t√©l√©visions, un lecteur de cd, 2 toilettes...) et tr√®s agr√©ablement d√©cor√©.
La localisation est parfaite car juste √† c√¥t√© du Parth√©non et il y a une petite √©picerie en bas bien utile pour le petit d√©jeuner!
Miltos nous a concoct√© un long message sur Ath√®nes, ses sites, ses mus√©es et ses restaurants. Il nous a aussi aid√© le jour du d√©part √† trouver un taxi ( et qu'il a n√©goci√© au prix officiel malheureusement r√©serv√© aux grecs!). H√¥te tr√®s appr√©ciable!

Where do I start. By far, this has been our favorite nocarz spot. Kosmas was extremely attentive the entire time. The place is very clean and it has anything a traveler may need, even if you may have forgotten something.  Kosmas is so well organized; he has a set of maps for you to easily review when you are ready to explore the city of Athens. He also has a lists of restaurants for travelers to visit when hungry. There was welcome gifts upon our arrival which made all members of the group feel extremely especial. Overall, there is not enough words to describe how satisfied we are with this nocarz spot

Great place and location!
We loved this place. We shared with our daughter and 14 yr old grandson.
Having 2 full bathrooms was so nice!
The backyard garden was so pretty and peaceful.
There was good WiFi and it had all amenities we needed and more.
Spotless clean.
We used UBER to get to Acropolis, Monastiraki and Plaxa Districts. Between 5-7‚Ç¨.
The house is in a very quiet neighborhood. We loved the local feel‚Ä¶getting fresh bread a few doors down, eating at Pita Status for lunch (1 min walk)
The host was very accommodating and quick to respond.
We will definitely stay here when we come to Athens in the future.
Note: if you have mobility issues there about 4 steps up into the front and a few to the back door.
Once inside all on 1 floor.

The apartment is great and just as described. Fantastic location, too. Miltos was a very communicative and helpful host. We would love to come back another time!

Very nice appartment, well located, well equiped, well decorated, very clean and spatious (for a couple). The host is very kind and provided some food for lunch. The only little problem concerns the Wi-Fi which get disconnected, but we were still able to use it for our purposes.

Nasos was one of my most welcoming hosts from start to finish. He picked me up from the Athens Metro past midnight, gave me tons of recommendations around the city that were spot on, was super responsive throughout the trip, and made my girlfriend and I feel quite at home. The apartment itself was nice, too--absolutely perfect location, great bedroom--but Nasos himself was the best part of the experience. I can't wait to see him again next time.

Great location walkable to restaurants, all major sites and safe night life. Host went out of his way after we checked out to store our luggage while we went to islands for a few days. 10/10 would recommend
Fantastic stay! The location cannot be beat. Miltos was a perfect host. A+ on cleanliness. Would definitely recommend!
A great cozy place, centrally located and close to all important touristic spots

Nice flat near the acropolis!
I recommend it!

Stella checked us in - she was very lovely and informative. The place was charming and elegant. Looks even better than the photographs. We had a good stay here - our only little annoyance was at 7am some mornings it sounded like supermodels were above us which after being out late wasn't pleasant to wake up to. Of course this is of no fault to the host and these things can't be helped - apart from that our stay was perfect - it was nice to go only the little balcony and eat - the kitchen is small but ample for a short stay in the heart of Athens
Heart of city, awesome location, cozy quiet place, and Miltos helped us with the entire to-do list including places of visit, food and drinks..

What a beautiful, light and spacious apartment! My sister, friend and I spent 9 days here and had the most wonderful time. Maria met us at the apartment building with a big smile on her face greeting us like old friends, despite of the fact that we arrived almost an hour late because of unexpected delays at the airport. The apartment felt so warm and welcoming - even better than the photographs led me to expect, and had everything we would need. It was extremely clean and comfortable, and the balconies in both the living room and the bedroom were especially delightful. Maria generously provided us with water, fruits, cereal, eggs and other healthy snacks, and made sure that the bathroom and kitchen had everything we needed. The apartment is in a quiet safe neighborhood near a metro station (Larissa Station), by which you can easily access all of Athens' hot spots. We had access to a pharmacy, a crepe house/cafe, a restaurant, a hair salon and a super market literally a few steps from the apartment building. We were also pleasantly surprised to experience a "Laiki" Farmers' Market set up  in the neighbourhood during our stay- I think it was either a Tuesday or a Wednesday. The only downside to the apartment was that it had no washing machine, but a laundry mat is located near the building, so that did not cause us much inconvenience. We truly had a good time and will treasure the memories of our time in Athens. I highly recommend Maria and her beautiful apartment!

This was our first nocarz experience & it couldn't have been any better! Maria is lovely & generous, very prompt with communication, the apartment exceeded expectations - it was very clean, modern & felt like home. Extremely good value for money - don't hesitate to stay here! Maria, thank-you so much :)

Several shops and Restaurant are almost next to this apartment, Metro stations are reachable within 3 min by foot. But the district is kind of decrepit, it's not that bad.
The Host Maria was verry kind and answered always in a short time. The apartment was verry clean and all kind of stuff you need for living where there. For what you get the price for the Appartement was pretty cheap. Me and my Brother were completely satisfied.
Miltos is an absolutely fantastic host, super attentive. We love staying in his extremely central, clean and organized apartment. We hope to return next year. Thank you so much Miltos!

One of the best nocarz I have stayed. Great apartment, just 10min walk from Acropolis. Fontini left us a map of the city and a list of great places to eat and visit. We communicated by email and always responded fast and answered all our doubts. Would definitely love to stay again at this apartment when I return to Athens.

The apartment is superb, one of the best place that I've experienced in Athens. well renewed, furnished and close to the main touristic places. Fotini is very kind and always ready to assist, so I should reccomend this place

I received several emails with adequate information and lots of tips, all very good. Upon arrival, we also communicated, and everything was tip top. We loved the balcony for breakfasts in the sun. It was my first experience with nocarz, but it will not be my last. The flat was really nice and it was also very clean. Our host also provided help with transport from the airport and our experience with the taxi driver made us book her services for the return trip as well. I am very pleased and I will not hesitate to recommend it to anyone.
The place was in great condition - recently  renovated and clean. Gina was kind and very helpful. I would recommend it to anyone that needs to stay close to the historical center.

Great location within walking distance of the Acropolis and between two very vibrant bar and restaurant filled squares. Nikos‚Äôs flat was spotlessly clean and benefited from air conditioning in the sitting room and fans in other rooms. Shutters ensure the sun doesn‚Äôt wake you too early and there‚Äôs a balcony for an evening drink. The kitchen and fridge were well stocked with all the basics plus a few treats. We strongly recommend this flat to anyone looking for central Athens location.

Fotini's apartment is located in a quiet and beautiful neighbourhood, with bakeries, coffee and food just a short stroll away. The main sights are all walkable especially Fillopappou Hill just behind. The apartment itself is charming and I enjoyed sitting in the balcony with gets plenty of sun.
Communications with Fotini were prompt and precise; collection of the keys from a bakery 5-10min away was as instructed.
I would recommend anyone visiting Athens to stay here.
great place to stay :)
Very clean and located in the centre of Budapest
My partner and I had a lovely time staying at Nikos' place. Super helpful host, lovely place, and really good location.

Appartement tres grand,avec une √©norme terrasse.
Tr√®s calme,tres propre,et id√©alement situ√© non loin des transports.
Vesna et Costa se sont occup√©s de nous r√©server un taxi pour notre d√©part en ferry t√¥t le matin.
Parfait pour un s√©jour a Athenes.

The place is great and really worth the price. It's really close to most of Athens ancient sights, it's clean and really well equipped. If someone likes to party it is located in very vibrant yet safe night-life district, despite that, the place is really calm and quiet inside. The biggest upside without a doubt is the host though. Konstantinos gave us very detailed instructions on how to get to his place and how everything works inside. He answered our questions super-fast and he even helped us with printing our boarding passes on sundays afternoon! You can feel at home in Athens with a host like this.

Fantastic apartment and location!    Anna is a great host.  She was extremely helpful with check-in and offering great information about the area.  The view is incredible and overlooks Monistraki Square and the Acropolis.  Great place to stay!

Very nice hosts, perfect communication before and during our stay, easy to find and to get to from the airport, spotless clean, amazing terrace, great suggestions provided for places to eat, a lovely experience. Would definitely recommend and hope to come back here.
Thanks for a wonderful stay! Apartment is extremely spacious and clean. Location is right in the heart of monasteraki. Wonderful place would recommend it

I loved this flat! Yota was very warm and welcoming, and incredibly accommodating and helpful for every aspect of my stay--in short, the best host you could ask for! The apartment was the perfect size for me as a single traveler, and had everything that I needed for space and cooking, etc. It is incredibly convenient to the metro and shops and restaurants in that area, but is in a quiet "real" neighborhood (for those who might want a break from the tourist experience). The rooftop terrace is fantastic, and the perfect place to sit and enjoy breakfast or the sunset. I unfortunately also had to work during my stay, but the terrace is also a wonderful place for writing (if you have to work), and the internet connection was fantastic. I would definitely stay here again (and I hope to!), and I enthusiastically recommend it. It was very much the ideal nocarz experience!
Great Welcome and a beautifully presented flat in a great location

First of all a big thank you to Giota for her helpfulness and kindness. She is doing everything for her guests. The flat is very beautiful and clean and has all you will need. It's a rooftop apartment with a huge terrace which is only for you. We loved the view from there. The flat is located max. 10 mins from the Panormou Metro station in an area which is safe. All in all we were happy to have chosen Giotas flat. We fully recommend it.
The host was really helpful and welcoming. Nice flat.

Angel went out of her way to make sure we had everything we needed for our stay! The flat is gorgeous, with some of the best views of Athens. We would absolutely stay there again without question. Thank you!
Super logement, super accueil de l'h√¥te, m√™me √† une heure tardive. Le logement est tr√®s bien √©quip√©, propre. Je recommande ce logement sans h√©siter !

Very nice flat, comfy and clean, in a convenient location (not far from the Acropolis and Syntagma central metro station). Tia has thought about everything to make us feel good. It would have been even better with a bit fewer instructions in the flat ;)!

This place is exactly like the images online. It's in a great location/neighborhood. Its a 20 min walk to the Parthenon. The place looks exactly like the pictures and is clean. The elevator is great for taking your luggage up and down. I rented a car, and was able to find street parking within 5 min of looping around the neighborhood. It has a shared balcony with the other guest.

L'appartement est situ√© dans un quartier calme, proche de petites rues avec de bons restaurants, parfait apr√®s une journ√©e pass√©e parmi les touristes et les commerces qui vont avec. Tr√®s bien situ√© pour d√©couvrir Ath√®nes.
Tr√®s joli appartement, fonctionnel et reposant ... les propri√©taires nous ont bien renseign√©s pour passer un excellent s√©jour. Encore merci √† Tina et Mike.
Everything was okay. The apartment was clean, it‚Äôs the most important thing for me. Also, I liked the district. It seems safe and calm. Thanks.

The hosts are considerate and easy to communicate with. We had a short but really nice stay here, enjoyed everything in the apartment. Perfect!

The blue room is comfortable, cozy and classy.
Check in was easy and no fuss, and the apartment was exactly what I needed to set out and explore Athens from a great location.
Tia and Mike were warm and friendly and quick with email responses.
Over all a wonderful experience and I would happily stay there again if bookings and my travel line up.
Great place! Truly beautiful and looked like the pictures! And I LOVED that they provided a heater. It made traveling during the winter so much easier! Thank you! üòä

The apartment is the perfect size for 2 people (2 rooms) with everything you may need. It was sparkling clean when I arrived and the bed is super comfortable! The location is ideal for a short stay in Athens with it being walking distance to the main tourist attractions and the area itself is very cool with a local (rather than touristy) and bohemian feel and plenty of bars and restaurants which I much preferred to the tourist traps by the acropolis! Definitely recommend!
We spent a couples of night in Giorgios apartment and everything went perfectly smooth. Suggested!
host sempre disponibile e gentile. Lo consiglio vivamente.

Ourania's home is lovely, clean and in a perfect location. Ourania is very communicative, gave us great recommendations and went out of her way to make the place ready for us since we booked last minute. Very recommended.

You won't find a better location than this. Super easy to get to and from the airport, right next to the subway that will take you anywhere you need to be, but tons of restaurants and bars are within walking distance. I also happily took the time to walk through the city to get to the Parthenon.

Chris was absolutely lovely and very helpful with me and the room was nice. The apartment is next to a metro station therefore is extremely convenient however it is also next to a normal train line and is near what I thought was a nightclub therefore during the night there was a lot of street noise and I found it difficult to sleep however one could say this would be expected of an apartment in the centre of the city.

Buen anfitri√≥n

Amazing value and a brilliant location. Excellent if you need to get to the national bus station for onward travel as it's only a short taxi ride away. The most interesting parts of Athens are easily accessible in walking distance. Chris is a great host, extremely helpful, friendly and full of information. Thank you Chris, we will be back! Katerina & Steve

Chris is an amazing host. He goes out his way to help you with tips and suggestions, places to eat, things to see, etc., and extremely good at communicating. He knows and can predict travels' needs, so addresses issues head on.  He is a nice guy overall; I felt like we could be friends if we lived in the same city. Since I had an evening flight, he allowed me to keep my bag in the apartment, which was very nice of him. Thank you, Chris!

Chambre bien situ√©e au c≈ìur d'Ath√®nes, environnement peut-√™tre un peu bruyant mais personnellement √ßa ne m'a pas d√©rang√©. Esmeralda is very helpful. She organized our trip from the airport to her place. The apartment is exactly as described with a huge terrasse with an amazing view. There are a lot of restaurants in the area. The one located in front of the building is very good with a great welcome.
Eine sehr gute Unterkunft, sehr nette Vermieterin, alles perfekt.

Greg is an amazing host, he followed us to the car rental outside Athens to bring us forgotten luggage. His apartment is nice, on walking distance from the metro station that brings you in no time to Acropolis. Everything for a nice breakfast and some essentials to cook were present. We can highly recommend Greg's place.
Kees & Monique

This apartment was just as advertised! Very spacious and clean. The area seemed great...was convenient to all the sights we wanted to see.
Highly recommend nearby Black Sheep restaurant.
Most importantly Greg was super speedy in his replies and kindly accommodated our very late arrival (2AM).

We liked Konstantinos' flat so much we rented it a second time.  The flat is fabulous and comfy.  You will feel right at home.  It's very bright and spacious with a lovely terrace full of plants.  The neighborhood is perfect.  You can walk to all of the amazing attractions in Athens Center.  Konstantinos is a perfect host and really nice guy.  He made sure we had everything we needed.  I highly recommend!

Nice and conformable apartment, close to the Acropolis in an area with only local people.
Manoli has given us a lot of good advises for bars and restaurants close to his apartment.

Very nice place
Close to everything
Fantastic! Great apartment and local restaurants!
Tout √©tait parfait, bonne localisation, endroit propre et belle terrasse !!

We had a nice and cozy stay. The flat is as described and very much in the center (you can go basically everywhere by foot). The flat was clean and the host was very polite. We definitely recommend a stay in Konstantinos‚Äò flat!

Konstantinos is very welcoming. His appartment is perfectly located, very close to the main tourist attractions and the subway station. It is modern, safe and comfortable. We could only stay for one night but he made us feel at home right away.
un belissimo appartamento con un bel terrazzo, molto luminoso, mi sono trovata benissimo. Se dovr√≤ tornare ad Atene sicuramente sceglier√≤ l‚Äôho stesso appartamento

The place is very modern but cozy at the same time. One of the best parts of the apartment is the terrace which is absolutely beautiful.
The host is very responsive and gives helpful information.
I highly recommend this place.

Wonderful and stylish space in great  location. Ideal to explore the city with everything close by but not in the over touristy and crowded suburbs of the inner city. Really appreciated all the tips and ideas Manilos provided and used most of them. This is a wonderful space and ideal for an Athens stay. Thanks Manilos and your team for a great stay.

Die Wohnung liegt ideal, man erreicht die Akropolis zu Fu√ü und in der N√§he befinden sich gute Restaurants und eine Bahn Station.
Der Gastgeber ist immer bereit um Tips zu geben und hat f√ºr uns die Transfer Flughafen-Wohnung-Hafen organisiert.
Die Wohnung befindet sich in eine Sackgasse und deswegen ist in der Nacht ruhig.
The apartment has a great location and Konstantinos was a very nice host! Would definitely recommend.

The appartement is really amazing, just like the pool. It is very comfortable and the terrace is a real asset especially in summer. The location is also quite close from the city center ; ultimately, Manos was very helpful in advising us during our trip. 5/5

Konstantinos is a perfect host, very kind and available for every need. The house is located in a beautiful and very central area close to the old part of town and many restaurants and bars. An experience to recommend.
Brilliant location ideally situated to see both the ancient and the modern side of Athens. We are so pleased we chose this one. Konstantinos is a great and very helpful host.

This place is very well located. We were able to walk everywhere. restaurant are near by but far enough that it is peaceful and quiet.
Konstantinos's is thorough, he received us late (because of our ferry arrival time), let us in, and took a few minute to tell us about the in's and out's of the apartment and the neighborhood.
we loved the place as it was well equipped, comfortable and has a but of charm. worth the price!!!!
thank you Konstantino! We will be back.

This apartment was so close to everything we want to see in Athens. We appreciated the flexible checkin and clear instructions when we arrived. The hosts helped us with directions and specifics of the apartment. I would recommend for a quick trip to Athens!!

I highly recommend the apartment . It was great stay and valuable for the money .
From all above Marina showed a lovely hospitality and always were there for me to help .
Thank you once again
La experiencia fue agradable e intetesante

Marinas apartment is a beautiful oasis in Athens heat...cool, shady, spacious, very comfortable and very stylish. We were sad to leave!
Marina and Katerina were very helpful and great to deal with.
Highly recommended!!

Easy check in/check out, clean apartment and only a 15 minute walk to the major attractions.  The apartment was as expected.  Due the infrastructure of the city, sidewalks are small and busy, at times pushing you onto the busy streets, something to note for families pushing a baby stroller.

Bom lugar para ficar em Atenas, bom custo x benef√≠cio. Mesmo pedindo para o anfitri√£o, ele n√£o nos levou, pois afirmou que tinha o suficiente. O lugar √© bom apenas para passar a noite, se voc√™ petende ficar em casa descansando, n√£o recomendo.
Very nice place, two clean bedrooms, near cool bars and very good local food

A nice overall experience. The area is really nice, 5 minutes walk to all the nightlife in Gazi area. The apartment is good for a couple and easily accesible( direct metro from the airport). Host is great and really flexible.
If in Athens again we will surely come back!
Recommend the place! Very comfortable and clean. Neighbors were a bit noisy but it‚Äôs certainly not the host‚Äôs fault whatsoever!

Good vibe
Great location
Feel like home
Accurate photos, check-in very easy, good location, everything was impeccable!

Definitely an unique apartment. It was cozy and comfortable for 2. The communication was spot on and easy. I guess the only thing that surprised us was the shower location to be in the kitchen (which we hadn't notice from the pictures) but to be honest at end of the day it didn't bothered us at all.
Wonderful place to stay

Vivian and Minto's apartment is the perfect place to stay in Athens. Located on the top floor of a beautiful 20th-century apartment building in Kypseli, it is both cosy and elegant, with a balcony full of green plants, overlooking Mount Lycabettus . Kypseli is an amazing neighbourhood, full of interesting architecture, good places to eat, and within walking distance of central Athens.

Thank you Rozana! You took the time to provide us with detailed instructions on how to get to the apartment, which were easy to follow. You were so welcoming on our arrival and gave us great advice on where to go and what to do. This is a beautiful apartment, in a very central location, that somehow didn't feel as though it was in the heart of Athens. We are so grateful to have stayed here!

Rosana was an awesome host, with quick responses and waiting for us at check-in even though our bus was late. She was enthusiastic and the flat was centrally located. Had all the necessary items needed and made for a wonderful stay a few minute's walk from the acroplis. Would definitely recommend.
Stayed for 6 nights in November, the apartment is comfortable with a nice balcony; overall it was very pleasant stay.
Communicative hosts. Some necessary maintenance work needs to be done in the kitchen and shower and a general deep clean and laundry of all materials, carpets, curtains, sofa covers

Great place and a great location. The place was squeaky clean, one of cleanest nocarzs I have yet been. Host was extremely friendly and had lots of recommendations for the area. Area itself is amazing, walkable to the tourist attractions but also near those more quiet and private places.
I could wholeheartedly recommend staying in this nocarz!

The place location is good, close proximity to the Acropoli Metro station, within walking distance of restaurants, the Akropoli and the Akropoli museum.
The apartment is small, but functional, good fit for a solo travel or a couple. For me, in particular, it was important that it was quiet. Would stay here again.

Rosana was the kindest, most delightful host. I had a very early arrival to Athens and she was kind enough to help me in and store my luggage as soon as I got in. I was greeted with a hug and fabulous recommendations for local places to eat and see. It‚Äôs a beautiful little spot a bit away from some of the louder more touristy areas, but still close to anything you‚Äôd like to see. Would absolutely recommend staying!

Wonderful greeting from nasos's wife who showed me everything. Cute apt with everything you could want. Great location at the centre of everything. Had lots of fun walking in all the different neighbourhoods as well as seeing the sites. Nasos even checked in to make sure i was ok! Athens very cool and felt very safe. Top notch experience! Tracy

Nasos is an amazing host. We arrived Athens late night and he met us at Syntagma station to assist us to the apartment which was only a few minutes walk away.
The location was superb as it was located in Adrianou Street in Plaka (street shopping heaven & beautiful). It is very very near to Acropolis.
Nasos was very kind to provide small snacks & water upon our arrival.
We had a wonderful time in Athens! Due to the short time we had in Athens, had it not been for our apartment in this great location, we would have not been able to do a lot of activities.
Thank you Nasos! :)

Nasos and his wife were really nice and kind with us. He explained us all about the city and also gave a few advices where to go. The flat was just great. For sure it s center of city, we didnt use transportation at all during out holiday and it provides whatever we need. Certainly i d recommend there .
A great location in old town's core and a    very warmful welcome full of useful...the only improvement we might suggest would be to upgrade the shower

Our stay at Nasos place was amazing! We landed early in the morning and he met us close to the station to allow us an early check-in which we greatly appreciated. He walked us to the apartment and showed us around thr neighbourhood, pointing out good cafes and bars as well as some of the historical sites.
The apartment itself was fantastic and had everything we needed. Very clean and we were supplied with coffee and tea as well as croissants in case we got hungry. A very good experience overall!
I would definitely stay here again- very central!!

Angelica could not have been more welcoming. I was told this was to be considered my home too and that is how i felt. I feel that i have a new friend in Athens.
Excellent advice on where i could get home cooked Greek food.
The area where she lives is not at all touristy and that suited me fine. Everything i wanted to see was either within walking distance or a short frequent bus ride away.
Fantastic, comfortable stay. Angelica is warm, friendly, and makes you feel right at home. I'd love to come back one day.
Great location and cozy apartment

Siamo stati molto bene. La posizione √® ottima, √® silenzioso, e dal tetto del palazzo c'√® una bellissima vista! Tina √® venuta a prenderci alla metro, ci ha portati a casa e ci ha consegnato una mappa della citt√† fornendoci utili indicazioni!

Vikis cozy and clean flat is a good base to discover and explore athens. On top of lycabetus you have a great view over the city and watch beatiful sunsets. Viki herself is a pleasent host that is availible for questions evertime.

100% approval - we've spent a great time in Athens and Akrivi house is just perfect for a group of friends. Comfortable and spacy kitchen and above all - great patio that you can eat your breakfast on, enjoying the olives and wine.

The hosts were very helpful waiting for us to come from the airport very late at night.
We would choose that accomodation again visiting Athens.

Photo probably taken quite some times ago. Bathroom floor has big crack. Light is quite deem too, not bright enough
Location very convenience, walkable to lots of restaurant and shops.

Akrivi's brother welcomed us, and he was more than kind to provide us with things we needed, like coffee, shampoos etc. We came earlier than agreed but still he was there to open the door for us, which was super convenient, as we were tired. Also, during our communication before arrival they were supper considerate to meet all our requirements regarding changes of reservations (in the number of guests). The location is close to the tram stop, super market, and Syntagma square. so all was super! warm recommendation!
Akrivi was amazing, I forgot my swim suit and she help me to find it, thanks a lot :)
Beautiful, quiet and clean appartment in a nice neigborhood. We really enjoyed our stay! Stephen is a wonderfull host. It is nearby a metro station and to the conference center. Highly recommended!

I was traveling from the US to attend an academic conference in Athens and had  no idea about how things would work  in Athens/Greece. Stephen, from the first day I made the booking, was a phenomenal host. He responded to all my queries and concerns about the stay and traveling in and around Athens. The bnb is at a very convenient location; major tourist sites are at a walking distance, has a lot of cafes and restaurants nearby, and the neighborhood is safe. I was traveling by myself and didn‚Äôt encounter any issues; Stephen was always available to help out. I highly recommend this nocarz.

Lovely place! Great location with the public transport and a city center in a walking distance. Her place was sparkly clean and we really loved the backyard! All in all very nice place and well recommended!

We are staying in this place for already 3rd time, and it is always nice to come back. There is private garden and the apartment is very big  with enough space for whole group to have cosy rest and enjoy in the garden. Will come back again.
Really nice apartment with nice terrace in Neos Kosmos. The area its really close by tram up to Syntagma Square and Akrivi really nice and communicative lady. I will back again!

Tasos is great host, and the appartment is beautiful, especially the view. We were group of six, and it was enough space for us. We had strange time of arrival, but Tasos was so kind to wait for us. We had great time at Athens, and the appartment was home away from home. We would stay at Tasos again! Once more, the view is unbeatable!!!!

We loved this apartment in Athens! The view of the Acropolis is breathtaking, especially at night. The apartment is spacious and beautifully furnished just as the pictures show. It has 3 separate outdoor areas with the top most being a great place to sit and enjoy a glass of wine on a warm evening. We did not meet Tasos but his associate Dorina could not have been nicer. She was very communicative and easy to speak with. She showed us all of the apt features and gave us some valuable advice upon arrival and was even able to help ensure that a delayed bag made it to us from the airport. Highly recommended!
We liked the place

It was the perfect location, in the city centre and a very cosy and comfortable apartment.
Nasos was incredible, he really cared and helped us in everything we needed, not only information but he waited for us although we arrived quite late in the evening.
We had a great time in Athens thanks to him. Hope to see you again soon!!!

I recommend this studio: it is clean and well-located. Nasos is really likeable; he picked us up from the metro station and showed us where the flat is situated and told us really nice bars and restaurants that are not written in the guidebook ;-)
Thanks for the staying!!!

Apr√®s nous avoir r√©cup√©r√© √† la sortie du m√©tro, Nasos nous a accompagn√© jusque chez lui en nous montrant le quartier!
L'appartement est au c≈ìur de plaka dans une ruelle calme. Il est tr√®s fonctionnel et correspondait parfaitement √† nos attentes !
Merci Nasos pour ton accueil, tes conseils et surtout ta disponibilit√© !
Vous pouvez sans aucune h√©sitation.

Posizione ottima, vicino alla metro, quartiere caratteristico e sotto il partenone.
La moglie di Nasos √® venuta a prenderci alla fermata della metro, si entra in casa e c √® un piacevole odore di pulito, tutto funziona perfettamente dalla doccia all'acqua calda, al condizionatore. Centralissimo ma i vetri della camera sono doppi, praticamente insonorizzato. L'host mette a disposizione informazioni utili, Cibo e bevande. Todo muy bien. El apartamento est√° muy bien situado, cerca de la parada del metro y a pie del acropolis. Kal ha sido muy amable y servicial. Recomendable!!

Great value for money.  Location is very good, walking distance to city centre. It is a small flat but sufficient for 2 people. Could be a bit noisy in the night with the cars on the street, but nothing too extreme. Kal is a nice host and communication was very smooth. We enjoyed our stay and will recommend.

I spend two weeks in this lovely appartment. It looked exactly like on the pictures and the terrace with its view are amazing. The neighbourhood is very beautiful with many shops and bars and is also very safe and close to walk to the city center. During my stay Olga was taking care of me and we had really nice talks together! I would definitely love to come back to this appartment again and can highly recommend it!!

The place is in a GREAT location. I stayed with a friend and we were able to just walk to everything and didn't run into any problems trying to get into the building. We were given PLENTY of recommendations from Tina upon arrival. They even allowed for us to have an early check in, but you should most definitely let him know ahead of time. Thanks again for the great stay!

. When we first stumbled upon this flat on¬†nocarz, it seemed almost too good to be true. There must be a catch! But everything was as perfect as it seemed online.¬†Aris¬†is the most thoughtful, gracious host.
He provided us with all the information we needed and showed us around. The flat is just perfect! Kitchen is compact and contains everything one needs
Beautifully designed space! Balcony views of the acropolis is stunning, and in a quiet local neighborhood. Not touristy but within walking distance of everything.

One of the best hosts I have met! Kostas is  really hospitable and helpful. He offered to pick me up from the airport and showed me around the neighborhood. I can always get timely response from him. The apartment is really cost effective and spacious. You can find everything needed. The only downside is it's quite far from the center. Even though there's a bus stop minutes away, it's not the best location to travel around considering it's such a long wait for buses and commutes.
Beautiful apartment. Neighbourhood is not residential, and doesn‚Äôt have many street lights. Very walkable to key sights.

Stunningly cool apartment. Very clean and has everything you need. Anna was an excellent communicator. This place is certainly worthy of it's high quality reviews
For a first night in Athens probably just a bit further out than we would have liked but that was our fault because we didn't know enough about Athens. Ate at a lovely & authentic restaurant about 5 min away which was on Anna's recommended list.
Nice location across the metro station, very responsive and clear apartment, I hope we go there and stay here again.

We really enjoyed our stay here! Great price and the area is perfect - very close to the station, very close to the main tourist sites, relatively quiet at night but still a close walk to good bars and restaurants and very safe. This is important as some parts of Athens felt very unsafe, so we were glad to be here.
The apartment is also very clean, laid out nicely, and the hosts are lovely and responsive, and it has a good kitchen plus an iron, nice towels + sheets.
I think the only thing that made it four stars for us is that it‚Äôs perfect for one person/couple, but not two people. The living room is quite difficult to sleep in. If you have earplugs and eye mask it‚Äôs ok.
The toilet is also in the bedroom, so you have to go into it, which is ok if close friends.
Note: Culture shock- in Athens you can‚Äôt flush toilet paper, and there is no bidet. A plastic bottle was left instead
