La casa √© dotata di tutto l'essenziale per un breve soggiorno (noi vi abbiamo soggiornato 5 giorni). Sean mette a disposizione anche un cellulare con in memoria i principali numeri utili (incluso il suo!). Sean √© un ospite fantastico, fa tutto il possibile per metterti a proprio agio, d√° preziosi consigli su cosa vedere e dove mangiare ed √© stato molto flessibile con l'orario del check out. Comunicazione ottima prima e durante tutto il soggiorno.
Nice flat with perfect location.
Amazing location close to the sights  good restaurants and public transit. A bit noisy from street. Overall great stay

Wij hebben hier samen met onze 2 (kleine) kinderen een geweldig verblijf gehad. De locatie is super en de host heeft alles tot in de puntjes goed verzorgd. In de accommodatie was alles aanwezig, we hebben helemaal niks gemist. Absoluut een aanrader om hier te verblijven als je Athene wilt ondekken!

Maria was a great host. She made us feel very welcome by greeting us with a homemade dinner and wine. She provided us with some information about Athens, too. The apartment has the most impressive view from the big terasse. We enjoyed our stay a lot. Wencke & Jan
Perfect location, all you need for a weeks stay, reasonably clean, everything worked and check in was easy.
Everything was great! Thank you!

The location is perfect, so close to everything. We just walked to Acropolis, Archeological museum etc. The unit is nice and the view is gorgeous - my friends were jealous when they saw my pics. Maria lives downstairs and you can see her anytime to ask questions or for help. She showed us her unit and the view from her bedroom is beautiful. She graciously prepared us some fresh Greek salad -soooo good! And her son Prokopis is just a phone call away. I'd go back and stay at this place and would recommend to friends a family.
Very good location! Small but functional, and good value for money. Bathroom could use a renovation.
Buena ubicaci√≥n para descubrir Atenas y pasear por el centro y el barrio de Plaka. Perfecta para dos personas.
Sweet rooms with very comfortable homey invironment...

Wonderful place, with an AMAZING view. Very close to the center, in a very quite building & quarter. Maria & Prokopis are very available and answer quickly to all your messages. It's an ideal apartment to spend few days in Athens and to discover the city. I do recommend it !!
Great location, outside space is fab!

This a clean, comfortable studio flat with a large balcony that really does look straight out onto the Acropolis! The flat is in a great location, with leafy streets and great cafes and restaurants nearby and is quiet. You can walk to most places in the city. Prokopis and Maria are fantastic hosts!

This place is perfect for staying in Athens - it‚Äôs in a very safe residential area, lots of eating places and grocery stores. It‚Äôs not far from the main attractions, only 20 minutes walking distance. The view from the balcony is truly stunning, we had breakfast and dinner with the acropolis view. Athens view point Lycabettus Hill is just behind this studio, but in my mind this studio has already offered the equivalent view! The hosts were very friendly and the communication was great. Maria greeted us in person and showed us around the studio, Prokopis checked on us to ensure everything was ok during our stay. They also recommended some eating places where we really enjoyed the food. We had an amazing time in Athens thanks to the hosts.
Great location, friendly host, a few minutes walk from everything you want to see in Athens. I would boom again !
Amazing experience!! The space was beautifully decorated and in a great location.

S√©jour plus que parfait gr√¢ce √† un emplacement  exceptionnel entre Monastiraki et Plaka. La plupart des attractions de la ville se situent dans un rayon de deux kilom√®tres √† pied. L'appartement est tr√®s fonctionnel et agr√©able par les grandes chaleurs. Antigone a tout fait pour nous faciliter le s√©jour. Un grand merci.
We loved this place. Our group of 7 fit comfortably and the location couldn‚Äôt have been better.

Eleni's place is exactly as described. It is nicely located for one to reach the important sites by foot. In addition, Eleni is a very kind and generous woman, who is always available to help with suggestions and local eateries. I recommend this place to solo travelers looking for a nice and quiet stay in Athens after a day of sightseeing.

Fantastic apartment in perfect area to explore Athens.
Taxi transfer arranged by the wonderful Antigone, which made arriving with a family in the evening much easier.
The place was as per the pictures, quirky and characterful, but very practical, with seating overlooking the square in the mezzanine walkway, but sleeping deep in the building, so dark and quiet.
Restaurants and bars aplenty nearby, as were the sights. wonderful

Felt like we were in a small community, even though we were right in the middle of the city. It was just a great feel. We enjoyed walking around the neighborhood and we enjoyed the restaurants that were right outside our door.  We would definitely recommend the place to others.
Our stay was great! The flat is small yet spacious with a huge terrace with a view of Acropolis.

Er war ein sehr netter Gastgeber, sehr kommunikativ. Die Wohnung war sehr sch√∂n, sauber und ordentlich. Die Aussicht von der Terasse aus war fabelhaft, mit Blick auf Akropolis. Die T√ºcher waren sauber. Leider war das Bett nah meinem Geschmack sehr ungem√ºtlich und da die Wohnung im 4. oder 5. Stock ist, sehr hei√ü. Wir hatten einen Ventilator, der aber ein wenig zu laut war, um ihn die Nacht durch an zu lassen. Alles in einem, bin trotzdem sehr zufrieden, vor allem f√ºr den Preis.
Good location, nice and compact place to stay.
It's a beautiful place to leave and Akis is really a great landlord, friendly and warm-hearted. My husband and I enjoyed living here a lot! Thanks Akis!

We loved George‚Äôs apartment. It is in an amazing location with everything we wanted to visit and experience within walking distance. Given its central location it‚Äôs incredibly quiet. The apartment was decorated really stylishly and the beds and other furniture really comfortable. Communication with George was excellent from start to finish and we felt well looked after. I would highly recommend this apartment and its host to anyone visiting Athens.

The apartment is wonderful! It has a big terrace with two exits and the view on Acropolis and the roofs of Athens houses. Perfect place for beautiful breakfasts!
Every room were so clean and tidy, also there‚Äôs some details selected with a great taste. For example, you can turn on radio to listen to some Greek melodies in the evening :)
Akis was so hospitable and nice, always helping us with all the questions. Thank you!

George‚Äôs place was stylish, immaculate and well-equipped. It‚Äôs a short walk from the Thissio and Monastiraki metro stations, centrally located near the Acropolis and cool Psyris and Plaka bars and restaurants. George was extremely helpful and very responsive. I recommend his place very highly.

Sehr sch√∂ne Wohnung in absolut bester Lage, super freundliche, unkomplizierte Gastgeber, die immer und schnell erreichbar waren.
Ein sehr sch√∂ner Aufenthalt, den ich immer weiter empfehlen w√ºrde!
Tr√®s bon accueil, h√¥tes aux petits soins. Appartement bien plac√©

Super s√©jour dans le nocarz d‚ÄôAkis.
Il est tr√®s disponible, r√©actif et est toujours pr√™t √† r√©pondre aux questions.
Je recommande !
Akis is very polite and helpful owner. The flat is very clean and you can find household profucts which you might need. Also flat has a large terrace that you can sea akropolis. Highly recommended.

I came to Athens to take part in the marathon.
I would say Anna and her husband are the definition of superhosts.
I arrived around two in the morning but they were very accommodating with my late arrival.
Anna prepared two meals that were waiting for me when I arrived along with a traditional Greek wine.
They gave me plenty of local suggestions to investigate.
The flat was located about a 10 minute walk from the nearest metro station.
The fridge was stocked with bread, milk, jam, eggs, butter, yogurt.
The flat also opened to a balcony which was pleasant in the late autumn sunshine.
Considering the price this was a really good amount of space, for my sole use.
If/when I return to Athens, this will be the first place I look to stay.

Anna and Petrus are truly amazing hosts, so kind and thoughtful. The location of the apartment is great, straightforward to find from the airport and close enough to all the must see attractions. Super clean and equipped with everything you could possibly need not to mention a gorgeous balcony that gave me serious plant envy! Cannot recommend this highly enough, just lovely.

El alojamiento es de los mejores, si no es por decir el mejor nocarz en servicios; es muy completo y los host son extremadamente amigables. Staying in this place was super cool. I cannot imagine of a better place to stay around Athens. Perfect studio, perfect location, its a brand new place. I definately recommend to everyone.

It doesn't get better than this. Huge studio, with everything you could need. Location is incredible, really easy to walk to the main points of interests and fun neighborhood to hang out. Konstadinos is super nice, helpful and gives the best advices for places to eat.
Very cute appartement and very close to the train station. Anna is very friendly and gave us usefull advices on the neighborhood !

Good place with nice artwork and decoration, Anna was a lovely host with quick communication

Everything was in tip top shape and was really conveniently located. The metro stop was close, food options close, and just a few blocks away are some little ruins from Ancient Greece!
I liked the wrap around balcony too. We brought pastries and coffee up for breakfast and just people watched.
Would stay again!
Everything was wonderful. Clean, very comfortable bed. Excellent location.

This is a nice, clean, and centrally located apartment in the Monastiraki area of Athens. Our host met us immediately upon our arrival and showed us the apartment (including a printout of local recommendations for restaurants as well as things like grocery stores, etc.). The apartment has AC, which is crucial for Athens summers! There's also a nice little balcony. Great place!
We spent a wonerful weekend in Constantinos' flat, wich is cosy and sunny , and Constantinos is sooo nice :) Thanks for everything!!

Really good place to live

Readers should ignore my review, because I had a change of plans and never checked in.  Therefore, I have no opinion.  However I gave 5 star to every category since I did not want to adversely affect the host‚Äôs rating and unfortunately nocarz does not have an option for saying I have no opinion (you MUST rate the place). I let the host know a few hours before my check in time and I believe the host was not upset as he received his money without providing the service.  However I did not hear back from him once I informed him that I would not be checking in.

Our family (with kids aged 11 & 10) had a wonderful stay. Everything in the apartment was very high spec and spotlessly clean. Location is excellent and easy walking distance from all the main tourist sites and the Plaka district. The balcony with view of the Acropolis is lovely. Would definitely recommend! Thank you George!

George was a great host. Very organized and helpful!
The apartment was perfect located. Walking distance to all important sights and charming neighborhoods like Plaka and Psirri.
The apartment is even nicer than on the pictures. Very comfortable beds, well equipped kitchen and all areas very modern and clean.
We had a great time in Athens.
Thank you George
Great view and convenient location

This is a great appartment. The whole place is brand new and has a breathtaking view of the acropolis. It is very centrally located to everything but on a quiet street so noise level is minimal at night. Its a block from the center square where you will find all the shops and restaurants you could want and nightlife as well.
Loukas was very helpful from check in to check out, we even locked ourselves out once and he was there within minutes to open up.
I definitely recommend this place and will stay there again next time !!

We had a lovely 4 night stay at Kostis' apartment. The apartment is in a great location for exploring the centre centre, with the Acropolis a short walk away. The apartment was clean and stocked with everything you could need. Kostis was a great host and a pleasure to deal with. He provided lots of information about the local area and places to eat. Takis bakery, which Kostis recommended, was a short stroll from the apartment and was so good we made several trips there :)
Thank you Kostis for a great stay. Hopefully we'll make it back one day!
Great place and location

From the very beginning until the very end Eleni was very helpful and kind to us. After following her exact directions to her house, we arrived there and she was waiting for us with a big smile. We felt the Greek welcoming right away. When we left the place, we were all happy with the accommodation Eleni had provided to us.

When we saw the attic where we were going to stay, we were excited. Private, with your own terrace, which is excellent to have breakfast or dinner at, and also, very important, the ALL the place was extremely clean. We really love it. Eleni's house is beautiful and with good taste decorated.
The neighborhood is residential and felt it very safe at all times. It is very close to the Arcopolis and other interesting things around it.
We would highly recommend this place without a doubt!

Eleni is a lovely woman who was very communicative and welcoming.  The sunny flat is perfect and just as described.  It was very comfortable and spacious. We walked to the Acropolis is about 20 minutes.  There are many good places to eat - the kind of places where locals go,  so affordable and delicious - within walking distance.  Highly recommended.

Eleni's home was a wonderful oasis during our short trip to Athens. And Eleni is an even nicer person! We arrived before check in time, and Eleni graciously allowed us to store our luggage and give us a map and suggestions on what to do during our stay. The apartment was very clean and in a safe area. Eleni even called us a cab to take us back to the airport when we left! I would definitely stay at Elena's again when I'm in Athens.
Tr√®s bien accueilli. Merci
Great place to stay in Athens! Quiet area, easily walkable to great restaurants and the Acropolis and surrounding area. Eleni is a great host, extremely kind and helpful. Highly recommended!

This is a fantastic place. The appartment is very pretty, it has an own veranda, and everything you need. It is nicely situated right below the Filapappou hill, 15 minutes walking from the Akropolis. Definitely a good place to stay!
Ottima posizione. Alloggio incantevole.
I loved it... Dimitrio is an excellent host! Recommended 100%

Fast communication was a key factor when we booked this place, as Dimitrios patiently replies to all our queries in the soonest time possible.
Dimitrios offered to meet us from outside the metro, and led us to his place, while offering very useful pointers and areas of interest. The place is a just a short walk from Syntagma Metro, and is just a few minutes away from most of the historical sites, as well as the numerous options for restaurants, cafes, gelato stores, etc.
The pictures doesn‚Äôt do justice, as his place is literally breath-taking. The place is very clean and full of little touches, bedroom was comfortable with a/c, and the view from the balcony is simple magical, be it in the early morning, midday, or even at night. The kitchen is also well-equipped, as well as the bathroom. He even provided a map and a local guide which proved to be very useful as well.
Dimitrios has also made some very good recommendations for lunch/dinner, as well as gelato stores, which we highly appreciate.
Overall, very much pleased with this place, and would definitely consider returning to Dimitrios‚Äô place, as 2 days seemed to be too short to explore more on the neighborhood and sample more on the fantastic Greek cuisine.
This is our 2nd time to stay at Dimitrios‚Äô place in less than 1 year. Simply put, this is our only option whenever we visit Athens, and everything about this place is excellent!! Thanks again!!
Overall 5 stars!
Excelente anfitri√≥n, conversador y muy amable. Me facilit√≥ mi estancia y recorridos por Atenas. El sitio tiene las mejores vistas del lugar.

The location is perfect in the city center. The view to the Acropole is breathtaking. The room is confortable. Dimitri is kind,  attentive and quick to answer. We expect to return. Highly recommended!
Fantastic location and stylish place! Unbeatable spot among so many restaurants and an easy walk to key sites. Easy to communicate and check in/out. Definitely recommend!

We stayed twice at Dimitrios place and we loved it. The location is perfect, the room is confortable, and the view is superb. Dimitrios is a great host, always available and quick to respond. I would definitely stay there again.
Nice apartment, amazing view from terrace and close to Acropolis and Plaka. Georgios was very helpful. Excellent quality -price ratio.

Logement tout √† fait conforme au descriptif : propre bien √©quip√© spacieux avec la climatisation bien appr√©ciable cet √©t√©. Assez proche du centre . Rapide et √©conomique en taxi ( compter 4‚Ç¨ maxi) . Et puis surtout merci √§ Yanis voisin et ami de Zographos pour son accueil attentionn√©, ses conseils, son aide. Adresse tres recommandable
Great location for touring Athens.

Dina's place is perfectly central, so comfortable, and very spacious. The four of us fit very well and the apartment was clean and beautiful! Communicating with Dina was easy and she responded quickly. We also really appreciated the information about the neighborhood and the suggestions for taxis and places to visit, eat, and shop. Staying at Dina's was the perfect way to end our trip!
The appartment was ok in a very good location.

House is in good location 2 minutes with walk to metro acropolis and museum. There is everything in near by house bakery supermarket cafes bars etc. We really enjoyed at this house, i strongly recommended..

Das Apartment war sauber und sehr gut ausgestattet, es hat nichts gefehlt!
Das Badezimmer war neu und sauber.
Die Lage der Wohnung ist einfach klasse, zur Metro Station sind es gerade mal 2 Minuten und es liegt in einem jungen modernen Viertel wo immer was los ist!

Stamatis was a fantastic host, who helped tremendously when we needed assistance finding the location on our first day. He found us and brought water, which was very kind. He provided great insight into sightseeing, ins and outs of Athens and ways to make our time enjoyable. The apartment is gorgeous and the rooftop pool is wonderful. I would gladly come back if I'm able to visit Athens again. The listing is very close to metro and 20 minutes walking to Acropolis and other sites.

What can we say? Stamatis was an incredible host. From the moment we arrived, he took his time (without question) to explain everything about the area + Athens. The time and dedication he puts into his place (which he designed himself) makes it so inviting- as does the beautiful roof top pool. We spent more time at "home" than we did touring.. It was too comfortable and beautiful to leave! I would stay here over any hotel in Athens. A must do to truly enjoy your visit!!

Loved the apartment, the neighbourhood & the proximity to so many of the attractions in Athens. Dina‚Äôs recommendations for great food and shops in the area were so helpful. Hope to come back someday!
Stamatis‚Äô home is incredibly stylish and cool, in a hip yet quiet location. Incredibly clean, chic and welcoming. We look forward to coming back!

Accommodation close to the historic center and local (non-touristy) restaurants. Everything within walking distance.
Easy access by metro with suitcases.
Very welcoming host, always available, attentive and very responsive.

Stamatis is an exceptionally outstanding host. He speaks very good English, gave us a complete overview of the apartment and gave recommendations about how to tour Athens. He helped us get a package delivered and when the delivery company had trouble delivering, he spoke to them over the phone for us.
As for the apartment, it is immaculate. It looks just like the photos -- there is no bait-and-switch going on here. It is very roomy as well -- more-so than other places we have stayed. Its location is very convenient and feels safe.

Hosts were amazing and helped a lot with getting to the place and making sure we were good and settled in!
Good location with pharmacies, groceries, cafes and even barbers right nearby.
Great stay :)

This was a wonderful location for a stay in Athens. It was a great walking distance to the metro and we got to experience more of a local feel of Athens, not just the touristy part. The host were also wonderfully helpful and always responsive! We would definitely recommend this to people wanting to experience a local feeling of Athens!

This is an amazing place in the center of Athens. Well-thought apartment and a swimming pool on the top floor that makes it unforgettable. I would definitely go back next time in Athens. Very responsive host.

We loved our stay in the apartment! It was really spacious, clean and had everything we needed including towels, shampoo, hairdryer, coffee and coffee maker. The roof terrace and pool was a great bonus and lovely to relax on after exploring Athens.
The location was good, not much immediately around the apartment but a supermarket nearby, a 5 min walk to the Metro or 20 mins walk to Monastiraki Square and all the sites.
Stamatis was a fantastic host, really responsive and flexible, especially when our first flights were cancelled he let us change dates and was flexible about check out time too. He made sure to meet us when we arrived and gave us lots of recommendations and explained the latest covid restrictions.
I would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Athens, a perfect base for exploring all the city has to offer!
Dimitri is a great host , he let us to check in earlier , his location is close to the metro station and it is very convenient, he helped us to carry the lugares and made us feel at home .

Quelle belle rencontre ! Giannis nous a accueilli et nous a aid√© tout au long du s√©jour ! Disponible, tr√®s gentil et de bon conseils il a rendu le s√©jour vraiment au top ! Je le recommande vivement. Un sans faute ! Merci encore pour tout. Ravi d'avoir partag√© ce moment.
Really enjoyed our time in Athens at this home. Very comfortable and in a convenient location to the metro to get anywhere in the city in minutes.
Very nice apartment great location

Panos is truely a superhost and is very kind and helpful too. We are happy to spend some nights there in the nice, quite and clean apartment. The restaurants nearby are also very nice and authentic. Acropolis and ancient agora are only 15-20 footwalk from the apartment! üëç

Very nice apartment in a fantastic location.  We visited with 3 children (16, 14, 12) and really enjoyed our stay.  One kid slept on couch (her choice), so all the kids had their own space.  The apartment was very clean and very well supplied with cooking gear, soap, shampoo, towels, etc.  George arranged transport from airport for us, so check in was very easy. The apartment is in a great location on the edge of the tourist zone, but within easy walking distance of less touristy areas.  Very easy walk to all the ancient sites, metro station, endless bars and restaurants.  Everything worked well in the apartment, and the one minor issue we had was promptly resolved by George.  Only thing to caution on is that it's in the central city and the church bells chime on the hour and half-hour, so if you need perfectly quite environment at night, bring earplugs as it can be a bit noisy.  Didn't bother us, but something to be aware of.
Perfect location in the center of Athen. Compared to the pictures, the apartment is here and there a bit in the years. But overall a good choice for us
Appartement tr√®s bien plac√©. Nous avons pass√© un super s√©jour chez Rosana. Je recommande!!

Spectacular views of the acropolis and great proximity to all of the sites such as the Agora, Syntagma Square, Acropolis, National Archaeological Museum. The apartment is nestled in a quiet square behind the National Cathedral of Athens within the busy Plaka district. Therefore, the apartment was very quiet but in an ideal location for access to great food, shopping, and nightlife in Plaka, Monastiraki, and Psiri.
My family of 5 (three adult children in their 20s and parents in their 60s) spent one week here and had the time of our lives. The apartment is also very close to the central city bus stops and two main metro lines for east access to the rest of the city and surrounding region.
Finally, George arranged a day-tour of the Peloponnesian peninsula. The English-speaking guide was previously a geologist and was extremely knowledgeable of the history and geology of Greece. We learned so much and a had a great time.
Great option. The best host.

L'appartement est vraiment tr√®s bien, tr√®s bien d√©cor√©, tr√®s bon emplacement, tr√®s bien √©quip√©, parfait pour un s√©jour professionel ou des vacances. Rosana est tr√®s sympathique et tr√®s accueillante. Je recommande sans h√©sitation.

The apartment was exactly as described. Location couldn't be beat, only a 10 minute walk to the Acropolis. Finding it wasn't too hard. Apartment was clean and tidy when we arrived. Balcony was nice, up on the third floor. Pantelis gave us information that we used to find a great local restaurant. Couldn't be happier.

Peter's apartment was great, I really felt at home. It has an authentic Athenian feel. I'd be happy to return. It's easily accessible by public transport and just a few streets away there are many bars/restaurants.

Cute apartment, had everything we needed. Location was really perfect as we walked everywhere.
We stayed for Saturday and Sunday nights which meant we had lively nights. on Saturday there was a party just below us with loud music till about 4am (I think it was just a weekend thing). It didn't bother us, but if you have little kids or sensitive to noise, you might want to take it into account...
Will definitely come again
Apartament was Perfect. Hosts were Perfect. We recommend the place to everybody who will want to spend their time in Athens. IT was great

Great apartment, big and clean. The metro station is just 1 minute walk from it.
George was very nice and helpful, and answered quickly to any questions we had.
!I really recommend this place

A very nice and spacious apartment in a central district of Athens, we found nice restaurants and bars in the nearby neighbourhood . We have been there with a group of 8 people and had enough space for everyone. George is a very nice host, communication with him was perfect. We would come back at any time.

We loved our stay here! It's so central - you're within a 5min walk to anything you might need and the metro station, Plaka market and Acropolis museum are right around the corner. We had lunch at the restaurant a few doors down while waiting to check in and the neighbourhood is busy but great for a relaxing meal while people watching. The apartment itself is small but was comfortable for the two of us. The futon is very hard so I wouldn't recommend a super long stay if you'll be needing both beds. Drosoula was so kind to have bread, cheese and orange juice waiting in the fridge for us and went over the map of Athens and suggested a walking route that we spent and afternoon following and loved. If I'm ever back in Athens, I'll be staying here again!

We really enjoyed our stay in this apartment, the location was incredible- close to the metro station, but we mainly walked everywhere anyways. We felt very safe and had a great time exploring!
We struggled to find the apartment because we arrived on a rainy evening and were following the GPS directions map from the nocarz page, which led us to the hostel across the street and unfortunately we could not reach the host. Although she was accommodating with a late check in for us, which was appreciated. It would be helpful if there was a photo of the outside of the building, so guests can easily recognize it.
Once we finally found the place, host was very kind and super helpful in showing us directions on a map & tips of where she recommends.
There was quite a bit of noise from other apartments, but location was really great and Host was friendly and pleasant.

This flat is in a very convenient spot and is great value. It is an older style place, but charming and spotlessly clean. The host is so very warm, kind and helpful. The restaurant next door is must: again, lovely hosts and excellent food and value for money.

eravamo due famiglie per un totale di 9 persone. abbiamo gradito la posizione molto vicina al centro e alla metro e gli ampi spazi. Qualche problema con i bagni insufficienti per 9 persone e l'aria condizionata perch√© i condizionatori erano inefficienti: meglio evitare il periodo troppo caldo.

10/10 would return in a heartbeat. Booked rather last minute to join a friend in Athens for their birthday. Location was perfect, just down the hill from the Acropolis metro station. The flat was right in the middle of things, we walked to the Acropolis, the Agora, shopping and dining. Do try the restaurant immediately up the hill from the flat, great food, really friendly staff. Nicoleta was a great host, communicative and friendly from our first interaction on. Even though the flat was right in the middle of things, I didn't have issues with noise or anything like that.

I stayed in this lovely little apartment for 2 nights while I explored the nearby Acropolis. I was on my own, and it was perfect for my needs - comfortable and clean, close to the metro, and in walking distance to the Acropolis and other historical sites, as well as bars, cafes and restaurants (and a little supermarket!) The bed is very comfortable and the shower was good and hot. It was very easy to communicate with the host, who was quick to reply and very helpful. I would recommend this to other solo travellers. A lovely find.

Drosoula met us at accommodation, which (we were later than we'd originally stated, but did our best to keep in contact ((including asking strangers to message them when we had no wifi/roaming)).
When we were let in, it was a very quick tour of unit. There was time to ask questions about anything.
The bathroom gets very wet from no shower curtain, but would also be difficult having one, as it's very confined.
Location has very good access to metro, Acropolis, shops and restaurants .
Bed was comfortable.
Fridge wasn't on when arrived, but chilled reasonably quickly.
Nonika and Drosoula both were very responsive with messaging.
Maybe we just expected more from unit and host on arrival.
We stayed again 3 days later. we arrived 7.30pm. Drosoula left keys in locked key box at building entrance. This was easier than trying to meet at a certain time.
If you're just Athens for a day or 2 , it would be fine.
Thanks Nonika and Drosoula for your assistance when required.

House is great! Really close to all great attractions. Nice restaurants nearby
The house was comfortable and Panos was great . All was very clean. The Netflix was great and we saw movies.
Great experience!
Mr Nikos is great host, friendly, and helpful I had everything in kitchen for cooking.

Mr. Nikos is a great host.
friendly, responsive, professional, and very helpful. I loved the place and the location and recommended to everyone. he is so caring that he came late night to help me with luggage and find taxi for me.
definitely recommend that place and I will be back again also.
Panos will give special attention to your every need, taxis, restaurants, sights and more

Notre exp√©rience avec Panos a √©t√© super bonne. Malgr√© notre arriv√©e tardive, il nous a accueilli √† la bouche du m√©tro et nous a conduit √† notre logis.
Son appartement √©tait parfait pour un s√©jour d'une semaine, rien n'a manquƒó.
L'emplacement du logis est parfait pour les visites usuelles d'Ath√®nes.
A pied ou en m√©tro, tout les points int√©ressants sont accessibles en temps record.
Merci de nous avoir accueilli si chaleureusement.

The appartement was really nice and adorable, it was very clean and very safe. It had all what we needed and even more! We really recommend Panos‚Äôs house, it was really amazing and well prepared. It exceeded our expectations. Thank you again Panos for everything!
Ana and Xaviera
Great place to stay in Athens.  Able to walk to many of the sites and restaurants are close by.

Great host. Very responsive. And the parking in the valet garage is fantastic if you have a car!  Location is nice but on a busy street so could get pretty noisy in the bedrooms. It's near the stadium and the temple of Olympia - around a 20 min walk from the main entrance to the Acropolis. The place itself is large - 2 bedrooms and a large living room but 'lived in' so we were living out of suitcases for the week.  Overall good value for groups of 4 (or more) but less so for 2 people.

Thanos was a great host. He was extremely quick to respond to any questions and his assistance was always timely. He arranged our transfer on arrival and leaving, and both experiences were great. The apartment was in a great location, which made it very easy for us to explore Athens. We would highly recommend his place for a stay.

We never met Manos but his brother Kyriakos took care of us. He was a great host. He picked us up from the airport (they charge but it's worth it because of how far the Athens airport is) and showed us around the city and helped us get oriented. He marked up a map for us on the first night and briefed us on the cities and the sites. He was patient and enthusiastic throughout this process.
During our stay there were issues with the wifi in the apartment (not their fault) and Kyriakos spent hours on the phone communicating with the company on our behalf. In general, we felt very taken care of as guests. Also, the apartment is beautiful. While it is not in the center of the nightlife, it is not far from anything you will want to see.
Stay here!
We had a great time - lovely central location although street performers noisy at night. Totally worth it though. Recommended.

It was a very nice experience staying in Maria's home. Nice Tv since I could watch European football cup at nights in Athens :). The air conditioners were good in very hot weather of Athens. There are couple of shops around her flat so no need to worry about buying stuff. And the most important part was her tips and suggestions for site seeing in Athens , felt that you have a professional tour guide with you ;).

Maria was a wonderful host! Even though we booked are stay just some hours before we arrived in Athens Maria welcomed us in her nice apartment. She was very flexible and provided us with valuable information about Athens. The aparment is very nice and clean, from the first minute on we felt home. Maria is the perfect host! I would totally recomand to go there.

I would highly recommend staying at Maria's if you're in town for leisure or business. During my short stay, Maria was a kind and really helpful hostess. The apartment is cozy and mass transport is really close. I would choose her again without any doubt

Great apartment in a perfect position as a base to explore Athens.

Nous avons pass√© un agr√©able s√©jour chez Niki. √áa maison est tr√®s accueillante, on se  trouve comme √† la maison. Tr√®s propre et tr√®s bien situ√©e. La terrasse est parfaite. Accueille tr√®s chaleureux par Niki.  Ses confitures maison pour le petit d√©jeuner sont un d√©lice.

Niki √® una eccellente padrona di casa. Dal primo momento si √® dimostrata disponibilissima nel fornirci tutte le informazioni per rendere semplice il nostro arrivo a casa. Wow... you cannot get closer to the ACROPOLIS! This place is insane. You physically can't get more central. Literally on the rock and two doors down from a beautiful street of restaurants and bars- so funky! HUGE place, great aircon, large bedrooms, 2 bath, cute little kitchenette (all you need). View from the balcony is crazy beautiful. What a great house and city to explore! Highly, highly, highly recommend. Niki was FAB and she recommended the best dinner we had our whole trip - Feedel Urban Gastronomy (a 7 minute walk from the house!) 10/10!
Wonderful apartment with amazing energy! My friends and I had a wonderful time and I was able to show them all Athens due to the perfect location! Niki was great at check in and out!

No better location in Athens.  Our hostess had everything we needed and more.  The local restaurants were a lot of fun and friendly.   Niki was very helpful getting us from the airport to the house.  We will visit this gem again.

Niki was a perfect host! Her place is in the perfect location! It is a 7 minute walk to the entrance to the Acropolis, and close to cafes and other historical sites. We are a family of 5 adults and we had plenty of room. There is a rooftop balcony that we enjoyed overlooking the city and  and up to the Acropolis. We feel lucky to have found Niki!

We had a great time at Gergia‚Äôs place. The place is modern and very clean. It is centrally located and 5 min walking to the Acropolis , with so many lovely restaurants and cafes located nearby . The place and its location are absolutely awesome. We would definitely recommend the apartment. Thank you Gergia . Billy and Mila
Awesome location. Cozy place with everything you need. Great hosts.

Our stay was perfect.
The host is very nice and helpful, he sent us detailed instructions how to get to the apartment, and it was really easy to find it.
Location is great, for example, Acropolis and good places to eat are not too far, 15 minutes maximum.
In the apartment, there was everything needed, equipped kitchen, hairdryer, towels, wireless internet, AC etc.
It was really clean, so it was comfortable to live there.
Absolutely recommend to stay here!

El estudio estaba muy bien en general. La limpieza inmejorable y la ubicaci√≥n muy buena.
La comunicaci√≥n con Chris fue muy positiva tambi√©n.

This is a good choice. Location is excellent, place is very clean and has things you need to make your families' stay comfortable. Spiros is a great host. He arranged transportation for us to and from his place. Overall, awesome experience, truly enjoyed our stay.  Highly recommended!

Departamento en excelentes condiciones y equipado con mas de lo necesario.
Anfitrion inmejorable en atenciones. Excelente ubicacion cerca de lo mas importante de conocer.
GRACIAS.
the apartment is located great, very clean and pretty. Thanks Spiros.

We had a blast! Memos and his wife were so helpful to us in every way possible and we can't thank them enough! The location is the best possible that I could think of from the city and the views are BEYOND breathtaking. We thank you again so much for everything!

William was very helpful before meeting in providing us with all the info the get to his appartment and even later suggesting us what we could visit. The location is perfect, 15 min away from Acropolis! Definitely recommended!
Same as my previous review... Willian is an Amazing host and everything is absolutely perfect... Love the place and the host!

Great location, safe neighborhood, beautiful view from the apartment of the Acropolis. Willian was an extremely helpful host and waited up for us to arrive late at night. The flat was perfect! Thank you, William, for making our time in Athens so great!
Great little place to stay that is not that far from a lot of tourist sites in the center of Athens. Communication with the host was great. Would recommend this place to those passing through.

Our stay with Willian was great! He provided us with many great tips on things to do and places to eat. We also enjoyed being able to use the kitchen and eat out on the terrace with great views of the Parthenon!

We stayed at this stylish place for 3 days . Is super central located .. 5 min from train station. The place has an amazing view and waking up to see sunrise overlooking the acropolis is breathtaking .
William provided with tips for places to visit and places to eat .. these suggestions were surrounded by locals and the food was delicious . Amazing stayed !!!

Es un apartamento agradable,limpio y nos gusto el detalle de los chocolates, fruta y agua. Adem√°s de chanclas de uso personal. es un poco lejos del movimiento de Atenas. Buenas recomendaciones cuando llegamos al apartamento. le sugerir√≠a una repisa en el ba√±o para colocar los champus

Myrsini is a wonderful gem of a person and her place reflects that completely: beautiful apartment, full accomadations, wonderful decor. Couldn't recommend higher! She's very responsive and generous! wonderful stay - all our thanks!
Todo muy correcto. Granfacilidad en desplazamientos cercado todo
Gegend toll, Blick obertoll, Wohnung klein, aber sehr s√º√ü und alles sauber.

El alojamiento es tal cual las fotos, la ubicaci√≥n es excelente y la vista realmente un sue√±o!! Lo √∫nico que puedo decir como negativo es que el agua no sal√≠a suficientemente caliente y en invierno es un poco incomodo. Gracias thodoris!!
Clean and tidy in a great location. Incredible view!
Great location with an amazing view !
Great location and view is even better than the photos !
Suggested. Everything great

What an amazing location with an amazing view of the Acropolis. Theodoris was extremely responsive and helpful. The studio is small but with the rooftop terrace, it‚Äôs like a huge place and is well equipped.  Would definitely stay again.
Perfect location with a beautiful view. Very comfortable and cool apartment had everything I needed. Thodoris was helpful and responsive. Wish I could have stayed longer and would definitely return.

Wonderful stylish spot in and around Kolonaki. Great light and greenery from the backyard. Highly recommended.
Great room!

We had a perfect stay in this apartment. It is ideally located to visit Athens, very close from Acropolis and the metro. The apartment was very comfortable, clean and well equipped. AC worked very well luckily as it was extremely hot on Athens. The bed is perfect. It was very easy to communicated with Konstantinos and we could easily check in even with a very late arrival. I definitely recommend :)

Very clean apartment with great location. The building and the apartment is a bit old, but it was maybe the cleanest nocarz we have ever stayed in. Very good location, walking distance to almost everything, but still the bedroom is quiet as it is faced to a backyard, with no restaurants/bars outside the window. Wifi also working well. Air con both in dining room, and in the bedroom.

Mike ist ein fantastischer Gastgeber. Die Wohnung entspricht v√∂llig der Beschreibung, sei es die Lage oder die Ausstattung. Als besonders toll empfanden wir die Dachterrasse.
Die Lage der Wohnung ist perfekt: Metrostation, Supermarkt, Boutiquen, Flohmarkt, Sehensw√ºrdigkeiten, D 14 (und die angesagteste Bar Athens direkt gegen√ºber) alles ist zu Fu√ü erreichbar. Wir hatten eine unglaubliche Woche in der Wohnung und kommen sicher wieder.
Mike konnten wir jederzeit erreichen, er hat uns immer helfen k√∂nnen oder Auskunft gegeben.
Mike is a fantastic host. The flat is matching the description 100% including the location and the interior. Particulary the rooftop terrace was a real highlight for us. Staying in Mikes flat gives you the possibility to reach literally everything you need within minutes: subway-station, supermarkets, shops of every kind, the flea market and most of the places of interest (including a super-cool bar right across the street). You can walk to all of those places.
We could always contact Mike by texting him and he always provided us all the information we needed.
We had a terrific time in the flat and are definetly coming back.

Mike fue muy amable conmigo y con mi familia. Nos espero cuando llegamos y nos facilit√≥ su ayuda para imprimir nuestros pases de abordar y nos recomend√≥ un muy buen restaurante. El departamento muy limpio y bien decorado tal cual se muestra en las fotos. La terraza tiene una vista espectacular!!!!

Wonderful service and hospitality we understand why Mike and Vasilis are super hosts. Flat was in an amazing location close to everything. The room was very clean and stylish. We were even left  yogurt, toast, jam and coffee for us at the apartment. Would 100% stay again and recommend to anyone thinking of staying here.
Mrs. maria is one of the most polite welcoming and friendly people i have met. the place was great so was its location. keep up the good work! Sure will go again

Maria did an excellent job for our arrival and stay. She was always contactable and ready to help. The apartment is very clean and cosy, food & beverages for breakfast/snack was provided and complimentary. A very nice experience in my hometown Athens.

This is a lovely apartment in a great area. Very close to the stations of Thissio and Monistiraki and literally within 30 minutes walking distance of all the monuments.
The apartment is light, clean and very well equipped, things like good crockery, a coffee maker and pans that you can actually use. And Aris adds some nice personal touches, like providing a jar of coffee and a good hairdryer and hair straighteners, a basket to carry a bottle of wine and glasses, blanket and lighter to take up to the roof terrace to watch the lights come on at the Acropolis, priceless
The locations is great, excellent bars and restaurants very close by and some quirky little shops, it feels like you are living in a real neighbourhood and not in a sterile tourist area. We loved it.
Aris is a great host, he helped us out when we realised we had no plug converters and we borrowed a phone charger from him.
Stay here, its fantastic, even the lift is funky, very Enter the Dragon mirrors, you'll love it.

Aris is a fantastic host. Not only is is apartment well appointed but it is also located in a wonderful neighbourhood in Athens. So many cafes around and a great atmosphere.
Aris gives lots of ideas on the best places for your money to go.
Really recommend Zamano Restaurant near the apartment.
Coffee around Athens is a rip off so go to the Handlebar Cafe (close) for great and cheap coffee (1.5 Euro) and Coffeeway (near Vodofone) cost 2 Euros
Aris was fantastic and organised very cheap sim cards for us with lots of data.
We couldn't of asked more of a host. His communication and help was outstanding.
The bed and the apartment is very comfortable
Ask Aris about the legendary revolution dog.His painting is around the corner. It is a great story!

Aris‚Äô apartment was a great place to stay in Athens! I‚Äôd read other reviews so pretty much knew what to expect. What surprised me was HOW convenient the apartment was to everything we wanted to do! We were able to walk to the Parthenon, the museum, the Athens flea market, and lots of other shopping and restaurants. No taxis or Metro necessary. Check in was super easy, and Aris very helpfully organized a taxi from the airport for us. He spent time showing us around the place, including the rooftop, and had a tabletop map and showed us the surrounding areas. His restaurant suggestions are spot on, too! We would definitely stay in his  place again if we returned to Athens!

Maria nos espero hasta que lleg√°ramos en el departamento. El cual est√° ubicado muy cerca de la plaza monastiraki y de la estaci√≥n de metro del mismo nombre una zona con bastante turismo y lugares para comer y tomar una bebida!! Muy limpio, bien decorado y con una terraza con vista a la acr√≥polis!!! Maria es demasiado amable y hospitalaria!!
Nice place ! Nice host ! Maria is so kind !
Maria est pleine d'attentions pour ses h√¥tes. Son appartement est propre, bien am√©nag√© et tr√®s bien situ√©.
O apartamento √© bem localizado, o quarto √© aconchegante e confort√°vel. Recomendo

Ioannis is a great host and his apartment is clean, modern, and located in a central area of Athens near Gazi. The apartment is large, furnished, and has a separate kitchen, living room, bathroom, and bedroom areas that can easily accommodate a family. I was travelling by myself and my flight was delayed, but Ioannis was welcoming, helpful, and communicated excellently with me. Although I was worried about the neighborhood's appearance, Ioannis reassured me that the area is safe at night and it was.

The flat is in the heart of Athens. It has the perfect location and you can really reach everything by foot. Because it is so central, it can be a bit noisy in the neighborhood at weekends (I still slept well). There are lots of cute restaurants and shops just around the corner. Maria was very nice and could give us lots of tips on where to find good restaurants, which bars are worth visiting etc. I highly recommend this accommodation to anyone.

We stayed at Calliope's apartment for a few days and had a wonderful stay. She and Dominic are very welcoming and the apartment is on a nice quiet lane in a great location. The place was clean, spacious and comfortable, everything we needed. Thanks for a great stay!! Highly recommended!

The apartment is very cosy and comfortable, the location is good if you like the calm and silent neighborhood. A lot of nice restaurants in a walking distance. Subway is close, it's very easy to get to the city center. Good choice to stay in Athens.

I came here on a business trip, it is super close to the Megaron international conference centre. It's maybe 5 minutes walk with a little cluster of cafes on the way.
Dominic&Calliopes apartment is clean, bright and comfortable with a lovely balcony and the comfiest bed I found in Greece. Little things are all sorted for you, so there's no worries if you dont have time to get to the shops. If you do have spare time, it's a short walk to all the attractions in Athens, particularly Lycabettus hill (go up there at sunset for the most amazing view. Stay until the Acropolis lights up!)
I was greeted by Dominic, who is very welcoming and full of tips about the city. He really made me feel comfortable in the apartment. This was particularly nice as I was travelling alone. He is also great at responding to messages or questions. I would stay here again for sure :)

I spent a wonderful time at Calliope and Dominic. Their vintage apartment is decorated with a lot of taste and I felt like home there. They were very available and very helpful for anything. I will certainly come back!
We had a great stay at the nocarz. I can totally recommend it!

Very nice studio flat in a great location for exploring and enjoying Athens. A short walk from the Acropolis for sightseeing by day, and with nice bars and caf√©s nearby for the evening as well. Thalia is a great host, and check-in and check-out were both very straightforward. Thanks for our stay!
A comfortable, clean and airy place with all the required facilities. A good place to stay at Athens.

It was indeed a true Athenian experience! Awesome apartment worth every penny. Amazing view of the Acropolis by day and by night from the balcony. The apartment was perfect for a group of 5 people as it was fully furbished, very spacious, clean and had everything needed for a pleasant stay. The apartment is situated in a very quiet neighbourhood, just 20 minutes walk from the Acropolis, 10 minutes walk from the Kerameikos metro station, near wich you could find nice bars and restaurants that were not tourist traps but genuine Greek ones, and also 2 minutes walk from the bus station from which you could easily go to Piraeus.
Stratos is an AMAZING host. He was extremely helpful before and during our stay in Athens. Not only did he arrange for me and my friends to check-in earlier than expected but he made sure everything was ok throughout our stay. He also provided us a greek mobile number from which we could contact him in every case. He and his friend Michalis were extremely helpful since they helped us by suggesting the above mentioned bars and restaurants, by explaining to us the public transportation lines and also by helping us find 24 hour markets nearby!

I would deffinitely recommend this apartment and Stratos to everyone! 10/10 rating!

Anna's place was absolutely amazing! Great location 5 mins walk from the center. Restaurants and bars right outside the door. The place comes fully stocked with everything you may need. Anna was a very accommodating host arranging airport drop off and pick up. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Athens!
Enjoy this Appartment in the heart of Athens with a view to the Akropolis you will never forget.

Willian is an AMAZING host. He took time to sit and chat, got to know us, provided tips and suggestions on our travel plans, and we even had meals together. He is Super friendly and kind, very approachable and sincere. The apartment is extremely lovely and comfortable - very clean and absolutely perfect. The two cats - Fluffy and Titica - are gems. I can't wait to go back to Athens and stay with Willian.
The apartment is exactly like pictures . Willian is extremely helpful and has some amazing tips to see the city. He made us feel very welcome and we would definitely stay here again.

Me and a friend spend three nights in Willian's appartment and we are really glad we choose it. Willian wasn't there but his mate George welcomed us and gave us lots of information about the area and how to visit Athens to not miss anything. It was perfect. The room and bathroom are very clean, the balcony looks exactly how it's shown in the pictures and the cat's are really nice. Highly recommended.

Location was great, 5 mins walk from the metro. William has a beautiful place with 2 cute little cats to welcome us! Even though our plane was delayed for 2 hours, William waited patiently for us & gave us a good recommendation for some local Greek food. The room was clean & wifi is fast as well. Not forgetting the amazing view at the balcony of the Acropolis. Thank you William for hosting us at your beautiful place!

What a gem of a place in the center of Athens!
This was the first time that I've rented a room with anyone (usually I pick a whole place to have to myself), and I'm quite happy that I made the choice to stay with Willian and Giorgos. Not only do you get to stay at a stylish, modern and clean loft in the heart of the city, you have access to fantastic hospitality and local advice to help you get the most out of your time in Athens. For the traveler looking to meet friendly people and make connections with local folks...this is the place for you! They were both beyond welcoming in every respect, offering constant suggestions and friendly conversation if you initiated, but also knew how to give you your space and independence. What cool guys!!
Their place was very easy to use, located in a very convenient and safe section of Athens. Within the immediate area is a great little bakery, as well as an outstanding restaurant (To Trikyklo) Also, you're just a short walk from the Syngrou Fix metro stop, offering easy access to the rest of the city.
I spent a week with these guys, and am completely impressed with how caring and thoughtful their approach was to my stay. I feel like I've gained two friends!

Willian‚Äôs apartment is a wonderful place to stay if you‚Äôre in Athens. The apartment is modern, comfortable and clean, and has an incredible balcony with great views. Willian was an excellent host and he was happy to answer any questions and offer tips for the city.  I really appreciated his hospitality. This is a safe and great value option for anyone visiting Athens. :-)
Great apartment! Amazing view! Walking distance to everything!!!

We are two Aussies travelling Europe for 2 months so far. Willian's place is the best Air BNB we have come across. Bonus is the friendly cats, Acropolis view from the balcony, and Willian offers tours for a great price - this allowed us to learn and see things we would have otherwise missed.

One of the best nocarzs I‚Äôve ever stayed in. From location to views to cleanliness to comfortability - amazing. I live in NYC, it‚Äôs impossible in a city this size to find an apartment that has no noise pollution, but Anna‚Äôs place nailed it. Silent at night with blackout shades for sleeping in. Breathtaking views at all other hours. What a dream to live here. Thank you!

Great location and fantastic view of the city and especially the Acropolis
Anna was a great communicator sending lots of information on good restaurants before we arrived so reservations could be made. Very modern apartment with all the necessary amenities. Anna deserves her reputation as a super host

Great appartment in a nice, quiet area. Spacious bathroom (not so frequent in Greece), kitchen with everything you need, even a little breakfast is offered. If you have a question, Panos is there to answer! Thanks for the nice stay and thanks for flexibility for a later departure! Greatly appreciated. Definitely recommended to stay here!

Great location in Athens. The balcony wraps around the entire unit and is fantastic. The host was very flexible when our travel plans changed. Although the location is centrally located, the unit was very quiet. Highly recommended!!!

The place is located in a calm neighborhood, surrounded by cafes, bakeries, food markets and drugstores. Most of the times I walked to the city center - took me 60-70 minutes, but I dont mind a good brisk walk:)
The apartament itself is very simple, cozy, clean and comortable. The beautiful terrace, of course, is a highlight.
Lastly, Katerina is a very welcoming, kind and always ready to acommodate, host. Thank you again!!

Panos's place was awesome! Just perfect for exploring Athens--in a great neighborhood and easy to get around. The patio was a lovely place to relax and the beds were really comfortable. And an extra thank you for the breakfast provided in the fridge. We arrived late in the evening with our hungry son and we truly appreciated the food!

Appartement parfaitement conforme √† la description : emplacement id√©al
Pour faire toute la ville √† pieds, calme, grand, propre, parfaitement √©quip√©, une terrasse ombrag√©e avec magnifique vue pour le soir. Mais surtout un accueil charmant, attentionn√©, une disponibilit√© sans faille. Nous recommandons vivement ce logement qui nous a permis de vivre d‚Äôagr√©ables moments dans cette tr√®s belle ville d‚ÄôAthenes. Encore merci pour tout !!!
Eirini was extremely helpful and welcoming during our visit to Athens. Exarcheia is a vibrant neighbourhood, within easy walking distance of the major attractions. Perfect!
Eirini was unbelievbly friendly snd helpful, amazing host. She made our stay a real charm. The place is just great, tidy and got everything we needed. Loved the erea!

This place is immaculately, clean and very comfortable. The location is wonderful as it is walking distance to restaurants, metro, the Acropolis and many other attractions. We did experience some street noise at night due to the busyness of the area but we were definitely able to get a good night sleep. Karima was always helpful and responsive.

Thanks to Aris, we had two enjoyable days in Athens.
The flat is very central and very close to the metro station. There are cafes, bars and supermarkets around. The neighbourhood is very nice and safe. Note that, the entrance of the building is just across the gas station (i guess it was BP), we had a tiny problem with finding but it was solved quickly.
It was just for two people, neither bigger nor smaller. There were everything one can need. Kitchen, bathroom, bedroom were all well equiped.
I would definitely stay here again when I come back to Athens. Totally recommended.
Cozy apartment in a good location, highly recommended!
super nice place. very close to all touristy things and we could walk everywhere

Communication was really good, and they had everything we needed for our baby. the only reason it is not a five star is because of the cleanliness that could have been better. We really enjoyed our stay though and the layout of the apartment worked really well for our needs. thank you and maybe see you again when we come back to Athens!
PS: to be more specific and to give some constructive feedback: the washing machine for example could not be used because of the mold. it would also e good to have a curtain or sth in the bathroom so the water from the shower does not go everywhere. or have a wiping tool to make the clean up easier.
Alles super und wie beschrieben - vielen Dank f√ºr die nette Unterkunft, die wir brauchten um Athen zu erkunden :-)

Aris has a wonderful place and is a very responsive host. Very walkable to all the main attractions, and also the neighbourhood itself was lovely with some great restaurants nearby. It was much quieter and less touristy than staying somewhere closer to the centre.
The space was nice and had good amenities, clean and tidy, the only issue was that the shower made the entire bathroom floor wet, which became quite annoying. Would also be an easy fix with a little PVC barrier!
Overall though, we highly recommend - thanks for the stay Aris.

Perfect location, amazing home like apartment, great local food close and easy to metro and acropolis. Christina is very easy to communicate with!
Highly recommend

Ira's place is greatüëç perfect penthouse feeling, much space, superb equipment (just missing a toaster). It might be a bit noisy for some people, because of the street. The instructions and tipps are perfect for a short stay in athens. Check in / out and everything else was without any problems. If you want to be outside of the city's tourism center, this is perfect, if you want to have everything in walking distance, it might not be.

Ira is the superhost. Expect pro level attention to detail, promptness and cleanliness. Everything matches the description.
Very nice and cozy flat with a great view! Has everything you need, we really enjoyed our stay. Thank you Ira :)
Balcony space excellent, lovely clean apartment. Easy check-in. Great stay

Lovely apartment not far out of the centre of Athens. We chose to walk to the centre and back most days which took about an hour, but the metro is close by and will have you there in 15 minutes for a good price.
Apartment itself was clean and a lovely base, very quiet at all hours and the bed was so comfortable! Much bigger than a lot of the apartments seen for a good price, with kitchen facilities as well. House manual sent out prior to arrival made it easy to find the property and check in was really easy with the lockbox.
Would definitely recommend!
Everything was great once again. Highly recommended to any guest. 5*****

I felt welcomed and the house is the best to visit the city and to enjoy Athens: very close to the ancient Agora, the Acropolis and Monastiraki. The house is very clean and Georgios is a very nice person! You should take a look at the Acropolis from his tarrace: simply amazing!
Great room in a totally authentic apartment in a perfect area of the city!

The location of the apartment is perfect, I did all sightseeing walking. He himself is also very friendly and always available to help to make your stay pleasant. We had a lot of interesting conversations üòÅ Many many thanks üëç

This place was amazing!! The patio has a great view of Athens. The kitchen has everything a person could want/need. The apartment as a whole was great and also within 3-5 minutes walking distance to buses. The only thing I would tell people so they aren‚Äôt shocked/surprised is that this nocarz host does not own the entire building, so when you enter the first floor, you will encounter the smell of cigarette smoke due to the tenants smoking inside their apartments. However, once you get to the Diamond Penthouse, you don‚Äôt smell this. I‚Äôm American and it was shocking how many people smoke cigarettes in Athens; you‚Äôll also encounter smoking in most restaurants that we went to as well. Highly recommend doing outdoor dining. I‚Äôd totally stay here on my next visit to Athens!!

We are much more than satisfied. Apartment was perfect, fully furnished and cozy. Everything was like we expected. Highly recommended:)

This is nice pesthouse.

Sadly for us, this was a one night stopover in Athens before flying home early in the morning, we picked it on the overall look of the place and on its proximity to metro for the morning. That being said, Sofia was an absolutely lovely host and we would pick this place again for a longer stay! She waited for us to arrive even though our plane was rather late, made sure to give us a good orientation to the neighbourhood even though it was just an eat-and-sleep stay, left us food and beverages to welcome us and even had the AC on for our arrival! We could not have asked for a more pleasant welcome. :)

The apartment was just as advertised, 2 minutes from a metro stop to get to all areas of the city, and very much in a non-touristy area so you can easily eat in local places. It was small, but clean and well equipped with beautiful large balcony. Overall I would recommend Sofia and her apartment for anyone, no matter how long you're staying in Athens!

Very good apartment. It is really small, but you have everything you needed for a good stay. And for spring and summer you have a really huge terrace with a hammock and sunbeds.
It's only 2 minutes walking to a metro station (straight line to the airport) and 1 minute to a supermarket.
The host is really good, she answers almost immediately and we have a really warm welcome upon our arrival.

Location! This place is a two minute walk away from a cute square with plenty of drink and food options. And it's about a 15-20 minute walk from Acropolis.
The apartment itself was well appointed, clean, and comfortable.
Our hosts met us at the train station and walked with us to the apartment. They are super friendly and gave us plenty of good suggestions.
Perfect location for 1st time Athen Visitor.  Sofia is very hospitable. Strongly recommend
very fine
Overall a very good apartment as described. Two cos for me, is the elevator (very small because is an old building) and also the sound insulation is not the best (probably for the same reason)

Great location - everything is walkable. Great communication and very helpful in arranging transport. Place is clean and spacious. Only small problem was that wifi wasn't too great sometimes and just be aware that you need to flip a switch for hot water about 30 min prior each time. Overall would highly recommend!

Me and my girlfriend, we stayed in this apartment for a few days and would recommend it to everybody who wants to see Athens and stay on nice place directly in the city.
Apartment is nice furnished and very clean. You have everything there what you need including small kitchen and air-conditioning. It is located directly in the centre of the city with just a little walking distance from the best monuments of Athens. Location next to metro station gives you very good connection to the Airport and the rest of the Athens (and the see).
Nikos was very helpful, we arrived very late in the night - he was waiting to greet us and available on phone for our questions. Our flight from Athens was later in the afternoon and there was no hurry with check-out so we could leave out stuff there. It really helped, as we did not have to walk around the city with our backpacks.

Effie was so kind and welcoming! She met us at the train station and gave us suggestions for our short stop in Athens. The apartment is so nice and clean with an awesome balcony! Would love to come back :-)
Nikos is a very charming host.
We stayed at a lot of bnbs over a month. Effie stands out as the best host by far. Wonderful hospitality.

Marios was a great host,there was a small mix up on arrival but this was rectified immediately with lunch and a coffee after a long journey as way of apology!The apartment was great,fridge stocked with food and a great location,bakery and a supermarket at the end of the road if you need to pick anything up.A very welcoming host and a great place to stay in Athens.Thank you!
Clean, convenient, close to main attractions and helpful host. What do you need more?! Thanks Efthimis :)

The apartment is situated at a perfect location. Nearby the bars and restaurants in Psyri, Ghazi en Monastraki. Plaka and the Akropolis are also at walking distance. But we liked Psyri and Ghazi more for having a drink (less tourists).
It was bigger then we expected. We sent Efthimis an app when we arrived from the airport so he could give us the key. It was a couple of minutes walking from the metro station. He had given us a lot of information. But when you walk around you will find the most popular bar with deserts by yourself!
We were very glad that we stayed for 6 nights!

We had a great time at Efthimis‚Äôs place. He was waiting for us at the apartment after our late arrival and also was very kind with a late checkout as no one was checking in that day.
Beautiful apartment with amazing view and location. Highly recommend!
Effie is super helpful and the flat is wonderful, clean and big. The internet was fast. It was close to the centrum. Everything was fine
It was a beautiful apartment with everything we wanted. It had a nice balcony and spacious rooms. Will stay here again if I were go to Athens again
Great location, very nice balcony and Efthimis was very accommodating and helpful!

My husband and I stayed at the apartment for two nights. Aris was a great host. He met us at 2am to let us in and gave us great recommendations for places to eat and drink near by. The place was clean and superbly located. Walking distance to main sites around the city and very close to the metro. The neighborhood has a hip nightlife with lots of bars playing good music. I highly recommend!!

Ideal location just near everything and the view speaks for itself. wonderful host, space, and communication. The tips and assistance at all times of the day and night were a great addition to a great stay

Everything was amazing! As mentioned on the comments below the house is in a PERFECT location, very clean and has all the amenities that are needed for you, even those you haven't thought of, so just bring a suitcase with few clothes. Terrace is a huge plus and the view from the window is outstanding especially at night. Aris' tips for everything around were great and useful. I have to say that the house looks even better in reality so it was better than I expected. Beside, communication was fast and efficient and the access to the apartment was easy from the metro.
Thank you Aris!

Perfect location for such a reasonable price, furnished with early mid-20th century style, and extremely comfortable for my wife and I. Comfortable bed, cozy kitchen, and spectacular view--especially that last night with the big moon over the Acropolis that you can't stop gawking at from the balcony. Within a 10-30 minute walk you can reach most of Athens' prime destinations. Efthimis met us earlier than check in time and answered all questions at any time. Highly recommend!

Perfect place to stay for solo traveller
The room is neat, stylish, and thoughtful amenities. Love the private big terrace and marvellous view of Acropolis
Very convenient as the main tourist attractions are just few minutes away with many interesting cafes and restaurants around to try, this is the perfect spot to stay and you could be able to walk to the attractions very easily
Thanks again Aris for your help and the wonderful place
An amazing place, it‚Äôs exactly like looks, the owner is so friendly and helpfully.
Everything was perfect.
Great house with great view in great location. Highly recommend üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

This is such a wonderful apartment! We stayed here for 3 months and it was perfect. A great location, and it was equipped with everything we needed. The patio is so nice too! Maria is very responsive and helpful! All around very nice
This a nice, clean, very close to the main amenities in Athens

It's a nice place to  stay for a couple of days, not more. The bedding is comfortable, the apartment neat and clean and an enjoyable shower. The communication was perfect, and we were able to find the apartment easily and self check-in. It is also close to the city center and easily walkable. However, this neighborhood is also very noisy. The second floor hosts a shoe workshop, that has huge machinery working from early morning to late evenings. Construction works in the area do not allow for an easy night of sleep. Ear plugs were provided which is a nice gesture, but I'd ideally would have known before that such a workshop was operating 7am-9pm just below.
close to acropolis which makes everything convenient, fani was so helpful in helping us during transit strike at greece. very accomodating.
Great location, wonderful host and very clean.

Super s√©jour √† Ath√®nes. L‚Äôappartement est tr√®s bien localis√©, proche des quartiers anim√©s de la ville. Il est tr√®s beau et propre.
La bo√Æte √† cl√© a l‚Äôentr√©e permet d‚Äô√™tre autonome sur l‚Äôarriv√©e et le d√©part ce qui est tr√®s pratique. En revanche l‚Äôadresse donn√©e par nocarz ne m√®ne pas √† l‚Äôappartement avec notre gps mais Stelio tr√®s pr√©voyant nous avait envoy√© la localisation de l‚Äôappartement et des photos pour se rep√©rer. Stelio est tr√®s sympa et r√©actif.

The place is very central and functional. The two main flaws are:
1) It feels like nobody ever actually lived in it. It was redesigned and renovated to be an nocarz place, and it shows. There were important things missing in the kitchen, I found only one large pot and one small frying pan. As I was going to spend 10 days there, I bought some pieces of cookware, incl. a small pot to boil water (there is no kettle), plus paper towel, tin foil etc.. Also, no tea towels (I used a bath towel). In the shower there are no shelves for shampoo etc. I know these are small details, but it is what makes you feel at home in an nocarz place.
2) The location, though unbeatable in terms of centrality, was also a big problem at night, as it is smack in the centre of the hub of night life in Athens. Starting after midnight, and going on even to 4 or 5 am in the weekends, I was woken up by people yelling, singing out loud, playing music, laughing, smashing bottles etc. Being on the third floor, you could hear all this as if it was right outside your window. Besides, even on nights that were not particularly hot, I had to use the a/c because I did not want to open the windows due to the noise.
Stelios was very accurate and reliable. The place does not have a dishwasher, as I had read on the website, but it has a washing machine (although there are no tools for hanging your laundry). The "dining table" is very uncomfortable to sit at and not very stable. On the plus side, the bed was absolutely fantastic!
