We loved our stay In Athens.  This was a great location. The check in was super easy.  The apartment was clean and comfortable. We would definitely stay here again.
Great location!! Easy check in. House was clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay again.
Stelio was very friendly! The apartment is in a very good location to visit Athens by foot.
Œ§Œ≠ŒªŒµŒπŒø Œ¥ŒπŒ±ŒºŒ≠œÅŒπœÉŒºŒ± !!! Œ†ŒøŒªœç Œ≤ŒøŒªŒπŒ∫ŒÆ œÑŒøœÄŒøŒ∏ŒµœÉŒØŒ± !!! Œ†Œ±ŒΩŒµœçŒ∫ŒøŒªŒø check in Œ∫Œ±Œπ check out!!! Œ§Œø œÉœÖŒΩŒπœÉœÑœé Œ±ŒΩŒµœÄŒπœÜœçŒªŒ±Œ∫œÑŒ± !!!
Very good!The host is so nice and the apartment is tidy and spotless!!Thank you for hosting us!

Best value for money. Homely setting, great host. Amazing experience overall.
Location is among the best in Athens, with connectivity with the red and green metro lines not even a 5min walk from the apartment. The neighborhood is very safe, and has a supermarket and bakery at a stone's throw away.
Coming to the apartment itself, it's spacious enough for three people (perfect for two), with decent amenities in the bedroom and bathroom. The hall is very stylish and comfortable, and the entire place has a very homely atmosphere.
The best part about this, however, is the host. Stefania was absolutely wonderful, making everything super convenient for us right from day 1. She is very helpful and caring, and ensures your stay is as enjoyable as possible. Would definitely recommend this to any traveller going to Athens.

A fantastic, safe and cool apartment for exploring Athens, just 8mins from the metro, or a few moments from several bus stops. It was perfect for our family! Christopher and Sotiris are excellent hosts with friendly and helpful messages throughout. Thanks guys!
The view of the big balcony is soooo great! The room is clean and cozy. And the location is good too, near to the center of the city but also quiet.

The hosts were truly fantastic, they would go out of there way to make sure we had a comfortable stay.  We even left a credit card in the apartment and he was kind enough to deliver it across the city to us at the ferry port.  As for the apartment it is a nice small perfect for two space with a large balcony and a great view.  I would highly recommend these hosts and apartment.

Great location
Excellent communication with Liana.
Went out of their way to help as they can.
Recomended

The apartment itself is very nice and comfy. Contrary to what other reviewers said, we did hear some noise - both from the neighbors and especially from the square/cafes downstairs. So we didn't sleep in the front bedroom and instead opted for the rear bedroom, which was quiet. Aside from that, we found everything we needed. Decent sized TV, decently equipped kitchen (only thing missing was a kitchen knife which the host assured us he would buy ASAP). Good value for your money.

Liana was an absolutely amazing host! She made my friend and I feel very welcomed and comfortable. Very responsive and helpful! Their apartment was super cozy. We slept very comfortably and felt very safe. The view from their super cozy deck is stunning! I could have hung out there all day. An easy 15-20 minute walk to the National Garden. I highly recommend anyone to stay here! Thank you Liana & Theodosio for a wonderful stay!

My partner and I were so looking forward to our stay at Elena‚Äôs apartment from the get-go due to the beautiful photos and location shown through the nocarz profile. These photos were not able to prepare us, however, for how beautiful her home truly is. Her shelves are full of books about art, ancient Greece, french plays, sociology, politics, etc etc, and her walls are covered in beautiful, framed art and prints. The attention to detail is really lovely, with plants and mood lighting across the apartment, and not to mention the fact that on top of being extremely clean, the flat smells wonderful (!!) with fun candles and essential oils placed around the space. The terrace is also full of lush plants ‚Äî bumble bees would feed on the lavender and honey suckles in the morning as I had my coffee and the succulents were blooming. The apartment also has great working/office spaces as my partner worked during much of our stay and was able to stay very productive.
Elena was extremely responsive and supportive throughout our whole stay, not only as our host but also as what felt like a friend :) our only regret is that we did not have the chance to visit her jewelry shop on Antiparos, but we will have to do that next time!
Staying at Elena‚Äôs apartment makes you feel like you lived a whole life in Athens and that you were able, over that time, to build a beautiful, eclectic, and comfortable home for yourself. Not to mention that the apartment is in a wonderful and calm neighborhood though a nice walking distance from most sites in the city, so it is perfect for the tourist experience as well.
I couldn‚Äôt recommend this stay enough ‚ú®üåäüåªüíï

We absolutely loved this apartment. It is in a great location to access different parts of the city and was such a nice place to come home to after a lot hot day. It was just perfect for my wife and I.

Daphne's place was very convenient as it was walking distance to the metro station. Daphne was always available when we had questions. Just a short ride to Syntagma Sq., Acropolis and Monastiraki and many more!
Cute apartment, location is amazing, being two minutes away from a central metro line and 10 minutes from amazing tourist attractions.
A five star flat,great location and local.

I really enjoyed staying at Thassos place. Communication was really easy! He met us at the house and showed us around. He stocked the fridge with ham, cheese, bread and beers which was a really nice touch!
The bathroom even had supplies of toiletries and a first aid cupboard with things you may need including a sewing kit which came in really handy for me as my travel pillow had a hole in it and was on its last days but thankfully I was able to fix it! Also washing powder to be able to wash clothes.. another great asset. Little things like that make a massive difference to other nocarzs.
It was close to restaurants, cheap places to eat, bakery etc.
About a 10 minute walk to the metro station too!
If there is only 1 negative thing, it would be that it is on the ground floor so when other residents enter the building, the door slams but it is the only minor thing. Pack some earplugs of that concerns you. I certainly would stay again!

The place is near the city center and really easy to find. Also, Daphne is communicative and helpful.
The room needs a lot of maintenance as is has mold on the walls and smells like mold.
We could barely sleep one night out of 3 we booked because of this. For sure it needs to be renovated.
After talking to Daphne about this issue, she offered me the option to refund the money and I've accepted it and we moved to another place for our remaining time in Athens.
So I would recommend Daphne, but I would not recommend her apartment.

This apartment is right in the heart of monastiraki and all of the wonderful shops and restaurants. Looks just like the pictures! The view of the acropolis is incredible and something you won‚Äôt forget. It has a nice large floor plan, a nespresso machine, and everything you‚Äôd need to cook. But all of the Greek food in Athens is so good and quite cheap I‚Äôm not sure why you would. Can‚Äôt imagine a nicer, or more convenient place to stay in Athens for a few days! Highly recommend :)

This nocarz was large and well furnished with high end products.
Grigoris is a gracious host. He met us at the metro station and carried my bags. He had snacks, water, and coffee for us. We enjoyed the large deck and what has to be one of the best views of the Acropolis in Athens. It could not have been more prefect. Plenty of good restaurants, a grocery store and shopping near by. We liked it so much going to stay there again at the end of our trip in Greece.

This is our second time staying at this incredible nocarz.  Grigoris was so thoughtful; he provided us with plenty of Cool A/C, Drinks, Snacks, and a nice long hot shower ready  on arrival after our extended tour of Greece.  Once again we enjoyed the private roof deck with an amazing view of the Acropolis.  It was a perfect ending to our stay in Greece.
Beautiful nocarz with a fantastic view. Grigoris was a wonderful host. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Great apartment in central location. Easy to walk to everything! Love the view of the acropolis from the balcony!

Grigoris' place was perfect! Great location, walking distance to Plaka, Acropolis, the Metro (to name a few) with very little effort. Grigoris met my husband and I outside the metro, walked us to the apartment and gave us many tips and recommendations on the way. He was very thorough with explaining everything about the apartment (how to work the AC, washing machine, lights, etc). He even stocked the fridge with lots of water, beer, orange juice, as well as left us coffee, bananas and snacks. If you are searching for the perfect location in Athens and a host that goes above and beyond, look no further.

My wife and stayed 5 nights and enjoyed our visit.
Grigoris met us out front of the building where the taxi dropped us off and that made the arrival hassle-free.
Grigoris was a great communicator explaining everything about the apartment and giving recommendations for the local area even offering to arrange the taxi back to the airport.
The apartment was stocked with water, juice, beer and soda, bananas and coffee.
The view is great, it's the selling point of the apartment. It is in the middle of walking streets with loads of restaurants and shops.
While the living room space is large, the kitchen space is quite small (but adequate). The bathroom has an odd setup in that you walk through the shower to get to the toilet so some coordination is required if two people are staying in the apartment.
The water pressure in the shower was good and there is plenty of hot water.
This apartment is great for a short stay in Athens.

La wifi, lenta, pillamos apartamento con lavadora por ir con la beb√©, y no funcionaba; aunque nos ofrecieron que fuese el t√©cnico era inviable ya que vamos de vacaciones a viajar y conocer todo lo que de tiempo.
Para acceder al bloque y coger el ascensor tienes que subir escaleras y en el ascensor el carrito con la ni√±a dormida no cab√≠a.
Tener que encender el agua para ducharnos una hora antes un poco‚Ä¶.complicado si vas de turismo a darlo todo, aunque eso ya lo indicaba el anuncio.
En pleno septiembre con la humedad o calor que hay, dormir con un edred√≥n sin haber s√°banas es complicado, tenias que dormir con el aire s√≠ o s√≠, cuando te duchas la ducha se inunda de agua, por el contrario la limpieza estaba bastante correcta, y el piso aunque aparenta viejo, estaba bastante bien.
La televisi√≥n se la ve nueva, pero hubiera sido bueno que fuese Smart TV o m√≠nimo, que tuviese la funci√≥n Chromecast, para poder ver cosas que uno pueda pasar del m√≥vil a la pantalla.

We had a great stay at Yannis' place. The location was superb (best possible view of the Acropolis) and Yannis was a great host -- good company, always very easy to reach with questions, and full of great suggestions for places to go and things to eat. We would stay with Yannis again in a heartbeat. Thanks for your hospitality Yannis!

We have just returned from staying in Konstantinos' s loft and wow what a great place. There were 5 of us staying including my 15 month old daughter, who they supplied with a travel cot upon my request. Travel cots tend to have a very hard mattress meaning my husband and I loose our pillows to soften it but our hosts had thought of that and had ensured her cot was well padded a very thoughtful gesture and shows how far they are willing to go for their guests. Location of the loft is great with amazing views of the accropolis and beautiful church opposite. Very close to lots of restaurants, bars, shops and the ruins. The loft is clean,modern and felt like home with a private lift into the apartment which was great with our pram and luggage. Konstantinos and his lovely partner were there to greet us on arrival and had left supplies in the fridge another thoughtful gesture after a long trip. I would definitely recommend staying here if you are planning a trip to this amazing city.

Yannis is a wonderful and interesting man who will make your stay lovely.
The apartment itself is neat and stylish and offers great view of the Aropolis.
The Air conditioned room proved very needed during our stay and was working great.
We really enjoyed our stay and wish Yannis the best. Highly recommend!
Recommended! Host is friendly and approachable too! üòä

Amazing location. The house is close to many restaurants and main tourists attractions. All of the main sites are a walkable distance from the home. The house itself is clean and modern. It's beautifully decorated!
Great apartment in an amazing location, walkable to tons of restaurants and coffee shops. The view from the balcony/terrace was amazing. Host is very responsive. Definitely would recommend.
The location and the view from the balcony is great. Communication with the host is quick and easy. The host arranged a taxi from the airport with a seat for children.

Awesome place in the center. View is great. Taxi, which Anna arranged was perfect.
Windows are really good isolated so no sound disturbing from the lively center, especially the night. We definitely come again. Thank you ladies :)

On the positive side, a good size apartment. Linen, towels and kitchen were good but the "industrial" nature meant the apartment the floors and walls were tatty and dusty.
On the downside...
Very, very noisy.
At night there is a bar opposite that stays open until the early hours and is very loud with drunken people shouting and singing continually.
In the early morning, building work starts from 6.30am with concrete drilling and glass smashing as properties nearby are demolished / rebuilt.
There is no sound insulation at all so you can hear people outside and when they come into the building three floors below.
The shutters do no close properly and as there are no curtain the front bedroom is light all night. In the rear bedroom the shutters close but they do not block out any light.
"Industrial" is an understatement. There were wires sticking out of the wall covered in insulating tape and pipework cut off sticking out of the floor.
The bathroom (it is a shower room really) is tiny. Really tiny. The sink is a small hand-rinse basin and shower small with no screen or curtain - be prepared for everything to get wet.
No drawers or wardrobes - just bookshelf and clothes rail in the hall area.
Very basic for the price. If it is impossible to sleep because of the noise then it is too expensive at any price.
Psiri is described as "up-and-coming" but certainly has not arrived yet! It is dirty, smelly and noisy with lots of derelict buildings and graffiti. That said, it is an easy walk to most of the sights.
The balcony was nice - it does have a good view and is bright and sunny in the morning - just so long as the wind doesn't waft the smell of drains / garbage over you.

Great little apartment. Not a huge amount of storage space for clothes.
Good hot shower üòä and great kitchen.
Lovely balcony which we spent some time chilling out on with a great view of the acropolis.
Locals bars and restaurants were fabulous and way to get to.
We took the train back to the airport which was extremely easy as the station is right next to the apartment!
Would definitely recommend this apartment.

Konstantinos Mom was divine, made every effort to accommodate us with check in times, cleanliness and she was able to hold our luggage for us before we checked in. Such a perfect location with lots of restaurants around as well as some interesting ancient history sites. Loved the view of the Acropolis

Situation id√©ale pour les visites de l'Acropole, Plaka et Monastiraki, appartement spacieux et d√©coration vintage, accueil parfait et grande disponibilit√© de Konstantinos et sa maman, merci pour tout

Great apartment in excellent location, clean, good value for money. The photos do not do this apartment justice. It is spacious with high ceilings and huge rooms and light filled with dual aspect floor to ceiling sliding doors and the views from both sides, including the Acropolis, are fantastic.  The perfect place for hanging out. We stay in Athens multiple times a year over several years and this is the best apartment we‚Äôve stayed in. Sia is an excellent host, easy communicator, and check in/out was easy. We have already recommended this apartment to friends and hope it will be available next time we are passing through.  Also so nice to stay in someone‚Äôs actual apartment rather than an apartment that is for commercial gain only.  Thanks Sia for having us.

Yiannis's place is cozy,clean and really well organised.The area is quiet and in a very convenient spot if someone wants to explore Athens by car or by foot!Very close to kalimarmaro stadium and not far from the metro station.A small diamond that is called Varnava square is just a few meters from the house,and in the general area someone can find almost everything,from restaurants to shopping centers or cinemas.We had a great time and Yiannis is a really good host and the house is a good value for money!
Nice, historic place, very responsive hosts!
Great place!!!
Fantastic apartment, and brilliant location. Loved every bit of our stay
Really nice apartment in the centre of Athens. It has everything that you needs. And the description is very accurate.

Great location!!

Stayed at Antonia's for one night. Really lovely place, newly renovated, and great. She was very accommodating and responsive, was waiting for us as our boat got delayed. Very much recommended, would definitely stay again!

Petit appartement propre et fonctionnel.
Literie confortable de 160cm de large.
L'√©quipement de la cuisine est optimal pour se faire correctement √† manger.
Tr√®s bon accueil ! Recommande +++
Fantastic location in the heart of Athens. Easy access to Ride sharing, usually within 2-3 minutes. Comfortable outdoor courtyard and comfy living room.

great
value for money!!!
Nice appartment in great location  , thanks  Vasilis for your hospitality!!

Fantastic stay. Hosts were extremely helpful with clear instructions on the easiest option to reach the apartment from the airport. Very helpful with all questions, even printed bus tickets for us! Great location, everything in walkable distance.

Jasmine is the perfectly located gem in the heart of Athens. Close to everything: great restaurants, grocery shops, stores, bars, tourist attractions and public transportation.
Gheorghos was also a super host, welcoming us with great tips and explaining everything we needed to know to make Athens feel like home.

The location of this apartment is ideal to walk all the historic places in Athens. Konstantinos and Mar√≠a are permanently communicating to you to follow up and offer help. Decoration is nice and modern.
the apartment was very clean and comfortable !! great location in the heart of Athens. Would stay again for sure !
Great location, only a few blocks from Plaka, museums and hop on hop off buss. Also walking distance (15 minute walk) to main shopping area. We loved the location and safety of the apartment.

My son brought me here for my birthday, the nocarz was just as he described, it was such a wonderful place. Walkable to everything you want and need.
Milto‚Äôs was the best host, always responsive quickly, great recommendations and my son said the couch was just as nice as a bed. We had the best time here and talk about location! It was the best!! Love it here and would highly recommend and definitely would come back again.

We only stayed for one night and contacted Achilleas on short notice, but check-in was no problem, his mom gave us the keys and showed us the nice apartment. even though the area is really vivid, the bedroom was totally quiet for good sleep :)

I stayed here for 10 weeks in the summer, and it was perfect. The space was clean and well-stocked with everything I needed. I appreciated all the light and the outdoor space (balcony), but it was also really big inside, especially for one person. The two couches were great for having guests, and there was plenty of storage space. The location was also perfect for me, easily walkable to a lot of sites and close to the National Gardens. I‚Äôd stay here again, for sure.

Fantastic! Nelly and her husband were extremely accomidating the whole time. They showed us where to see during our stay. The unit looks brand new/renovated which is awesome. Me and my partner stayed there for 3 nights and loved that we had aircon and a kitchen. Really good to go buy food from the markets and cook up a Greek meal.

Stay with Eleni! She welcomed us at the door once we called her at arrival. She was so thorough in her explanation of the area we were in, the house amenities, and great advice for how to make the most of our stay in Athens. She is full of love and we would stay there again! her house is gorgeous and great for 2 ppl. and the location could not be more perfect ! trendy, close to all things and taxi rank just out the door if you need to go far. Love this Air BNB
Eleni was incredibly helpful and kind!
Nick and Nelly are kind and helpful persons.  Room is good and locations is good, but outside environment is prety loud at night.

Appartement central id√©al pour famille. Nelly  et Chris nous ont fait un tr√®s bon accueil et se sont montr√©s tr√®s disponibles. L'apprtement est propre, confortable et fonctionnel. Les lieux touristiques sont accessibles √† pied. Toutes les commodit√©s sont disponibles. Chris nous a fait partager les bonnes adresses sur Ath√®nes. Nous recommendons vivement cet appartement.
Nice appartment and very good located in the center of athen.
Nice place. They jacuzzi is not private and is for the whole property. Clean place. Nice location
Great Apartment, and friendly host. highly recommended!

Jai occupe le nocarz de Nelly pendant 2 jours avec une amie.
Nous avons passe un sejour parfait a Athenes grace a Nelly et Chris. L'appartement est tres propre et tres bien equipe !
Sa localisation nous permet de tout faire a pied, pratique !

Chris et Nelly ont toujours ete la pour nous donner des conseils, savoir si on passait un bon moment, aller nous chercher au metro... Un bonheur !

Uns hat der Aufenthalt sehr gefallen! Die Lage ist wirklich super zentral und man erreicht alle Sehensw√ºrdigkeiten fu√ül√§ufig. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gef√ºhlt. Besonders sch√∂n war die Dachterasse!

The flat is amazing  and as described. We really enjoyed our Time in Athens. The Apartment is very Chose to all attractions and Janis and Dimtiris did everything for us to feeling really comfortable. Also the jacousy onto the roof was very conviniant and warm, wie could relax perfectly.

visited Athens for 3 days (not enough time!), the apt. was a perfect home base in city center. private, comfy, with an amazing view.

We loved our stay and enjoyed meeting Anna, who met us and showed around. The best thing was the view over the lovely park and also the proximity to so many great restaurants.  Easy walk to the Acropolis and Uber took us wherever we wanted for amazingly low prices (compared to US and Canada!).
Great place, close to everything!! Value for Money and a chance to live like a local. Many thanks to Argiro, for her support.
This place was great! Very clean and as pictured. Loved the neighborhood too. Would highly recommend and will be staying here next time I'm in Athens.

Great place, close to the metro and easy to reach from the airport.
I recommend it !
Evrething was ok!

I spent one night at Argiro‚Äôs place and I would happily go back on my next trip to Athens.
The flat is in a very convenient location, 5‚Äô from the tube which takes you directly to the airport (35 mins ) or the city centre (Syntagma Sq. is 12 mins).
The neighbourhood is lively and vibrant with lots of cafes and bars.
The flat‚Äôs biggest advantage was certainly it‚Äôs stylish interior and the fact that it was spotlessly cleaned.
Argiro is a kind and friendly host, easy to communicate with and very welcoming.
It‚Äôs a great choice for your next trip to Athens.

Argiro is a wonderful and attentive host. In her absence, due to a slight delay in arriving to her neighborhood, Argiro sent a trustworthy friend to assist us with our check in. The area of town where her apartment is located is perfectly quiet, comfortable and charming. She gave us super helpful tips and recommendations of which nearly all we followed. When in Athens we will be back!

Excellent location, sparkling clean apartment and smooth communication with the host. Highly recommend it!

Our stay was very pleasant, very good communication with Giannis who attended us on our arrival to the house. Things to note are the good location of the neighborhood, very central from which you can walk to any place of interest and also close to the metro. The room was very nice and comfortable, very true to the photos. We only had two nights but they were very nice.

Eleni‚Äôs place was comfortable and cozy. We stayed two nights and didn‚Äôt have any issues. She communicated with us constantly and made check in and check out easy. We walked around the neighborhood and felt safe, there are also cafes and restaurants near by!

Alisa‚Äôs place is great for the unfussy traveller who values location! The apartment is in a great spot for food and drinks plus plenty of shopping. It is a busy, hip and happening area, with the trade off being noise, but as mentioned if you are an easy-going traveller this place will be perfect for you.

My stay at Ippokratis's place was amazing. The decor and style of the apartment were charming and stylish. His sister waited for us at the exit of the subway and took us to the place. She was an amazing help, gave us tips on where to go and was genuinely nice. The place was clean, had all the amenities and the fridge and pantry were full of delicious food. We had access to a washing machine and that was an amazing first, as we could finally wash our clothes. The apartment was located 5 min away from the subway station, and the subway station was 3-4 subway stops away from the Acropolis, Parthenon and Athens down-town. We had an amazing stay and the place was wonderful, I would highly recommend this place.

Alis's place is well situated in the city centre and is very well equipped. Communication with the host was excellent, everything was exactly as described. Great value for money, would recommend!
Beautiful apartment! I have stayed in many apartments but this one is by far the best. It‚Äôs in a quiet neighbourhood a bit out of the city but the place is totally worth it.
We had a lovely time and would recommend it to anyone looking to stay really central just a short walk from everything that we wanted to see in Athens.
This place was amazing. Tina was such an amazing host and was so helpful throughout our stay. The location is amazing and is so convenient to walk around. I highly recommend!

The house is so nice, cute well taken care , Maria is very smart, kind and helpful and in the house there is everything that you can need. The position is perfect, in a quiet zone but in ten minutes you can be in kerameikos metro and park. One of my best places in Athens!

Great location, one minute walk to the Neos Kosmos metro station (2 stops to Acropoli, 1 more to Syntagma) as well as to a grocery store, restaurants, bars, bakery, and other stores in the area. The apartment was also nice and clean. The only issue we had was the hot water unfortunately stopped working on the last night. It was too late to contact the host, so we didn't inform her of the problem until next morning after checking out. Nonetheless, I'm sure it's been fixed by now so I would still recommend this apartment.
PS: If you struggle to open the apartment door, make sure to pull it towards you when trying to unlock it with the smaller key.

Maria was a very nice host, she took care of everything in advance, the check in and check out was effortless and easy. We were even able to stay beyond our check out time. We could always ask her if we needed anything. The apartment was clean and in a calm area. Would totally recommend this place!

The apartment was lovely. There are several great restaurants in the area and it was easy to access all the Athens hotspots. Some locals cautioned about the safety in the area, but I never felt unsafe. If you're looking for a nice, affordable place while exploring Athens, this is it!

Appartement confortable, √©quip√© avec tout le n√©cessaire et tr√®s fonctionnel. La climatisation fonctionne tr√®s bien. L‚Äôemplacement est id√©al, dans un quartier anim√© proche du centre, mais le bruit ne parvient absolument pas jusqu‚Äôau logement. Je recommande amplement !
Rodopi a great host. Very responsive. Easy check in and check out instructions. Apartment is large, spacious, light and well equipped. Photos accurate.

Pantelis‚Äô place was very clean and very centrally located. Most places of interest, such as the Acropolis, Plaka, Thisseio and Syntagma/Omonia are writhing a short walking distance. I would recommend his place for anyone looking for an urban apartment in a nice central neighbourhood.

The apartment was in a great location in the middle of everything yet on a pretty quiet street. The help from Pantelis to set up transportation made getting to the apartment and airport quick and easy. It was great having him available for questions and help checking in!
It was so nice :) I had a great time at Pantelis‚Äôs place in Athens! It‚Äôs amazing location in the heart of plaka.

A real gem. Eftihia is wonderful and was a pleasure to meet. She got us up to date and on our way quick, and the central location of the apartment was great - we walked everywhere and anywhere. The view of the Parthenon from the roof is stunning!
The apartment itself is cozy, and does feel like the inside of someone's soul - a beautiful, artistic soul in this case. It isn't a modern, "slick" apartment - it is a real, honest to Œ∏ŒµœåœÇ, Greek place. Super clean, the teas/coffees are a great start for the day, and Eftihia and her mother even gifted us with some cookies and dried fruit on arrival. The apartment is warm, the bath has great water pressure and a great heater.
Don't think twice - this is the place you want.
Location is perfect for beautiful Acropolis views, restaurants and night life. You will not find a more thorough and genuine hostess!

Eftithia is the very definition of hospitality! So lovely and accommodating. We couldn‚Äôt recommend the happy place more highly! Very central to the vibrant night life, museums, anything you would need. She greeted us with a homemade cappuccino freddo. Was very responsive to any questions we had. Really makes you feel at home in Athens. Couldn‚Äôt have hoped for a better location or host!
Great people the owners and the flat is a wonderful place ! Everything inside is new and clean ! Furthermore the it is located near 24/ 7 market!

Perfectly situated in Plaka, nice and quiet street right next to restaurants, shopping streets and historical sites. Just a few minutes walk from Acropolis slopes. The house is clean, spacious and is fully equipped with a roof terrace with a nice view of Acropolis. We loved it and will definitely come back when in Athens next time.

I stayed at Rena‚Äôs place for 4 nights. She is such a nice person. I like the fact that she lives next door (in my personal opinion, you solve your issues if any, very quickly if the owner lives close by). Her apartment is very stylish with nice touches in every room.
The apartment is close to Evangelismos metro situation, 7-8 minutes walking distance and the area is very safe. In case you are a light sleeper, you might feel uncomfortable time to time as the bedroom faces a street and you might hear some noise during the night. Personally I was ok with that.
All in all, it was a nice stay for me and I will book her apartment again in the near future.

My second time at Rena‚Äôs place and I like every second of it. What you see in the pictures is what you get. Rena is such a lovely person very warm and kind. I will come and stay at your place again Rena. Thank you for everything.
Great place in a great location

Boris and Yana‚Äôs place was great! Super close to the Acropolis and public transportation that can take you to the beach, airport, or anywhere else. They also give great recommendations for things to do in Athens and will help you with anything you need. I highly recommend staying with Boris and Yana!
a bright cheerful place with a lovely terrace.  Good location.  I was pleased  Maria and Maria are both nice and helpful,  Lots of natural lighting and lights and plugs!

Tr√®s bon contact avec Maria. Tr√®s beau logement inspirant :) avec une superbe terrasse plein sud vue sur l'Acropole.

Spiros description and pictures of the place is very accurate. I did think the place would be a little bigger but it was still perfect for all 3 of us for just one night. Spiros has excellent communication whenever I needed him he was just a text away and responded very quickly! When we got there he let me know to just ring the bell and he would meet me downstairs . It was a fast checkin process , he met us downstairs and helped us with our bags to our room and showed us around and explained everything about the place . One thing be prepared to walk up lots and lots of narrow steps with your bags . I had  two heavy bags when I arrived so it took me a while to get upstairs. So if walking up a lot of steps isn‚Äôt your thing I wouldn‚Äôt suggest this place .. but once you get up all he steps the view is amazing ! There were some snacks and drinks left for us. Also we forgot our adapters for our charger and I texted Spiros to see if he had any .. and he quickly responded and bought us two so we could chArge our phones .. all and all it was a good first time air bnb experience for me! If I travelled here again I would stay there again , it‚Äôs also close walking distance to a lot of things restaurants, shops, bars, and entertainment.

Lovely apartment in an absolutely central and perfect position for walking excursions to the surrounding main attractions.
5 minutes walk to an Acropolis entrance gate.
Restaurants and coffee shops close by.
The apartment is clean and spacious.
We loved our perfect stay in Plaka.
Die Lage ist wirklich ganz toll, man ist sofort mittendrin :)
Excellent nocarz with a good view of Acropolis. Spiros and his mum are warm and kind. Can't wait to be back !

Spiros was a lovely host. He was helpful & lives & works in the building so he‚Äôs on hand if you need him.
The view from the spacious deck of this rooftop apartment was fabulous - at night it‚Äôs extra special.

Unreal view with floor to ceiling windows. Our favorite place we stayed by far!

Super nice look apartment in Athens! Really in good location. We are able to reach all tourism attraction by foot. For sure, we will back Athens and stay at Lito house again! Thanks for the house made biscuits for us. Taste fantastic.üòç

Spiros' flat is in a really cool building with lots of character. I loved feeling like a local in this rooftop unit. Everything was as advertised, no frills. The view is amazing, exactly the same as the views from Electra Palace for a fraction of the price and your patio is much larger! Just perfect for 2 people.

Staying at Plaka's Heart was a real pleasure the location was amazing. The apartment is small and simple with everything required for a short stay in this the most beautiful district of a beautiful city.
It is worth noting that taxi access to the apartment entrance is sometimes difficult but it is no hardship to walk the last hundred meters from the main road. Your reward is peace and quiet and the pedestrianised zone!
Whole rooftop to yourself with a beautiful view. Would definitely stay again, wish I had more time here.

Great location close to shopping and great resultants. The view speaks for itself and is deserts the price. The only bummer on our stay was the AC wasn‚Äôt working and we had to sleep in the front room. However Spiros was very apologetic and made sure we knew before we checked in

perfect little place. everything is accessible by foot.

Stavroula is the best host you could have. She met us at her flat and spent time helping is navigate our time in Athens. She went over and beyond to host us. Her place was gorgeous! The pictures don't do justice to how cute her place is. It's a 3rd floor flat, so take that into consideration as you pack. But do not let this persuade you from not choosing to stay here. Her place and the sunsets are worth a million stairs. The entire place is very spacious, clean, and nicely decorated. You can watch the sunset from the couch through her beautiful large windows, or the balcony. The best part is the private roof time. You almost have the same view of the city and the sunset as Mars hill. The neighborhood is quiet and safe, just enough distance away from the business of the city, but close enough to walk everywhere. If you're in Athens, please do yourself a favor and stay here! You won't regret it.

This flat is gorgeous and decorated with perfect taste. The bed are comfortable, including the fold out (and we are very difficult when it comes to mattresses). The area is very nice, authentic, not touristy at all, and the rooftop patio is huge and amazing. Stavroula is a great host, very dedicated to making your stay perfect. We wish we would have planned more days in Athens so we could enjoy the flat longer.

Without a doubt the best nocarz I have stayed in around the world and you cannot get a better host than Stavroula!! Everything is as per the photos, but only better!! Take your time to explore the local restaurants in the area - they are excellent and are very reasonable.
Very beautiful apartment in a residential neighborhood. Had a wonderful stay here with my wife. Stavroula was extremely accommodating and responsive when we had unexpected travel changes.

Wonderful place to experience Athens. Close to everything and the apartment has everything you need to feel at home.
Stavroula was really helpful to us providing us with local info and help when we needed.
Very clean and location is great!
This place is amazing. Best location and the rooftop views are to die for. Hosts are sweet and communicative. The area is 5 minutes from the acropolis and many local eateries.

Spacious, gorgeous, comforting. The only bad thing about this apartment is leaving it. I would book again, if I am lucky enough to return to Greece.
Practically:
- outside temps were high 80‚Äôs to low 90‚Äôs F and the air conditioners worked great.
- the water pressure is not just good, it is legendary
- there is a gang of cats on the steps to the building every night and every morning. If you love cats, which I do, this is a huge bonus.

The most gorgeous nocarz!! The first stop on our trip and truly the best way to start! The home was very clean, walking distance from the best spots in town and the views from the rooftop were just the cherry on top! The beautiful hosts were so helpful and responsive and made our stay so easy and peaceful! Will definitely be returning!

George's assistant met us at the house and provided a walk through of the 3 apartments.  The rooms were a good fit for our group and was in a good location.  We enjoyed the shades to darken the room and the quietness of the rooms.

Warm and friendly couple in an excellent location.  Total privacy with a separate entrance, but hosts available if needed. The flat is large and comfortable.  It‚Äôs a great place to ‚Äúcome home‚Äù to.  Beautiful backyard patio.  We appreciated the welcome coffee and hearing the history of the property.

We had an incredible time at Froso‚Äôs Place! We couldn‚Äôt be happier with the location- walking distance from everything. What really made our 3 day stay so special was how Froso and George went above and beyond to help us- travel questions, taxis, ticket printing, and so much more. The space was also was so big and spacious. We loved our time there so much!

We had a great experience at Froso‚Äôs place. Apartment is super clean and has everything you need.  The patio is a beautiful oasis.   Hosts were helpful, told great Athens stories & made us feel at home.

The apartment is charming (nicely designed), the bed is very comfortable and there was even food for breakfast. Stavros is a very good host, he was available and kind for all questions we had before and during our stay. We definitly recommand this place !

We loved staying here, we would love to stay here again someday. If we are ever in Athens again we will absolutely come back here. Adorable charming lovely place and we have nothing but good things to say about the time we spent while we were here.

Looking for a quiet and convenient place to lay your head while in Athens, this is it! On our last night we enjoyed a delicious meal at a local tavern, watching kids run around and families enjoy amazing food. All locals, no tourists in sight! Stavros is great and flexible. He went above and beyond for us! Would highly recommend. Metro 8 minutes away.
Good location. A bit noisy at night with car alarms and the neighbours yelling but overall clean and easy to get around to places by walking!

We had such a great stay here! Close distance to laundry, a supermarket, a bakery and more. Also, the market on Monday morning was great and super cheap! Stavros was so helpful with tips on getting around Athens, and the location walking to the main tourist sites was not that far. Overall great experience and would stay here again!
Thanks for all! This is apartment will be always my choice, if I travel in Athens! I strongly recommend this flat!
I've already write a review, you can found below this.
If you like to stay in the heart of Athens with all the activity, this is the place , rooms in an old beautiful building, inhale and live all of the historic centre .

The place is the same it is in the pictures. Stavros is a good host, always avalaible for any question, and, more than that, he even picked us with his car from a metro station nearby. The location is great, specially for the money, as it is close to the center of Atena, and the area has everything you need. As a minor minus: given the fact that the appartment is on the 1st floor, you can hear some things from the outside. But, if you really enjoy Atena, then you should be too tired to hear that much.
A very good place in Athens !!! I recommended !

We had a very nice time staying in Stavro‚Äôs place. Apartment was clean, spacious and comfortable. Stavros is a great host, he organized transfer from and to the airport, which added comfort to our stay. He gave us a lot of helpful suggestions regarding local stores, restaurants and transportation.
Really nice place and great guest!

I loved staying at Harry‚Äôs flat. It‚Äôs in a lovely building and has maintained its original features. The view onto the tree lined street is beautiful.  The area is my favorite in Athens. And the flat is within walking distance to cute cafes, fun tavernas, an outdoor movie theater, and lots of shops. Communication with Harry has been excellent. Would love to stay here again!
Has everything you might need, perfect for a trip in Athen, easy to get to the city center and all sightseeing places in Athen by walking.

Great location and wonderful flat very close to plaka. The flat itself was very clean, small but also perfect for 2 people. It was on a great street next to some amazing restaurants. John was very helpful and responded very quickly.
Everytbing was perfect! Giannis was a great host, beautiful house in a excellent location. Lily provided a list of helpful reccomendations and maps which we were very grateful for.

Situated in the heart of Athens, the flat provided all amenities one might simply dream of while furthermore standing out owing to the great flexibility, availability and warmth of the hosts! I couldn‚Äòt have possibly chosen a better place for my time in the Greek capital! Highly recommended!

Good location with great food spots all around and right outside, it was quite noisy in the home though we weren‚Äôt sure if they were other Air Bnb people or extra people that lived there. Hosts were nice though and room was very big!

great location. close to the Acropolis and right in the heart of the city.

I can highly recommend Anna and Efi‚Äôs beautiful space; my wife and I stayed here as the first stop on our honeymoon in Greece.
Before check-in we were offered the use of lockers outside the unit for our luggage which was a game changer and gave us almost a full day back without having to take our luggage with us. We also used these lockers after check out which made our last day in Athens so much easier.
We found the apartment in immaculate condition and very quiet when we slept. The apartment is located very centrally and conveniently close to all major landmarks, restaurants and markets. Everything is within walking distance.
Anna and Efi are attentive and caring hosts and are lovely to deal with.

Absolutely beautiful apartment in the middle of Athens! Close walk to everything. The private terrace was wonderful. The hosts were very helpful at check in and check out. Definitely recommend staying here!

I had a great time at Alex and Maria nocarz. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. The neighborhood is very conveniently located and the apartment is very quiet! Would absolutely recommend to stay there!

From before booking Panayiotis was helpful answering any questions we had.
Transfers from airport were arranged for us so less stress and because of having a late flight going home he allowed us to stay in the Villa all day.
All his instructions were clear. The villa was spacious and very clean.
We loved the pool and the area was very quiet and peaceful!
Thank you for our stay!

Fantastic place! It is sunny all year long because of the south orientation, so the flat is bright and lovely. ŒßœÅœÖœÉŒ± helped me instantly with any issue that I had, super helpful. Nick is one of the best host I ever met so far. During our stay, he was always there and made himself available every time I need him. Nick received my family and I and even helped me with the luggage.

Anna previously contacted us informing us how to get to the apartment and what metro and busses to catch. When we arrived she welcomed us in and had stored the fridge with essentials. Nice terrace and central location. Some maintenance might be recommended.

It was great to stay at Fotini's place. There are many flat priced restaurants near by, and the hills nearby are ideal places for hiking and sightseeing. Fotini is very easygoing and considerable, and we love the dog Puplo!

If you need somewhere to stay in Athens, we have no hesitation in recommending you stay at Dimitrios's place.  Dimitrios has thought of everything that you could possibly need, and more.  The place is conveniently located, it is extremely clean and the beds are so comfortable.  Personally, Dimitrios will do everything he can to ensure your stay is  perfect and is a great wealth of knowledge - has an answer for everything.  We stayed here at Christmas time.  We couldn't believe all of the personal touches - decorations, fruit, traditional Greek sweets and wine.  How thoughtful and it made us feel like we were back in our own home celebrating.  Thank you, Dimitrios!!

Wonderful apartment in a great location for walking. We were met by Aleka upon arrival and greeted with fruit, wine, and a sweet local treat. The apartment is incredibly well decorated, clean, and is well updated. It is on a great street around the corner from sytagma square and a short walk from the acropolis, plaka, monastaraki, and the rest of the Athens sites that are popular. There are lots of food and bar options outside of the touristy areas that are a close walk from the apartment as well.
We loved Tony the tuxedo tabby. Its a cute and colorful neighborhood. Definitely recommend it!

We stayed at Dimitrios place for a few days. The apartment is perfectly located and was very clean. Dimitrios hospitality is amazing and he is always available for any question. I wish we could stay there longer
Fotini was nice and helpful. We spent a good moment in her flat. Thank you.
Fotini, such a nice person and en excellent host! The place is very well located, very clean and Pablo and Tony so cute. I will definitely come back. Thank you for eveything Fotini.

Fonti is the most supportive host I've ever meet. Because I will have long stay in Greece, she helps me to get the temporary social security number for traveling in Greece easily during Covid. Furthermore, her cooking of the local soup is awesome! I have great memory with her, highly recommend. PS, if you are dog or cat lover, you will also love her place.

A estadia com Fotini √© a melhor poss√≠vel para habita√ß√µes compartilhadas! Ela far√° voc√™ se sentir √† vontade desde o primeiro momento. O quarto √© espa√ßoso e a cama confort√°vel. Tem um lindo gato e cachorro que s√£o muito amig√°veis. O bairro tem muitos restaurantes e √© uma alternativa tranquila ao centro muito movimentado de Atenas.

This place was exactly as advertised and pictured.  The host , Alexandra, was extremely helpful and punctual.  It is a wonderful place to stay and a safe walking distance to most of the great sites of Athens, which includes the Acropolis and Plaka.  It is well decorated and had everything we needed for our week long stay.  We spent one of our days just enjoying the villa and all of its accommodations on Christmas Day.  We were able to prepare our Christmas meal while lounging around in our pajamas all day, and then later enjoyed time in the swimming pool, which was like being in a warm bath with available jacuzzi-like jets on one end. Each room was equipped with heat/air condition units; therefore, everyone could set a temperature according to their comfort.  The neighborhood was nice with several restaurants and a very nice bakery  nearby.  Coming for the U.S., the only suggestion we have is to make sure you get instructions on the microwave, stove and dishwasher from the host when you arrive.  They are totally different from what we were accustomed; however, once we figured them out, they worked great.  We would also suggest using the offered transportation service if you are coming in from the airport; especially, if you have a large group with a lot of luggage.  It is an eight passenger van with plenty of room for luggage.  It is very nice and clean, reasonably priced and the driver is very punctual and professional.  When we return, we will definitely look to book here again.

Christos is an incredibly friendly host who was more than welcoming and overwhelmed us with all the several thoughtful touches ranging from marked maps, food, toiletries etc... the apartment itself was an absolute dream with endless art supplies and a piano that is set to unleash your creativity. Christos also has some vintage antiques that just cozy up the space. The apartment was extremely clean and well kept with space to cook, dine and do much more.

You may not get to meet Christos as he is on an artistic mission but his beautifully designed apartment says a lot about him. If you enjoy cooking on your travels (there is an amazing full kitchen filled with herbs and equipment), if you enjoy music (there is a guitar and a piano among other instruments), if you enjoy art (drawing and paintinf tools and canvases), this is a place to relax. On the other hand, the location is perfect and central to all tourist sites. Above all, there is Christos and his hospitality which are indescribable and I can't recommend him enough as a host.

Christos is een heel vriendelijke host die je met alles wil helpen. Met oog voor detail heeft hij alles in zijn ruimte in het teken van de reiziger gezet. De meubels zijn zelf ontworpen en door hem met de hand gemaakt. De wijk is heerlijk rustig maar toch op loopafstand van alle bezienswaardigheden van Athene. We konden ons geen betere host en ruimte wensen. Als de ruimte vrij is, zou ik deze zeker weer boeken!

Great place to stay with family. It is right in middle of main square and has all the required amenities within walking distance. Most of the important places are in walking distance.
Highly recommended.

We had a wondeful time in Athens. Anna's apartment is very beautiful, specios and clean, close to the metro. Anna gave us a lot of good tips about reataurants and places to visit. Thank you for everything!
stayed for a few days, great host, and great room, very nice for it's price

The home is adorable and the location is perfect. We walked to the Acropolis, the temple of Zeus, shops, Cafe‚Äôs, Greece‚Äôs oldiest distillery is two steps away. You won‚Äôt need to drive anywhere and you can‚Äôt beat the veiws from the top of the apartment. The bathroom is the only thing that wasn‚Äôt jaw dropping. We hit our heads a few times, you have to duck while showering and while using the restroom. I would definitely come back to Evangelia‚Äôs!
Great host, beautiful place
Near to the metro station. Decent rooms. Nice and friendly host.

What‚Äôs an amazing location. Such a hidden gem right in the heart of the Plaka neighborhood‚Äînot to mention the proximity to the Acropolis. The rooftop offered amazing views of the Acropolis and the winding streets below‚Äîthe perfect place to relax after a long day of exploring. Evangelia was so sweet and thoughtful, and very quick to respond. Definitely recommend!

We absolutely loved our stay here.
The apartment itself is in an absolutely perfect location and within easy walking distance of most major attractions. It's an incredibly pretty area, with lots of bars and restaurants around. There can be a bit of hustle and bustle at night, but it really wasn't very loud and we actually enjoyed the atmosphere - you're right in the heart of Plaka!
Inside it was homely, clean, and very well equipped. The private terrace with outdoor shower and its own view of the Acropolis was particularly impressive.
Evangelia was an amazing host. She was always really quick to respond to messages, and gave us loads of advice and recommendations when we arrived. She even left fresh oranges in the fridge for us to make juice.
We would certainly look to rebook here if and when we return to Athens!

Highly recommend this place. Sakis was extremely helpful even as we checked in very late at night.  The apartment itself is huge and beautiful with amazing views. It is in a very good location and would stay here again.
Amazing apartment right in the heart of Athens. View of the acropolis as well. Great communication

What a great place to stay in Athens! The loft is actually bigger than I thought. The kitchen, dining room, and living room were huge with lots of seating options, and the view is incredible. The kitchen was well-equipped with everything we needed. The bed was big and comfortable, though a little tight on the sides. The two balconies were really nice. The bathroom was fantastic, lots of space, well-equipped, and the shower was fantastic. We appreciated the washing machine with plenty of room to dry our clothes. The elevator that brings you up is updated, and you don't have to use any stairs. The neighborhood is really central and there's lots of nighttime activity on the street (a bar is right outside of the exterior door), but the loft itself was really quiet. Overall, really fantastic, we'd stay here again!
Very nice and clean flat. Ideally located. Sakis was a great host

We had a great stay at the apartment! It was quiet, well furnished and a great spot to access most of Athens from! Check in was very smooth, communication was great and we would recommend staying here!

Big Mike is a Big Host, highly reccomended.Very professional,helpfull And Friendly.the new and clean flat is in The wonderful Monastiraki district.

Amazing, amazing and more amazing! The perfect location, close to sigh seeing and restaurants. Great view of acropolis. Nice and cool with good air con and very clean and tidy. Beds were also very very comfy! Athabasios was very kind and provided some breakfast food for us and was very helpful. Wouldn't stay anywhere else if I went back to Athens!

The apartment was beautifully decorated, clean, and coming back to the view of the temple of Zeus every night was a great way to start off our trip to Greece. The host was there to greet us and show us around, and very friendly and responsive throughout.  The location was also great! You can walk to the Acropolis, Plaka, and the Temple of Zeus all in 10 minutes! Having breakfast supplies on hand let us get an early start on sightseeing. Would highly recommend this place.
Great location walking distance to everything. Excellent communication and a very wonderful trip!

L'appartamento √® pulitissimo e ha tutto ci√≤ che serve, compresi asciugamani profumati e puliti.
La connessione Wifi super veloce.
Il palazzo molto tranquillo √® situato in una zona (Plaka) davvero strategica per visitare la citt√†, a un minuto di distanza dall'Arco di Adriano e dal Tempio di Zeus. 2 minuti di distanza dall'Acropoli (che tra l'altro si vede dal balcone...un vero spettacolo che allieta risvegli e illumina le serate!!).
La metro √® a 2 minuti a piedi ed √® connessa perfettamente con l'aeroporto.
Davvero una bellissima esperienza!

Great location great view and minimalistic clean interior design. We loved it. Perfect for two couples. And close to everything in the center. The street in front is the only thing that‚Äôs quite loud. But I mean you look straight on the olympieion :)
Will come again
Great place. Our flight was delayed and Daniel was a fantastic help. Brilliant local bars and restaurants. Walking distance to historical sites.

We felt lucky to find this place last minute for such a great price. It was in walking distance to the main attractions, local markets, transportation, and restaurants. The apartment is clean, cute, and comfortable. Everything was wonderful and having the piano was an added bonus for my teens that play. We felt very safe & happy there. The hosts were phenomenal and so friendly. They accommodated our easy check in and late check out request, even offering to hold our luggage if needed because we had a late ferry to catch.

Very quick responses and well prepared apartment. Has all the things you ld need during your stay.
Great location in a quiet corner.

Daniel & Anne Maria were very helpful and accommodating. The appartment is in an unbeatable location but close to two metro stations and in easy walking distance of the Acropolis, the ancient Agora, the amazing Kerameikos cemetery and the Monistiraki & Plaka districts and numerous bars, shops and cafes.

We were greeted warmly and orientated to it. The apartment was comfortable and met our needs perfectly. The location was awesome being so close to many attractions and good restaurants. People were friendly in the neighborhood.  It is our first time in Greece and we had a true local experience!
The location is excellent, walking distance to all major attractions of the city.
The best place! Clean, modern, beautiful, right in the middle of Athens
Very nice loft in the centre of Athens! We had a great time! Highly recommend üëåüèº
We had a great stay! Location was perfect - thanks a lot to the host Nikos!

This was one of the best nocarz experiences I‚Äôve had. The communication was great. Niko and Amalia were very flexible and helpful at check in and check out and helped us by keeping our bags pre-check in and after check out which was a HUGE help to us. We had a large group of 6 and were able to stay comfortably in the very contemporary apartment. It was walking distance to most everything. We enjoyed our stay! Highly recommend.
Great location, easy to navigate around Athens, walkable neighborhood. Super clean space with AC and small outdoor space for the summertime.
Amazing flat in the center of the city. I had a long-term stay and everything was fine. Great host, helped me with every issue.

What a gem of an apartment! The space was sparkling clean, and perfect for our family of 3. The apartment is located on the top floor so it has the most incredible views and an amazing patio with adjustable awning and sun shades. The location is in a safe and walkable neighborhood (we walked to Acropolis and Plaka) with coffee and grocery near by.
Victoria was there to greet us and let us in, and also explain the area and provide information.
The bathroom is large with a great shower.
The bedroom has the most comfortable bed and pillows I have ever slept on!

This is the perfect spot for taking in all Athens has to offer!  Walking distance to the Acropolis and Plaka, minutes from the metro and tons of restaurants. The views from the apartment were spectacular!  8th floor (there‚Äôs an elevator!), so you‚Äôre above all the other buildings nearby. Amazing view of the Acropolis and all of Athens. The apartment itself has everything you need to relax and unwind after a busy day in the city. Victoria was so helpful and even arranged our transfers from the port and airport!  Do not hesitate to book!!  One of the best places we‚Äôve ever stayed!!
Super host, super place!
Athina is aresponsive and helpful hostess. Her place is clean and welcoming. Very convenient. A great home away from home in Athens.

L'appartement est petit et bien agenc√©. Il correspond bien √† la description annonc√©e. Il est id√©alement situ√© pour visiter Ath√®nes et tr√®s calme. L'accueil d'Athina est efficace. Tout ce qu'il faut pour un agr√©able s√©jour.

Very cute and nice apartment. A lot of little welcome details.
Athina answers very quickly each you have a question or need something.
I had a very nice stay and I definitely recommend it.
Great place to stay. Near many sites in Athen.
It is not my first time at Athina's place, the apartment is very nice, comfortable and with a cute balcony. I recommend it (if notI wouldn't have come back :-))

Not my 1st stay and certainly not my last. Very nice place I always enjoy to stay there, very practical apartment, well located and Athina is a very welcoming person. I recommend her place with no hesitation :-)
Great location. The bedroom is nice and the bed was comfortable. The bathroom and kitchen were more minimal, but overall a good stay. Would stay again.

Mikes place was great! So close to the lively part of Athens and still very secluded. The place was huge and nicely furnished. Mike was nice enough to show us around the neighborhood and recommended many great things to do. The breakfast items in the fridge were better than most hotel breakfasts! Definitely stay at mikes place if you come to Athens!
Great modern apartment, close to the city center, restaurants, bars, public transportation. Very good host!
Nice place to stay. Close to the monuments and ruins.

For a unique Athenian experience I highly recommend lason's place. Not only is his apartment stylish, comfortable but it's location in Exarchia offers that different experience. lason provides an excellent history and guide for the area,Iason and Thomas are great hosts always available and welcoming.

Great location to visit Athens, close to everything - you can actually do without public transport. A beautiful, atmospheric place.
Thank you!
What a beautiful home in a great location. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Nicol√°s place is cosy and in a good location in Athens close to Subway supermarket and restaurant. We really enjoyed our stay and Nikolas was a great host

Ein sehr wohnliches Apartment. Wir fanden alles was wir gebraucht haben. Die U-Bahn ist nur wenige Gehminuten entfernt, man kommt schnell sowohl zu den Sehensw√ºrdigkeiten als auch zum Hafen. Nette Lokale gibt es auch einige in der N√§he.
Can't complain about anything. Very good host, free coffee, towels and even a complimentary bottle of water in the fridge!
Wonderful location, very central. K was great at keeping in touch and met us at the apartment. Would highly recommend for a quick stop through in Athens.
Loukas was a great host, this was a beautiful spot and a great location - walking distance to the Acropolis and Plaka! Def would stay here again

We arrived to Athens to stay for one night before our traveling back home. We know Athens, and the location is amazing and the apartment is clean.
We appreciate Konstanations help to keep our luggages for couple of hours after the check out.
Regards
Waleed & Rabab
Saudi Arabia
Perfect spot!

Ilias was not there during my short stay, but he is very helpful throughout.  His place is clean and convieniently located.  The description matches the actual.  The place is tidy, clean, tastefully decorated and have everything needed.   The balcony is cute, overlooking the square.  The square has a lot of restuarants and bars.   I really enjoyed my stay.

Ilias is a lovely guy who was very responsive and helpful.
the location was about 10-15min walk from the city centre/tourist areas and Monastiraki Station.
the room is as expected in the photos and description.
comfortable, fairly clean.
there was a certain local charm to the unit that is different to a modern hotel including the cats, the neighbouring restaurant playing music every night, the style of the doors and building (although maybe certain types of tourists won't enjoy this)
Good location, close to many restaurants and bars.

Very good place to stay at Athens!
Highly recommended

Nefeli‚Äôs place was beautiful and in a great location. Just a short walk to restaurants, museums and The Acropolis. Nefeli met us in person, gave us great information and her binder with recommendations was very helpful. We recommend Nefeli‚Äôs for anyone visiting Athens.
Great location, great communication, comfy bed, and AC works great!
A great location that's quite central but on a residential street that is not busy making it even better. Communicating with Nefeli was seamless.
Such a great place with a great view. Definitely recommend.

Wow, where to begin with Dimitris review. First of all what helped me choose this apartment above others was when I read Dimitris reviews. Everyone had written such positive comments and said what a great host Dimitris was and how friendly and welcoming he is and they were not wrong. Dimitris picked me up from the airport as I had a very early flight and I landed early morning. I got a chance to take a tour around the Acropolis area before being picked up again and taken to the flat. The flat itself was very clean but i'd say the best bit about it is the fact you can sit outside in a massive area with a brilliant view and a chance to enjoy your meals or drinks outside.  There's also a ladder outside that goes to the very top roof and you can sit up there for an even better view. It was amazing. The other good thing is the location of the flat.  My gf and I were walking into the centre of Athens every day. No need for a taxi really. Also there's a supermarket and cool bar close by. We also found some cool restaurants nearby too. Dimitris is a very friendly host and checked in with us by message just to make sure we had everything we needed. I couldn't rate him enough and i got the feeling he was a very genuine person and just wanted to make sure we had everything or if we had any questions. If so he's a message away. Definatley worth a stay and if i'm back i'd stay here again. Many thanks, Gavin.
Athens Family Apartments were well-managed, clean, tidy, friendly - I loved staying there and would stay again, without doubt. Thank you :)

We had a really good time at Anna's place. As she was hardly there and since no one else was staying in the other room we practically had the apartment to ourselves, although, we didn't spend all that much time inside. Anna is really nice. The area is great. Very close to Exarcheia and well connected. Omonia Square with its two metro lines is only five blocks away.
If I came back to Athens I'd stay there again.

We had a great stay at Dimitris‚Äô place. Very clean, stylish and well-equipped apartment. Amazing terrace with panoramic view and comfortable patio furniture. Dimitris was a very attentive host, and answered messages almost immediately whenever we had questions. The apartment feels safe with quality security doors, and the building itself is locked at night. The neighborhood is calm, although there is some traffic noise when on the terrace from a larger street about 100 meters away. For close dining, there is only a 6 to 8 minute walk to some great cafes and restaurants in the heart of the Koukaki area - great for travelers who like to go where the Greeks go - not packed full of tourists!
Using the metro is not so convenient, as you have to either walk 13-15 minutes or take a bus to get to the station. However, a taxi to Syntagma (for example) from the apartment is only 3.50‚Ç¨, so 2 or more people together might actually Save money taking the taxi, and a short walk to a busier street is all you need to hail one as it drives by.
An excellent place to stay, central yet away from the tourism. Great value for the money. Highly recommended!

It was a lovely, small apartment where to stay for a couple of days in Athens. Location is great as it is out of all the noise yet still close to reach Acropolis and other attractions by foot. Communication with the host was great and very quick not just before the check in but also during our stay the host was following up to make sure that we have  everything we need to enjoy our stay.

Brilliant location, smack in centre of Athens on a cute street with cafes, bars and restaurants - an still quiet at night, and a view of the Acropolis! Flat is as advertised, smallish but with all you need, and several balconies to sit and enjoy the view.
