The apartment was very spacious, nice and clean. The fragrance of blossoming orange trees on the balcony was just amazing (our visit was in mid April). The location was great, in the city center - we took a walk to the Hill of the Muses one morning.
Our hosts were really hospitable - they took the trouble to wait for us at the Metro station at the Easter evening, when we arrived. Very kind of them. And they really saved me and my family (wife and two kids) by providing some essential foodstuffs in their kitchen, so we didn't have to go out after a long travel to look for something to eat on the Easter evening (when practically everything was closed). I can sincerely recommend this place for anyone visiting Athens.
L'emplacement est top dans le centre ville, la vue des terrasses sur l'Acropole est superbe! Super dispo pour r√©gler arriv√©e et d√©part avec un service de garde de bagages si besoin.

Everything was as you seen in the pictures.
A little difficult with the parking of you have a car.
Rimawas very welcome and nice

Beautiful apartment in an really interesting area of athens! Despina was also very nice and helpful and the communication went very well.
We really enjoyed our stay :)

Despinas Place was nice and easy to find, thanks to her tips for the transfer from the Airport.
Her answers came quickly and we could even stay a few hours longer due to the delay in our flight back home. thanks for that!
In the flat, we had everything we needed and in the neighborhood is a very nice restaurant, that we can only recommend. (Try it! Its right up the street)

Central location, cozy house and right below is the happening pub Ôºågoing left towards monastiraki, turn right to syntagma, going front to Ermou street and to the back is the plaska shopping areas. The shower place is a bit small and it is hot when accidentally touched the hot water faucet ...

Superb location, very friendly and nice service provided by Nikos! The place is big, personal thinking the bath tube can better be changed to a shower, but I am more than satisfied for the price/quality rate! Good communication!

Appartement spacieux et tr√®s bien situ√© en plein centre d'Ath√®nes. La plupart des lieux int√©ressants de la ville sont accessibles √† pied. Trois chambres et un grand salon permettent de s√©journer confortablement. Stella a √©t√© tr√®s r√©active pour chaque demande avant notre arriv√©e et pendant le s√©jour. L'accueil  a √©t√© tr√®s sympathique et nous nous sommes sentis comme chez nous. Un grand merci.

Filio's apartment was exactly as described and shown in pictures, and the view from the balcony is even better than the pictures. The flat was very clean and furniture was kept in good condition yet stylish and modern. Filio was waiting for us in the apartment and we had no problem both checking in and out, she was kind to respond positively for our late check out option.. Filio was a great host, she provided cookies and some fresh juices upon arrival. You wont need anything extra in Filio"s apartment she was very kind to provide all kind of bathroom amenities as well. The neighboorhood is mainly residential and literally 5-10 minutes walk to Psirri our favorite and Monastraki Square which connects you to main touristic attractions. Overall that a great price for value and we recommend it highly for travellers who are looking for comfy accomadation at reasonable prices in a central location. Thank You Filio for the opportunity. Oh and yes Athens was great :)
Stella is a great host. Place was clean and quiet enough at night. We can go everywhere by FOOT, Wolt can bring your meal there near 20min so this is a big benefit of this place :D

If your looking for a rental in a prime location next to everything then book this rental. We enjoyed being able to walk to almost everything. It‚Äôs a small older rental but clean. With it being cold during our stay I wish there were more blankets and throw blankets on the seat in the living room. The Netflix is connected to an account which is an added bonus! The front door is a little tricky to figure out as well as the door to the rental. It wasn‚Äôt till the last day there that we kinda finally figured it out. I guess this is pretty common in Greece because we dealt with the same thing with some of our other rentals that we stayed at. The Owners were very accommodating and even let us book very last minute and allowed us to check in past midnight.
Clean, modern apartment close to everywhere you want to be! George was very gracious and accommodating!

George is fabulous!! He is so understanding and quick to respond. We had horrible flight issues, cancelled and then coming in at 4 am. He got up and met us at the place even though it was 4 am. The place is perfect. In a safe area that is quiet. However it is a 5 minute walk to the more busier part of town. Plenty of shops and restaurants. If we ever come again, we will stay here!
We had a good time in the apartment with two big & comfortable beds. We would stay there again. Thanks!

This apartment is so great and Natassa is a wonderful host. She was easy to communicate with before and even during the trip. She provided me with clear directions to get to the apartment and even suggestions on what to do during my stay. The apartment is clean, spacious, and really cute. Also it is located in an area where you can just walk around and see what Athens has to offer.
Tr√®s bien

Aristotelis ‚Äòs apartment is at the perfect location for those wanting to see everything in Athens.
Minutes from sights, walking distance from everywhere!
The apartment was super clean with crispy sheets and lots of towels to use.
We even got complementary coffee, tea, fruits and biscuits which was a really nice touch.
The area is safe and the apartment is comfortable for families and the images reflect reality.
Would stay here again, hands down!

This location is perfect for walking around the inner core. Lots of sites to see & fun restaurants. The kitchen was well stocked, beds were comfortable & having a clothes washing machine was a great bonus.
bella e accogliente casa, nel cuore di Atene. Arredata con gusto e molto piacevole. Lilly poi √® davvero una padrona molto gentile e accogliente. Fantastico soggiorno
Wonderful place and great host
Great to have a two bedroom flat so close to the Acropolis. Shops and supermarket really close by

Absolutely loved our stay here. The apartment is beautiful, the view from the roof is amazing- loved having coffee up there. The location is perfect to explore Athens and there are really good restaurants and cafes nearby. Loved everything about this place- would stay again and recommend to all our friends.

Niko has an incredible place, it is super cute and has an amazing view! It was everything we needed and more. Niko was super helpful and proactive with instructions, and was always available if we had a question. Highly recommend staying in this beautiful apartment!

This was the perfect place to stay in Athens. The area was very quiet and safe, and super close and walkable to all of the main city landmarks, great restaurants, and the metro. The rooftop terrace was beautiful and the view was stunning. The apartment was very spacious and clean. Lilly was very responsive and check in was seamless. I would recommend this nocarz to anyone and everyone!
Great location for visiting city center
Great place to stay with a family. Clean, spacious, close to metro!

Great location and beautiful modern designed apartment. Using the ancient lift was a very unique experience, although it was out of order on the day of arrival and we had to carry the luggage all the way up we were happy with our stay. Akropolis in walking distance and bars and restaurant around the corner. We‚Äòll be back for sure.

Excellent home away from home. It was incredibly convenient to find. Our host provided perfect directions from airport. We were amazed that it was so easy. Home was stylish and well located. Our family of 5 was comfortable. We walked to all of the historic sites and couldn‚Äôt have found a better nocarz.
Perfect location and great check in. Very friendly and helpful. The apartment was very clean and tidy.
Thanks for being such a great host Panos!!

Position is good and a comfortable studio but hot water was deficient so it wasn't possible to have a decent shower. Plus if someone tried to boil the kettle while you were in the shower the whole apartment blacked out. Apparently this is normal and acceptable
Lovely apartment in an amazing location. Very comfortable bed
Our stay was very brief but we had everything we needed and enjoyed seeing the neighborhood!
Great location
Great place! Busy area but noise was blocked by the doors / windows pretty well!

Lits Confortables et pr√®s de toutes les attractions importantes.
Tr√®s calme. Vue sur acropolis superbe du 3e balcon. Bonne pression dans la douche et eau chaude.
Alisa was very helpful with tips and orientation. Very pleasant stay.

Stayed for one night in this fascinating old house! I didn‚Äôt have time to make use of all the facilities, but it seemed like a great place for travellers who want to be in the middle of it all. Yannis was very helpful, I‚Äôm sure anyone can have a nice stay here.

ENG: it's amazing place for everyone want to explore Athens because it is in a perfect location, very closed to Place Syntagma, Acropolis and every site archeological.
The ospitality is perfect, Yannis advised me about Athens.
ITA: Posizione perfetta, ogni sito archeologico e facilmente raggiungibile a piedi (9 min dall'acropoli oppure pochi minuti da Piazza Syntagma) consiglio a qualsiasi viaggiatore questa casa.
Ospitalit√† perfetta con anche alcuni consigli su qualsiasi cosa riguardo Atene.

Loved our stay at George's place. Would recommend!
Great location in Psyri neighborhood - lots of restaurants nearby, walking distance to many tourist attractions and the metro. The apartment is on a quiet street and has all the amenities we needed for our stay.
George and his team had great communications. They were very helpful, especially when we left something behind after check-out and they were able to retrieve the item and kept it safe for us to collect later.

I had such a great stay here. The location is perfect, the neighborhood is great, the house is lovely with good vibes all around. It's easy to get to all the places you want to see, and there is so much to do in Athens. Alisa is a wonderful host, excellent company and fun to hang out with. She also has a fabulous coffee shop just around the corner!
Thanks again for everything, and hopefully see you again sometime!
The room is in a great location where you can easily find bars, street food and restaurants nearby. It is perfect for those who want to explore the city, and the price is awesome.

The apartment had a fantastic view of the Acropolis and was minutes away from everything. George went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed for our stay including convenient airport transfers. The place was stylish and picture perfect!
Just beware of the pipes in the shower as they do get scalding hot but nothing against the host as I already knew that going in but was dumb and accidentally burned myself.
Our stay with George was lovely. Amazing view of the Acropolis in a fun and lively neighborhood.

Unfortunately, our anticipated dream stay at George's managed place had turned into a sweaty and sleepless nightmare. Here is the good, the bad, and the ugly of our experience. The good: the view is truly incredible and the location made it easy to go downstairs into one of Athen's most lively restaurant and bar areas. The Bad: The place is simply not as nice as in the photos, everything felt worn and cheap and there were large stains on the couch. The bed mattress was cheap and uncomfortable. And the communication from the host was confusing. nocarz warns you that there may be an additional security deposit at booking, and after messaging the host about it, George reiterated that there will be a security deposit that we must pay, but it's unclear how or when that was supposed to happen. We wanted to self-check-in because our arrival time was uncertain (we were on a road trip with stops on the way) which George said was fine before we booked because there was self-check-in available, but then we got an automated message from him that insisted asking us for an exact check-in time and meeting some assistant (presumably to collect the security deposit? We never found out because he never responded to messages on check-in day). He later clarified that this was an automated message which out of date, but that just caused additional stress on us that we did not need to deal with on our holiday. This should have been simple and easy, and it wasn't due to a lack of attention to basic details like being consistent with check-in instructions. But here is when things get worse. George was quick to communicate before we booked but simply did not respond to our messages for help on the check-in day. When we arrived, the AC started to work for a minute but then it suddenly stopped, nothing would light up, and the temperatures are extremely hot in Athens in August so not having an AC is a problem, it means you can't really enjoy the space you just rented. I was sweating in the evening indoors even though the windows were open. We also noticed a very large stain on the couch (it looked nasty) and it just felt like the place is definitely not as clean as it looks in the photos. It looks like it's been heavily used and everything felt worn and stained all over. The UGLY: Since the AC did not work, and George was not responding at all, we had to keep the windows open to try to get fresh air in, but due to its location the street music from all the nearby bars (many bars with large subwoofers blasting music), street noise, and city noises, all mixed into a sound equivalent of vomit and all of that noise made its way up into the studio which made it impossible for us to sleep even with earplugs. Laying in that bed, sweating from the heat, with earplugs, and feeling like we were still in the middle of multiple dance floors felt extremely uncomfortable. We read that this might be an issue here in prior reviews, but I think if the AC worked and all the windows were closed, there is a chance to pass out eventually. But with the windows open to get fresh air, we could not sleep no matter how hard we tried to block the ears. Closer to the morning as the temperatures eventually cooled slightly, we closed all the doors and windows to try and get at least some hours of sleep and discovered that the AC suddenly turned on! How? It turns out there was a sensor at the windows/balcony door that turned off the AC and George failed to include that basic instruction in any of his documents, there are no signs, nothing. And since he didn't respond to our messages, we had no way of knowing this small but very important detail. The next day we had a flight, so not getting a good rest resulted in an uncomfortable day of trying to stay awake while dealing with car rentals and airport travel mess. Afterward, George messaged saying that "I was out of the office". He has 112 listings to deal with so don't expect him to respond to your particular booking if you have an issue. He offered a refund of 50 euros in exchange for a 5-star review but I think I owe it to fellow travelers to leave my honest experience here. I still gave this place 2 stars because of the incredible views, but I would not stay there again and would not recommend others stay here either. Perhaps if the host takes good care in cleaning and replacing worn/stained furniture, clarifies the communication to be 100% precise with instructions for check-in and security deposit instructions, and puts a simple sign about the AC sensors and includes it in the instructions, this place could actually one day be worth the money due to the view, but right now it's not.

This place is beautiful! Extremely roomy compared to most places in Europe.
The view from the sofa and the giant outdoor patio is unreal!
There is an elevator, which means you don't have to tote your luggage up and down flights of stairs.
That said, the elevator is right next to the unit and very loud when it goes at all hours of the night. There is a nightclub just down the street that can easily be heard inside. It goes until 2-4am depending on the day. If you want somewhere to sleep early, this would not be a great place to stay. But if you want to be SUPER walkable and close to everything, it would be a great place!
There was construction when I stayed, so I rarely slept as the club/bar noise went until 3-4am and construction started in the morning by 8am. I'm sure the construction is just temporary.
The bed is extremely firm, so if you need a softer mattress, I would look elsewhere.
Overall I would love to stay here again as it was just a fantastic location!

Highly recommend this place! The place was clean and a great, walkable location. Lots of nearby restaurants, shopping, and we could even walk to the Acropolis. George was very helpful and set up a transfer/car pick up from the airport. The driver was very friendly. The only downsides were noise (music) from the street some nights, and the elevator stopped working the last night of our stay (which was out of the host‚Äôs control).

We loved staying here! It was in the perfect location and very spacious. It exceeded all our expectations and we would definitely recommend staying here!
Lovely place, great location. Korina was very straightforward to deal with and easy to contact. Thank you for a lovely stay.

Lovely spacious apartment close to plaka and monistraki areas. Easy walk to acropolis. Well equipped kitchen but I didn‚Äôt use it as lovely restaurants close by. Hot shower with good water pressure but cracked tiles with some mould. Lift no longer in operation so need to carry suitcase upstairs. Overall would recommend .

Louis has been very friendly and uncomplicated. From the appartment it has been very easy to reach the beach and the city center. The appartment has got a nice balcony and had a very good size for two. Especially in the last days (40 Degrees in Athen) we really enjoyed the air condition.

Louis ist einfach der beste Gastgeber, den man sich vorstellen kann! Immer freundlich und hilfsbereit! Wir haben uns in seiner sehr geschmackvoll eingerichteten Wohnung super wohl gef√ºhlt und kommen bestimmt wieder!

Wir haben sechs Tage in Vasilikis Apartment verbracht und waren sehr zufrieden. Wir hatten quasi nichts an der Unterkunft auszusetzen, allerdings ist die Verkehrsanbindung teils kompliziert. Wenn man aber gut zu Fu√ü ist, ist das auch kein Problem.

The location is exceptional, as it is in a quieter part of the very busy city of Athens, however still a good distance to walk to any of the main attractions. Also if you are able to stay here on Saturday the farmers market is a really great way to get lots of good food for cheap.
The balcony with the view of the Parthenon and Lycabettus hill was the highlight of our trip in Athens and most nights we wanted to just relax on the balcony and admire the beauty.
Lastly, I did not have the pleasure of meeting Vasiliki due to her having to leave town while we were there. However, just through communicating over the phone she quickly became one of my favorite hosts. Our plane was set to arrive later than we wanted and then there was an added delay. She was very understanding and nice enough to set us up with a friend to show us the apartment. All in all it was a very pleasant experience and I will definitely recommend this apartment to anyone wanting to stay in Athens.
Ottimo appartamento e ottima accoglienza di Vassilios. Splendida vista sull'Acropoli dalla terrazza. L'appartamento √® perfetto per passare qualche giorno ad Atene.

Vassilios‚Äôs place was beautiful! The location is perfect, it is walkable from the metro and to all of the ancient ruins and the private balcony is amazing!!  Vassilios was excellent at communication with us and it made it very easy for us to use the metro and meet up with him for check in! When we were walking to his place he gave us great recommendations of what to do and where to go.  We loved the snacks he had waiting for us.  If we ever go to Athens again we will definitely stay at Vassilios‚Äôs place!

Appartement tr√®s mignon m√™me si √† premi√®re vue ce n'√©tait pas notre style de d√©co pr√©f√©r√©. Les petites attention de Maria √©taient √† tomber par rapport √† d'autres bnb (bouteille de ros√© offerte au milieu d'une d√©co romantique, petit dej rapide avec fruits dans le frigo).
La localisation de l'appart est top, la vue encore plus.
A recommander !

This place is located in a great location of the center Karamikos, next to the metro station and surrounded by cafes, bars and restaurants. The communication with Fotini was excellent and she always was available for us! Really recommended!

Vassilios provided the best recommendations and made our Athens experience great!
Vassilis went out of his way before and during our stay to answer questions and provide support. Perfect Plaka location. Very clean and welcoming. We would absolutely book with Vassilis again.

Vassilios‚Äôs place was great.  Lots to do in the area.  Nice restaurants and shops close by.  The view of the Acropolis from the large balcony was amazing!  Vassilios met us at the apartment and gave us great recommendations of things we should do.  Supplied lots of fruit, bread etc.   I would definitely stay there again.  Tom and Stephanie.
All is said about the great appartment with the best terrace ever. Vassilios indeed is a lovely and very generous person. Once more thanks a lot. We loved our stay.

Fortini greeted us on arrival and showed us how everything worked. She is friendly and communicated well. The apartment was as expected and comfortable. Great location, minutes from the metro, close to lovely restaurants and markets. The fridge was very small and cooking facilities/utensils a little lacking.
Thoroughly enjoyed staying here. Views of the acropolis were incredible.

Anastasia and George's place is exactly as they describe it. The courtyard is truly the best part of their place, even when it's 110 degrees outside! They make you feel right at home, and even gave us a plate of fresh fruit when we arrived late and too tired to go out and get food. They helped to arrange a taxi pick up for us at the ferry as well, and stayed in great communication. Since they live right upstairs they also always made themselves available for any questions, concerns or suggestions. They even offered to over in food for us when it was so hot, while another night Anastasia walked us up the street to help point out the best pizza in Athens. Had we wanted to cook they had every appliance we could've needed, including a variety of coffee and tea accompaniments and the most delicious homemade marmalade. The beds and air conditioning also made the quaint space very comfortable. They even have a very "talkative" cat that spends a lot of time in the courtyard and will occasionally peak in the window to say hi.
La chambre est agr√©able et propre ! Les "probl√®mes" de propret√© et de bruits rencontr√©s lors du s√©jour √©taient dus aux autres colocataires.. par ailleurs les h√¥tes sont tr√®s sympathiques.

It is ok for this price. In generally the flat is clean. In my opinion it needs a renovation, especially bathroom and kitchen. Localisation is fine, about 20 minutes to the center, bus station is near to the flat. Also in neighbourhood you can find some good bars, restaurants or a shop.
Great place, big and spacious. Paris was great and very nice. Easy to communicate. Close to main attractions. Overall a very good experience

What can somebody say about this place! It's definitely the best place -fair enough called dreamy- to stay in Athens. Clean and perfectly decorated is a place where you can find peace of mind and feel literally like home, with all these goodies you can find in the kitchen and if you forgot to take your toothbrush, deodorant etc with you, dont worry Kleio's house is the place for you.  Furthermore, Kleio is a superhost! Kind, polite and ready to share with you all the secrets a city like Athens hides. Completely recommend we will come back for sure very soon .  Kleio, thank you one million times!

Konstantino was very quick to repsond to our inquiry, and making sure we got into the apt ok. The apt is well kept, clean and pretty quiet for the one night we stayed. We did stay during the heatwave, and unfortunately the AC didn't work well at all - the room felt like it was about 90F which made sleeping very uncomfortable. On hot days, a fan would be a helpful addition to the space. Also, if traveling for business, there is no iron on site. Other than that, we really appreciated have a nice bright space to rest in, and also the black out curtains to keep the sun at bay!
Perfect place to stay in Athens - lively area close to all major attractions. Great restaurants and bars nearby.

Kleio is an amazing, welcoming, attentive host, and the apartment is a reflection of it.
Perfect place and perfect welcome.

The appartment is small but spacious, with a comfortable bed. The location is perfect, with every major tourist site reachable on foot. Syntagma metro station is 5 min on foot so it's very easy and convenient to reach the airport or the train station. Finally the host was very helpful and greeted us with a very warm welcome. Great !

Where to start?
Kleio is an absolute sweetheart who welcomed us earlier than normal checkin as our long flight arrived in ATH at 6.30am. Kleio also arranged our pickup from the airport and we were very pleased to find out we could have access straight away. Kleio then gave us a rundown on places to go in Athens particularly where to eat and drink. As she is a former chef and now consultant to restaurants, her advice was impeccable. We dined at several of her suggested options and they were all beyond expectation.
The apartment itself is located in a fantastic and more local position in a safe, gentrified and funky neighborhood just 10 mins walk from the Acropolis and has easy walking access to all inner Athens attractions. Everything including great eating, supermarkets, Plaka district is within walking distance. The images on nocarz whilst completely accurate probably cannot do it justice as the volume provided by the extra high ceilings makes for a very spacious feel.
Kleio provides an unbelievably generous array of food, wine, beers, waters, coffee and other snacks (and even Berocca) the like we have never experienced before in a nocarz property.
To wrap it up if you are staying in the fascinating and ancient city of Athens, and you want an authentic and supremely comfortable experience rather than a " you could be anywhere hotel stay" look no further. Kleio's place and hospitality are the best you can find for your stay. Thanks Kleio! Hope to have the opportunity return some day.
Tonia is an overwhelmingly hospitable and very cheerful person. It was a great pleasure to stay in her lovely, and unique place. I would highly recommend

We were able to book Kleio's place last minute and this was the best option ever. The place truly saved our trip after a terrible experience at another nocarz. Kleio welcomed us last minute at 20:00 with a warm smile and gave us an extensive tour of all the must-knows of both the apartment and Athens. In addition, she was also very flexible with our check-out time, which we really appreciated! Below I will briefly describe everything.
Location:
The apartment is centrally located from all tourist attractions, located in a super safe neighborhood (family neighborhood) in less than 2 minutes you also have numerous cozy restaurants, bakeries, supermarkets, ect. The perfect place to spend your holiday in Athens.
The apartment:
The apartment is phenomenal, you can literally eat off the floor. In the apartment you can find literally EVERYTHING. From well equipped cooking equipment to numerous biscuits, breakfast, spices, bread, detergent, fabric softener, numerous shower necessities, (all bought new,..).
The first days we didn't have to think about buying food for our breakfast because of the food provided by Kleio. The apartment is very clean and super cozy. I must admit that it is better than in the pictures! After a long hike or walk in the city center you can really enjoy of your evening in the couch, with candles, netflix and many other streaming services.
Thanks again Kleio for your warm welcome and your flexibility! We really enjoyed it and hope to come back to one of your apartments in Athens as soon as possible. For the people who read the reviews to make sure wheter to book this place or not, I can assure you that this is a great place to spend your stay in Athens.

Kleio's place was the best choice I made. Kleio is very organized and has done an amazing job prepping the place for her guests. I can't thank her enough for her tremendous attention to the smallest detail and her great help and recommendations around Athens.
Thumbs-up and hope to stay at your place again soon.

I could write a novel about how this nocarz is the cream of the crop. Remember when nocarz first started and it wasn‚Äôt just a bunch of investors buying up places to flip and make quick money but instead people who opened their amazing, well curated homes to you? The latter is Kleio. I genuinely wish I lived at her place! Every review you‚Äôll read here praising it is truthful. The photos are accurate (a rarity these days). The place is incredibly clean and has everything you could possibly need . Kleio deeply cares about your comfort and experience which is shown through the easy to navigate iPad she has of recommendations. Don‚Äôt worry about thinking - Kleio has already taken care of it for you - just enjoy!
Un petit instant vol√© au c≈ìur de la vie de Tonia, qui nous a re√ßu comme des invit√©s. Bien situ√© au centre ville. Petites attentions fort appr√©ciables. Merci Tonia. Marion et Lo√Øc.

Our stay at Kleio‚Äôs flat was absolutely extraordinary!!! The flat itself was very lovely and also very well located.  In fact, it is even better than shown in the photos. However, what put it over the top was Kleio herself. She went above and beyond to ensure we had everything we needed and more. She arranged for a driver to pick us up from the airport so our arrival was seamless. She provided outstanding recommendations during our stay and when we left, she even helped us with our next stop.  This property and host deserve the very highest rating and I have already recommended her to others. Thank you Kleio!!

Kleio was the perfect hostess. She gave helpful hints about getting around in Athens, suggestions of great places to go, info about the Acropolis & other highlights, and fun places to eat, drink, and go to, even outside of Athens. It was amazingly close to the Acropolis.
The only downside was the location of the bed.
A 9.9 out of 10. So worth it!!!!
She will make your stay so wonderful!

Lovely apartment. Eva was very helpful and informative. The suite was clean and gorgeous! Location is everything you'd be looking for in Athens.

A great spot with a beautiful balcony to relax on in a vibrant and fascinating part of the city, a short walk from the Acropolis and the major sites. Great apartment in fantastic location.  Easy to walk to all main sites.  Didn't need to use public transport at all.   Wide range of bars and restaurants nearby.  Jaquzzi lovely to relax in the lush green secluded garden.

Very nice, clean and equiped with everything you need place, quick access to the Metro, 10 min trip to the center.

I recommend!
Evagelia's place is very convenient to anyone staying in Athens. It was very clean, close to public transportation, and Evagelia was extremely communicative and friendly.

Yannis and Helene‚Äôs place was very clean and on point. Aside from the easy access and the strategic place, we totally enjoyed eating in the terrasse with a superb view on the magnificent Acropolis! 5/5!

good and cheap place!

Yannis was a great host! The location was excellent! The view of the Parthenon was amazing! The washer/dryer was nice to have available. Yannis had some food in the apartment for us on arrival. It was  a great touch!

Really great apartment we were very pleased with it, and it‚Äôs located perfectly, everything is in walking distance from it. For anyone who‚Äôs wondering, yes that is the apartment you want to book :)

Great location for our visit to Athens! Easy to get to the metro stop, walking distance from the Acropolis, and lots of great food and shops close by. Perfect location in Plaka!  This home is truly special.  It is in a wonderful neighborhood that is within walking distance of everything. The house itself has lots of A/C, amazing artifacts from the Acropolis, great bedroom/bathroom setup, and the most gorgeous courtyard in which to spend the afternoon sipping the wine left by the hosts.   This is a rental with character and charm, and it is one I would recommend to anyone.  Should I find myself in Athens again, I will definitely rent this home.  It was wonderful.

Great apartment in a very central location. The apartment was clean, comfortable and exactly as advertised. It‚Äôs central location meant we could walk to everything. The living, kitchen, and bathrooms are all very nice. There is definitely adequate space. The flat is within walking distance of most things. The hosts met us at the flat and demonstrated everything that we needed. The issues we encountered were with the very loud road noise and night and the noise from the school during the day (which might not be a problem if you are out all day).
The hosts really can't do anything about that so we understand it's unavoidable if you stay. The beds, however, are extremely uncomfortable. I stayed in the room with the double bed and my friend in the room with the 2 single beds. We both had very uncomfortable nights. The mattress are either very old or very cheaply made because we could both feel every single spring that we laid on. It was so bad I slept on the couch both nights. Additionally, while the house was clean no one had bothered to sleep under the beds in a long while. There were huge dust balls underneath which I found while checking the beds. We both have allergies.
Overall, the hosts were good so I would recommend if the mattresses were replaced and you aren't too sensitive to street noise. The neighborhood seemed nice and safe.
Great apartment, excellent local restaurants, easy walk to central Athens.

The apartment is the center, very close to the acropolis and the restaurants. It is wonderful thanks to the location, very clean and with all the needed fornitures. I recommend to everybody
Clean and well appointed apartment very close to the Acropolis.  Plaka, Syntagma, Monastiraki and other areas a short walk from this apartment.  Exactly as presented in photos.

We had a great stay at Toni's place. The location is really good - just 2 minutes walk to the Acropolis museum and metro station. Although its near several restaurants and pubs, its very quiet at night - we all had a good night's sleep. Will stay again if we come back.
Great value and place!

La casa est√° muy bien situada y es bonita, pero hay que tener en cuenta que el agua caliente funciona con termo y si vais mucha gente (m√°s de tres) no llega para todos. Por lo dem√°s esta muy bien y es muy amable
Fantastic place in Athens. Extremely comfortable accomodation for a family, and the host was in regular contact to make sure we were comfortable. Location is also outstanding. Thank you Elena.

We had a good stay here.  Everything was as described, and our host was friendly.  We had to wait about half an hour for check in because something came up.  I also got stuck in the elevator when it malfunctioned, so I would recommend sticking with the stairs.  Its an easy walk to the metro to get anywhere in the city.  Lots of shops nearby.  The room itself was excellent and evwn had a balcony.  Good place to stay for the price.
Used the place for a couple of nights  before setting sail.

Great safe location within 5 min or so from Acropolis museum and entrance to the hill of the Parthenon. Two large beds plus a sleeper sofa in the living room. Good size kitchen, but the fridge is a little small, so don't expect it to hold much. No cloth dryer. The small cloth washer is in the kitchen closet, but I had to bleach it due to the front loading washer having mildew/ mold from people not leaving the detergent compartment n washer door open to air dry the unit. Toni has a cloth drying rack, so you will have to use that or go to one of the two coin laundromats two blocks away. There is also a market two blocks away (Go Market? Accepts credit cards) to load up on bottle waters n other supplies (i.e. laundry detergent and bleach). Please note that the standing shower is only half covered so some water may splash out. TV is a bit on the smaller side n Wi-Fi wasn't able support streaming for my kids to watch. However, we didn't go to Athens to watch TV, so not a big deal for us.
The apartment ist perfectly located, you can reach everything by foot.
Very nice flat and well placed. I recommand.

Excellent apartment in a prime location. We were able to walk to all the sites. Very clean and excellent communication with the host. We would certainly recommend it and would stay here again if visiting Athens.

great host, the location is perfect.
thanks!
Great experience, a stones throw away from the acropolis
Beautiful view of the Parthenon! Sokol was very accommodating and quick with responses. The apartment was very small but totally doable for two people. The view from the balcony is unreal.

Excellent view as stated from a stylish good sized balcony and adequately sized, well equipped apartment for individuals or couples who can manage with a pull-out bed.
Exceptional hospitality provided by the host family in a nearby shop with the precious commodity in Athens of a parking space!
Good situation for restaurants, tour buses, shops and all that Athens has to offer.
Sokol‚Äôs place was perfect for us! He was quick to respond and gave us many helpful recommendations! There were many local stores nearby. Taking a taxi was the best way for us to get there.

Toni's place was in a fantastic location right near the Acropolis museum. Close to the metro, easy to find, and very clean and free of clutter. Comfortable bed. Toni was very responsive to my questions over the nocarz email and responded in a timely way. There were a few little downsides - the apartments sits over an outdoor bar, so there was music playing up until around 11 pm. Also, the phone number given in the instructions was to a company that dealt with many rentals, so the person I texted with was not Toni. But email communication was with Toni. That got a bit confusing. Finally, the kitchen was very nice, but there were no amenities. No paper towels/napkins, and no coffee pods to go with the coffeepot. Toni was extremely responsive to this last issue and send a friend over with some instant coffee since I was only staying for one night and needed to get to the airport early. Thank you! Overall a great place if you are staying for multiple nights and can stock supplies.
Sokol was √† great host, very nice and convenient. The appartment is nice, and the view is spectacular. We really enjoyed our stay and we would come back with great pleasure.
Beautiful place and very friendly host. Apartment is very close to center of Athens and sparkly clean. We loved its unusual art design.

We stayed here for 2 nights in Athens before travelling onto Santorini. Was one of the best nocarz‚Äôs we have stayed in. Could not recommend this place enough! Sokol was so helpful arranging taxi to the airport and check in was very well explained and easy. The location was good close to the centre. The apartment itself as beautiful with everything we needed and more and the outdoor space was so lovely to enjoy the view and weather. Such a relaxing, well placed apartment, we will be visiting again on our next stay in Athens!

Bruyant mais tr√®s bien situ√© , tout est r√©alisable √† pied. Panagiotis nous a donn√© d'excellentes adresses de restaurants grecques √† 5 minutes de l'appartement. Merci pour l'accueil.

The apartment is clean and compact but it has everything we need. Even it has a filter water tab so we didn‚Äôt need to buy bottled water during our stay.
The apartment is in 7th floor with elevator to the 6 th floor. The stairs to go to the 7th floor is pretty narrow so need to be extra careful for kids and elderly but once in the 7th floor, the view of Acropolis especially at night is really mesmerizing.
The location is only 5 minutes walk from Psyri bars and restaurants, one minute from a trendy Thai restaurant, Tamarind and across the building, there is a mini market and not far also there‚Äôs a Chinese supermarket. We went back home around 9:30 pm during Saturday night and still seeing some people walking around in the neighborhood, it‚Äôs a quiet area but ok. It‚Äôs a store area where they closed after the dark.
Sokol and Kesiana are also great hosts. They are always responding quickly. We had a great time staying at their place.

This glamorous and spacious apartment (three living rooms!) is also very comfortable. It allowed our family of four to spread out, which is always a big relief after little hotel rooms. Every fitting and detail is lovely. We enjoyed cooking in the very new kitchen, and can report that the oven is very fast & efficient. It was great to also catch up on some laundry. The neighbourhood, Exarcheia, is considered dangerous by some uber drivers, but we felt safe walking around and uncovering hidden gems, like the deli on the cnr of Emmanouil Benaki & Gravias Sts, nearby. Also excellent are the restaurant recommended by Ifigeneia, Ama Laxei; the Pnyka bakery on Totsita and the Saturday farmers‚Äô market on Kallidromiou. We thought it was awesome being right next door to the archaeological museum. Ifigeneia was super thoughtful and easy to communicate with. Would stay here again in a flash!
We had the best stay here. It was walkable to all the ruins and sites. The apartment was clean and spacious. The host was so kind and accommodating. Lots to do and see and eat nearby!

This was the most beautiful vacation apartment I have ever had the pleasure to stay at. It had all the immaculate luxuries of a five star hotel with the comforts and conveniences of home. The decor even exceeded my expectations. Fine art and a smart sense for space, aesthetics and color, make this apartment an oasis in Athens. Athens is loud and this apartment was quiet! We slept so well. Thank you to Ifi and her Mom for the great communication and excellent hospitality. We were so grateful for and happy with our stay.
Truly wonderful hosts, location and accommodation!

Ifigeneia is a very good host, the communication from booking to arrival outstanding. The place is very nice and clean. We stayed with a small family and all we need for our to short stay was available. The pictures are as you will get and better.
Thank you Ifigeneia for a first great experience with nocarz.

Panos was an awesome host. Communicated very well with all details and highlights of the area. He arranged all transfers and the place was very clean and comfortable!
The building is really old but everything is nice inside the room. Perfect location with a good view. We walked to everywhere we want to visit and there are quite a few restaurants nearby.

The room is in a great location with a lift, great view from the balcony, it was also very clean. The bed was squeaky with any movement and a little difficult to sleep because of this. But inspire of this bed issue, I would totally stay here again.

The room is rather tiny but has everything you need for a city trip! The balcony is really pretty and offers a great view! Communication was flawless and the Check-In and Check-Out was super relaxed and without any complications! Can definitely recommend this for spending a few nights in Athens!

Perfect location, close to all the main attractions and stations, fantastic view. Excellent place and even better host! Highly recommended!

Studio apartment very bright and clean,lovely high ceilings and well equipped.Great size balcony with stunning view of the acropolis especially at night. Convenient to metro and restaurants. Approach to front door a bit scary but we got used to it. Balcony furniture could be updated. A five day metro ticket a great buy. Collection from port/airport was very good and reasonable. Excellent location and services! But this view of Acropolis... I can't say enough! Highly recommend.

The apartment and its location are amazing and I have no words to describe the view.
Thanks Vanesa&Voula. I hope (and wish) that we will return soon.

Everything was as indicated! The apartment is great and has an excellent location!! The view is the best! Voula and Vanessa were so attentive all the time and gave us recommendations within the city. We also loved the details we found inside the apartment. We'll definitely come back!
Amazing place. Clean, easy check in, and incredible terrace with a fantastic view of the Acropolis.
Everything was lovely! The apartment was spacious, clean, in a fantastic location, and of course had a great view of the Acropolis. Definitely recommend for your stay in Athens.

Lila and George's apartment is close to the Acropolis. Aprrox 10-15 mins walk to the ticketing booth ( To beat the crowd, go at 8am ). Nearby there is a supermarket for all your everyday needs.
The host are a great and accommodating. They spend time to assist you in your planning and ensure that your experience in Athens is wonderful. Look no further and quick book with Lila and George!
We had the best stay in Chris apartment. He gave us some good recommendation on which places we should visit. If we ever come back we would definitely stay there again.
O apartamento esta bem localizado, perto da esta√ß√£o Biktoria, confort√°vel e pr√°tico. Voltaria a escolher a casa do Chris numa proxima viagem a Atenas.

Pros:
This apartment was amazing. It is a little off the path of the craziness of Athens, but Ubering around is definitely easy enough. The pictures for this apartment dont do it justice. The view you get when you look out the window is amazing. Vivian is a great host and does her best to make your trip very memorable, she was always there for us and even helped plan our stay with giving us recommendations for places to eat or visit.
Cons:
Absolutely nothing. Vivian is the greatest and if you are lucky to stay at this place you will be in good hands.

Massimo‚Äôs accommodation was really cool. It was very modern and very clean too. The location is really good but people that don‚Äôt like noise  should be aware that it is in an area with a lot of bars so you will hear a lot of noise. We would definitely recommend this place.
Massimo was a great host. He was quick to reply and really made us feel at home. Would certainly recommend!
Our stay was very good, house is perfect and the host is very welcoming and helpful

A wonderful place to stay in Athens that is a good base from which to explore. Located very close to the attractions. Clean sheets and towels are always a warm welcome after a long flight! A great host that communicates well!

We loved our stay. The Home was well appointed clean. Very comfy, heat works well during a winter stay. Our hist was very responsive. Most of all the home you see in the pictures is more impressive when you see it in person. Lastly the location is a 4 to 5 euro uber from everything.
A stunning view of the northern hills of Athens is combined with a vast accommodation that could easily take 10 guests.  Great value and great location!

Vivian and Michael were absolutely amazing!! From the get-go before the reservation, they were very accommodating with our travel arrangements to the suite and back. They offered amazing guides and recommendations from places to eat, activities to do, free walking tours and were checking on us consistently throughout our stay. With extremely quick replies as well to any questions/concerns we had throughout the day. The suite itself was spectacular and fully stocked with tea, coffee, some light snacks and amazingly clean and had a very homey-feel to it. Words can‚Äôt really describe the experience we had but in truth, it was well above and beyond our expectations. We enjoyed it very much and would definitely come back. If your looking for a helpful guide and a wonderful place for your vacation, look no further! Vivian and Michaels‚Äô place is your solution!
Much love,
Tom & Maryam

The apartment is beautiful and is nicer in person than in the pictures. It has been kept in very good condition. It‚Äôs spacious enough for our family of four, with two tall teenagers. There are three separate sleeping areas (one double is in part of the large living area) and two bathrooms. The kitchen has all you would need. The balcony seating is wonderful. Our only critique is the difficulty in using the key. We had a hard time opening the door, often all 4 of us giving it a try multiple times to get it to open. There is definitely a trick to learning how to open it the right way, which can be frustrating when you‚Äôre a tired traveler. Overall though, I would stay here again. The location is also great, close to the Acropolis, Smile restaurant, lots of cafes, etc.

Nous avons √©t√© ravis de s√©journer chez Nonika. C'est sa m√®re Drosoula qui nous a chaleureusement accueillis. Le logement est tr√®s spacieux, la terrasse sur la rue est tr√®s agr√©able. Nous recommandons sans h√©siter !

We stayed at Ira's apartment for 3 nights and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay there. The apartment was very clean and beautifully decorated, reminded us of home in the UK. Ira was kind enough to show us around the apartment and gave us few tips and guide of the area. The apartment is well equipped with everything you could need for your holiday including a washing machine with detergent supplied, pots and pans, etc and even Netflix. There is a 24hrs convenient shop down the road (approximately 5 mins walk). The nearest Metro station (Panormou) is about 15 minutes walk away. There are restaurants, cafe, bars and supermarket near the Metro station. We would definitely stay here again and would highly recommend.

Very easy parking, almost in front of the appartment. The location of the apartment is very convenient. The place is very clean and nice. We really felt like our place. Mr. Ioannis is a very good host.

This apartment was very noisy, my friends and I all lost lots of sleep as a result. It's on a busy road and motorbikes go down it 24/7. It was so loud on the balcony we didn't even consider going out there for breakfast.
If you are a heavy sleeper (or biker) and don't mind noise the apartment is very clean, and is near to some nice bars and places to eat. It's well positioned for the Acropolis, but the actual area it's in isn't so nice (unless you need a motorbike garage...)
We didn't get to meet the host, he gave the keys to the taxi driver he sent for us. We weren't shown round the flat or told how things worked. We weren't given tips for places to eat or drink in the area. That said the host did answer texts very quickly and would provide any information you needed this way.
Overall the apartment was very cheap and clean, but I'd rather pay more money for a place where I stand a chance of a good nights sleep.
Sakis nos ayud√≥ en todo lo que necesitamos. El apartamento est√° situado muy c√©ntrico y es muy c√≥modo. Hay muchos restaurantes cerca y tiendas. Si volviera a Atenas, sin duda volver√≠a ah√≠.
Very cool designed Loft in the heart of Athens!  I will come again :)

This appartment is huge (way more bigger than expected), and the location is perfect. George is very thoughtful, and flexible. Very easy to communicate to get the key even though my late arrival. Great Greek hospitality, felt like home.

Vivian was a wonderful host, very communicative, helpful and flexible. The apartment is one of the best I've been to - very clean and convenient! And the location and price were great. Thank you very much

Vivian was an absolutely excellent host - the room was exactly as advertised and was very clean/equipped with helpful extras upon arrival (like coffee to brew and a loaf of bread!). Additionally, she goes above and beyond in ensuring that her guests are seeing the most important sites in Athens. Upon our welcome, she drew us out a path to hit some of the bigger sites, and her advice was very helpful!
She was quick to respond with any questions, and even sent a number of recommendations for food/drink locations around the city. Our time in Athens would not have been as special if not for the gracious advice and hospitality of Vivian! I would certainly return to the flat, and would encourage everyone to book with her for trips to Athens.

Vivian's place is exceptional! Amazing location, stunning views and well stocked amenities. The coffee machine (with pods) especially was very much appreciated! Vivian herself was extremely communicative and clear in her instructions. Highly recommend, we will be back!

Vivian is a super host!!
We arrived very tired at 6 am after traveling 23 hours straight, yet Vivian was there to meet us at the studio.
It was lovely ~ the room was just like the picture, very clean with a very comfortable bed. The fridge was stocked with cold water, butter, marmalade and ice cubes.
Vivian had previously sent us information on where to go and what transportation to use even giving us the number of the buses.
Vivian would call to check on us and to see if we needed anything to make sure that we enjoying the city.
On the third day she did our personal laundry, changed the sheets and towels .
The location of the studio was wonderful as we were close to caf√©s shops etc.
We walked many miles in the city enjoying the cultural sites as well as the shops and restaurants. The locals were always very accommodating and extremely helpful.
We would definitely return again as it was a great experience!

Vivian is the perfect host! The place is great with good location. Vivian is really helpful and she made the trip easier with her tips. communication with her was great. I would totally suggest the place!

We loved our stay in Athens and it was even more special thanks to Vivian's tips and wonderfull appartment. We recommend it to anyone visiting Athens for a short stay or a relaxing vacation. Vivian always goes above and beyond with her help and service.

The appartment is really nice and clean. The location is also good and close to many touristic places. Never met the hosts personally, but they were always in contact (for the check-in, some recommendations, etc.). Would recommend it.

La estancia en el apartamento fue inmejorable. Todo tal y como se indica en el anuncio, muy buena comunicaci√≥n en todo momento y abierta a darte recomendaciones. Adem√°s est√° bastante bien ubicado y en una zona relativamente tranquila. No te vas a equivocar si lo eliges.

Very great apartment for a couple everything is provided if needed and Vivian is fast in replying and helping out where needed. With insider tips and a very central location you really can‚Äôt get wrong with this one!
Super appartement. Bien situ√© avec une belle vue. Vivian tr√®s disponible.
Excellent reception and a very beautiful place neighborhood. Highly recommend Vivian‚Äôs place.

We had a brilliant time staying at Corinna‚Äôs place. It‚Äôs a wonderful space which, if anything, looks even better in real life than the pictures. We only wish we could have spent more time hanging out at the loft, but we were too busy enjoying Athens. For convenience, the location could almost not be improved - almost everything that a tourist might want is within walking distance, while the metro station, with direct trains to the airport and the port at Piraeus, is only 50 metres away. We appreciated the thoughtful touches, like the coffee, bread and jam, and the Korres toiletries. The only (small) downside of the central location was some noise at night - if you are a light sleeper and your visit is at the weekend, you might want to pack some earplugs. But basically, we loved it.
great space, very unique, centrally located, super host...

This was the best nocarz I've stayed at, and I've stayed at a lot of nocarzs! My only problem was that it was so beautiful and cozy inside that I never wanted to actually go out! I expected noise to be a problem, but the room is a few stories up, so the noise from the street all melts together. I had no problem falling asleep during the week or on the weekend. I was debating booking because of cost, but this place was definitely worth it :)
It is a very good experience, Stratis are hospitable, the house is close to the scenic spot, the traffic is very convenient

Wij zijn met ons gezin 4 dagen te gast geweest bij Anna-Maria. Wij hebben een hele leuke tijd gehad in Athene. Het appartement is perfect gesitueerd in een rustige straat van waaruit je op korte loopafstand vlakbij alle leuke plekken bent. Het appartement is comfortabel, heeft een groot terras en 3 slaapkamers en 2 badkamers met een lekkere douche. De keuken, alles is nieuw. Perfecte plek om Athene te ontdekken.
Super host, awesome location. Amazing apartment. Very clean.
Sakis is a great host, and his property is strategic and accurate as described! :) amazing place to stay if you are visiting Athens!

We really had an amazing time and the apartment was great, clean, top location. We had everything we needed. Sakis provides you with all the information you possibly need from start to end. He arranged for us to be picked up at the airport by Giannis, his reliable driver, a great man, who also drove us back at the end of the holiday. We got great dining tips, and everything was on a walking distance. Tip: lycabettus hill. Go there by taxi which will only cost you 4‚Ç¨ and see Athens from a top location. About the apartment: it has a great design, nice bathroom, great couch, airconditioning and its a nice space to be in. Definitely recommend it!

do not hesitate one second to book here!
its a safe area with cool restaurants and bars.
the location is just perfect next to everything.
the flat is massive and super clean!
thanks, we will come back
It was perfect. Incredibly well located, very nice flat and you will have everything you need. Just go for it !

Perfect hosts very friendly and helpful!
The appartement is great and the neighborhood is perfect!!

We enjoyed our stay very much. We were greeted as we walked up to the property and were settled In immediately.  The apartment had everything we needed and the extra information we were given at check in was so helpful.  The location is phenomenal and there is so much to do nearby. The kitchen is so large and easily accommodated the five of us, which says a lot. Our favorite spot to hang out was the terrace.
Es war hervorragend ! es konnte nicht besser sein, 10 von 10 !

This place reminded me of why I love nocarzs. Kitchen with all the essentials, clean and clutter-free space, great outdoor patio, wonderful location, and kind and responsive hosts. We enjoyed this apartment so much!
Good and spacious place. Close to the tram #6 and other central points of interest.

Great stay! Apartment was clean and very cozy. Very nice decor. Costa is super nice and very organised. The location was GREAT. Walking distance to everything you want to see. Also right by a metro stop, so easily accessible from airport. The apartment was even nicer than in the pictures. Costa was an AMAZING host. He was super attentive and incredibly helpful; and he also was just really cool. One of my best  nocarz experiences ever. Would definitely recommend!

This is a budget-friendly little place. We liked the fact that it was very quiet and in walking distance from the Acropolis. The apartment is situated in a beautiful area with great restaurants. Costa and his partner are very friendly and made our check-in and out very easy and agreable.

Peggy is a fantastic host who shows what Greek hospitality is all about. Her flat is clean and well equipped. Both my friends and I really enjoyed our stay!

This is a fantastic place to stay for those visiting Athens the first time. Great view of the Acropolis and a 3 minute walk to hop on hop off. Very close to amazing Greek restaurants and super clean. Easy check-in. Suggest using their preferred driver as well. Made the trip from airport very very easy.
Great location!! Loved our time in Athens!!

Yannis was very active in communication and met us at the airport and provided a shuttle service for us. The place was perfect for six people and the location was walkable to Plaka and most of the main sites of Athens. The mattresses were a bit hard but other than that we had a great stay.

Great location within Walking distance of the city center. Host is really nice and prompt with his text responses.

great place near the metro  this was actually my second time to rent this apartment  If I return to athens I will probably look to rent it again

L'appartement est tr√®s bien situ√©, on a tout fait √† pieds. Le quartier est agr√©able.  L'appartement √©tait parfaitement propre, Athina r√©pond aux sms et mails tr√®s rapidement.  Un tr√®s bon moment !

This is a great studio flat to be based at for a few days in beautiful Athens. It is very centrally located, on a largely residential street just off a lovely square with nice bars and restaurants, and the main sites of the city are very walkable. We found the studio really comfortable - it has a large main room with a nice sofa area, a kitchenette which was well-stocked with crockery etc. and a lovely bathroom with a big shower. Light sleepers might be disturbed by the security grill on the front of the building but we soon got used to it. Bill was a brilliant host, meeting us at the local metro, giving us lots of great advice and tips and checking in on us during our stay. We'd definitely stay here again and recommend the studio to friends.
Wonderful space, super hospitable host and a very convenient location. Could not have asked for anything more.
Simple but nice apartment in the center of Athens. Communication and cleanliness are excellent.
Alexandros was a good host!

Perfect location in Psyri neighbourhood, restaurants on same street and Monastiraki square a few minutes walk away. Great communication and clean apartment. Comfortable bed too! They were generous in organising our taxi to the airport and back too. All in all, exactly what we needed.

Veronica's home is in a great location if you're looking to stay where the locals are, which is exactly what my girlfriend and I wanted. There are plenty of cheap and delicious coffee shops, bakeries and restaurants around, and if you want to visit the Acropolis the walk isn't bad at all, its very peaceful and scenic. The city bus has a stop about 8 minutes away which is perfect. Veronica is extremely polite and helpful. My girlfriend and i plan on staying with her again before our flight home in a few weeks and we recommend her 100%!

I‚Äôve been traveling for four months and have stayed in so many places I‚Äôve forgotten the number - this is by far the best. Absolutely amazing. My unit had its own balcony (spanned three rooms) full kitchen, nice bathroom, everything spotless, all the amenities and more (a bathrobe!!!!) and my lord the rooftop decks (two!) with views of the Acropolis - see it lit up at night! The entire family made me feel welcome and at home, total privacy and yet right there if I needed anything, and everything you need is outside the door - food, markets, shops, shopping, laundry, barber shops, cheese shops, wine, on and on (even PCR tests if you‚Äôre traveling on. I needed one for Turkey, right up the street) and for me I walked everywhere - the Acropolis, Mount Lycabettus, the Acropolis Museum, the National Park, the Archaeological Museum (a bit of a walk but fine) and so much more. Walk the cemetery, and don‚Äôt forget to feed the cats!

An amazing place in an amazing location with an amazing host, what more can you ask for!
The apartment is even more beautiful that advertised. Very spacious, beautifully decorated and you can't beat the jacuzzi with the view! Also within a 5 min walk to lots of bars/restaurants and the subway.
One of my favorite nocarz experiences and I will definitely be returning for any future trips to Athens.

A place is really nice to stay!
Lefteris was a great host. The apartment was clean, he quickly responded on questions, advised useful information about way from airport and where near by we are able to eat; and also he leaved some food for breakfast, what was very pleasant.
The main plus in the apartment is big terrace where it‚Äôs nice to spend resting time. It was very quiet outside, what is a good thing too.
The way to subway takes 10 min by walking, but it‚Äôs possible to go to touristic places by 40-50 min for those who enjoy walking as I do.
Great place , would stay again.

This apartment is simply amazing. The photos are exactly as it is when you get there. The views of the Acropolis really are that good! From the moment we booked until after we left Rosana was the perfect host, helping us with a taxi from the airport (perfect service), telling us about the sights and giving us amazing tips for food all over the city - each of which were great. The location enables the best of both worlds with only a short walk to all the major attractions but far enough away that you can have peace and quiet too. Would definitely recommend and stay again!
Amazing apartment and host! The jacuzzi and view were stunning!

This apartment is AMAZING.  Beautifully appointed and vey comfortable. Close to everything!
We had a wonderful time in Athens and were very grateful to be able to stay in Miranda's lovely flat as a base: it had everything we needed and more. And the location is perfect.

We were very glad to return to Miranda's flat after our trip to the islands. It was sparkling clean and Miranda was very accommodating concerning our arrival time and check-out. In case this wasn't mentioned elsewhere: We really appreciated the tasteful art on the walls, the range of books in the living room and the wonderful selection of children's toys and puzzles for our daughter to play with.

Super Wohnung !! Beste Lage in Athen !!
100% weiterempfehlung !
Im Herzen Athens !
Miranda war eine herausragende Gastgeberin !
10 von 10 Punkten !
Ich werde wieder kommen üôèü§ó

The apartment is situated in the very centre by the Acropolis hill, an area which is green and quiet on one hand, yet very lively, full of restaurants, cafes and artist stalls - all overlooking the Acropolis. The apartment is very quiet in a very quiet street, and is within walking distance to most attractions including areas like Monastiraki and Plaka. Other than the normal facilities the apartment benefits from an outdoor patio and a living-room full of quality books and toys (mainly in Greek).
Miranda was the perfect host- responsive, helpful, kind, friendly - everything I asked was immediately taken care of.
The apartment was spotlessly clean, very well equipped and stocked up, and I am sure that in the unlikely event that something is missing, Miranda will immediately supply it.
I highly recommend and on my next visit to Athens I will stay there again if it will be available.

Vasiliki's place was amazing! 2 of my friends and I stayed at the wonderful Athens nocarz for the night before our ferry left for Mykonos. It was positioned in the perfect place for only a couple of hours of touring around Athens. The evening views were spectacular and we even watched a movie from the outdoor cinema on the roof. The location was absolutely amazing. The beds were comfortable and the kitchen and bathroom were well kept!
Vasiliki helped me arrange a car from the airport and to the ferry at the early hours of the morning. My flight was delayed several hours and the car service was quickly adjusted by Vasiliki without any issue.
I would recommend anyone staying in Athens to stay at this nocarz. I will certainly look into Vasiliki's nocarz if I come back to Athens!

Charming hosts, very attentive to welcoming us, a real personal contact. The flat is perfectly located and squeaky clean. We regretted that the flat doesn't have any living room. It is just a place to sleep, with an entrance, 2 bedrooms, and a small bathroom and kitchen. The terrasse (with the amazing view) is outside the flat and in the winter not a place to hang out for long. Fortunately the weather was nice enough for December and we had a great stay.

This is a fantastic place to stay. The location couldn‚Äôt be better and the rooftop ‚Äúliving room‚Äù is the best part of the apartment. Not to mention the complimentary wine and homemade chocolate cake! One word to the wise... the tours showcased in the apartment are lovely but are only taxi rides... this is not made clear in their descriptions. They do not include the admission price of any of the things you are visiting or food of any kind. Other than that we very much enjoyed our stay here. I wish we had booked it for longer.

El apartamento est√° muy bien ubicado y Vasiliki, c√≥mo anfitriona, es inmejorable. Tuvimos la atenci√≥n necesaria y, adem√°s, nos dej√≥ hacer el check out a las 19:00, hora qu√© nos √≠bamos de Atenas. 5 estrellas!
Beautiful, good located place, with pretty amazing view from the rooftop. I would choose it again. This home is full of nice surprises! Worth of every ‚Ç¨ ;)

Best Athen‚Äôs experience that I could have hoped for. Vasiliki arranged a taxi driver to meet us at the airport (highly recommend) and she allowed us to check in early. We were greeted by George who showed us around the apartment. They were such hospitable hosts, even baked us a fresh loaf of chocolate bread and gave us a bottle of wine. The location can‚Äôt be beat! You are literally right along the pedestrian walkway that circles the Acropolis. The rooftop patio has one of the best views in the city. Everything that you want to see in Athens is walking distance. Would highly recommend staying here!
Stay here if you want an amazing location with beautiful views!!!! Very sweet people and place was perfect
Perfect location! We even got to see the movie at the theater next door through the balcony. And nothing compares to the roof terrace.

Antell's House has a great location, only 5 minutes walf from the metro station and two stops before Syntagma Plaka. Very quiet apt, you don't hear any car, in a residential and university area.
Great place to be away from the noise and only 2 stops from the center

Vasiliki's accommodation is ideally located if you want to visit Athens' most important archaeological sites on foot.
The house is well-maintained, and I greatly appreciated the sustainability efforts proposed by Vasiliki.
In the evening, the neighborhood becomes vibrant and delightful to experience, with excellent local and international food and wine offerings.
The terrace with a view of the Acropolis and the open-air cinema (which was showing "Despicable Me 4" during our stay) was the added bonus that made us love this stay.

Perfect place to explore Athens. Tucked away from the busy tourist spots and only a 15 minute walk to the main attractions. We didn‚Äôt rent a car and it wasn‚Äôt needed at all since everything was walking distance. The apartment is spotless and exactly like in the pictures. Fokas was great and helped us get a taxi early in the morning to the port when we left. Also, there‚Äôs a great gyro place less than a 10 minute walk away called Grill & Pita, highly recommend it.
central

I agree with most of the things Karina has mentioned but we would say the location is not as bad as it sounds in her review and we had no trouble at all. Walkable to Acropolis, Metro, Tram, Shops, Bakery, Taxi stand etc
Inachos was super prompt with communication and would advise you to use his recommended transfers from airport.

A great location, great place, great amenities for a family stay. Had a wonderful experience staying this place. The host arranged for cab for ride from/to airport,  a bug relief. Got some great ideas about local excercuions. I would recommend this place to anyone with family. Great value for the money.

Not on the prettiest Street in the world. Great central location but very very noisy as next to one of the busiest main roads in Athens. Apartment clean and tidy, most everything that you need. Comfy beds and good laundry facilities.

Pretty much everything has already been said about Miltos and his lovely apartment by other guests but here goes -
Great apartment, in a great location with great hospitality. Easily a 5* service and a credit to nocarz.
Highly recommended.

There is nothing one can fault with this apartment, it is perfect in every way... clean, stylish, with all the amenities and superbly located... it is next to all the hip restaurants and not too far from tourist attractions (we try and stay away from all the hustle bustle)... The tips and guidance they offer along with the support of their co-host makes the experience wonderful... we had no problems whatsoever and recommend Marietta & Nikitas's place for a stay in Athens,, especially for those traveling with family you can't go wrong if you stay here

This property is incredible. Miltos, the host, was very helpful in checking us in  as well as arranging transportation to the airport, which was effortless on our part. The place was beautiful, modern and quite luxurious. The views of the Acropolis were stunning and the location is exactly where anyone visiting Athens should be. The two-level apartment was perfect for my wife and young daughter, and the building was very secure and private while being in the middle of Plaka, just steps from the Acropolis. We will be seeking out this property again when we visit Athens.

Fabulous.  Would give more stars if possible.  Property was clean, quite, well stocked and perfect location. Rooms were spacious and most comfortable.  Lorena provided a lovely welcome basket and directions to all the local stores. There were several local stores for food and dining with in a few blocks - very convenient.  All the key attractions were a short walk. This is excellent property.

Beautiful apartment, by far the best nocarz in which I have stayed. Historic building in classy neighbourhood, tasteful furnishings, spacious, very high ceilings, all mod cons, very comfortable beds. Marietta available and helpful. Ample cupboard space, marble bathrooms and good kitchen. Third bedroom above kitchen. Highly recommended.
This little studio was smack dab in the middle of Athens! Literally everything was at most 30-40 minutes away by foot (and metro).
I stayed 2 months working remotely and it was a great stay ! I recommend Natasa's appartement.

It was a wonderful stay. Ana was so prompt to my questions. All instructions were clear and location was superb. Couldn‚Äôt get better than this. Apartment was so stylish and loved the colours. It was spacious and located in the heart of Athens. Created unforgettable memories.

A very spacious flat not too far from the city center and all the historical sites. It's about a 13 minute walk to the Victoria station and about 20-30 min total to the Acropolis station. Walking all the way there takes about 45 minutes.  AC is only in the bedroom but there is a very nice balcony that usually has a breeze in the morning and evening to cool down the rest of the apartment. There is a small elevator big enough for one person at a time to get up to the 5th floor. The bed was quite comfy and it's pretty quiet since you're so high up off the street. There is a washer but it's not a dryer, however there is a drying rack in the flat you can use and during the day it gets warm enough to dry things out pretty quickly. It's a very nice place if you are looking for a larger flat to stay in and don't mind a bit of commute time to get to the city center.
Top locatie midden in het centrum van Athene, mooi uitzicht op de akropolis vanaf het gedeelde dakterras. Schoon, ruim appartement. Anna & Efi reageren snel en vriendelijk!

Toni is very nice and patient. My friends and I had a great time there. It is very convenient to tour in the city center. I will recommend it to my other friends if they will go to Athens.

The apartment is really big and spacious, with a nice balcony. There is also a workplace in the livingroom if that¬¥s needed. It¬¥s clean and all basics are provided. Safe area. Vangelis must be the best host, went out of the way to welcome me and the communication has been very good throughout my stay. Will stay here again whenever I¬¥m back in Athens.

Spacious 1-bedroom flat, light and nicely designed with a large balcony, decorated to feel like home but not cluttered, we had awesome stay there. Equipped kitchen with all basics you may need for cooking, washer, hot water, internet - nothing to complain about. Dimitris showed us around and gave details about an area and transport links, he also has listings of nearby places he'd recommend, really appreciate it! The flat perfectly located in trendy but non-touristy neighborhood, just around two streets where locals tend to go out, and roughly equidistant, from 650 to 900 m, from three metro stations - Metaxourgeio on red line, Kerameikos (which in Gazi itself) on blue airport line and Thissio on Pireaus line close to Acropolis hill, Psyri and Monastiraki areas, so whichever you prefer - moving around on metro or walking, it's a gem. It faces the street, so some might consider it's a bit loud sometimes - but seems all central Athens are :) Although I've booked just some 12 hours before, check in went smoothly, and communication with Dimitris was flawless. Great host and great place!
Good location, very close to the main monuments. Apartment itself is very clean and nice.

Kann ich nur jedem empfehlen. Tolle Lage, sehr zentral, cooles Viertel mit Bars und Kneipen, alles zu Fu√ü zu erreichen.

Great apartment in a wonderful location. We had problems with the water heater which clearer instructions would have prevented.  A second chair to pull up to the bench would have been appreciated for when we had a meal.

Perfect occasion if you search for a stay in Athens. The apartment has everything you need if you want to visit Greece. There is room for 2 people in the bed and 2 more in the couch. A few minutes to go is a supermarket, a bakery, restaurants and cafes. If you walk 10 minutes you will reach the Akropolis. The hints Romina gave us were perfect. She has a portfolio where every information for several days is included. Also she was so nice to bring our post cards to the post office, because we had no time for it. We would stay there definitely again!

Appartement id√©alement situ√©, proche des sites touristiques et des moyens de transport. Tr√®s bonne communication avec Toni. Un seul b√©mol, pas de place pour installer une table √† manger m√™me si le n√©cessaire pour cuisiner est pr√©sent dans l'appartement.
