This home met our expectations - it was surprisingly spacious, matched the description, had good sound insulation and was very close to a lot of very nice restaurants and the Acropolis. It was clean and the bed was comfortable, and the amenities were great.
The only feedback I would give is: even though the curtain blinds block out all light from outside (even in the daytime), I would recommend wearing an eye mask as there are various small intermittently flashing lights in the room where power sockets are which made sleep a bit difficult without an eye mask. Also, the staircase up to the flat is not lit at all, so watch your step or bring a torch. But I maintain this is still worth it otherwise!
Nice place. Small but functional, modern and clean. Good communication with Toni, easy checkin and good location within walking distance of most sights and shopping areas in Athens.
Great place to stay and very well located, we have a nice time in Athenas.

Very good communication and Tony was really flexible while the self check in/out was a smooth process.

This house was very modern and clean.  It took us 10-15 min to walk to the Acropolis and food was close by.  Check in/ out was very easy.  A/C and showers worked great.  We would recommend to any family visiting Athens.

The apartment was perfect for our party of 3.  It was outside of the very touristy area but within easy walking distance to the Acropolis. Damianos responded promptly with all questions and concerns, and provided good advice.  Thank you for letting us stay at the apartment!

This room was amazing! I have never been in better nocarz (and I have been in many). This accommodation is best because it is very clean and hygienic. All the public transport, city attractions and cafe are nearby.  The host is very responsive on nocarz and will help you out.  The city tips from the host were very helpful. I encourage everybody to stay at her accommodation.

I did not know what a super host was on Arbnb but I do know. We found the best one.  Yorgos was amazing. Not only was the property as advertised he was a huge help to us in enjoying our time in Greece. He answered questions in a timely manner about restaurants and places to visit. His property is less than 75 yards from the subway, grocery store and a good number of restaurants. This was a huge blessing to us.  He came and said hi when we arrived and helped get us acquainted with our neighborhood.  You will not go wrong with this property, its location to other things and Yorgos as your super host. Wonderful stay at this flat. It's centrally located with everything you could ask for close by in an up and coming neighborhood. Great place, just below the Lycabettus hill and only 10-15mins walk to the city center. Great small streets nearby and cozy places to drink and eat! Elina is super friendly host, thanks for the great stay.

Perfectly located, very comfortable bed, view to the top of Lycabettus, not to mention being able to help myself to fruit,  good coffee and other delicacies. It felt like a home from home. Best wishes to you both and I hope to visit again!

My stay was perfect. Magi's place is even better than in pictures. The appartment is very cosy and very near the Megaron (and metro), where I assisted a conference. Everything is clean, bed is big and very confortable.Magi is also an amazing host, very comprehensive and very nice. I arrived by 3am and still she made it to give me the keys to the appartment.   It's the perfect stay!

5 Stars. This place was perfect for us (a couple) visiting Athens and Greece. The apartment is professionally hosted by a company named UPSTREET. They have close to 100 properties. So, though they try to provide personal service you may get a corporate response rather than a truly personal one. I know the difference since I have my own nocarz that I host in the U.S. I had a couple of concerns which were partially addressed. However, given that, I still give them/this place five stars. It's not the Marriott but it is within walking distance of so much. It's in a great location in Plaka with shops and restaurants very close by. The place was very clean and excellent, mostly well furnished. I learned for the first time (crazy me) that there are 2-in-1 clothes washers/dryers and they work. Internet service was great. Netflix worked well. The bed was comfortable. The place was safe. It was easy to access with this one caveat ‚Äî they indicate it's on the first floor. However, you actually have to climb stairs to what we would consider the 2nd floor to get to the apartment so if that's a problem for you perhaps choose another of their properties that's actually on a first floor. We took an overnighter (by plane) with our backpacks to Santorini. We returned the following evening from the airport via the underground/metro and walked to the apartment. Our trip inside Greece totaled six days and we're very happy we chose this particular nocarz on Thalou Street!
Una casa muy limpia con todo muy nuevo y ordenado. Tonia es super amable y atenta a todos los detalles. Sin duda la recomiendo.

We had a nice stay at the apartment. It was really good located close to the city, some restaurants and shops. The apartment was clean and loveable designed. We missed a gabage bin , a towel in the kitchen and some more stuff for cooking.
I would recomended the staying at this place. Thanks :)

Where should I start? We have rented the place for 5 weeks, and it was simply PERFECT. Really. I have been in hundreds of nocarz-s in Greece and different countries, but this was the best experience so far. The house is in a very nice area with several public transportation, but there are also supermarkets, pharmacies, and a lot of more useful shops around by just a few mins on foot. The flat is on the 5th floor so it's really silent, we were never bothered by any noise. The two terraces are really really great, our little cat has enjoyed the stay also, as she was able to look around. The apartment is really really modern, and it is comfortable! All the furniture are new, the doors and windows close fine, there are blinders also in the flat. The air conditioners also work really well, they heated up the room in just a few minutes. The TVs were a big experience, Maria and her husband were so nice they have bought another TV in the bedroom for our request. I was amazed. The bedding, the towels, and everything was sparkling clean and brand new, so as the iron, drier, hair drier... There were a lot lot more than even necessary which again, made the stay very comfortable. We had cleaning stuff, masks, gloves, snacks, coffee, really everything you can even think about. I am two left handed and made some tiny accidents, and when I let Maria know she was really really nice and helpful with the cases. She was so understanding, and so is her husband. They are the loveliest hosts I have ever met. Getting and leaving the keys was really fast and easy, even once we left the keys Maria's husband came in a couple of minutes to help us out. What can I say? 10000000% recommend the flat and the hosts‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you again, for you both‚ò∫Ô∏è Hope to see you again!

Tonia was extremely helpful and enthusiastic! We arrived close to midnight (during working days) and Tonia was there to meet us, regardless of waking up early, next morning. We thank you sooo much!! Studio looks GREAT! The balcony is met by a wall so not the best view. Also, the neighbour is a smoker so if you keep the balcony door open, smoke might bother you. Fully equiped kitchen, bathroom, washing machine, toaster and coffee maker. Stylish setup and a very good deal for your money! Metro is 10-15 minutes away (Ambelokipi Station) and it has a direct connection to the Airport. Syntagma square (and Syntagma Metro Station) is reachable by foot in 20-25 minutes or metro 10 minutes (from Ambelokipi Station). From Syntagma you can take trams to get you to the Beach (Glyfada and Alimos beaches). Overall a GREAT venue and a WONDERFUL host!! Thank you, once more, Tonia! :-)

This is a beautifully updated modern apartment in Athens so close to the train station. It was close to monastraiki and plaka as well as city center  (pardon my spelling if it is incorrect). George was an absolutely wonderful host! We arrived so late and George was so kind to do such a late check in for us. He gave special attention to detail and safety so we didn't have to worry about a thing. We arrived late at night and were concerned about getting water and food late at night, but once again George was prepared and The apartment was stocked with snacks and drinks. The apartment was meticulously cleaned, had necessary toiletries for the stay, had other items like blow dryer and straightening iron. There is also a beautiful balcony. The host was available to help us with anything we needed. They even arranged taxis for us to and fro from the apartment to the airport. The one heads up I would give you is the mattresses are a little on the firm side. Overall I would describe George and Panagiota as the most thoughtful, considerate and kind hosts.  I would definitely recommend this nocarz to anyone staying in Athens! If I ever have the opportunity to return, I would definitely stay here!

I travel to Athens every month for work, and this is the first time I use nocarz in Athens, Absolutely amazing. Clean and 100% to pictures, even better in real life. Pool area is amazing for your morning coffee and to soak in the view. Thank you for having me and will be using again.

We had a great stay in Aris' place. It is located very close to Victoria station. There are supermarkets and bakeries within walking distance. Aris' apartment is amazing and just as described. We especially liked that it is located very close to the metro station. Stylish apartment with thoughtful touches! Good location. Aris is great,   Very helpful communicative and very concerned about ensuring guests have a great time in Athens. Overall, would stay here again :)

Such a cute place with great views from the balcony! Great location surrounded with many places to eat, pharmacy‚Äôs, super markets, and the subway! I would recommend this place to anyone visiting the area!

This was a great find for us. As a family of 5 we were accommodated very well in this lovely spacious apartment. It was a 2 minute walk to the metro and there were some very reasonable cafes, restaurants and shops nearby. The air con was much appreciated and we enjoyed spending time outside on the balcony, relaxing on the deck chairs and also being able to have some meals outside. Aris was a very helpful host who provided us with a map and information about the locality. He also arranged a taxi for us to the airport. We would highly recommend this lovely apartment.

The apartment was literally 10 minutes away from the Acropolis, by walking. The host was super friendly and the apartment was fully equipped. We enjoyed it very much and we feel very fortunate to have had the chance to stay there!
Perfect location, lovely apartment, great communication, everything included. Would recommend!

Die Unterkunft ist perfekt um Athen zu erkunden!

Natasha is a sweet, wonderful host, and a very cool person. She stayed in contact with us prior to arriving and made sure someone was available to let us in. Natasha also took the time to video conference to make sure we knew where everything was and gave great recommendations for non-touristy places to visit and eat.
The place has everything you need. It is a great home base for seeing Greece. Very safe area. Lots of craft vendors nearby. Walking distance to many of the tourist attractions like the Parthenon and various museums. A bakery across the street and a market around the corner. Metro is a 3-minute walk. We got a month pass to travel further out to explore Athens and to the coast to catch a ferry to the islands, that Natasha suggested for us.
Natahsa is an Artist; her apartment decor definitely has that quality. The balcony is inhabited with nice greenery and a great place to kick back and enjoy the city sounds. We also enjoyed the eclectic CD collection.

Sophias Apartment war wirklich super sch√∂n und perfekt f√ºr 2 Personen. Vor allem die Lage war √ºberragend und man war innerhalb von noch nicht einmal 10 Minuten an der Akropolis.
Wir wurden auch direkt von der Metro abgeholt und zum Apartment gef√ºhrt (auch schon vor der eigentlichen Eincheckzeit). Auf dem Weg haben wir schon viele hilfreiche Tipps bekommen, wo man was findet und zum Beispiel sch√∂n essen gehen kann.
Allem in allem hatten wir einen wundersch√∂nen Urlaub und w√ºrden sehr gerne wiederkommen!

F√ºr den n√§chsten Morgen habe ich beauftragt das jemand kommt um ‚Äûsauber‚Äú zu machen.
Das war dann auch so halbherzig. Denke aber das es in Athen bzw Griechenland an sich es alle nicht so mit der Sauberkeit haben.
Immerhin war das Schlafzimmer ok. Das Bad war schlecht, klein und in der Dusche war die Decke total verschimmelt und dadurch muffiger Geruch in der ganze Wohnung!

Lovely place in a terrific neighbourhood! Sophia was very proactive and made the whole experience turn-key.

The apartment is about 12 to 15 mins walk from syntagma Square, with quite an amount of uphill walk. But it is still manageable if you are not with a lot of heavy luggages. There's a small carrefour express in less than 5 mins walk.
Though the furnitures are a bit old and we seem to have spotted some stains on the bedsheets, rooms are very spacious and fully equipped with all that you need, e.g. Bottled water, toiletries, kitchen, thick blankets.
I have to say im very thankful we found this place/host cos my friends fell sick during the trip and Adham was very responsive in helping me find where i can locate asian marts and food during the easter weekend (where a lot of shops are closed!!).
One thing to note is that the heater needs to be turned on 30mins in advance to get hot water for shower. During our first night we didnt manage to turn on the heater properly and had to shower with cold water (but Adham quickly resolved it the next morning).

The apartment is excellent. It is in a great location. It is in a more local area of Athens that has great restaurants and lots of options for food and drinks that are less expensive and better quality than the tourist areas. However, is it still only a short walk to tourist attractions and the metro. Eleftherios provided us with lots of great information and recommendations. We stayed at air bnbs in other parts of Athens and much preferred this one. The apartment was also quiet which we greatly appreciated after our other air bnb had club music and people yelling in the streets at night keeping us awake.
Sehr netter Gastgeber und perfekte Lage des Apartments
Thank you for being a great host! Lovely place to stay üòÄ

H√¥te tr√®s accueillant qui nous a attendu malgr√© le retard important de notre bateau.

Great pad in a very nice part of Athens. Tucked away in a quiet street just off a beautiful promenade.
Beautiful views from the rooftop and the perfect location for seeing the sites near city center. A bit tight for four unrelated adults, but perfect for a 1-2 day stay in Athens.
Best place to Stay in Athens!

Such a fantastic host who was kind enough to stay up until 2 am to welcome us. Not just that, he stayed back to share his recommendations and to explain the amenities in the house. His house is boom right in the centre of the city with all touristic spots nearby. We enjoyed the comfort of the house as well as the proximity of it to the attractions. His response was pretty quick and Mr Eleftherios was surely a perfect host. His place was so much equipped with almost everything one needs and was spotless. He was kind to provide us some cookies and stuff needed for hot beverages. We would surely be back for another stay and would recommend him for stays. The place is situated in a very safe residential spot and we had no trouble in getting back at late night. The parking opposite to the house is free of cost but it‚Äôs a trouble to locate a spot. Alternatively, there is a paid parking next doors to the residential apartment. Thanks

This place was perfect for us! The location was great, next to the metro, lots of food options and you can see the acropolis while strolling the streets. We only spent one full day there and wish it was longer! Eleftherios was very warm, welcoming and helpful with everything. He was there to welcome us and let us know what to see. There is so much in Athens and we recommend staying at least 3-5 nights! The streets at night are full of people, food and music. We loved it there and will return in the near future!

The apartment is well equipped, very clean and the location is perfect. Almost all the sites can be visited on foot or you can take the metro two blocks from there. The host gave us precious hints to visit and was very kind. I hope to come back very soon.
Amazing balcony views! Restaurants are a 10 minute walk away, not too bad. Good place to stay for a day or two when visiting Athens!

Aris is super chilled and nice to talk, helped to carry my heavy bags upstairs and informed me of all I needed to know about cool spots in Athens. I loved his collection of vinyls  too ‚ò∫Ô∏è I would definitely recommend his place, it is close to  Alexandras‚Äôs avenue  and a 20 min pleasant walk to the underground or called ‚ÄúMetro‚Äù The underground is super easy to navigate and it took only 4 stations to reach the Acropolis. Thanks, Ari! You‚Äôre very welcome in Vienna and so are your parents whenever you need/want.

Large, clean and modern apartment - all renovated.

Nice apartment with great views exactly as described and shown on the pictures. Wifi connection was good. Checkin as well as the communication was easy and straight forward, Matty was very helpful!

We greatly enjoyed spending time on the rooftop of this apartment near Larissa station. Larissa is an edgy area and lacks services on foot, but it's very well connected to the metro. The view is excellent and the best part about this apartment is its large and clean rooftop (with automatic shade awnings ...you need them!).
The interior is charming and kept cool by the new looking air conditioner. We appreciated having a washing machine. The bed is comfortable and there are TV subscription services like Netflix. The biggest thing to note is the ever-present wet cave mildew smell that might annoy guests. We suspect it's from the building plumbing, and therefore difficult to ameliorate, but if you're sensitive to smells, then take note. If you're okay with that (and it's fine if you open the windows), then you'll enjoy your time here - the price is excellent!

Great location, walkable to many tourist points.
Shops, restaurants, kiosks all around.
Clean apartment, easy to check in, great communication.

very responsive host, checking in was easy with the video instructions provided. the place is just as described, nothing more and nothing less and that's perfect. neighbourhood is just what it is and its not bad, it's just a city.
This is a top-notch apartment, great value for money. Chris has been incredibly helpful in providing tips and sharing his favorite restaurants with us. We had an amazing time, anytime again.
Perfect stay in Athens. Thank you for your Tipps and all your ideas.

Yanos was a lovely man to communicate with, always replied promptly. The place was perfect. It was so close to the center, with lively bars and nice restaurants around, yet inside the apartment it was dead quiet - great for if you've had a long day of sightseeing and need good sleep. The place was super clean and the bedroom was very comfortable. I also appreciated the strong shower pressure. Yanos put beers and a bottle of wine in the fridge for us which was a very nice surprise. All in all, I really recommend this place.

The place is very nice, well situated. Host friendly and accurate.
Would go again here.
Thanks Yanos

Clean apartment with very comfortable bed.  Walking distance to greats restaurants.  The apartment is underground with very little natural light so we found it difficult to adjust to the time change.  Best for the adventurous type, be aware that there were protests in the neighborhood due to current political events, with road blocks and bombs, that our hosts didn't warn us about. It was fine for us, but definitely would he best for someone young at heart.  I can't imagine my parents staying here.

Lovely, clean, centrally located flat. Yanos‚Äô mother met us outside as we walked from Syntagma square metro stop to his street and let us in.  Flat was clean and comfortable. Location was amazing. Very close to Acropolis and tourist area. Highly recommend the following nearby restaurants: Avocado (vegetarian, dickie dee‚Äôs (ice cream). If you love vegan food, Mama Tierra is a must.  Bed was firm and made with only sheets. But there were blankets in the cupboard. Requested additional pillows (because I sleep much better with 2) which were provided the next day.  Thanks for the hospitality!
Thanks for having us! Place is in a great location. I recommend to everyone who likes convince of being in a walking distance from everything.
Really good host and help us a lotÔΩûAthen become more beautiful because of the good apartment and nice host^_^

A cosy little basement apartment around 15 minutes from the centre of Athens (Acropolis, Agora, Syntagma Square etc). My brother and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Despite the areas of Omonia and Exarcheia in which the property is situated being listed as "places to avoid in Athens" on Google, we actually both felt relatively safe. We would both probably advise just walking home with someone at night and sticking to well-lit streets. In the day we felt very comfortable in Athens. The apartment is a lot smaller than the photos make it out to be, and also far less modern. However we still found it charming, cosy and the perfect base for our 4 day exploration of the wonderful city. Communication from the host was 5 stars and the check-in was seamless. Thank you for the great stay!

Un appartement spacieux, bien situ√© et charmant (avec une belle biblioth√®que et de jolies fresques).
Je le recommande √† ceux qui veulent profiter de la vie nocturne (bars et restau √† deux pas) en visitant les sites historiques.

Very warm and welcoming host, who also helped us to arrange airport pick up from the Athens international airport and recommended lots of nice restaurants and places to visit during our stay.
Great house with all all seperated air-conditioning, and only minutes of walk to very nice restaurants.
The only small comments I will need to mention is that the towel and bedding might need extra clean as some of my friends had redness, itching, and some small bumps on their legs and shoulders after using them.
All my friends have really enjoyed the hosting and hope to stay here again in the future if we revisit Athens :)

Place was very clean and nice, host was super communicative and gave recommendations for the area which was nice. The only thing is that the street noise is quite loud at night making it a little hard to sleep, not the hosts fault just something to note!

Dimitris's place was a fantastic stay. he came and picked us up from the ferry late at night, told us the spots to go see in athens, and even provided a guidebook. His place is great. Very clean and loaded with amenities. Wifi was solid and the location of the apt was pretty close (10 minutes) to the main spots of athens and the metro if needed. Good food nearby too
Great host with many good tips to get around in Athens. The apartment is beautiful and charming and ideally located to explore the city by foot.
Very good location. Comfortable apartment with everything necessary. Very responsive host. I would highly recommend it to anyone

Amazingly comfortable apartment with a lot of nice forniture and design stuff.
close to the metro but in a really comfortable area and silent place.
Mirto is so generous and helpful! The place is very clean and such a good location :) would 10/10 recommend staying here
We loved Olga‚Äôs place. The location is great. The appartement is very very clean. Olga‚Äôs really nice. A great experience. We strongly recommend.

The apartment is very nice, with everything I needed. The position is strategic in order to reach monuments, metro, shops and restaurants.
But most of all, Mary is an amazing host. She helped me in everything, with kindness and in a professional way.
I recommend her flat!

Maria is the best host imaginable. She was reliable and extremely thoughtful during our stay and we had a wonderful time. The apartment is perfect and we were very comfortable. This is the place to stay in Athens.
Amazing place, amazing host, amazing location.  Was perfect.
We had a wonderful time at Olga‚Äôs place! the views were beautiful and the AC kept us cool during the heatwave. Highly recommend.

L'appartamento √® veramente buovno Ottima posizione per raggiugere a piedi il Museo Archeologico. Con una passeggiata di 20 minuti si arriva all'Acropoli. La casa √® pulita e due persone ci vivono comodamente. Il terrazzino √® delizioso. Per i ristoranti consiglio: Ama Lachei (a 5 minuti dall'appartamento) e per i pita gyros i SourviakiOkavvouras (a 3 minuti) Lo raccomando.
The apartment is really good. Great location for walking to the Archaeological Museum. A 20 minute walk takes you to the Acropolis. The house is clean and two people can live there comfortably. The small terrace is delightful. I recommend it
Great location, lovely balcony for catching brunch when the sun comes round 11
We had a great holidays in Athens. The apartment in the downtown area and nearby the metro station. It‚Äôs really convinient and clean. Super recommended the apartment to everyone.

Everything went well during our stay at home, Mary was kind and helpful host. The house was very clean and Mary was always helpful when we needed something. Also, Exarcheia neighborhood is already a place we always prefer to stay, and it's definitely in a very central spot. Only, maybe it would be better if the sofa in the living room was replaced with a slightly more comfortable one. Apart from that, an apartment and area where you can stay safely. I would recommend it, thanks!
Great place to stay and great communication!
Nice and spacious apartment. Host was very nice, responsive and helpful. Location is not very central but it is just next to the metro.
Had a great and quiet stay in an apartent that what was advertized and what I was looking for. Panagiotis was friendly, receptive and proactive.

This space is an ideal location for exploring the Acropolis area and well beyond. It is just minutes from the metro and Acropolis Museum. Great restaurants are also close by. We took a day trip to Meteora by train and a ferry to Hydra. Both were easily accessed by metro from this location.
The apartment is incredibly spacious and very clean.
Apostolos & Irene are excellent hosts. They always ask how they can help and respond quickly to all messages. We would stay here again if and when we return to Athens.
Very central, Nasos and George very helpful, the apartment was everything that was promised.   Highly recomended

Staying in this studio was much better than our expectation. The location is simply just too perfect with only 2 mins walking distance to nearby metro station. You can also find a lot of great restaurant nearby.
Nasos and George were being helpful. Thanks to their hospitality, our stay in Athens was a pleasant one!
The only cons is it needs 40 mins to heat up the shower and it last only 20 mins before the shower get very cold. However It didn't cause us much issue and i think this is common issue in all apartment in Athens.
I would strongly recommend everyone to stay in this studio if you are travelling to Athens. You will find no regret!

From check in to check out I had a perfect stay at Kosta and Eva‚Äôs place which is located in Psyri, one of the best neighborhoods in Athens for atmosphere, social life/night life, location/easy transportation, etc. This listing offers all of the above and more! Kostas and Eva are excellent, friendly hosts who are always responsive when you need them. Overall, I can only say good things about my experience and the value for the price was AMAZING! I highly recommend Kosta and Eva‚Äôs listings in Athens.
Muy bien.

We totally loved Lillian's apartment and highly recommend it!! It is very beautiful, comfortable and clean. It is also very well equipped (including for a toddler), calm and at walking distance (approx. 15-20 min) from all historic sites.
Eleni was very helpful and responsive with the pre-arrival arrangements, Anastasia welcomed us warmly upon our arrival, and Panos responded competently by phone when we had an emergency (see below). We are very thankful to all of them! We also very much recommend taking the reliable and friendly taxi driver which they work with.
Once piece of advice: Make sure to ask for written instructions for how to handle the keys upon your departure and that you understand them well! We got locked out of the apartment, without being able to get out of the building's main door.
Great place! Very clean and beautiful! Well furnished! 5 out of 5 stars!
Really great place to stay! In walking distance to many historical locations.

A wonderful host, Very nice place, great location. Skill  Bill  has taken care of every bit of our need. Overall  very satisfying.
Great place in a great location to explore Athens from!
We had a great stay, was very easy to check-in and out and the place was very clean!

We stayed three nights at Bill & John's place.
The apartment is very well located, just steps away from the Acropolis, Plaka, Monstiriki and all the place you would like to visit in Athens.
The apartment is brand new, the deco is top, living spaces and bathroom and bedroom are just as nice as you can view them on the nocarz pic.
Definitely an awesome place where to rest after long days strolling around antiques stones !
Thank you so much to our super hosts, they are very kind, gave us good addresses for taverns and bars, and also arranged our trip back to the airport

Excellent stay in Athens! nocarz was so spacious and roomy for two. Looked exactly like the pictures. AC worked well in the bedroom. We really enjoyed the living room area. There was also ice cube trays in the fridge, perfect for loading up our water bottles before hitting the town. Extremely responsive host when we had an issue with the washing machine. They sent someone over to check it out within 10 mins. We wish we stayed here longer! 4 min walk to metro stop.
Great location and incredible views!!!

Amazing location, and the view from the apartment is stunning.
The host is so quick to communicate and so polite, making it a really enjoyable stay.
Without hesitation I‚Äôd stay there again.

I‚Äôve stayed in a few nocarz‚Äôs in Athens over the years and I have to say this is one of the best.
Being a veteran real estate agent in NY I pay close attention to details and that is exactly what you get with this apartment. From the marble built out living room resembling the marbles of the Parthenon, to the eccentric minimal design of the shower, this was the perfect place to stay.
My favorite moment was being able to watch a movie on the projector while enjoying the view of the Acropolis.
Chari provided amazing customer service and was very quick to respond to any issues. Definitely recommend this apartment and host!
This was such a beautiful apartment and very well done and well designed. The view was stunning. It was very clean and charis was a fantastic communicator.

Charis‚Äô home is beautiful, architecturally built, super aesthetic and had a great location. We really enjoyed the huge projector at night and stunning acropolis view in the morning. The wifi was sometimes quite slow but overall was fine for us. Charis was quick to help with all of our questions and requests. Super responsive host.

We loved our stay "KIRON" Sanctuary. The location is perfect for exploring Athens and Charis and his team are extremely responsive and helpful. Prime location, unique architecture, modern amenities, and an incredible view of the Acropolis make this spot a must stay during your time in Athens.

The appartament is so amazing that you want to stay in all day enjoying the views from the balconies and listening to jazz. You can see the Parten√≥n from the bed!!!. The host is the best ever, always there for you for everything. Thanks a lot Ioannis!!

The place is great. I felt very comfortable to come back to her place everyday, it felt like home. Air conditioning is great. The apartment is very silent. They left things to make breakfast which was amazing. Shower and toilet are perfect. The neighborhood does have a lot to offer so I had to walk a few minutes for food and other things but other than that it was great stay. Would definitely come back !

A lovely rooftop in a lively neighborhood! Ioannis‚Äô place is perfect, both the terrace and the apartment is huge, nicely decorated, clean and comfortable ‚Äì it feels like a real home. We also really appreciated Ioannis‚Äô hospitality, and would absolutely choose to stay here again.

This place was the perfect studio to stay in during our time in Athens. The studio was clean and had all the amenities necessary to make our stay comfortable. It is in a neighborhood just outside the main tourist attractions and it is quite easy to walk to any place you wish to visit. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a place to stay in Athens!
Studio tr√®s propre et bien localis√©. On se balade facilement depuis le studio. Tr√®s proche de la station de m√©tro d‚Äôacropole‚Ä¶ Lyvia a √©t√© tr√®s attentive et accueillante.

Top facilities and top location, only 10 mins walking distance to the Acropolis and the Panathenaic stadium.
It gets really noisy at night due to all the traffic, specially bikes.

We really enjoyed our stay at the apartment of Mandy and Leo, the communication with them was easy, quick and welcoming. The place felt like a home away from home, at a very convenient location in Athens and with a nice balcony with sunshine in the morning.
Very nice place convenient location, Mary was very polite and helpful

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Mandy‚Äôs place. The apartment was spacious, clean, and well-located in the Plaka neighborhood. But the best thing about this listing is Mandy herself. She is easily the most responsive nocarz host I have ever encountered. She provided several recommendations for good local restaurants, all of which were fantastic! You cannot go wrong with this listing.

We found real joy, peace and happiness at this stay. Mandy and Leo were super welcoming and caring hosts, they truly made us feel at home. Mandy was generous in suggesting a number of places and activities, all of which were right on the mark and added to our experience of the city.
The apartment is beautiful, better than the photographs, with high ceilings and bright daylight in every space, furnished tastefully and lovingly. The balcony is perfect for breakfast, as the street is quiet, despite the perfect location in lively Plaka, close to all the main sights, cafes and restaurants. We walked everywhere and never needed to take transport.
We enjoy cooking and found the kitchen very comfortable with good appliances and all the basics plus much more.
If the Gods bless us with another visit to Athens we will surely look to stay again here. Many many thanks Mandy and Leo!
Flor and Juan
It was a great stay in a really cool area of Athens! Mary was super nice and responsive. Can recommend staying here if you like the vibe of the area!

Absolutely fantastic apartment with great view, very clean and spacious. The apartment was equipped with everything we need including bottled water and refreshments.
Excellent service from Thomas who welcomed us late at nice. Much better than expected. Will book it again next time in Athen.

Very beautiful, clean home in quiet, centrally located neighborhood. Thomas was very responsive and met us when we checked in. He gave great recommendations for sights to see and things to do nearby. He was also very accommodating about early check in/ late check out. Rooftop terrace is stunning!
Spacious, clean and modern apartment with every amenity you would need. Would recommend this place highly
Perfect location, quiet, safe, apartment space is large, clean, comfortable, convenient to go anywhere in Athens, convenient check-in, good choice, will come again.

C‚Äôest un tr√®s bel appartement, tr√®s design et tr√®s bien √©quip√©. L‚Äôaccueil est tr√®s agr√©able. L‚Äôappartement est tr√®s bien situ√©, pr√®s des plus beaux sites d‚ÄôAth√®nes facilement accessibles √† pied et, malgr√© tout, dans un endroit calme.
Excellent location - can hardly be better. Good flat. Owners are always ready to help. Recommended.

Initially, when you pull up to the condo, the outside look may throw you off.  However, if youve had the opportunity to venture around Athens prior to checking in, you will find graffiti on just about any and everything.  Please dont let this fool you.  The condo is beautiful.  Its modern, updated clean, and a break away from the hustle and bustle of the City of Athens.  Theres even a couple of small little restaurants/pubs next door, which we didnt initially notice.  However, the windows must be sound proof because we didnt hear anything.  Long story short, if we  were to travel to Athens again, we would definitely stay here again and we highly recommend to everyone.  Thanks Toni!
Recomend 100%
Great value for money. Extremely clean and stylish place. Toni was a great host.
Excellent location 10 minutes walk to Acropolis and Monastiraki. Lots of restaurants and tavernas near by. Very comfortable beds.
A great stay! Clean, quiet, comfortable, in a great location.

Toni's place was great for the four of us. Each couple had their own full bedroom and bathroom, making it very easy to have our own space while still spending time together in the common spaces. Checking in and out was very easy and Toni was responsive with any questions we had during our stay. The location was fantastic, right next to a metro stop and very walkable to the Acropolis, Plaka neighborhood, and other places in the center of the city.

C‚Äô√©tait un tr√®s tr√®s beau s√©jour. Merci √† Tony pour sa confiance. Juste un petit commentaire √† faire sur la machine √† laver. Nous n‚Äôavons pas pu en faire. Il n‚Äôy avait pas de produit √† disposition.
Amazing location, 12 min walk from city centre. The host was amazing, helped us with everything we needed. Highly recommend!

Spiros was super helpful, gave us full support during our stay. Even bought a new hairdryer as it was not there in the apartment. Apartment is located just few Kilometers away from Acropolis. Restaurants and Super shops are nearby. We enjoyed our stay thoroughly.

The location is super great. I really like this apartment. There are a lot of different cafes, restaurants, food store around. You can easily walk to the main sightseeings. If you don‚Äôt like walk there are a few bus stops near the building and the closest metro station is around 8 min walks. The view from the balcony is really cool. I was working during my stay and I really liked working with a view :)
Yes, as it was mentioned at others reviews it is a little bit nosy because of the busy road. But personally it didn‚Äôt bother me at all. I think I noticed it only at the first moment but then I got used to it and didn‚Äôt pay attention to it at all.
The instructions on self check-in was super easy and understandable. So, I don‚Äôt have any problems with it or check-out.
Spiros is very nice host and ready to help even though I didn‚Äôt have a lot of questions during my stay.

Marianne is a great host.  Unit was as advertised with a great roof view of the city and ruins.  Good location and great value.

Pros- location, good water pressure, good air con, good wifi, corner computer desk by window, good value for money
Cons- its an old apartment with cosmetic imperfections, little maintenance items needed to be fixed.
Overall a great value for the money, especially if you just need a place to spend the night and you are gone most of the day. I would stay again
Todo muy bien

1. The place doesn't look like the pictures. The two rooms are interconnected, and one of the rooms doesn't have privacy. The first room has an open wall, and has a common wall/big sliding wooden door with the main bedroom. The Air-conditioning is provided only in one room, so if we close the common slide door in between the two then the bedroom is quite hot.
The kitchen and the bathroom floors are very very old. The kitchen and the bathroom don't have proper ventilation possibilities and the bathroom smells.
2. The amenities provided are also not that great, the pots and pans especially. There was no bodywash or shampoo either and only two toilet paper rolls when we moved in. The kitchen has a gas stove and not hotplates as shown in the pictures, and we found it difficult to operate. We also coudnt figure out how to operate the electric kettle.
3. Apostolos is an extremely friendly and kind host though. When we told him about the missing bodywash and shampoo he sent them immediately the next day and also provided four complimentary beers.
In total it wasnt the best nocarz experience we had in Greece. But the host is super nice, kind , friendly and extremely quick to respond to any queries.
Had a great stay at Lilly‚Äôs place. Only stayed for one night but wish we could have stayed longer.

Pros: great location, clean, great water pressure, nice view.
Cons: water pump under the sink is extremely loud when it‚Äôs pumping water. Air conditioning in the larger bedroom doesn‚Äôt cool as well as the other two units in the condo. Lobby/elevator have a very unpleasant smell.(no fault of the host)
C√≥modo y c√©ntrico
Amazing place located in the top center of the city. Strongly recommended for anyone who wants to visit Athens and to enjoy every moment there.

Not sure where to start here...
The apartment is everything you want for an urban vacation, and then some!
Location is PERFECT! It is in the city center, surrounded by many restaurants, bars, shops, pedestrians streets and more. The specific street is in the heart of the young lively nightlife and it is so cool. (surprisingly, the noise was not an issue once you close the window, and the AC works well so no problem there). It is also only few steps from the metro station (blue and green lines) so you can actually get to anywhere very easy.
The apartment itself is so nice. It is actually nicer than the pictures! Everything is new, super clean, all amenities working perfect. Kitchen is fully equipped, with both Nesspreso machine and coffee maker, full size refrigerator, all the dishes you need for cooking and dining and a lot more.
Hot water in no time, bed is comfortable, cable TV with English speaking channels, and on and on.... this is really a lovely place to stay in.
The hosts are great, very responsive, super nice, helped us with whatever we needed, gave all the info so we could easily get there, not to mention all the food, drinks and treats left for our use, set us up for breakfast and snacks throughout the vacation.
Bottom line - this apartment is highly recommended! Everything on their listing is true and accurate (we tried to make a pros and cons list but couldn't think of any cons...) a real jem in the heart of Athens!

Evi's place was amazing! Perfect location in downtown Athens next to a metro stop and in a  neighborhood with great food everywhere.

Lyssandros and Ioanna were incredibly welcoming hosts and provided lots of great advice for our stay. The apartment is of a very high standard and in a great location where you are able to reach all the main attractions by foot. I would highly recommend this apartment to all my family and friends.

Great location, great house owners. Really sweat penthouse and well furnished.
We had great time there. Lyssandros and Ioanna are very helpful and easy to communicate. Next time I won't look any other place to stay.
The apartment comes with basic cleaning items (toilet paper, shower gel, shampoo, etc), and coffee and biscuits for the morning
Thank you for everything
Everything was as expected. Great place in the center close to everywhere. The apartment has everything what you need. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who is travelling to Athens.
Perfect location our our stay in Athens! Clean, comfortable and had all the amenities that we needed. Would definitely recommend.
Great location and layout of Spence. 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. One of them being very small and uncomfortable. Just make sure you have towels.
very well located  ,we had a raining storm in Athens and they help us to change the place in order to get our plane etc ..
Great location, comfortable apartment and lovely host. Highly recommend for those how want to enjoy Athens from outside of the center.

I stayed at Veroniki's place last minute as I was traveling through Athens for a few days. It's a quick walk to the main attractions and as a solo traveler I felt safe at this apartment. It was also very close to the metro, which was great! The apartment itself is super clean and adorable. It's very comfortable and quiet. I would come stay here again.
Great location; Ideal for wandering through Plaka (go left for more 'local' feel) and for accessing the Acropolis.
Nice cosy place, close to all the big sights. If you don't mind walking you can reach everything by foot. Very nice host, lots of information about what to do and see.

Stayed with 2 friends for 4 nights. Clean, nice, well decorated apartment with close distance to the metro as well as walking distance to the city center. Can absolutely recommend Chris's apartment for other visitors!

Our group of 7 adults had an amazing stay!!  There is not a better rooftop view of the Acropolis to be had in my opinion and the Thiseio neighborhood has everything you are looking for at your doorstep.  5 star luxury, gracious hosts, and a thoughtful touch of  welcome wine and charcuterie boards.  Do not hesitate to book this property if available!!

We rented all 3 units. They each have their own entrance but share a courtyard together which is gated and is very safe.
One of the double bedrooms had a ‚Äúbedroom‚Äù without walls and a bedroom with walls. This works for adults and children but not for multiple adults. The 2nd double bedroom has two bedrooms divided and two bathrooms. The 3rd unit has 1 bedroom. We enjoyed our time and the area around is perfect, peaceful and close to the action when needed.

We enjoyed our stay at Sevi's place. The apartment is spacious and well equipped. The photos show exactly how the apartment looks like in real life. The alternative district Exarchia is great, very safe and central located. There are many shops, caf√©s and restaurants nearby. We can highly recommend Sevi's place!

Die Wohnung ist genau wie beschrieben. Klein und fein, fast vollst√§ndig eingerichtet, sauber und eimfach gem√ºtlich. Ein Zuhause in der Ferne.
Sevi und Tasos waren sehr zuvorkommend. Von frischem Obst, zu Wrin, Bonbons und den Kaffee inkl. Transport zum Flughafen k√ºmmerten sie sich super um uns. Sevi antwortete prompt bei Fragen. Das Viertel ist sehr bunt und zu Fuss sind Altstadt und Sehensw√ºrdigkeiten gut zu erreichen. Zu den √∂ffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln ist es auch nicht weit.
Great host!

Lovely nocarz with everything you need in the heart of an eccentric and fun neighbourhood. Very well connected to public transport and great restaurants and bars nearby. Sevi and Tasos were very friendly and helpful hosts throughout the stay!

The place was exactly as pictured and with everything being newly renovated. The place was clean as expected and location was fairly close to tourist destinations. This is an apartment building with other apartments within and locals appear to live there.
Some negative feedback: We did not get to meet Toni, however his associates were helpful for the most part (Toni was responsive through email). The instructions given on how to lock the door was not accurate as we were told it locks on its own when closed. However upon some trial and error we realized it was not true and it needed to be locked. It would have been appreciated if we were told from the start as it would help us feel more comfortable.
Additionally, there is some noise late night (12 to 2am) noise of people talking and opening the door to the building loudly.
Overall, I enjoyed my stay as it was very conveniently located.

This is a perfect location, close to loads of great bars & restaurants, easy to walk to all the major sites and on a safe & quiet street. The flat is recently decorated and very clean and host is brilliantly helpful and welcoming. Handover of keys was really straightforward & we were shown round the flat so we knew how AC/heating & hot water etc worked. Provided everything you need for your stay, shampoos etc towels, pots and pans, washing up. Really excellent value for everything included. Thanks again!!

Toni's place is in a perfect location.  Easy waking to great cafes and restaurants,  the Parthenon and other ancient sites. The apartment was well appointed and provided a comfortable base for our stay in Athens.

We loved the house of Dimitri! It is very cozy, light and comfortable. The area is quiet and nice. To the main attractions in 15-20 minutes on foot. Close to tram, trolleybus and metro. At our disposal was a very beautiful patio, with table in the shade of a lemon tree (in March it was covered with lemons!). Also in the house everything is provided for convenience of guests. Dimitri hospitable host, very friendly, gives all the detailed instructions - how to get, where to go, where the nearest shops and taverns. Thank you, Dimitri, be sure to come back by yourself (Athens is an amazing city!) and we will recommend your house to friends!
We had a great time.  This place is very cosy And comfortable.   10 minutes walk from acropolis. It is really nice to rest under lemon tree after whole day.

We only stayed for two nights. But the apartment was very clean and everything we needed was there. The area is super nice with lots of cafes and very close to the centrum of the city.
There are a lot of stairs in the area that‚Äôs one thing you should keep in mind, but there is always a way around the stairs.
We really enjoyed our stay and would recommend it!

Perfect little place! My friend checked in before me and due to a miscommunication accidentally locked me out. My flight was delayed so I ended up having to wake up Dmitris mother at 1 am to help let me in! She and Dmitri were very gracious and helpful. Really nice space to relax after a long day in Athens.
Excelente anfitri√≥n y lugar para disfrutar Atenas!

Perfect location - the area is beautiful and calm, with everything one might need close enough - supermarkets, metro station, restaurants and cafes. The apartment is bright and full of light, cozy and clean. There is everything you need in the apartment, kitchen is fully equipped.
Eleni and Mike (Eleni's son) are great hosts who made us feel truly welcome.
We had a great time in Athens and highly recommend this apartment.

If you are readying reviews wondering if you should book. Book it if it‚Äôs available. The place has a fantastic location.  Free on street parking if you need it.  The place was very clean and the bed was comfortable.  The shower was hot and powerful.  As in a lot of places in Greece you can hear other rooms or outside noice so if you‚Äôre a light sleeper bring some ear plugs.  If you book Toni‚Äôs place you will not be disappointed.

The pictures do not do justice! The Parthenon is actually much closer than it appears in the pictures. We chose to stay in and watch the sun setting over the Parthenon from the patio instead of going out to other locales that offer similar view, because it was just so wonderful. The host is absolutely amazing, upon arrival, she provided a map and highlighted all the spots to visit and see. The snacks, water, and bottle of wine in the fridge were a wonderful touch. The apartment is clean and modern (you can see the Parthenon as you take a shower!). Do not let the front entrance downstairs deter you, it‚Äôs actually perfectly located in Platka, which is the best (and very safe) neighborhood in Athens. Everything is walking distance and there is an amazing souvlaki place just around the corner, which was actually recommended by the host. The host is also available at all hours of the day/night. We had a small issue with the lock downstairs (which I believe has been fixed since) and called the host at 2am. She not only picked up the phone but was ready to come help. She was also available at 5am when our car service to the airport was late (once again, generously arranged by the host and not her fault that it was late). We were visiting Santorini after our stay here and the host even provided recommendations of places to visit there. Overall, I would not hesitate to stay here again and have already recommend it to friends who want to visit Athens.
Great place, great location, and great host! Highly recommended...
Good location and nice place.
The place had not been cleaned after the previous guests

Eleni‚Äôs place was very nice very clean very close to historic places to visit, restaurants and souvenirs shops.
However, the padlock had a different code than the previous one given so we had hard time trying to open it. Also communication was very slow, hosts must of the time provide contact number and this was not the case. I had to contact nocarz to be able to had the new code to open the padlock and get the key.
(It was nice let us in before check in hour, so we left to have lunch.)
However, when we came back apartment, the key didn‚Äôt work and we were outside waiting for a solution from the host around 40 minutes we explained the difficulties, the lock was stocked the key didn‚Äôt turn. The maintenance guy said for our security was installed that type of lock, (why? It‚Äôs suppose to be a secure place).
Finally someone arrived and at the end the key given was damaged and the cleaning lady had the good one.
Besides, this stressful inconvenience everything was good.
Good location,clean place, nice and neat

Appartement bien situ√©, tr√®s bien √©quip√©, propret√© irr√©prochable. Konstantinos est un gar√ßon charmant, serviable, pr√©venant, avec un sens aigu de l'accueil soign√© et de la communication. Amazing location with great views. Wonderful/helpful host. Comfortable bed. Good water pressure in shower. Elevator to floor.

We really enjoyed our stay here and would definitely recommend it! The location is great and close to everything. We walked everywhere and almost everything we wanted to see was no more than a 15 min walk. This apartment is only an 8 minute walk from Syntagma Station so that is nice.
The apartment was very comfortable and had a great view of the Acropolis. The hosts were quick with communication and they gave us good tips on restaurants and other things in the area.

Amazing location with an absolutely breathtaking view. Apartment is very centrally located. Annie and Vasiliki did a great job of arranging transportation to/from the airport. I would definitely recommend!

We had a terrific stay here. Vasiliki is a wonderful host who really goes out of her way to be helpful with recommendations. We were able to drop off our luggage a bit early in order to join a tour, and she also arranged for an airport transfer to take us at 4:30(!) in the morning.
The studio is spotlessly clean and as described. There is an elevator to the unit, and a nice kitchenette and she provided some water and snacks. We really liked the location - it was very close and walkable to everything, but not in the main tourist fray. There are restaurants and caf√©s everywhere, starting right downstairs. I felt very safe at all hours as a mom with a child. It was very quiet in the room at night, and there are blackout curtains if you need them.
The view was fantastic. I never thought I would lie in bed looking at the moon over the Acropolis!
Thank you for your hospitality, Vasiliki!
Great location, clean and beautiful apartment!

The apartment was perfect for the two of us and within walking distance from everything. The view is just amazing! The reality is better than the pictures! The room was very clean, the fridge was stocked with water, juice and wine which is a very nice attention! Communication was perfect and very fast. There is no negative comment to be said. Do not hesitate to rent this apartment. Thank you again for the stay! Just amazing!!

Great stay overall. We only stayed one night, but they provide recommendations for Athens as well as other spots during your vacation. Nice place with view of Acropolis and within walking distance for us.

Had an amazing stay! Vasiliki was hands down the best host I have ever had on nocarz! She takes her guests experience as the biggest priority in her day - and you can truly feel it.
The apartment is perfectly situated in the city. You step out the door to the heart of the city.
Waking up and going to sleep with an epic view of the Acropolis‚Ä¶ the best! The balcony is huge. Perfect for sunset!
Super easy check in and check out process. Vasiliki is available all day for questions so you don‚Äôt have to second guess anything :) I felt bad because I messaged her so much! But I was jet lagged and needed some hand holding haha.
You will not regret staying here! Clean, easy, and feels like home.
Thank you, Vasiliki! And your brother too for his help! I will see you again soon.

George is a fantastic nocarz host who ensured my first trip to Europe started out smoothly. My long-term stay here was great. The location is perfect, close to the center but not fully in it, and near a lot of great restaurants. The apartment was spacious and clean and well-appointed. I didn‚Äôt cook much but the kitchen was well-equipped and the washing machine worked well. Overall, a great stay.
Nice and spacious appartment in the heart of Exarchia. Andreas and Maria are very helpfull hosts and very flexible. We had a lovely stay in Athens.

This place is a hidden gem. Centrally located and walking distance from all major attractions. Ira was amazing. The bus and Metro are so close as well. The apartment is wonderful and well designed clean and has all the facilities . The bed and pillows are so comfy and soft too! We really enjoyed the stay!!!

El peque√±o apartamento de Ira tiene casi todo lo que necesitas para una estancia c√≥moda en Atenas. Est√° muy bien situado respecto al Acr√≥polis y su museo, tambi√©n tiene cerca el metro, supermercados, restaurantes, tiendas... Ira nos dej√≥ tambi√©n mucha informaci√≥n y gu√≠as √∫tiles para la visita a la ciudad. Ira¬¥s little apartment has almost anything you require for a comfortable stay in Athens. It¬¥s very well placed near the Acropolis and its museum, also has near the metro station, supermarkets, restaurants, shops... Ira left us also a lot of info and useful guides for visiting the city. Ira and her father help us A LOT when we needed during our stay, so I only can thank her for her kindness and good treatment to us.
Clean, easy, and Haroeh was very communicative with exactly how to get to the apartment and what was in the area.

We had such a lovely stay. The hosts were very attentive and made sure we had a welcome greeting upon arrival. The room was exactly as described and was very clean. The bed was super comfy and provided a wonderful sleep. The suite was in a very quiet location close to all the necessary amenities as well as the acropolis. Finally, check out was simple. We had one minor issue when departing but the host was able to assist promptly and all worked out wonderfully. We would definitely stay here again!
Amazing location, beautiful apartment, comfy bed and excellent shower! Rooftop views are unreal!

The place is exactly as advertised. The view of the Acropolis is excellent and the balcony outside is great to sit and drink coffee.
The bed was comfortable and the air-conditioning was good. Kitchen amenities good also, so if you want to cook you are able to do so.
Bus stops to the major sites are very close and easy to use. All in all, excellent value for money.
Great patio!
Very clean place with new facilities. It was very comfortable to stay in and a fantastic location to be able to get around Athens. Good food areas about a 5 min walk away too!
Stefanos place was great and perfect for me. As a solo traveler not having large amounts of space was key. I enjoyed his place greatly.

The apartment is lovely and we had a great stay. The place is relatively close to all main attractions and surrounded by many restaurants/cafes.  Everything was clean and tidy, and we didn't have any problem contacting Konstantinos. We only had a minor problem with the shower cabin:  couldn't properly close it. The rest is cool and the place is absolutely recommended to visit!
Really nice apartment not too far from the Acropolis and the city centre. Stefanos has been really helpful.
Convenient, quiet location, a very clean apartment and a responsive host. This is a great base from which to navigate Athens.

We spent a few days in that beautiful apt, which it was more than perfect because it is located 25 min from the Acropolis.
The area is very safe, we arrived late and went out early and we always felt safe.
Metro and bus stop are 10 min walking distance. There is a few small stores and restaurants close by, very convenience when you need to get food.
The apt is beautiful, cozy and well equipped.
Stefanos-Konstantinos always followed up if we need something.
If we are back to Athens we will stay there again. I recommend this apt 100%.
Great host, super kind and the apartment how expected. Check-in and out very flexible!
Conveniently located studio in Koukaki, down to earth with everything you need; Stefanos is very responsive and everything was well organised.

Beeindruckende Lage des Appartments. Wunderbarer Blick von der Dachterasse auf die Stadt und die Akropolis. Gro√ües Appartment. Gastgeber bietet Abholservice vom Flughafen an.
Es ist ein Kellerappartment (mit Lichth√∂fen). Dadurch ist die Luft etwas feucht, so dass man h√§ufig l√ºften muss. Der Gastgeber hat uns auf Anfrage freundlicherweise ein Babybett und einen Hochstuhl zur Verf√ºgung gestellt.

If you are a researcher like me and spend hours pouring over Air BNB options...then look no further Dimitri‚Äôs place was perfect in every way.  From the moment we arrived to the morning we sadly had to leave, we had the best stay we have ever experienced in an Air BnB.  Firstly the view..wow..     Dimitris has thought of everything that a traveller could need...from  beer, snacks yoghurt and juice in the fridge to a comfy couch and very very comfortable bed.  The position of the apartment is wonderful...close to Monastiraki Square and surrounded by great restaurants and interesting shops.  Don‚Äôt overthink this one ....just book it..

Dimitris' apartment was everything he said it was in the listing.  The location was fantastic. He was great at communicating,  and more: he offered to arrange a taxi from the airport for us - no waiting in queue,  etc. He also provided some US power converter plugs! The bed was so comfortable!  And  he stocked the fridge & coffee supplies.
The location is awesome! We loved being in walking distance to the metro stop, the acropolis and all the restaurants in monastiraki. The apartment was cute and clean.

Angela was a great host. I want to thank her again. She was very flexible about check-in and check-out hours, also easy communicated. The apartment was really nice. It was really close to central and other touristic places. The apartment was also very clean and we had no issues about wifi or anything else. You would definetly stay in this place without any doubt.

Angelas Apartment liegt zentral in der N√§he des Omonia Square, von wo aus man mit der U-Bahn oder auch fu√ül√§ufig schnell zu allen zentralen Punkten der Stadt kommt. Excellent access to the heart of the city - Right beside Omonia square. The apartment is renovated and chic. Angela was prompt and communicative. Thanks Angela!

The appartment is very clean and well equipated (especially the shower!). It is well situated to visit the center, the Acropole etc. Angela is very nice and accomodating, it is easy to communicate. We had a great time!

This apartment is well located away from busy (noisy) streets but close for walking to the sights of downtown.  We found shopping close by, and a thirty minute easy walk to the ancient sites of the acropolis.  There is a bustling metro station a few blocks away surrounded by coffee shops and bakeries.  The fifth floor flat can be reached by two elevators or stairs.  There is a kitchen with all necessary equipment, including coffee.  We had a great stay and look forward to staying there again in the future.

The studio is stunning, the location is great, the host is superb.
Me and my fiance had a very good expirience in athens and Angela gave us tips for local amenities and even went the extra mile to provide us with information about the Greek Islands.
If I come back to Athens I will defenetly book this studio again.

The Appartement is perfectly located . Everything u Need for the Stay . The communication was easy quick and helpful , we enjoyed our Stay there. Would highly recommend.

Perfect location to start your Athens experience from. Everything was close by: City center in walking distance, public transportation just outside the the house. The Information provided were precise and accurate. The appartment was clean and quite. I would definitely recommend this apartment.

Good: about 5 min walk from the acropolis and plans. Lots of nice restaurants, cafes and bars around and located close to the metro and bus stop. Clean room with a communal bathroom and kitchen.
To be improved: the week preceding our stay we received around 10 messages from the host which had lots of chiding. It mentioned if you needed to call them out you could be charged etc. I know it was meant well but we felt that it was unhelpful.

Beautiful spacious apartment with balcony, lots of sun and very clean! Check in was super easy and great that it was self service as I arrived at 2am! Tia and mike are super helpful and very informative! Sharing the space was fine I didn‚Äôt even see another guest! Very clean and easy to use apartment. Great location - walking distance to Plaka area and the acropolis, quick taxi to syntagma square or about 20mins walk. Will definitely stay again :)

The apartment was fully equipped,  very clean, in a central position, easy to find, lots of cafe and restaurant around and the host very helpful and friendly. If we'll ever come back to Athens, we'll try to book again the flat of Angela and Akis!

Un appartement spacieux et tr√®s confortable. Un endroit id√©al pour visiter Athens. Christina est plein de bons conseils et bonnes adresses. Merci pour cet accueil.

What a wonderful and calming space - we were constantly marvelling at Nikos' great use of it (and perhaps spent too much of our time here)! The location is fantastic for seeing everything Athens boasts. Nikos was also a lovely and cheerful host who offered to assist us in every way he could. I would highly recommend a stay here!

Philip's apartment was perfect for our needs. The configuration of the apartment makes it ideal in that the doors allow you to close parts of the space off, especially helpful if you are traveling with children, as we were. It is in a convenient location, near sights, transportation, and groceries. The space was very clean and well appointed with everything we needed.
We particularly appreciated the welcoming touches provided by Betty, Philip's mother, who was the one who showed us around the apartment. She arranged for us to be picked up from the port (and later taken to the airport), left us fresh fruit, provided every kind of coffee one might drink, and even checked a minor wound I had gotten from falling down (she is a doctor!). Wonderful apartment and hosts.

Stefano‚Äôs place is incredibly designed, thoughtfully finished, and perfectly accommodating for anyone staying in Athens. It sets the standard for what care and hospitality for an nocarz should be. You can walk to fantastic restaurants and almost all historical sites you wish to stay, then relax in an apartment that feels like home. I highly recommend!

Great place and brilliant hosts. Communication was clear and frequent with instructions for checking in by myself without needing to have the hosts waiting around. Good location very close to the Syngrou-Fix metro station and only about 15 minute walk from Acropolis.

Excelente autoservicio de nocarz, todo muy bien descrito y organizado, f√°cil llegar al lugar en transporte publico el cual ofrece varias opciones, una vez llegamos tuvimos una confusion encontrando el piso correcto del apartamento debido a que en nuestro pais los pisos inician del 1 y no del piso 0 como en Atenas, en todo caso si tomas el elevador al piso 2 te ahorras una posible confusion. El apartamento y la habitaci√≥n concuerdan con la descripci√≥n, instalaciones limpias, ba√±o compartido impecable, habitaci√≥n y cama comodas. El apartamento se encuentra cerca a Plaka mejor sector turistico de Atenas, se puede caminar por el sector sin ningun problema, es muy seguro. Cerca encuentras cafeter√≠as, supermercados, restaurantes, etc.
Excellent self-service nocarz, all very well described and organized, easy to reach the place by public transport which offers several options, once we arrived we had a confusion finding the right apartment floor because in our country the floors start at 1 and no from floor 0 as in Athens, in any case if you take the elevator to the 2nd floor you save a possible confusion. The apartment and the room agree with the description, clean facilities, impeccable shared bathroom, comfortable room and bed. The apartment is close to Plaka best tourist sector of Athens, you can walk through the sector without any problem, it is very safe. Nearby you will find cafes, supermarkets, restaurants, etc.

Wonderful apartment in a great, quiet neighborhood yet close to all attractions. Terrific restaurants and coffee shops near by attended mostly by locals. Eirini was very welcoming and lovely to deal with. Highly recommended place for a short or longer stay in Athens!

Irene was the most precious person ever - the best!! I had a very late check in (around midnight) and she was there to hand me the keys with a smile on her face. The room was pretty and really close to a gorgeous view of the acropolis‚Ä¶ there was a really nice market that started right near the building on Saturday, very nice to walk through. Personally, the price was a little on the higher end when comparing other accommodations.
Such a great place. Spacious, full kitchen smart tv comfy bed very clean, extras in kitchen toiletries, Irene super prompt and helpful with any questions! Amazing

George‚Äôs place is in an awesome location for exploring Athens. We walked everywhere and didn‚Äôt miss a thing.
Great place for 7 adults. Could not ask for more.
Close to so many shops and restaurants too.
Would definitely recommend this place to anyone travelling to Athens

The place is excellent, located in a very convenient location. For anyone travelling in a car, the parking space provided is an important factor. The host is always available and eager to help the guest. In conclusion, this is a wonderful apartment, highly recommended.

Kyri's place is a spacious modern apartment with contemporary furnishings throughout. It has a balcony overlooking the street and everything is super-comfortable and impeccably clean. The location is quiet but also very close to a large supermarket, bakery and cafes. I didn't meet Kyri in person but he made the check-in process very well organised and easy to follow. A big bonus is the secure off-street parking which is a very rare find in this part of Athens. I can thoroughly recommend a stay here, especially if you are coming by car.

Great nocarz
excellent check-in
host easy to deal with
so so clean WiFi very good
& wow & super wow the view from the roof
Restaurants all around
easy walk to the Acropolis
thank you for hosting us

This apartment is a great stay when you are in Athens. It is a bit outside, but you can reach everything by Metro - its very easy!
And what I really liked about the location is, that you get to know the 'real life' of Athens. By the way, supermarkets, Caf√©s and restaurants are just around the corner ;)
The apartment itself is really nice, super clean and you have everything what you might need incl. washing machine and dryer.
The self check-in was very easy and the communication with Kyrie was perfect!
All in all we felt so comftable in this apartment that we extended our stay two times :)
So...a big recommendation from my side!

Good value for money. Very clean and cozy place. A lot of tavern's in area. Near to city center, save place to be at. Good AC in the bedroom. Alexandra allowed us to stay long efter check out.
We never meet with Alexandra but she was quick on response.
Going back to Athens next week, defenetly will book her again.

Alexandra was extremely hospitable and the apartment was very clean. The main highlight though was the location. There are a ton of restaurants, convenience stores, pharmacies, etc. a block away. The walk to the Acropolis and other ruins is about 20 minutes. It is also very easy to get to Monastiraki Square; about a 30 minute walk. Overall, a great space and even better location. Thank you Alexandra!
Nice apartment, everything is brand new, center of the city is about 10 minutes away. Good location for exploring the city.

This was my second stay at the apartment of Mr Kyriakos and it deserves a very high recommendation. It is comfortable, clean, and spacious. The location is very close to a bus stop served by several routes into town. Kyriakos is a well-organised and efficient host who has made the effort to think of everything a guest might need.

We were really happy with the apartment: lovely balcony, tastefully decorated, centrally located in an area with lots of restaurants. Eleni and her niece were very helpful and quick to respond to any questions we had.

Buen lugar para pasar unos d√≠as en Atenas. La distancia de la Acr√≥polis son unos 20 minutos andando. Buena zona residencial para alojarse y poder volver andando desde cualquier sitio. Las habitaciones de tama√±o muy correcto. Lo recomiendo!

Heel gezellig appartement op wandelafstand van het centrum. Vlakbij heel veel leuke restaurants en winkeltjes. Eleni stuurde op voorhand al heel veel tips en was bereikbaar voor al onze vragen. Ik zou hier zeker nog eens terugkomen.

Very nice place. Great price/quality ratio.
Between cultural and party area.
Toni had a great apartment in the perfect location. He was very helpful and timely with his responses. I couldn't recommend him more!
This apartment is very spacious and in a cool neighborhood! Everything was easy and I'd stay here again

Kleo is a very kind and generous host. She was always quick to respond to messages and happy to help. I'd happily stay here again if we come back to Athens.
an excellent apartment in an excellent place at the heart of athens we enjoyed our staying

Really good place: clean and confortable. The flat is really close to the better places in Athens It's in the center but it's really quiet area. I really enjoyed it. Maria was really here to answer all my questions. I recommend this place for sure.

Lovely apartment, great aesthetic, and absolutely perfect location.  Dennis and his sister Sophia were extremely hospitable, and thought of everything!  From espresso machine coffee to a fridge filled with beverages, to great local recommendations, our stay at The Prestige was as good as it gets!

George and Anna were very communicative and accommoding during our stay in Athens. The apartment was tidy, clean and with sweet welcoming treats. Location is great, with a direct access to the Acropolis park (across the street). 10/10 would recommend.

Very cute, stylish place with a great patio. Great for two people. They neighborhood has lots of restaurants and coffee shops nearby but it‚Äôs outside the bustle of downtown in a more local area which we preferred. Would absolutely stay here again.

This place was great. It's on a quiet, residential street, with a wonderful row of restaurants a few minutes walk away. We spent our mornings on the porch watching the local cats. The drivers were friendly and the price is up front and fair - a refreshing change from the taxi drivers on the street.

This space is exactly as it appears in the photos and description. The outdoor balcony is an amazing space to have in the warmer weather. The locations is perfect. It‚Äôs in walking distance to anything you want: restaurants, cafes, bars, grocery store across the street, the Acropolis and the subway. Also, on Fridays, there is a farmers market where you can go to buy fresh fruit.
If this space is free, just book it.
Stunning views of the city from this sleek, well-appointed apartment. Great location too - we especially enjoyed the cafe/bar across the street.

What a wonderful place to stay. Had everything we needed and was very well thought out. The roof terrace is cleverly designed and you have that feeling of space. Cute spot in a great neighborhood walkable to everything in Athens. We had a great stay and enjoyed the market at the end of the block. The airport pickup was great and made getting there very easy. Highly recommended!!!

Great apartment. Convenient, quiet and spacious enough. Place is exactly shown in the pics. Room is cozy but small. Fits a couple just nice if you do not have too many luggage bags.
Elina is very responsive & communicates very clearly. She also shares some suggestions on where to eat. A very highly recommended place to stay in Athens!
There is a street fruit and seafood market just 5-min walk every Friday. In 15 mins you can go to the hill, museums, juice shop, supermarkets, restaurants. I had a really relaxing week there.

On the (+) side: It‚Äôs a nice little place with its own back yard. We found it well equipped and clean. Generally the hosts responded quickly and resolved whatever came up during our stay. Conveniently, there‚Äôs a mini market/deli shop right opposite the house (quite expensive) and the metro stations are under 10 mins walk away. Otherwise it‚Äôs a beautiful neighbourhood with many classical buildings and offers great access to Kolonaki‚Äôs shopping area..
On the (-) side, there was some humidity and mosquitoes because the flat is in a semi-basement, but nothing too frustrating. Also it would have been great if there was a coffee capsules machine, but it‚Äôs not a deal breaker for me.
