Elina was SO incredibly kind, helping me out right away when I had a question and worried about some water on the floor (it was my own error and she was just so pleasant-  and on the national holiday of March 2nd, also!).  The building is right in the heart of the Plaka, just 2 minutes walk from Syntegma Square, and less than a mile walk up to the Acropolis-  and you get to stroll through Monastiraki along the way.  The place is small, but it has everything you need.  Wifi was REALLY fast, and the bed and pillows were comfy.  I would absolutely stay here again if I travel back through Athens!

Apartamento impecable. Bien situado para el metro. Separado un poco de la zona m√°s masificada, pero conveniente para estar m√°s tranquilo. La zona de plaza omonia tiene buena comunicaci√≥n con el resto de lugares de inter√©s. Respond√≠an r√°pido y recomendaban cosas para hacer.

we would happily recommend this apartment to others.

Very modern and clean place. Spiros was a helpful and kind host! Value for money! Highly recommended!

This review is for the other flat of Rena (with the private backyard), since the one that I booked was under construction. First, I am very grateful that we could stay at the other flat and my booking wasn't just cancelled! The flat was clean and tidy, the neighbourhood is nice. The kitchen is directly in front of your bed, so you can hear the fridge at night. Also, the building is poorly soundproofed, you can hear the neighbours leaving and talking. At the moment, there is construction work going on, on the building next to the backyard, that woke us at 7 a.m.  So, nothing for light sleepers. You don't get sunlight at all, and the sunblind above the backyard couldn't be moved, we tried! But at least the flat was cool! I was contemplating about giving 3 stars because after 2 days the flat was so humid that even our clothings in the wardrobe were cold and damp, even though we opened the yard door, and we kept the ventilation in the bathroom going until we left for the day.
A little gem in Athens ! Close to everything you would enjoy or need. Perfect

We had a lovely stay in Athens in this apartment. It was just as the photos show, a very comfortable space in a secure building.
The only issue we had is that the WiFi wasn‚Äôt working, however we got a quick response and being a public holiday in Greece the problem could not be solved which is understandable.

Pantelis, George's father, was our point of call for this stay and we could not have been happier with everything! Pantelis was warm and welcoming and insisted on carrying our bags up, the apartment was clean, stylish, well-stocked and only a 2 minute walk from the city centre and markets!
The wifi was fast, TV connected to Netflix, blankets warm and the bed super comfortable. Pantelis/George left a binder on the table filled with local suggestions, tips and maps that were really helpful!
We really enjoyed our stay and even wished we were staying a little longer!

The location is about 10 minute walk from the main Metro stop (Syntagma Sq) in the business district. The metro stop is where the eastern area of the Platka begins. The venue is a 10 minute walk to the Acropolis and 5-10 minute walk to Hadrian‚Äôs Library (next to the Agoras). On the road to the Acropolis are street vendors that sell shirts, dresses, masks, toys, olive oils products, etc.
The owner communicated to us via direct message a day after the booked and included contact info, how to take the metro from the airport to the stop, addresses, and local things to do.
The venue is a normal European style dwelling. It is quaint with a nice bed, little sit down area with a couch, good kitchen and good bathroom. Has an iron and ironing board, ability to cook on stove, and magazines of things to do. It is well styled but no view outside. Walls are kind of thin but didn‚Äôt keep me up at night.
It is on the 2nd floor with access to an elevator (I wouldn‚Äôt use though it is old school looking).

An extraordinary place to stay. The host was there to greet and give a little tour when we first arrived. It is a beautifully maintained 2bedroom apartment. The bedrooms were sized just right and each had its own bathroom. This is a very very nice apartment.
The common areas were beautiful and then they took us to the rooftop- magnificent! We sat on the roof a couple nights just talking and took in the Acropolis staring down at us. The hosts left a little list of good local bakeries, cafes, etc. that was full of excellent suggestions.
The location is perfect for walking to most popular tourist sites. It was a ten minute walk to the Acropolis and a little bit longer to shopping and nightlife. Despite being in the ‚Äúheart‚Äù of it all the apartment itself was always quiet.
The host was also able to help us arrange reliable and timely taxi service.
I cannot recommend this place highly enough.
Amazing host! Super clean! Comfy beds! Fantastically located.

Our stay in Diana's beautiful home in Athens was truly wonderful.  The location is fabulous... the Acropolis is within sight from the roof top terrace and only a hop, skip, and a jump to walk there.  The spacious two bedroom, two bathroom apartment was ideal for the four of us traveling as two couples.  There is a private balcony off one bedroom and a sitting room off the other.   We especially enjoyed our evenings on the terrace viewing the Acropolis all in lights.  Diana is a thoughtful host and a delightful human being.  Lovely to meet.  We arrived to find a basket of fresh bakery items, fruit, and snacks on the dining table and the refrigerator stocked with milk, juice, eggs for breakfast.   Diana responded to all our questions, personally showing us how to use the washing machine and dishwasher (instructions were in Greek).  Very grateful for our stay here.

Excellent location and a beautiful apartment! Incredible view of Acropolis and we even saw the New Years Eve fireworks from the patio overlooking the Acropolis. Amazing! Thanks a lot!

It is a very nice apartment, clean, perfectly located and it has everything you need. A good bed, a good bathroom (even a washing machine) a complete kitchen, great couch and most importantly a balcony with a magnificent view! Orestis welcomed us and even gave us some typically Greek things (such as a lovely Greek wine) to welcome us. Next time we go to Athens we would definitely like to stay at the same apartment!

L‚Äôappartement est id√©alement situ√© (Plaka, Syntagma) et offre une vue exceptionnelle sur l‚ÄôAcropole. La d√©coration et l‚Äô√©quipement rendent le s√©jour agr√©able. Orestis est tr√®s accueillant.

The apartment was beautiful, and exactly as pictured. The privacy of the building was very much appreciated after a long day of traveling and coming with a toddler. The elevator made everything much more accessible than we are used to in Europe, and we loved being able to keep our toddler in her stroller to make the trip up to the top floor. The apartment itself was super cute and well-kept, and incredibly clean -- exactly as pictured. We were accommodated with a baby bed for our toddler, and it was very safe and comfortable. The apartment itself was very spacious, and we enjoyed having all of that space to unwind. I had read ahead of time that the bells from the church bother some of the guests, but to be quite frank, we didn't even notice. We loved being close to the shopping, having the main sights accessible to us, and having a lot of great restaurants nearby. We felt safe when we were outside, as well as inside. Of course, the star of the apartment was the view. It was every bit as lovely as you imagine from the pictures. Because we have a toddler and we knew that we would be tethered to our apartment in the evenings after she went to bed, gorgeous views were important to us, and this one certainly did not disappoint. We spent all of our evenings marveling at the Acropolis and listening to the city come alive. Overall, it was a very lovely stay and we recommend it highly.
It was absolutely amazing! Thanks!

We stayed at Kathy‚Äôs for five days before a cruise out of Athens. We used the metro almost exclusively, ate at local places and really loved the experience. A cashier at the local supermarket helped us figure out the Pharmacy that was open on Sunday due to a sick family member. The host was always available with all our questions. Wonderful experience!

Perfectly equipped with all daily needs, clean, spacious
Host:
quick responses, high flexibility, Constantine gave plenty of local recommendations, cake, cookies and bottle of sparkling wine was given as a welcome present

20 minutes walk to the city centre, good for sightseeing, not recommendable for nightlife lovers
All in all highly recommendable accommodation!!! Thanks for this unforgettable stay Constantine!!!

We enjoyed every moment spent at this apartment! It is very well located, ultra comfortable, and so well equipped for  a locative apartment.  Constantine was ultra helpful in guiding us and always responded to our question in a very short period of time.  I recommend this place 110%!!

A nice apartment in the heart of the city. I would not recommend it for very long stays though, as all the windows go into the internal yard.

Nice spacious apartment in Pagrati. Nina was awaiting for us when we arrived and the host gave extensive information about Athens before arriving. Host took care of lots of little details to make us feel comfortable, kitchen was well equipped and I can imagine the place is great for a longer stay.
Thank you for everything!

Working with Constantine was a great experience. He was very helpful from beginning to end of our stay.
He answered ALL our questions clearly and concisely. He‚Äôs very professional in everything he does and says.
What stood out the most was his prompt response and follow-up to questions we had, including meeting us at the Metro station on the day we arrived (taxi drivers were on strike).
All his referrals made our stay easy and enjoyable by providing us with different options to venues and services.
We highly recommend him!

Constantine was a great host and communicated very well and was very responsive. His apartment is as described and pictured, perhaps even better than the description. The apartment it self was very clean, spacious, and well appointed with great appliances and very good amenities. If one has time, there is a great collection of books as well.
The location was superb, and the area (pangrati) is charming with lots of places to have coffee, eat, buy books, pharmacy, grocery store very close to the apartment. Highly recommend this place. Thanks Constantine.

Beautiful apartment, exactly as described! Clean, comfortable and had lovely thoughtful amenities - even a high chair for my baby. Lots of places to eat nearby and groceries a 3 min walk. Constantine was a wonderful host providing recommendations and communication was great  Highly recommend!
Best of the best

The nocarz is beautifully designed. It looked amazing and felt comfortable. Everything was super sleek and clean.
Pros:
Beautifully set up. Felt comfortable. Customer service was outstanding and hard-working. Gave great tips on what to visit in Athens. Very warm during the winter. Worker was very kind and caring. Amazing view of the Acropolis. Images on the website look real and true in person.
Cons:
Hot water runs out very fast. Can't take long showers. Directions to the nocarz we're a little difficult especially if it's your first time in Greece. Traffic was loud outside.
Conclusions:
A delightful stay. Despite the number of cons they are all very small. Honestly I'm nit picking a little. Well worth the reservation. I just wish it was a bit cheaper so I could stay longer.

We booked our accommodation over 12 months ago. Constantine was friendly and organised from the outset. He helped us arrange transfer from the airport, and for Nina to meet us at the apartment, and she gave us instructions on everything. 5 mins walk to the metro, and one stop to the Plaka. Very easy to get around to main tourist sites on metro. 5 day metro ticket cost 8 euros. 2 supermarkets and other shops in the street close by. We thoroughly enjoyed our 5 night stay at Constantine‚Äôs apartment. We started to feel like a local!!
This truly is a hidden gem. You‚Äôll be staying at a nice, modern, clean, cozy apartment -plus access to one of the best rooftops in Athens. All within a block of the most vibrant area in the city.
It is on a busy street but just a 5-10 minutes walk to the Acropolis and the subway. Very easy to navigate!  I could live on the rooftop deck!!

An excellent location with an amazing view of the Acropolis from the private rooftop space. The studio flat was of generous space with good amenities, clean, and of contemporary design. A good value for money.

This is a great find - close to some neighborhood restaurants and bars and a quick walk to the town center of Athens, in a quiet but safe area. I didn‚Äôt spend much time in the room itself, but the view of the Acropolis from the roof was my absolute favorite thing - especially at night! Nikos was always super friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay here again.

Nikos was an amazing host for our visit to Athens. Communications were timely and informative.  The apartment was as described, clean and well equipped.  The location was perfect for us as a couple, we could walk to the main historical attractions in Athens (Acropolis and Parthenon, ancient Olympic stadium, Plaka neighborhood, etc.) There were small markets nearby and even a larger grocery store, which we frequently visited to get supplies to  cook our meals at the apartment.  The crowning jewel was the rooftop terrace with an unobstructed view of the Acropolis.  Nickos' apartment is highly recommended,  we would book again.

This place was okay as we stayed for one night. The host was very kind and responsive, but that was the only 5 star thing about the place. It‚Äôs a bit removed from the main area and if I was travelling alone I would not feel safe here. Overall is was clean but there was an old bath mat and some hairs left behind in the shower. Would recommend staying in the Koukaki neighbourhood or somewhere on that side of the highway to feel safer.
everything was perfect! thank you for all recommodations! :)

Excellent staying. Good emplacement and near by a metro and a tram station. Giannis is a very good host, welcoming, helpful and nice.

Spyros and Marina are AMAZING. The apartment is in a quiet neighborhood, 3 minutes walk from the metro. The Acropolis is a 15-minute walk away. The apartment is near supermarkets, cafes, shops, bakery, pharmacy, metro, bus, clubs. The apartment is very very clean and very beautiful, the home is equipped with everything, the bed is very comfortable, there were also toys for my children. Spyros welcome us with a bottle of wine and various sweets for my children. Spiros and Marina always were happy and willing to learn what we do and if we need something. I suggest this house. I am sure you will love Greece and with Spyros and Marina you will love Greek people.
Thank you for all.

Great location easy to get around lovely hosts.certainly recommend to my friends and prospective travellers.

Aris is a great host. The place is modern, clean, great area and he's really quick to respond to messages. There are great little touches like the remote control shutters and curtains plus more. Every nocarz host can learn from Aris!

Totally recommended. Near to Athens center and 5 minutes away from Metro Station. The apartment was super clean and Spyros and Marina are great hostess.
Book it! Agis and his team made my arrival a smooth and easy one, the apartment is pristine and the view absolutely divine. By far the highlight of my trip to Athens. I can‚Äôt wait to return!
Nice and clean. Felt safe and Toni provided excellent communication with me. I would definitely recommend!

our stay in Toni's house was perfect, we do recommend this appartment as it is well located and very clean. Also the communication was perfect and when we arrived we were informed about everything of the house with all details, sure we will come back! Thank you Toni

Absolutely beautiful! So kind and welcoming on arrival and showed us everything we needed to know. Had the hot tub warm and ready.  Loved it so much. That view isn‚Äôt something I could ever get used to UNREAL. So amazing. Absolutely LOVED the location
Greet large flat with style and plenty of spacd! Very convenient walking for all of central Athens. Would highly recommend!

I really enjoyed my long stay here (one month+). It's a cosy, comfortable apartment, and I liked being able to cook meals in the modern, well-stocked kitchen. It's in a trendy and central location, with morning walks and runs possible around the nearby Acropolis and National Garden. Thanks also to the excellent, responsible and considerate host.

George and Marina were wonderful hosts and responded in a timely manner. They helped us arrange transfers to the airport that went without a hitch. The apartment is spacious and located in a great neighbourhood that was walking distance to good food and the acropolis. My family and I throughly enjoyed our stay.

We stayed in George's appartement for our 3 days in Athens the location is perfect near the Acropolis, museum, restaurant and trendy neighborhoods in Athens. The appartement is perfectly clean. We recommend without hesitation.

Want to be close to the Acopolis and associated Museum? Will not find anything closer, while Plaka district also very close. Apartment, very well set up for us (mum with separate bathroom and room), twin kids (single bed room) and wife and I (master bedroom) in very quiet street.....just missing the view over the Acropolis.
Overall perfect stay in Athens, not to mention the associated ride to pier and airport very slick, efficient and priced right. Thank you.

Love. Love. Love Amalia‚Äôs space. It‚Äôs perfect for a solo female traveler. It‚Äôs safe and in a perfect neighborhood. It‚Äôs away from the chaos yet close to everything.
Extremely tastefully done up space, very comfortable. Made my Athens experience wonderful.
We loved our stay! The place was great

This apartment was absolutely amazing! Very central, sparkling clean and has everything you can think of. Perfect for a group of 5. It‚Äôs located in such a beautiful neighborhood five mins away by foot from the acropolis and right next to the acropolis museum. Thanos and Nikki were beyond helpful and accommodated our change in schedule so smoothly. We look forward to staying at their apartment once again in the near future hopefully.

An amazing apartment in a great central location, the Acropolis is very close and you even see it from the balcony. Niki communicated throughout and was always incredibly helpful, friendly and quick to respond to any messages. The apartment was very clean, had brilliant facilities and they even gave us a cake on arrival. Couldn't have asked for a better apartment for our stay in Athens and will definitely stay here again when visiting. Would definitely recommend.

Great stay in Athens! Plentiful space, well decorated, and a 20-30 min walk to the main sights in Athens. The host was responsive to our needs. The apartment had everything we needed to stay the week including good Wi-Fi
The apartment was really nice and good located. Close to public transport. Everything was clean and nice, the answers for the questions was fast and good. I will recommend to stay at this apartment.
Great clean quiet cozy place. Great location. Easy communication with host! Highly reccommended
Very beautiful and bright apartment with a superb view.  Impeccable cleanliness and very good comfort.  It is also perfectly located, barely 10min walk to get to the Agora!  I highly recommend üòÅ
Wszystko Ok. ≈öwietny kontakt, super lokalizacja w centrum Aten. Dobre po≈ÇƒÖczenie z lotniskiem.

Everything was nice :) The kommunication was really fast and if i had questions about something she messaged me directly!
Great host and place! Quick responses and strategic location for tourism (near metro station and less than 10 min to Acropolis). Very cozy apartment.

Possibly my favorite nocarz listing to date (and I‚Äôve stayed at some lovely nocarzs). The location is close to Syntagma and the Parthenon but still residential enough to be quiet and peaceful. The apartment provides ample space. You are in an elevated ground floor apartment but feel incredible safe due to the calm street and safety features on the windows. The balcony was spacious and was quite private for Athens (the view was shared with just a few other apartments). The apartment is beautifully decorated and has modern appliances. There is an A/C unit in the main living space and both bedrooms. Furthermore, there is a full bath and a powder room. We felt so comfortable staying at this apartment. It is incredibly clean, well-furnished, and equipped with modern conveniences. I know many Americans that don‚Äôt feel fully comfortable when staying in Athens due to differences in modern conveniences. I think any American would feel quite comfortable staying at Rizi Inn. I‚Äôm greatly looking forward to staying here again, hopefully for a longer stay!

Great place to stay, perfectly situated ! Stefania is a great host and answers quickly, I highly recomment this place !
Excellent accommodation in the heart of Athens. Very spacious and clean. Thank you Stathis and Panis for the lovely recommendations and tips as well :) we really enjoyed our time there!

This is a brilliantly located little flat, so close to cafes and the Acropolis.
Flat was very quirky, small but fine for our overnight stay. Spotlessly clean. Would have been best if we‚Äôd read the instruction folder earlier as the water takes about 15 mins to heat up via switching on the mains fuse box so we were unable to jump in the shower when we needed it. ü•∂ Stefania provided so much info to support our stay locally, with excellent contacts for late transport needs and ferry tickets etc. Fab all round.
This appartment is fantastic. A perfect location to explore Athens. Always very quick answers from the host- perfect!

The host allowed us to check in a bit earlier - that was super nice. The space has a soul - it's spacious and very nice for a couple. We loved the kitchen table - I had to work during the trip so it was very convenient (i loooove big big tables). The interior design is so nice and cozy + the place is at the very heart of the city - close to everything and yet a tiny bit away from the noisy bar street that happens just around the corner. All in all the stay was very wonderful and added positive vibration to our trip to Greece. Highly recommend.

The appartment is just beautiful, spacious and very well designed. Very close to the metro station, although we didnt need it much since everything is at walking distance.
The neighnorhood is so charming and lively.
And our host was very kind and flexible.
Highly recommended!

Very stylish apartment in a prime neighborhood. Will certainly return on our next visit to Athens.

USA couple

The apartment is very quiet and relaxing. It has all the amenities you could ask for. Lamprini gave us a warm and friendly welcome and made sure we had everything we needed. The apartment itself is very close to the center and to the next metro station.
Great value for money in the city centre but the surrounding area untidy and filled with graffiti.

The place, the host and the overall experience is great. We re speechless ü•∫we are going to visit soon
Thank you for everything üåª

This is a spacious apartment in a convenient location! I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone who is staying in Athens. This apartment is in a fantastic location for sightseeing, especially at the Acropolis. Also located close to public transit, making an easy journey from the airport or port. Dimitris also included a very detailed local information packet providing details on local shopping, restaurants, and other activities. Dimitris was also extremely responsive when we messaged him with questions. I would absolutely recommend this apartment!

Great apartment. Beautiful area of Athens. Host was very kind and good at responding. Next to the best gyros in town and the view from the terrace of the apartment did not disappoint. Enjoying wine and a view of the Parthenon lit up. Perfect Athens stay.

Had a wonderful stay at Mary‚Äôs accommodation.  Everything was perfect.  The apartment is very spacious, very clean, and very comfortable.  The air conditioning was also perfect - especially during the heat wave!  It was also in a great location walkable to anywhere you require.  I would certainly stay here again.
Fantastic apartment that‚Äôs worth the value. I would stay here again.
The apartment was extremely spacious, clean, the host was great. The only thing was that it was not as "near to kolonaki" as expected.

Great home, great location. The home was really cute, and right at the heart of the city. Close by to convenience stores, and a quick 10 minute walk to the acropolis. Entire apartment was very clean, was pre-set up for the amount of guests we specified, and came with thoughtful amenities. The space felt spacious. Host were very friendly and explained everything very throughoughly. Gave lots of advice on how to navigate the city and recommendations as well. The only negative was that we were only able to stay one night! Thanks again!
spacious and surrounded by Coffee Shops - all attractions in NY walking distances and very clean. It is good value and all Rooms have their own AC Units. Good Place !
Comfortable apartment in the center of Athens. Recommended!

Toni's place near the Acropolis is spacious and close to the grocery stores and great restaurants.  Toni and his team made the check in process go smoothly and were very helpful.  The space is great to explore the Acropolis and was great for kids.

The appartment is rennovated, spacious, clean and nice to stay in. The location is approx. 10 mins walk from a nice area with decent restaurants. The close by dining options are are less attractive. We (family of 5), had a very nice stay in Tonis appartment.
If you plan to do your own cooking: Bring a couple of good kitchen knives, and note there is not a dishwasher. The fridge is half hight, and shelves in the fridge door was missing. Some of the broken amneties (minor things) mentioned in an earlier review was not yet fixed when we stayed in the appartment.
In the heart of Athens. Beautiful apartment with lots of space indoor and outdoor.

Fantastic stay. Check in process was an ease which was much appreciated after a long flight. Location is fantastic. Apartment was clean, communication was fast and easy, beds were comfortable, what more could you ask for. Would definitely stay again the next time we are in Athens!
Excellent location and spacious modern apartment. Very easy check in and check out. Would highly recommend.

This was our final stop on a 6 week euro trip. It was by far the cleanest, most affordable and best flat we have stayed at! A 10/10! The beds are comfortable, the shower is spacious and the whole flat is very very nice. We loved getting coffee right outside the front door daily, walking around the lovely village around the Acropolis. It‚Äôs the perfect central location and 100% walkable to all the main sights. We can‚Äôt wait to come back!
First time in Athens, had a great time.
Excelente lugar, a 15 minutos caminando del Acropolis. Buenos restaurantes cercas, la comunicaci√≥n con el host fue excelente. Muy amable en todo momento. Me volver√≠a a hospedar en el lugar de Toni.

Location is good, friendly host, replies on time. Very clean, gave us local tips as well

First the host made sure that everything went smoothly, communicated fast and already gave some tips to reach the apartment. We were 4 people, my wife and her parents and the apartment is the right amount of space to stay and prepare to go to Athens. The Metro is close by, but also close enough to go for a walk directly to the main attraction Acropolis. Definitely would recommend.
Great place, very clean, utilated with everything and close to Acropole.
Best place to stay in Athens! Super clean and fantastic location!! Very quick responses and always willing to help! Will definitely stay there again!!!!

This property was even better then the pictures. There is a very small elevator that you can use or the stairs. Both bedrooms were good sizes with lots of storage in them. Both bathrooms were also a good size. One has a washer and dryer which came in handy. We enjoyed the using the lovely balcony that you could access from both bedrooms or the living room. Marios was very thoughtful and arranged a driver to pick us up from the airport. Which came in handy as our flight had been delayed by a few hours.
Clean and spacious apartment a short walk from many of the attractions in Athens. Great communication from host and very detailed/simple check in process.
The location of this apartment was perfect for our short stay in Athens for seeing the Acropolis and other sights in the city. Would stay here again if/when we go back to Athens.
Perfectly located flat in central Athens. Thoughtfully decorated but with simplicity. Friendly communication and Theodore was (or Marietta, on site housekeeper) easily available to answer questions.

Great place, nice and clean.
Close to restaurants and attractions and will recommend 100%.
Return stay us as great at the first.

This place was clean and spacious as shown in photos! Having the washer and dryer was appreciated as we had already been traveling for 2 weeks. However, we didn‚Äôt find much to do around the nocarz so we took taxis to other neighborhoods.

A very nice apartment with all the facilities. Nice to have two bathrooms. Nice neighborhood with many locals.
Mario‚Äôs assistance was good and in time
I recommend, very nice location, very clean, close to us center, 10-15 min walking, quiet area, we felt great, I will recommend it to my friends üòä

Kim was very quick and responsive despite the time differences. The place could be cleaner, especially the bathrooms. The sheets were clean, and the air conditioners worked well. It was a 15-minute walk to the city center. The neighborhood is not the cleanest in Athens.

The flat was located in the historic section of Athen close to the universities and Syntagma Square. Max a 20 min walk to the Acropolis. Alex and team went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable. The flat matched the pictures and was spotless with a nice balcony. This would be a great option for a group

This was a terrific place to stay when you are visiting Athens.  The location was excellent, very easy to get to any sites or restaurants.  We loved the floor plan-many bedrooms so everyone could have their privacy and a large central room and enclosed patio where we could all gather as a large family.  We would definitely return!

Marianne‚Äôs apartment in Central Athens is the perfect place for families or groups of friends to stay in Athens.  She takes great care to make your experience one you will not forget.  If you are lucky you can book the penthouse apartment with the rooftop pool and view of the Acropolis!  Marianne is the best host we have had!
Highly recommend this experience. A wonderful and unique apartment. Stunning views. Great location. Gracious and accommodating host.

It‚Äôs exceded our expectations. Beautiful views. Quiet neighborhood and close to all the sites.
Very attentive host.

Beautiful apartment with an amazing view over the Acropolis! Even more beautiful than on the pictures. Acropolis and all the highlights of Athens are in walking distance. The neighbourhood in Kolonaki has many great restaurants, bars and shops. The apartment itself is modern, very clean and comfortable and equipped with everything you need. Communication with the hosts was very easy and friendly and helpful. We really enjoyed our stay so much and we will definitely try to stay here again next time!!
everything perfect except wifi is so. weak.

Aliki‚Äôs apartment is such a gem in kolonaki neighborhood! The energy is so nice there, you are basically close to everything, can walk to museum or plaka / monastiraki super easily. But my favorite is to easily leave the flat and walk up to mount Lycabeth watch the sunset. This is my second stay and the apartment is super clean and very modern. Thank you !!
Lovely place to stay. I give the host my highest recommendation.
Wonderful, spacious apartment with an epic view from the terrace in a conveniently located area of the city.

Andrianos‚Äôs place was very charming and the balcony had wonderful views! He was very friendly in welcoming us and gave us helpful recommendations. The location is super convenient too. I wish we stayed longer here!

Perfect location and wonderful hosts. Very spacious apartment with lots of room for our group of 5. Short walk to the Acropolis and lots of other destinations. We took the Metro in from the airport and the apartment is very close to the Acropoli stop.
Very appreciative for the accomodation of safely holding our bags until an early check in, as we flew into Athens first thing in the morning.
Casa ideal para pareja o grupo de amigos. Limpia y muy bien situada. Andrianos, el anfitri√≥n, es muy atento y simp√°tico.

Great location , spacious and well appointed

L‚Äôappartamento √® bellino, e la terrazza molto bella. E anche in ottima posizione.

Non sappiamo se sia stato un problema solo di quelle notti, ma era pieno di moscerini che ci hanno riempito di punture enormi.
Great communication with the host, the apartment was exactly as advertised, I really felt at home. It felt like being at a close friend's house and the terrace/balcony is beautiful!

The apartment itself is beautiful, and the location is great. But there can be a lot more attention / investment in making it feel more home / comfortable. There was no wifi for at least 1 full day, and then once the wifi was fixed, it was still not reaching the bedrooms inside - which was inconvenient.
Can‚Äôt recommend this spot enough. The hosts were amazing, they helped us with everything we needed and were so nice. The location and view on the patio are perfect. We had a great time

This apartment is even more beautiful than the photos. The host was so kind and warm and helped us settle in after a long flight with our kids. The location was wonderful. Thank you for a lovely stay!

Eugenia is such a proactive host that is always there to help. Her apartment is super cozy with vintage decorations and well located. The only issue we had was the lack of a/c since it was super hot when we visited Athens. We only stayed for a day so it didn‚Äôt bother us as much but we did not have a good night of sleep due to the heat even if there are 2 ceiling fans.
This apartment was just perfect!  Perfect location in the heart of all the Athens action!  Walkable to all major tourist attractions. Eassilikiva was the best host!

We really enjoyed our stay! Although this apartment is located in the heart of Plaka we never heard a sound at night, and even during the day it was very peaceful. The views from the lovely patio are terrific! A great place for morning coffee or evening conversation.
Side note: The host company (TopHouzzing) was very helpful and was also able to recommend a taxi/transfer company that worked out well. You pay a premium to book a private car but it‚Äôs worth the hassle-free experience! Dealing with taxis in Europe is not for the faint of heart, so it was wonderful to have a trusted source.
The apartment was great and we loved the welcome snacks and treats. Very thoughtful!
We worried that two adults and two teens would find it hard with one bathroom but it wasn‚Äôt a problem at all.
And there‚Äôs so much space for everyone to have their own spot for downtime.
Very comfortable and we slept great! Would stay again!

Spyros was an amazing host! He was very helpful at check-in, offering advice and/or services from the airport or the port to the nocarz; he provided local tips and suggestions; he even provided us with some of his homemade wine for free! The space was very clean, exactly as presented, and located in an amazing area. Would absolutely recommend to anyone, and would stay here again if I returned to Athens!
Who could ask for more from their hosts? Mary & Theo were there for me every step of the way. Great flat, sunsets from the balcony, safe neighborhood, central location. Stay here, enjoy :)

The view from Lina‚Äôs apartment is awesome. She is a great host, that arranged for our transportation and met us at check in. Her place is sparkling clean with many amenities, including coffee and bottled water. The area is quiet and within walking distance to all the attractions. Would definitely stay here again.

What a superb apartment with great access to the Acropolis and the places to be and see in Athens. 15 minute walk to Plaka. Lots of shops and restaurants close by.
Lina was the perfect host before and during our stay in Athens. We had to postpone our first visit due to Covid 19 and she was so helpful in rearranging the booking. The apartment is tastefully decorated and immaculately clean with every essential on hand. There were also very welcome extras provided. The terrace has superb views to the Acropolis and at night when the site is lit it is quite magical. The lift was fantastic as the apartment is on the fourth floor.
Lina provided plentiful information and advice about how to operate everything in the flat, where to eat, shop and visit and she organised airport taxis as well. Nothing was too much bother and she always responded immediately to any questions I had. For example she recommended a cruise to three of the Saronic Islands which was wonderful. She was also at the apartment to greet us when we arrived at 11.30 at night!
We cannot praise Lina and her beautiful apartment highly enough and are recommending to our family and friends. Thanks for a great stay from us all.

We had a wonderful stay in Athens at Lina's place. Lina was the perfect host, the flat was sparkling clean and the location was amazing - the view from the balcony of the Acropolis was very special. We loved exploring the city and Lina's recommendations were excellent. Lina was very quick to respond to any questions and also organised a taxi for us to the airport. I would 100% recommend!

My stay at Akis' place has been great. Akis is a true professional host. He is polite, responsive with a customer-centric focus. His apt. is at a central location in Athens with a view of Lycabettous hill that you can see even when you're lying in bed. The layout of the apt. is ergonomic and has all the electric appliances one might need, dishwasher included. While it is very close to a central street, there is practically no noise and there's no noise in the builiding either. There is plenty of closet room, a regular size washing machine and a very decent size balcony.  I highly recomment Akis as a host and his apt. to provide a comfortable and pleasant experience during your stay in Athens.

L'appartamento si trova in una posizione assolutamente ottima, in una zona fornita bene e vicina alla passeggiata che conduce all'Acropoli. Il punto forte √® la terrazza: far colazione e poi cenare contemplando il tramonto √® una piacevole esperienza. Anetta √® estremamente gentile e disponibile, sempre pronta a rispondere a qualsiasi domanda. Consigliato!

There is No way I could ever recommend this place to someone or revisit it again. This place is a huge disgrace for Athens and nocarz, doesn‚Äôt have anything to do with luxury, only dirt and poverty. I have been in Greece for more than 30 times, and in Athens it‚Äôs the 5th time for me. In any of my trips I have not experience this disconfort.
Is this place close to the subway? Yes, it is!
Is this place a luxury studio? No, it‚Äôs not!
Is this place as cosy as it looks in the photos? No, it‚Äôs not!
The matress it‚Äôs awful, the floor is not stable, the bathroom smells awful, the terrace is very dirty and the view is distressing. The hall is also very dirty.
It‚Äôs a shame!
The reason I did not ask for a refund is that I had a very short stay, a lot of planned activities and no time to comute.
This is my single negative feedback which I have ever provided for an nocarz accomodation, I am not happy with doing this, but this place was indeed above and beyond a nightmare.

Communication with Maria was excellent and and check in was very straight forward. Might be pretty noisy as it's next to a busy road and cleanness could be improved. All in all, it's a good value for money. Thank you Maria!

The apartment was in a good area, very close to Acropolis and other attractions. The flat is clean, functional, has everything you need plus an amazing balcony. I can‚Äôt say enough good things about the host - Anna was very communicative and friendly  - she helped me out with my travel arrangements and gave great tips about Athens!
The place is very nice, the highlight is definitely the balcony that would be great for spring or the summer.

Tony's apartment was perfect for our group of six.  It is spacious, clean, and modern.  The recommendations for restaurants were perfect.  My family and I like to walk and appreciated the exercise walking to the main sites.  The metro is nearby for those that prefer to get places quickly.  The kitchen does not have an oven, so beware if you want to bake.  I recommend!

This is the prettiest apartment ever, stylish and with a perfect location! Everything was really clean and we enjoyed our stay so much.

AnnaMaia and Dhimitri were great hosts, the communication was very easy. The apartment was in great location, in a nice little neighborhood surrounded by local greeks. Nice coffee shop and great restaurant!

Except the amazing Acropolis view to wake up to, the location is just amazing and all the best Psyrri coffee places and restaurants are 2 min away so we didn't even boil the kettle

This is a small apartment, but since you'll be spending most of your time out in Athens, the size really doesn't matter. Big comfy bed, large clean bathroom to freshen up in, and enough counter space to hold all your yummy purchases. Despite being only a few blocks from the busy Acropolis area, nights were quiet enough that we slept with the window open. We felt perfectly safe up on the third floor, and appreciated the balcony as an extra seating option. Toni's friend met us for check-in, and helped us navigate the public bus schedule for returning to the Athens Airport very early in the morning. Great place to stay.
Great location and everything worked out really well. We will come back :)

This was a great stay within walking distance of downtown Athens with a view of the acropolis from the balcony! I felt safe staying here and the price was amazing for the quality of the place. The only thing that was a little strange was the draining system in the bathroom shower (not a deal breaker). Overall would definitely recommend if you‚Äôre looking to explore Athens!

this place was super cute, and so close to a fun and hip area. clean, and Aris communicated quickly and arranged a taxi to the airport! we love that! only downside i would say is the bars play loud music but you can‚Äôt hear it from the further 2nd bedroom.
Estamos muy contentos con el sitio, muy c√©ntrico en un barrio muy bonito con posibilidades de cenar cerca. Recomendable.
the house was super central, clean and comfortable. the host was always available and kind.

The host was extremely nice and responded quickly but the flat was extremely dirty with little to no amenities. We did pick it for the location and it was in a very good location.

Tiny but cosy apartment  with a nice terrace. Right in the middle of a very lively area with many sights, bars, restaurants, shops etc. in walking distance. Very friendly and helpful host.
Tiny, but cosy apartment close to all sights and lots of restaurants, caf√©s and bars. Yiannis is a very friendly and helpful host.
Alexandros and his mother are cordial, nice, and extremely helpful.  They exceeded all our expectations.   No doubt that they are super, super hosts.

Alexandros is a SUPERB SUPER host.  Kind, nice, helpful.  He cares for his guests with constant communication and useful recommendations.  His apartments are well located, clean and nice.    I highly recommend him as an nocarz Super host.

We had a great time at Anastasia's place. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. The apartment is equipped with everything you need. Anastasia made sure we have everything (including sheets, towels, soap, shampoos, a baby cot, baby bath liquid, jams, butter, bread, water, tea, coffee, and even a bottle of wine!)
The neighborhood is very conveniently located - it is literally 10 minutes walking from Acropolis.
Would absolutely recommend staying there!

Very nice ~4x4m^2 studio flat in Pangrati. If you like to be near the sites with great access by walking or transit to almost anywhere you'd want to go but not in the middle of the sites, you'll like this place. Alex and his Mom were both very welcoming and communicative over my stay. In spite of how many bars and restaurants are in the immediate neighborhood, the flat is relatively quiet by midnight on weeknights and 1 or 2am on weekends. The one downside is the bed which is basically just springs without cushion in top. Ok for a night or two for most people.
Vasilis was wonderful. He was always available to help and even took me to lunch. Great apartment, close to the tourist locations. Thumbs up!
I had a nice stay.  Everything was as expected. A very clean apartment in a very lively neighborhood.

The apartment is very nice and at a great location (we liked the Koukaki neighbourhood the best of all the places we went to in Athens). There is air conditioning which is very nice in the summer. It was clean and nicely put together. Communication with the host was quick and easy.

We stayed in Athens for 5 nights and enjoyed our time in this wonderful apartment very much. The neighborhood is very nice and has many good restaurants and caf√©s to offer. Thank you Marita for your help with everything!

Great hosts, great location, the apartment was very comfortable and well decorated... like being at home.
I recommend this place.

We had a wonderful stay at Marita and George‚Äôs place. The location is in a lovely neighbourhood with lots of great restaurants and bars. The area felt safe and you are only a short walk away from the tourist areas.
Marita and George were amazing hosts. Replying to any queries instantly and making sure everything was ok with our stay. Would definitely return to this apartment if we visited Athens again.

Loved every minute I spent in this cozy, tasteful space.  Every detail is perfect and everything is of the best quality. Dimitris and Diane are obviously dedicated to keeping the apartment in pristine condition and they succeed beautifully. Just being in the apartment is an event.  The location is perfect as it is in an authentic Greek neighborhood and easily accessible by foot, subway or taxi to every place you will want to visit in town. Athens is a great walking city.  Get your steps in and then enjoy the fabulous Greek food available at every turn. The view of the Acropolis from the perfect sized marble tiled balcony  is thrilling, day or night.  As others have remarked they are very hospitable people and the "welcome basket" of goodies came in handy throughout my stay. They are also discreet,  unintrusive and great communicators.  There's no need to look any further. You have happened upon the perfect nocarz. This apartment elevates your spirit and makes you feel good to be alive. Very good karma.

This view is amazing!! The unit was super clean, bed was comfy, host was able to get us a car from the airport to the condo making check-in very easy. The building is a bit odd, there's an antique market on the bottom floor, two locked gates, and five floors (no elevator) between you and the room. Building seems more retail than residential. Overall the location worked really well for us and the view was such a treat to come home to every night. Thanks Nasos!

Literally could not imagine a better location in Plaka! There is an amazing rooftop bar 2 floors up in the same building which was gorgeous. Not the quietest area but honestly didn't feel super loud since we were on the 5th floor. 2 minute walk to some really cool local nightlife, right on Monastiraki square. 15 minute walk to the Acropolis. Seriously cannot be beat for location.
Place was basic, comfortable and clean. Bed was comfortable, wifi was good. Shower was hot and good water pressure. We only stayed one night so didn't spend much time in the room but it suited our needs and like I said, great location.
Oh, and fantastic view of the Acropolis from our window, of course.
Nice, reply fast
Perfect location with a great view. Super clean and comfortable apartment. I definitely would recommend this place to any friends traveling in Athens.

Great apartment for my family of 4. Location was also excellent, close to everything (just a few blocks from Acropolis) and close to many restaurants, cafe‚Äôs, shops, and metro. Plenty of space to move around and to relax. Had all of the amenities we needed. Definitely consider staying there again next time in Athens.
There was a water outage in the area, hosts checked on us repeatedly to make sure we were ok and kept us informed. Communication was exceptional.

Lovely apartment close to downtown - very clean and well appointed .  Our Hostess Mapzavva was most accommodating and available by phone to help.   There is 24 hour parking behind the apartment as well.  Local shops , markets and restaurants added to our enjoyment of the Greek culture.    The Acropolis and Archaelogical Museum are about a 45 min walk through downtown.   Kavouri beach is about 45 min drive away.  Our family had a wonderful time
The apartment was lovely and host was accommodating. Everything was just perfect!
Nice place and convenient location.

This is a stylish and VERY spacious apartment. There aren't views, and it is a little way from Syntagma, Plaka, Monastiraki (but still fairly central, and a fairly short cab ride). But with two bathrooms, four bedrooms and a great lounge and living space it was really good value. We only had a short stay, but Vivian was gracious, efficient and obliging. Recommended.

Marzanna's place was wonderful. Very clean, great space for a group with the three bedrooms and two bathrooms. It's a short walk to the metro. Marzanna was an excellent host. We would stay here again in a  heartbeat.

quiet place, all great.

Alex is truly a super host. He was always available and communicative through Whats App, making the whole stay very smooth and accommodating. Highly recommend staying here!

Place was okey, didn‚Äôt feel like nice neighborhood. But we are still alive so can‚Äôt complain. Place have video cameras, that little bit help. In place there was some pipes outside, didn‚Äôt look nice. But everything else was nice.

A great place to stay in Athens. Ioanna was kind enough to wait up late for me since my flight got in late, and the apt is clean, quiet and well located. A block from one of the best bakeries I‚Äôve been to! Highly recommend.

My family had a very enjoyable and memorable 10-day stay at Elena's place. Elena attended to our needs and requests very quickly, one day we had lost the house keys (stolen in a tourist area outside Athens) but she was very responsive and quickly replaced the keys for us.

What a great place, it‚Äôs like being home but in a foreign country. Full kitchen, living room, dining room and a great deck (can see the Acropolis). Some local restaurants about 10 minute walk. Major tourist attractions and activities about 25 minute walk, but not a problem. If we returned would stay again ;-).

Konstantinos and Anthie were amazing,great hosts for sure.House is located close to the hearth of city for touristic places.Just 5 min walk away from the connection train station which people can change between 2 railways of the athens.House was fully clean and have everything for a long term vacation.Some people says that are is not too safe but we had zero issue around.Looking forward to our next stay. 10/11 !

Location, location, location! Koukaki is a safe and stylish neighborhood in the very center of Athens and Dimitris‚Äô place is in the center of that!
Within a 10-minute walk you will find the Acropolis, museums, incredible restaurants and bakeries and 2 metro stations. Within a 15-minute walk you can get to Plaka, Monastiraki, Psirri and more. You save time and money by avoiding taxis and trains here.
The apartment itself is airy and stylish in a typical Greek building. The rooftop has *amazing panoramic views* of Athens and the sea and is the perfect place to start and end your day. It‚Äôs addictive.
Bonus: Illy espresso machine to help you fight jet lag!
Highly recommended! Most especially for Athens first-timers who will appreciate how easy it is to get around from here.

My boyfriend and I had to book this nocarz at 4p the day of because of flight complications and delays. Dimitris was very quick to help us out and allowed us to check-in after a few hours of sprucing up the place for our stay.

A very nice room with an excellent location, near to the most important places of Athens.

Yannis and Helene have been amazing hosts! Their apartment is beautiful and very close to tourists attractions. Yannis and Helene answered all my questions and gave us great suggestions! They also checked in during all stay making sure everything was OK. They have arranged for a driver from the airport and Sarafin was also extremely helpful and provided us with great info on the city and sites to see. The apartment has an amazing view of the Acropolis, a bakery, grocery store, and taverns nearby. I highly recommend these wonderful hosts to anyone visiting Athens.

I booked the room in such short advance, however the response was super quick like texting to your friend. Check in was super easy, finding the apartment was easy as well. The room is well secured with the private key and I felt warm and safe in the property. Haven't really used the kitchen but the kitchen was great too. I was here during January which can be bit cold even though it's Greece. But the house was warm all the time. Alisa was really nice to me the whole time. However, I haven't encountered with the cat. I think the cat afraiders may not really need to worry much about it. It was really good place to stay! I recommend it!

Absolutely beautiful apartment! Very stylish with an incredible view of the acropolis. For the offered price, this place is perfect! Yannis and Helene were incredibly nice and helped us with many things like arranging a car from the airport to the apartment, using the metro around the city, as well as providing a list of their favorite restaurants and places to see! Highly recommend and would definitely stay again!

Chambre hyper centrale, super bien plac√©e pour visiter Ath√®nes √† pied et pour prendre les transports si vous souhaitez d√©couvrir les environs.

A great place to stay for your trip to Athens! This apartment is adorable. Well decorated, clean, and has everything you need. You‚Äôre in a great neighborhood close to all the touristy things you‚Äôre probably planning to see. This neighborhood has tons of trending bars, restaurants, and shops.

Very nice private apartment! Hot water, nice shower, washer, and a ton of space. If you are looking to spread out and have your own space for a few days this is the place for you. Lovely place in a very central location. Perfect to see the highlights of Athens on foot. The apartment was very clean, nicely decorated and has everything you need. Stavroula was a great host, always kind and quick to help out with tips. Highly recommended.

The house was in a great area in Athens,  next to plenty of bars and restaurants and in a walking distance from Acropolis. The metro station and the bus station is really close to the apartment. Very clean and comfortable. Stavroula was also very kind and helpful! Totally recommendedüòä

Perfect is the only word! Stabroulas communication was excellent, the apartment was gorgeous. Welcoming, stylish and extremely clean! The neighbourhood is great, with traditional food and local bars ... Absolutely loved our stay and would book again!

Very clean and spacious apartment in a very central spot in Plaka. The communication with the host Maria was easy. Maria is accommodating what made our stay comfortable and stress-free. I would definitely recommend marias place.

Loved my stay at Vasilis‚Äô place! It is immaculately clean and modern. He goes above and beyond to make sure you have a great stay. Awesome recommendations for restaurants and bars to go to. If I am in Athens again, I‚Äôll be staying at this amazing nocarz.

We loved Maria's  house. it was perfect  in every way. It wasn't huge but plenty big enough for us and wow the balcony was superb. Great location and comfortable place. Radka met us for check in and was very sweet and friendly. It felt like a warm welcome to Greece.

Great apartment. Very clean and stylish apartment. Very comfortable bed after two weeks of travelling Greece. Hosts were very helpfully with restaurants and tips on getting around Athens. Close to the metro and a big supermarket.

Nasos‚Äô apartment is absolutely beautiful! It is very well maintained and decorated. It has really everything you would need for a comfortable stay. It‚Äôs also conveniently located walking distance to a metro station, which is just a few stops from the Acropolis. Stella helped us with our checkin process while we were there and she went above and beyond. She waited for us at the metro station and walked us to the apartment. Overall, this was one of the best nocarz experiences and I would recommend to anyone. If we are ever back in Athens, we will be staying with Nasos again!
20 min walk to Acropolis, great host, very responsive and AC + wifi working well. The only down side is the area, quite dirty butnot dangerous, police station is nearby. 100% recomended.
Small but very complete and clean appartment. It had everything we needed for our stay in Athens. Close to public transport, shops and caf√©s.

Nice and stylish place, and definitely was a great value for the price. Felt clean and safe, without having to sacrifice more money. The check-in process was super simple and straight forward, and the hosts were easy to communicate with. The neighborhood was nice, but not necessarily in the heart of things. We only stayed here one night before leaving Athens, so it worked well for us, but the location itself I didn't find extraordinary. Great food within walking distance though, and a quieter part of town. Would recommend someone looking for a quiet, nice place.
Great place near Acropolis!

We stayed for a week at the apartment and think that overall the apartment is good.
The pros:
location is convenient and close to many tourist attractions. The apartment is spacious for two and is nicely furnished. It also has a dish washer which was very helpful. The bed is conformable. The kitchen is equipment with pots/pans and lots of dishes. the managing company was pretty quick in responding.
The cons:
The noise! the apartment is located right in front of a very busy street and also back again another street. So started at around 6 am you hear nothing but cars. You can't even open the windows if you need to work. The apartment gets dusty pretty quick as well. The apartment is lack of some necessities for a longer stay: For a week's stay, we were initially offered only one towel each with a tiny bottle of bodywash about the size of my thumb. There is only 2 coffee pods, 3 dish washer tablets, no trash bag.

It was my first nocarz experience and I am so lucky that I have started it with Antonia‚Äôs flat. She was so prompt, responsive and kind when I asked some questions before booking.
After booking it, she sent detailed explanations along with pictures showing where to get off at the metro to reach her flat. So you sense that she takes it seriously and puts effort.
Her flat is just 2 minutes away from the Megaro Mousikis station which is 2 stops away from the Syntagma station, one of the main stations in Athens, so location is great. Flat is big enough for 1-2 people, it was sparkling clean and refrigerator was filled with beverages when I arrived.
All in all, I really enjoyed it so I recommend her flat in a heartbeat. Thank you Antonia!

One of the best hosts you‚Äôll ever have. Felt home from the first time we entered the apartment. It‚Äôs conveniently located near metro station, old but warm apartment. The host is very responsive and kind, he shared with us many tips to get around Athens. I‚Äôd definitely recommend staying at Stergios‚Äô place.

Marianna's place is a lovely, well-furnished apartment in the neighborhood of Pangrati in Athens. The apartment is located on the ground floor in a pedestrian area. This means, that there's not so much natural light in the apartment (which can be a good thing in summertime). Also, the walls are quite thin (just like in every building in Athens), so be prepared to hear your neighbors or passer-bys during the night. The street and area is very green and nice. There's caf√©s, a bakery, a shop for fruits and vegetables and some restaurants just around the corner. Also, it's really nice to hang out at Varnava Square closeby. Marianna was very flexible with check-in and check-out and helped us to explore the city with her advice! I would definitely recommend this place.

A beautiful little apartment situated in the most beautiful neighborhood in Athens! A five minute walk to the Parthenon, ten minutes to the Acropolis! We highly recommend this lovely apartment in a beautiful plaka!
Haidi‚Äôs Apartment is fantastic and in a perfect location for any tourist. I doubt you would find one better! Haidi is an exceptional host with plenty local knowledge

It‚Äôs a nice flat in a lovely part of Athens. The flat itself is small but perfect for one or a couple. The roof terrace is huge and really makes this place special with great views east and north over Athens. I enjoyed my stay here.

Very clean, well maintained and good location. Thanks to Nikos and Konstantina for good attention. Everything for breakfast : homemade jam, water, tea and coffee. Very good address in Athen.

A really lovely, cozy nocarz experience. Lots of lovely touches from the welcome, to how thoughtfully equpped the apartment was, from friendly communication, to finding some lovely local treats waiting for me on the patio table as the Christmas period approached.

The apartment is very comfortable and practically furnished for its small size. It is located in downtown Athens on a small square with an old church and some excellent caf√©s and restaurants whose terraces are populated by locals well into the night. Nevertheless, because the window of the apartment faces an inner courtyard the apartment is very quiet and I had a very restful night there. Sofia was extremely helpful and responded promptly to all my queries, giving advice about storing my luggage between check-out time and the time of my departure. When I initially had difficulty using the wifi, she instantly offered to send someone over to fix it‚Äìin the end it turned out to be unnecessary.

Hector welcomed us personally and was really reactive from the get go. We had no trouble finding the apartment ; the bed was comfy, the apartment clean, perfect for an overnight stay!
Very clean, modern, nice place. Right next to a great restaurant, and subaway. I highly recommend it

Nasos was a great person who is warm-hearted and has quick response. The location is excellent, only 2mins away from the metro station, and it is located near the Acropolis. Safe and quite environment gave us good sleep. Moreover, there is huge terrance where we can enjoy breakfast and take a rest. If I must say a flawless, it would be the bathroom which is a bit small than I expected.
The flat is very well located and was very comfortable for our group of 8 people. We recommend it!
A great location, I loved the balcony

The apartment is situated really close to a metro which gives you access to the whole of Athens, this really is a saving factor for this apartment as the area itself is not great. There are a lot of homeless people around, the streets are dirty and it doesn‚Äôt feel very safe.
The apartment itself is pleasant, it does have a slight issue with dampness with mould in areas, but this only started to affect us towards the end of our month long stay here. The warmer months I sure this wouldn‚Äôt be as much of an issue.
The host himself is great, we never met but his communication was 10/10 and he helped with any issues we came across during our stay.
There are stores really close by for groceries and a gym on the street which was great.

We loved the city, the atmosphere, the friendly people of Athens and of course Toni's apartment. The apartment was great, spotless, fully equipped and in a very good position for the city centre, the Akropolis, the Plaka, Psiri and Monasteraki. Toni is a great host and we will definitely choose his apartment next time.

Toni's place is perfect! Super clean, spacious, near everything (downtown, Parthenon, restaurants), and Toni is super easy to communicate with. I would stay here again if I find myself back in Athens!

Alles perfekt! Hatten selten eine so gute und vor allem blitzsaubere Unterkunft! Bis in die Stadt ist es nicht weit, Pavlos antwortet unglaublich schnell und hatte gute Tipps auf Lager. Lediglich die W√§nde sind etwas d√ºnn, sodass man den Fernseher der Nachbarn h√∂ren konnte. Hat uns aber nicht weiter gest√∂rt. Deswegen alle Daumen hoch und absolut empfehlenswert!

Todo se corresponde con el anuncio, Pavlos es un anfitri√≥n atento y sus instrucciones son muy claras. El apartamento es c√≥modo y amplio y el lugar est√° muy cerca del metro Victoria, aunque la zona es un barrio que hace 50 a√±os fue de clase media griega y hoy est√° un poco degradado.
Molto pulito, non manca nulla.

Nikolaos was a great host, very friendly and easily reachable when needed. The place is ideally located to explore Athens, also easily reachable by public transport like the Metro. The house is spacious and we, two families of four, had enough space. The kitchen had all you can need; beds where comfortable and the place was overall very nice and clean and kept clean during our stay. The roof top terrace is wonderful to relax after a day exploring Athens and the views on the Akropolis and the roofs of Athens are splendid. Thank you Nikolaos, we had a memorable stay in Athens.

Beautiful villa in the heart of Plaka. Walking distance to many interesting historical museum/landmarks, as well as nice restaurants and shops. The villa is kept very clean and stylish, you can see clearly that the owners are proud of their home. The owners communicate great and we had no issues at all! 10/10!
Victoria and her apartment are both amazing.She is a  fantastic host and her apartment is in a great area of town with everything being  just a stones throw away. Highly recommended.

Theo is an incredible host! He responded very quickly to all questions and even set up a private driver to pick us up from the airport. He then gave us great local tips on the area upon arrival. Would definitely stay again.
Accurate listing. Friendly host, basic accommodations that met our needs.
We had a great time at Victoria‚Äôs apartment. Great location with all the best food you‚Äôd need right downstairs. The aircon in each room kept us cool

Very nice stay in Athens, close to Acropolis, Plaka, national gardens and most of the main attractions and restaurants in Athens. Very walkable, close to metro. A good place if you like exploring the city, it‚Äôs in the perfect location.

Wow !! Possibly the BEST hosts and nocarz we have ever stayed in !!! This apartment is not only in the trendiest suburb of Athens close to everything (hidden restaurants, bars, supermarkets, transport and more), but the apartment beats most five star hotels and the hosts are amazing ! A lovely family who baked us a cake a kindly even bought our little boy presents on arrival !! Way more than we could have expected given we have travelled to over 70 countries around the world. This apartment is brand new , designed furnished, immaculate and has so many small lovely features you wouldn‚Äôt expect (ie home made jams, fruit, Netflix, local information, kids toys, etc etc ) Simply put you will not find a better nocarz in Athens for couples and families ! We have stayed at many in Athens and Aristos  his lovely families place is a 11 out of 10 !! This ticks every single box !

What can I say that the previous reviewers haven't already gushed over? Staying in Aristos' place was an outstanding experience in every respect. Aristos and Kristina were incredibly kind, thoughtful, responsive, and genuinely wonderful people who met me in person at the apt, thoroughly introduced me to the place, and checked in later during the week a number of times to make sure all was well. And it was so well. The apartment was sparkling clean, tastefully and cozily furnished, with the basics as well as thoughtful little touches both in design as well as hospitality - the fridge was stocked with wine, homemade jam, eggs, and juice. Location is excellent - walking distance to major attractions, shopping areas, as well as near non-touristy neighborhoods that are a pleasure to stroll through.  The area and building are quiet, beds are comfortable, shower is amazing, and ACs work beautifully. A vacation, I have learned (the hard way) is only as good as your accommodations. Staying in Artistos' place I am sure made my time in Athens as amazing as it was. It was genuinely a pleasure to come back to it every day and wake up there, I felt right at home.

Amazing stay, highly recommend Theofrastos!
Spacious and cool apartment at the very center of Athens. Awesome host. Great time guaranteed

Victoria was helpful, the flat itself good.
But very, very NOISY & LOUD.
Restaurants and bars all around the flat. Noise until 3 am in the morning on weekends, weekdays at least until 1 am. We did not expect it to be so extreme.
Apartment was perfect in a everything- we have all we need and even more. Theofrastos is an excellent host!

Theo‚Äôs place was great. It‚Äôs in the perfect location and is close to the Acropolis metro stop. Theo is so thoughtful and friendly. He met us early in the morning after we arrived in Athens and let us leave our luggage with him prior to our scheduled check in so that we could start exploring the city. He was also very helpful with arranging transportation. He was very responsive and replied to messages very quickly. I highly recommend his place!
great location and value for money. we enjoyed our stay. however beware, there is a lot of noise as the apartment is next to a very busy intersection.

Theo was great, always responsive and very helpful. Extreme level of hospitality.
The apartment is located 5¬†min walking from the Acropolis area and just next to the ruins of an old temple.
We loved our stay and would definitely visit again.

Wonderful location to rest for a few days in Athens. The condo was perfect for a group of friends, with 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths and spacious living room, dining room and patios.
The condo is really close (driving or ~1.5 miles walking) from the Acropolis and market center, and easy Uber from the airport as well.

This place is in a great location, very quiet and so comfortable whether you are traveling for work or vacation. Felt very spacious and communication from the host team was great.  Would definitely stay here again when I return to Athens!

Alexandros and his apartment were both great.  A very quite location yet within metres of the attractions  the Plaka district has to offer.  The apartment itself was very comfortable, spacious and spotlessly clean.  Alexandros as a host was very helpful and communicative.  We would not hesitate to recommend the apartment.
PERFECT location! The apartment was clean & exactly as expected. I would 100% stay here again if I find myself in Athens!

Alexandros flat was really great! The rooftop terracce and the loggia - both with great view. The flat has stylish furniture and feels like home. 2 bathrooms are a amazing plus if u travel 2 girls as we did!
Great place to stay. Located in a perfect area, right next to many historical sites. The view from the rooftop was beautiful. Would recommend!
Vasilis‚Äô apartment is clean and in a good location. He is easy to communicate with. He was thoughtful and had water, juice, and cookies for us. I will be staying again in the near future.
Vasilis‚Äô  apartment is in a great location clean and updated. He is easy to communicate with. I would stay here again.
Overall, we had a great stay and the hosts were both responsive and friendly. The location of the nocarz was very walkable to central Athens which was also great for us.

The home is perfect in so many ways! There were many thoughtful details provided on how the appliances/utilities worked.  It has a very small but functional kitchen to whip up something quickly.  A stash of coffee, and was water provided which saved me time to need to shop right away.  It is located in a very central and easy to access to most activities in Athens!  Check in and check out was so easy!
Great location and apartment. We had a very pleasant stay. We recommend it 100%.
Maria and her brother were very hospitable and their flat is very comfy, you can rest and have anything you want, even the air conditioner. Huge bed, large balcony. Thank you so much.

Great location, right in the city center close to all historical sights. Clean and comfortable with new renovation. Also wanna mention so comfy bed that is so important for tourist:)
We were happy to stay there.
If you just need a cheap place to sleep close to the center, this is the place for you

great apartment,top floor,big balcony,3 split ac's.1 min. walk to grocery
Great apartment in an original neighborhood with restaurants and bakery just around the corner. The view is amazing!
Muy amable la atenci√≥n y nos han ayudado en todo. Muy buena experiencia.
Aclara lo del agua caliente porque nos duchamos los primeros d√≠as con agua fr√≠a. Lo dem√°s todo fant√°stico, gracias
Good location. A little noisy from one room.  Small boiler, so there is a little hot water.

Wir haben uns sehr wohlgef√ºhlt, die Wohnung war super sauber, ger√§umig, praktisch eingerichtet. Die Aussicht vom Balkon ist am Tag und bei Nacht grandios. Wir haben morgens beim Kaffee und abends beim Wein die tolle Aussicht auf die Akropolis genossen. Den vom Gastgeber kleinen bereit gestellten Wasser- und Kaffeevorrat incl. Filtert√ºten haben wir gerne genutzt, f√ºr alles weitere ist der Supermarkt nah genug. Im Restaurant gleich nebenan haben wir zweimal sehr gut gegessen. Alle Sehensw√ºrdigkeiten sind zu Fu√ü gut zu erreichen. Die rechtzeitige Information vom Gastgeber √ºber den bevorstehenden General-Streik hat uns sehr geholfen, unseren R√ºckflug zu erreichen. Falls wir nochmal nach Athen kommen, werden wir wieder gerne dort wohnen und unseren Freunden, die im Fr√ºhjahr 2020 nach Athen reisen, empfehlen wir die Wohnung auch auf alle F√§lle weiter. Insgesamt haben wir zu dritt vier sehr sch√∂ne Tage in Athen in einer tollen Wohnung verbracht, die von einem sehr sympathischen und zuverl√§ssigen Gastgeber und seiner Mutter vermietet werden.
Great host. Great location. Balcony was very good for the evenings / late evenings. Local eats, takeaway food, groceries, wine etc all good. loved it.

A modern stylist apartment, central location with great amenities.  Cafes, bars, shops and Athens sights are within an easy walking distance.  Central location does mean you are in the heart of the city with some of the associated noise from bars etc. into the early hours is to be expected. Great stay, good hosts, to be recommended.

Voula & Vanessa‚Äôs place is lovely. It's modernly decorated, very clean and has a lovely balcony to enjoy your morning coffee.
They provided some well received amenities such as coffee, soft drinks, some light breakfast foods and some local snacks.
It's located in a nice neighbourhood, close to some nightlife and restaurants.
I hope to stay here again in the future!

The directions to check in were very clear and easy to follow.  The area is very nice with all kinds of food choices.  The place was very clean and felt comfortable.
The most beautiful ppl and amazing place to stay!

Stelios is a perfect host: we was in touch before arrive to Athene, he wait for us for a late check in and explain us all the best places to visit and restaurant. Everything was written with maps and allow us to have a great experience in the capital and also around it.
The house was perfectly clean and there was all' necessary we need!
Position is unique: 2 minute to metro, but is in a walking distance to the centre so we didnt need it.
Is in a quite, green area, there was not noise at night but just behind the building you can find nice restaurants, bars for excellente breakfast and every kind of markets. Just a way to feel home a few minutes walking to the centre of Athens!

This house is so amazing. Beautiful and so very unique. Such a relaxing and luxe apartment. Love the hot tub and the 360 balcony. Phenomenal views. Really appreciate the stocked fridge and the little touches like extra toothbrushes and sunscreen in the bathroom. Amazing host‚ù§Ô∏è
We enjoyed to stay an Manos' appartement, it is very clean and comfortable. The location is very near to supermarket, shops, busstation or restaurants.
