It was a lovely place for our first stay in Athens, close to metro line which made every attraction easily accessible. The house itself was extremely nice, we got some beverages when we arrived, the AC was life-saving, and communicating with the hosts was really easy and they were quite helpful. I would definitely go back!
A great place

Our stay at Andreas' place was great! The apartment is exactely as we expected, clean and perfectly located in the middle of the most interesting neighborhood Exarchia. Andreas' mother kindly welcomed us even if it was late and gave us very interesting suggestions. And Andreas, even if he wasn't there, was very easy to communicate with, and always answering quickly to our messages.
I definetely suggest his place to those who want to stay in a moving neighborhood but still need some quiet time to sleep at night (there is no noise in the house).
Thank you Andreas and Vasso!
Very good location, in a nice quiet street right in the centre of the city. Well-equipped kitchen, comfortable bed, good clean bathroom. Shower was a bit small, but maybe I'm just a bit tall.

We felt very comfortable in T√®o's apartment: it was clean, well equipped (kettle, crockery, cooking utensils, Tee, ...) and is centrally located, but in a quieter area so you can relax and sleep well (the bed is also very comfortable) after a long day of exploring. There are many cute caf√©s, restaurants and small kiosks, supermarkets and bakeries near the flat. The shower is actually a bit narrow, but my boyfriend and I had no problems with it. However, if you are a bit wider, it might be a bit more difficult. T√®o and his assistant Adiam were very courteous and the communication was super friendly and uncomplicated. If we come to Athens again, we will surely come back here!

Die Wohnung ist sehr gut und mit sch√∂nen Details eingerichtet. K√ºche und Bad sowie zwei Schlafzimmer sehr angenehm. Direkt zum Wohlf√ºhlen. Genau wie auf den Bildern zu sehen und beschrieben. Je recommande.

Pasmina was excellent! I was unfortunate to get sick in Athens due to dehydration  She went above and beyond and gave me great directions on the nearest pharmacy,  where everything was in the home and went above and beyond to make sure I felt better. highly recommended  beautiful home and atmosphere. great city view and view of the acropolis.
1 min walk to Metro (for Airport & Piraeus port)
George is incredibly friendly and very helpful! The apartment is very clean and conveniently located right next to the metro station and plenty of places to get food

This was among the best apartments we staid in on our trip. After 11 other nocarz's this is saying something.
It is brand new, sparkling clean, well appointed, comfortable and quite large. I wish we could live here full time.
The location is perfect for sight seeing and very close to all public transportation. There is a coffee bar downstairs and one of Greece's best bakeries down the street.

Romano was a great host. Housekeeping employees were friendly.  We felt safe at this nocarz
Lovely clean apartment, amazing location. More spacious than I expected!

Romanos was very welcoming and gave great instructions. He was very responsive and I felt very cared for during my stay. The bed was Super comfortable. The building is secure, and it is on the edge of a trendy neighborhood. It was on a pretty well frequented street and night life made quite a lot of noise until well past 2 am most nights. It was loud for my tastes. Someone else might not mind or if you are a night time party person, this is the perfect spot. Close to lots of shops and restaurants, and the airport bus. The big window looks right into the close neighboring buildings. I wasn't expecting that from the pictures as they are strategically taken not to show it. If you aren't going to be there much, it might not bother you. As for sleeping, the automatic outdoor shutters were awesome for privacy and convenience. Access to the washer/dryer one floor below was nice other than having to empty the dryer water.
Everything is good.

ARIS is the perfect host.
Beautiful flat, nice area!
We come back! Thank you for everything

Great apartment in a good location with lots of nearby restaurants and only a short walk to attractions. Lovely balcony and beautifully designed, powerful shower too. Would stay here again. If you have long/thick hair may want to bring your own hairdryer.
Very nice place. Amazing terrasse & view. Unfortunately it was very windy when we were there. The bed was really comfy as well. Would recommend.
The apartment was lovely, with a really nice shaded balcony. The location is great for the Acropolis, and some nice places to eat nearby. Would recommend!

The apartment is exactly like in the pictures, however, since it is ground floor there is almost no natural light.
the apartment is super well equipped for everything you need during the stay.
bed and pillows extra comfortable, great towels and very clean.
the location is great, u can reach main points of interest by foot.
many restaurants and cafes around.
thanks Konstantinos for the great stay.

Flat is as described, very nice place to stay in Athens, a spacious, quiet, clean and functional flat in a nice neighbourhood (close to Lycabettes). Responsive hosts, good price for value. It is not too far from center, a good 15-20mn to get to Monastiraki by foot though, crossing some busy streets, which was a down point for me.

Lovely apartment in a great location. I came during lock-down but it was a great place to relax and get some work done. Check in and communication was very easy, the whole team are very responsive. Would definitely recommend staying here.
very nice apartment, great location. the host is very responsive  and helpful

Great location and very friendly hosts. We truly appreciated their flexibility regarding our check in hours. Clean and beautiful space. The WiFi and cellular signal were poor so I would only recommend it if you are staying for vacation and not for work.

Apostolos‚Äô apartment is great! It was spacious and clean, and ideally located. It is close to two metro lines and walking distance to all the major sites, as well as many restaurants. Apostolos was also a very helpful host who was always quick to respond to any questions and offer suggestions!

Konstantinos‚Äôs nocarz is really great! It's super well located, you can get in the center in ~20 mins, super nice grocery store in front of the building and really good night life just downstairs! I would recommend Konstantinos‚Äôs place for sure!

Sakis made our stay so authentic. Everything from the transfers from Piraeus and the airport, fantastic recommendations and his friendly spirit made our stay in Athens so memorable. The room was perfect with access to Plaka, the Acropolis and shopping right at our doorstep. This is a rare find with the warmest hospitality, the BEST view of the city and Acropolis from the rooftop patio and beautifully thoughtful decor through the whole hotel. We will certainly be back and we highly recommend to anyone staying in Athens wanting to be in the heart of Plaka. Thank you for making our stay so perfect, Sakis!

I had a great stay at Georgia's - her and Periklis' hospitality, prompt responses, and general info were wonderful. The apartment is superbly located, a stone's throw from amazing restos, bookstores, groceries and bakeries, and an enjoyable walking distance from Athens' central attractions.  The apartment was very clean, a great space for 1-2 people, with all possible conveniences (excellent shower!). Moreover, Georgia's apartment/city 'manual' with literally dozens of options is the best I've ever seen, and every suggestion I took was wonderful.

Pennys apartment was perfect for our stay in Athens. She let us come early to drop off our luggage and we‚Äôre greeted by her parents who showed us around the house. I highly recommend Penny‚Äôs apartment for your stay in Athens!!

Wonderful apartment in a great location‚Äî easy to walk to the Acropolis but in a quiet neighborhood away from the crowds. Great restaurants, cafes, and markets nearby. Best of all: a beautiful terrace with a view of the Parthenon! Dora is a wonderful host. I hope to return!

I just wrapped up my second stay at this amazing nocarz, and I can confidently say it won‚Äôt be my last! From the moment I arrived, I was reminded of why I loved this place so much during my first visit.
First and foremost, the host is absolutely incredible! They are not only warm and welcoming but also incredibly attentive and responsive. The cleanliness of the house was impeccable. It was spotless upon my arrival, which made me feel right at home. It‚Äôs clear that the host takes great pride in maintaining the space to the highest standards.
As for the amenities, they were just as fantastic as I remembered. The fully-equipped kitchen made cooking a breeze, and the cozy living area was perfect for relaxing after a day of exploring. I especially loved the comfortable bedding, which ensured a restful night‚Äôs sleep. Loved it.

We loved our stay in Effie‚Äôs flat! Effie was an excellent host, helping us with both a late check in and a late check out. We worked from the flat for a few days, and the wifi was good enough to support two people on video calls. Cool neighbourhood, and an easy walk into town. Would recommend !
Great apartment in a great location. Effie is a wonderful host very helpful and responsive. Apartment has been well thought out and has a nice feel to it. Photos accurate. Highly recommend.

Absolutely perfect spot as a solo traveler! Great access to the metro for easy transportation and close to just about everything you'll want to do in Athens. Felt very comfortable. Christina and Billy were extremely helpful!

What a fantastic nocarz! The description is totally accurate - you‚Äôre right under the Acropolis, which is beautifully visible from the apartment. And the entrance to the Acropolis and the Acropolis Museum are just a few minutes away on foot. Right outside the door is the lovely pedestrian (mostly) road that goes along the bottom of the hill; you can walk into the agora area across the street and make your way into the Plaka. Rita was lovely and welcoming and accommodating. She offered to set up a pickup from the airport which we did, and that was great too. Rita‚Äôs apartment is highly recommended!
Merci beaucoup ! Logement tr√®s bien plac√©, √† moins de 5 min du m√©tro Syntagma qui est tr√®s pratique.

Very nice stay in Athens. Apartment was clean and comfortable and perfect for my needs for a short stay. The location was absolutely fantastic, literally in the perfect spot in the city to be close to everything you need and want (ruins, great food, close to great public squares, etc). Right in the corner the food at Greco was great, and right next to that was an awesome Greek coffee and dessert place. Those were my two go-tos and it was great and super convenient. Seeing all the ruins and sites is amazingly easy from this part of town, you can literally do it all in one day if you wanted to. Great location and place. Hosting was outstanding too, Christina went out of her way to communicate clearly and in a timely way and also gave great local recommendations.
The one minor point of feedback is there were no towels in the apartment. It wasn‚Äôt a huge deal as I had to pick up a beach towel for island hopping anyway after Athens but it would have been nice for the place to have had towels for bathroom, etc. Other than that the place was great! I would recommend.

The main attraction was the spectacular views. We couldn't believe how great they were. Highly recommend this place and would stay again.
Thank you!
Rebecca & Peter

the apartment was in the center of athens, about 5 min walk to everything which was great, the apartment was easy to find and had everything you need, its located in a quiet place, but onces you were in the apartment you could hear what was going on in the building, but that didnt stop us from enjoying ourselfs
Good appartament, cozy bed, close to station and historic center. Perfect communication. You must have in mind that need to wait 15 minutes to shower, but that's ok.

This location is the greatest. Walking distance to a nice food court. Lolo‚Äôs Seabream is superb. Romina and George were both great and patient. The room was very clean and a great value. If it‚Äôs available definitely take advantage.
Had a great stay at Romina‚Äôs place!
It‚Äôs a nice place to discover Athens. Good location.

This apartment is a little gem for culture lovers and is located in the coolest neighborhood in Athens.
Dimitrios is a great guest ! Very friendly and helpful, he has great tips for good places in Athens.
All in all, this is a great place to stay and discover Athens !
I warmly recommend it !
it is in a great neighborhood. There are nice cafes and restaurants nearby. It is close to everything.

We had a great stay in your clean and comfortable apartment.  Thanks for your timely response on all the questions we have and arranging the transportation to the airport!  The driver is very friendly and helpful !
Very well located, clean and spacious. A great stay in Athens, 100% recommended.

This place is amazing.  Mario and Georgia's apartment is even better in person (the pictures do not capture it's beauty or proximity to the Acropolis).  It was very clean and very safe, wonderful neighborhood that is not loud at all.  The apartment has everything you need, fully stocked kitchen if you want to cook (we ate out every meal).  Wine and bottled water on arrival, as well as toast and jam for the next morning.  Individual climate control for each bedroom and living area.  Washing machine was easy to use.  And it's close to everything!  We visited the Acropolis (south entrance near by) and Acropolis museum (right across the street), we walked to Sintagma square and the National Gardens.  We took the metro to the National Archaeological Museum,  just a few stops away.  We hiked up to Filopappou Hill- most beautiful views of Athens and the Acropolis.  We are dinner at the plaka (To Kafeneion  (address Epicharmou 1) has authentic Greek on a nice side street).  We also discovered To Kati Allo right outside the apartment- the most delicious Greek food I've ever had (we ate there twice!)  Wonderful mother and son duo who run the place with unbelievable hospitality and great prices.  It is very unassuming walking by,  you will not regret eating there!  Our only regret was not having more days in Athens.  We look forward to staying at Peripatos again!
Very nice spacious apartment in a perfect location to explore Athens. Lots of historical sites, shops, and restaurants in the area.

Spacious apartment in a nice location in Athens. Our family of six (4 teenagers) had plenty of space and enjoyed the comforts.  The rooftop is especially nice at sunset with great city views. The place was nicely decorated and the beds comfy. There is a good sized kitchen/dining area too. Convenient location to many restaurants and the tours and activities we did in Athens.

Mary was a great host. Her apartment is stylishly decorated with a lovely, spacious balcony. But the best part about our stay was the location - a short walk to major attractions such as the Acropolis, ancient Agora, and the beautiful Plaka neighbourhood, and right in the heart of the very lively Psyri neighbourhood. We loved strolling through the bars, restaurants and impressive street art around the apartment. The aircon was a lifesaver too on 37 degree days! Highly recommend this apartment.

I give John and Emma's place the best of recommendations. It was clean and contained everything you need to have a pleasant stay away from home. This basement apartment was located close to the metro, cafes, restaurants and Lycabettus Hill.
Great place, excellent hospitality

Good location : close to train, bus stations. Shops, caf√©s & tavernas & supermarket.
Quiet and safe area
Host is very attentive to your needs and responds immediately to you requests.
Immaculately clean.
Very nice host, the apartment was very comfortable and clean. Very flexible with check in! We're satisfied:)
Super well-located studio. EVERYTHING is walking distance. My friend and I really enjoyed our stay!
They place are amazing very comfortable amazing. The apartment had all the necessary . The host was incredible and very nice person definitly If I come back I'll stay there again.
This apartment is absolutely cute.  It is exactly the same as described. George is a great host.  Super quick to respond to my request. Smooth check in and check out experience.

We stayed only one night for this it was ok, but for a longer stay it would be too uncomfy and not so clean. The bed isnt comfortable and the facilities are old and not to good maintained. But thank you for the quick communication!

Great communication from start to finish, easy to book, all check in instructions were easy to follow. Room was lovely and clean and an ideal size for the time we were there.
Ideally situated on Ermou street so all shops, restaurants and attractions are all within easy walking distance. Unfortunately there isn't a view with this room but that didn't matter for the time we were there.
Perfect place, great location and rooftop

Amazing apartment in the Plaka district with clear views of the Acropolis, the Temple of Zeus and Hadrian‚Äôs gate with lovely balconies. Konstantinos was always available for any questions. Definitely recommend!

A great and comfortable place, exactly as described, with all the amenities you would hope for. Everything here feels good quality - good mattress, comfy sofa, good TV (with Netflix!), good coffee machine and new, clean kitchen utilities. All of this adds up to a very easy and comfortable stay - would highly recommend!

Our family has traveled quite a bit and so we've stayed in many nocarz rentals. This apartment stands out as one of our very favorites. The location is unbeatable - from the windows you can see the Acropolis, Hadrian's Arch, and the Temple of Zeus. The pedestrian street that leads to the Acropolis is adjacent to the building, with dozens of restaurants, cafes, and shops.
The apartment is beautifully furnished, with huge windows and wonderful natural light. It was equipped with everything that our family of 4 needed.
Konstantinos was such a gracious, friendly, responsive host. There were a few occasions when we had questions for him, and he would respond or call us right away.
I highly recommend this apartment! It felt like an oasis in the city and we wish we could have stayed longer.

Zoi es encantadora
Me hizo una estancia inmejorable, el piso ideal y con muchos detalles
The apartment is centrally and conveniently located, was clean and accurate. Would recommend to anyone needing a place to stay in Athens for a few nights!
Theodore's place was fantastic, my partner and I stayed here for a few nights while visiting athens and felt right at home. Very friendly and responsive hosts!

The apartment is perfect!  We couldn‚Äôt imagine a better home for the long weekend than this. The apartment itself is so unique and amazingly functional. There is a ton of local information available and many other thoughtful touches. Theo and his team were a pleasure to work with. Communication was top notch. On my next trip to Athens, this apartment will be at the top of my list.

We had a wonderful time in the apartment and we will always remember our time in Plaka. The apartment is located in a nice and quiet street in the heart of Plaka. The apartment is very comfortable and very tasteful decorated and you really feel at home the moment you enter in it. You can walk around and enjoy lots of nice restaurants and terraces and the area is extremely safe and beautiful!

Romina's apartment is very beautiful and in a very cool neighborhood! Everything was as described in the description and very clean. Romina also left good recommendations for places to eat and visit in the area.

Romina‚Äôs apartment is in a great location and very cute. We loved staying there and loved the thoughtful recommendations she gave us in and around her neighborhood. We would definitely stay there again!

We had a great stay at Romina‚Äôs. The flat is perfectly located in a very cool area with a lot of bars and restaurants (Romina wrote a very detailed guide about this and everything you need to know about Athens) and at walking distance of the Acropolis. The flat was very clean and just like in the pictures. Romina was super reactive and flexible. I definitely recommend her place!
Perfect location, great host, thank you for your quick communication!!

Nadine & Family's place was absolutely perfect. The space felt very homie and my two kids (8 & 13) even mentioned how much they loved it. Nadine greeted us at door and showed us around the apartment, the detail and thoughtfulness was amazing, they had even left a few groceries for us to enjoy - (orange juice, bread, and even a small bottle of wine - which came in very handy after walking around all day with the kids!) The location was fantastic - right around the corner from all the restaurants, shopping, and about a 5-minute walk to the Parthenon.
Thank you so much! Had an absolute wonderful stay and would definitely stay here again next time!
Great place, super cozy and in a perfect location and neighbourhood for an Athens stay. Highly recommended

This is the perfect place to spend several days exploring Athens and all it has to offer a visitor. Lovely in itself and located in a delightful, historic, and charming neighborhood, with everything you want right at hand, the apartment is charming, comfortable, and fully equipped -- with even a washing machine! We spent two days and nights there but the arrangements are such that we could have spent a week if we'd had the time. I can't imagine there's a nicer place in Athens -- even if you pay more!

Can highly recommend a stay here.  The central location was perfect for seeing the sights of Athens whilst also being secluded enough that it was quiet in the evenings.  We stayed as a family with 5 year old twins and it was also child friendly with kids activities, Netflix etc all available. The host,  Philippe, made everything so easy for us from initial booking through to checkout. He communicated instructions to reach the apartment, updated us with current events in Athens which may impact our plans, provided a map for the local area with recommendations for where to shop, eat etc. and was always on hand for any queries which he responded to very quickly.  He helped us out with a late checkout and made everything very simple for us - would certainly stay here again and recommend it to others.

Ilias is a great host. He was very helpful and kind. We travelled with our two kids, 3 and 1 y.o. He provided for us a baby crib and a high chair. He also allowed us to stay longer in the apartment until 5:30pm on our departure day as we had a late flight- this was very helpful!
Location is fantastic, close to the most attractions of Athens, in a safe and quiet area. Supermarket, restaurants and bakeries nearby.
The apartment is gorgeous, spotless clean, cozy and stylish. Excellent shower, bathroom, and well equipped kitchen. We cooked our breakfast, it has everything we possibly needed. We also used washer and dryer.
Overall we loved our stay, would highly recommend this place!

This apartment was superb - well designed, exquisitely clean and well appointed. We could not have asked for a better location for our short, family stay. The beds are super comfortable and the bathroom/shower luxury hotel standard! Philippe, our host, was always at hand (virtually) to support throughout our stay and I would not hesitate to recommend his apartment to friends and family looking for an ideal stay in the heart of Athens.
Had a lovely stay at this place, very clean with new appliances. Both Ilias and Aris were very communicative. Will definitely stay here again.

An absolutely beautiful property. Very clean, spacious and well-appointed. The presence of an elevator was very much appreciated for getting all of our luggage to the 2nd floor. The location was perfect, with easy pedestrian access to the central hub of Athens. Philippe was very communicative and extremely helpful in ensuring that our stay was perfect. Highly recommended!

Great location near all major attractions with a residential feel unlike the more tourist popular neighborhoods. Apartment had a great terrace area, beautiful kitchen, living room and bedrooms. Highly recommend when staying in the Athens Center.

Ilias was a great host! He was responsive before and during the stay. The apartment was in a great location. We found it very clean and had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend and stay again!
Everything was perfect, there many coffes and restaurants near the apartament, 15 min on foot from the city center, also there is a underground 5 min walking and Elena was so friendly and usefull!
Great appt run by great hosts. Just renovated, everything clean and modern. A place I would like to come back to Athens for. Thanks!

Super well located, feels pretty safe, really comfortable, stylish space, rooftop with a pretty cool view! Loved our stay there. Something to be aware of if you‚Äôre planning on getting out fast in the morning: to get hot water in the flat you need to press a switch and wait for 20 minutes. It says that the hot water then lasts for 3 showers, but it didn‚Äôt for us, just about 1 shower... not sure if that‚Äôs something that will be fixed or if we weren‚Äôt using it right!
Josif is a great social friendly guy besides his place is so gorgeous and in a great location. I highly recommend booking with him and I'll do the same next time I'm in Athens!

Wonderful stay in Athens. We were able to drop off our luggage early and get changed from our airport clothes. The view from the nocarz was beautiful, right in the heart of the city, you can see the acropolis from window. Location was perfect within walking distance to everything we needed!
Great apartment. There were 4 adults 2 young children and an infant and the apartment suited us well. Great rooftop view of the Acropolis.
Great location, great space! We loved the rooftop terrace and views. Everything we needed was there, communicating was simple and clear.
Good apartment with amazing views from roof terrace, great location and very helpful hosts!

Right from the start we know we made a great decision staying here. The building is secure and offers an incredible rooftop view of the Acropolis. Delicious restaurant right next door and the location offers easy access to the beautiful, lively neighborhood of Psirri.

Really nice flat very clean the host was very nice and responsive also great location I would definitely stay here if you‚Äôre in Athens!!
Convenient, spacious, and clean! Absolutely loved my stay here. Was close to Monastiraki and very central. Would definitely stay here again!

I was very glad I chose this rental. The hosts' father met me at the train and walked me the 50 meters to the rental. It was literally around the corner near one of the most popular sites in the city. As a female solo traveler I felt completely safe at all times and finding it each time couldn't have been easier. The apartment was adorable. A perfect pick, great hosts (they left a complete breakfast meal in the fridge) and ideal location. Can't recommend enough.

A lovely stay in a great area of Athens. Panos was a hospitable host, kindly offering to organize my taxi from the airport and happily meeting me at the apartment with the keys, a tour of the apartment and local tips, despite my plane getting in late in the evening. A lovely welcome for my first time arriving solo in a new city.
The apartment is spacious and stylish and the location is fantastic. The beds were a little hard and the noise from the busy road outside could be a bother if you‚Äôre sensitive to that, but otherwise it‚Äôs a wonderful place to relax, listen to records, watch Netflix and sit back with a cup of tea after a long day wandering around vibrant Athens.

Anastasis and Vicky were absolutely amazing hosts - responsive, friendly, and very helpful. They organized car transfers for our group of 5 from the airport to the apartment and from the apartment to the port - it was extremely helpful!
The apartment is amazing, clean and comfortable. The view is priceless! We are looking forward to another stay soon!

Staying at Manos‚Äô place was fantastic ! The apartment was exactly as described but best of all was the wonderful hospitality we received from Manos and his family - nothing was too much trouble for them. They have an amazing bakery across the road from the apartment and it was so tasty, we went back multiple times a day ! Would absolutely recommend staying here again.

Manos was a great host - super responsive! This nocarz was a good value.

If I can could give a million star rating I would. People like Manos ans the people behind him are the reason why I would choosw Air BNB over any 5 star hotel, any day. The price we payed was very small as compared to the service we received from them. The place was awesome, very hotel like, and the free breakfast Manos prepare every morning is Excellent. The place is at a very excellent location, only walking distance from the Acropolia, Plaka, and Temple of Zeus. We were also lucky to have met the very kind and good Filipino Family of Kuya Loyd who is helping Manos on the Apartments. From the day of our arrival up to our departure from the place, Manos and the family helped us a lot. This is the kind of place I would go back again and again. If ever I would be visiting Greece again, I‚Äôm a 100% sure that I‚Äôm going back at this place. Highly recommended. Me and my fianc√® really loved our stay in this place.

Let‚Äôs start with the obvious. The view. Wow, just wow! Few places in Athens will give you such a marvelous view of Parthenon and Acropolis, which is absolutely stunning day or night. That view alone is well worth the price of admission! You can enjoy it from a living room or a large terrace adjacent to it, weather permitting. But view is hardly the only perk. You get a centrally located, clean, spacious, nicely appointed apartment, with a well stocked kitchen, from utensils to coffee. There‚Äôs a cafe downstairs and a grocery shop a few steps away as well as literally dozens of restaurants within 10-15 minutes walk. The owner was attentive and helped eagerly with arranging our transfer from and to the airport, so our trip to Athens was smooth from beginning to end. Dimitros, the driver, was always on time and super efficient and informative. Our only gripe is the occasional noise coming from a busy street that runs along the Acropolis. But then, maybe it‚Äôs just us, used to absolute quiet of suburbia. We‚Äôd be delighted to come back!

This may be the closest you can stay to the Acropolis. The spectacular view out the sliding doors did not disappoint. My son fell asleep on the sofa bed each night staring at the Parthenon. It was a highlight of the trip for him. The location is right on the corner of an intersection, so traffic in the evening can easily be heard on the street, but it wasn‚Äôt enough to keep anyone from sleeping.
The local mini mart and bakery a couple of blocks away were fantastic! They were very welcoming and helpful with suggestions and translations.
If we make it back to Athens, this will be the first place I look for next time. Great communication, helpful recommendations, and they even helped arranged a ride for us from the airport. It was so nice to leave baggage claim and see the driver holding a sign with our name. Such a seamless transition helped get our trip off to a fantastic start!

Entering into the home at night and seeing the Acropolis all lit up was absolutely breathtaking.
The bathroom was updated and clean.
Loved that there were 2 private bedrooms.
Elevator was a plus

El alojamiento muy bonito, muy bien ubicado.
Manos y Fay muy amables y muy atentos

This place was very lovely. Beautiful view in a wonderful location! Highly recommend

Two things to point out that I saw in which I didn‚Äôt bother the host about because we were there for only two nights is that the shower curtains had mildew on it which was prob just an over sight by the cleaning lady so wasn‚Äôt the biggest deal and the other thing was the front of the apartment. Elevator almost gave me a heart attack because it is very old school and tight so for one there is a door that closes but tight space and for the other u get on and there is no door until u get to ur floor you are just staring at the brick wall and for that purpose I opted to take the stairs when we were going out and coming back to the apartment.
Overall I would say the apartment and the view is spectacular but building and street it is on is a little sketchy but one street over and Athens come alive.

Delightful, spacious flat with lush outdoor space and beautiful church views. Great service at check-in and check-out.
Monastiraki is a fun neighbourhood and Despina's flat is right in the thick of it all. Buzzing with small cafes and friendly restaurants, a plethora of tiny retailers, from rugs to fabric, from kitchen and bathroom appliances to children's toys, spiritual bead shops and street markets.
There's a minor snag to be aware of: especially if you're a light sleeper you'll likely be up from 7am when the church bells kick you out of bed. And if you're generally super sensitive to building sounds, you might get irritated by the running elevator at all times of the day.
Otherwise - it's a 9/10. Would definitely recommend.
Very nice apartment !
Seriously above and beyond! Third time in Athens, it‚Äôs the perfect location and an incredible place the stay. The patio is spectacular- would def recommend!

Great place to stay! The best part is the hostess. She made our trip such a breeze.
If you're a light sleeper you may want to bring some earplugs. Athens can be pretty noisy at night.

This was a beautiful, clean and comfortable nocarz located within a central location in Athens. We booked this very last minute when we showed up to our original nocarz and it was terrible. From the moment we finalized the booking, Svetlana was there to help. She immediately met us at the apartment to check us in and made sure we were comfortable.
The apartment has all of the modern amenities you would need and is great for a small group. The 2nd bathroom was a huge hit as we were a group of 5.
The neighborhood was fairly quiet and the metro is right across the street. There is also a great bakery one block away and plenty of places to grab a quick bite.
Thank you Svetlana for being such a great host!

Very good flat ! We really enjoyed our stay , very very good location , you have everything you need around you . No need for a call at all . The owners are very responsive . Highly recommended , well defiantly come back !

Niki and Matina‚Äôs place was awesome and exactly what was shown in the photos! Love the views and balcony! Check in was smooth and hassle free, the amenities provided were also aplenty and was a nice touch with the welcome gift, travel adapters, home made wine and spirit which added to the experience:) would strongly recommend staying here!

My new husband and I unfortunately missed our flight over to Athens, but Matina was very sweet and accommodating to help us the whole time! She arranged for a car to pick us up at the airport and she was at the apartment upon our arrival. The apartment was clean and beautiful. Views were even better than the pictures!
Lovely place to stay and explore Athens! Great patio and nice view of the acropolis.

Great place to explore Athens. Great location with everything in walking distance. Nice terrace. Niki is so nice, responsive. Recommend!

Norma's place was great.   it was clean,  well presented and completed.   had everything I needed and many things that would have been helpful if I only had the time.   her hospitality and flexibility was greatly appreciated and I look forward to returning when I come back to Athens

This is a small apartment close to Monasteriki, right in the heart of the downtown. Very good location for exploring the sites, everything is within walking distance. Can be busy and noisy, especially on weekends. That said, apartment was on 4th floor, so it was still pretty good. Super cute, compact space with two bedrooms, living room/kitchen, bathroom and a good size deck. Very clean, well managed, excellent communication. Highly recommend.
Spacious apartment in a great location.
Easy communication. Location is great. Everything easily within walking distance.
Great location, short walk from the bus from the airport. Lots of space with 2 1/2 baths. Friendly host to let us in.
This is a great, spacious apartment to stay in if you want to explore one of the nicest neighbourhoods in Athens! Walking distance to everything you need and plenty to do.

Manos' place is a really nicely laid out apartment, with lots of natural light and within walking distance from most of the key spots in Athens. Though it says 'sleeps 2' we did not realise these are not two distinct rooms, with the beds separated by a standard window blind. It's ok if you are with friends or family, but if not, might not be the ideal place if you want privacy. Manos gave some great local recommendations for dining out, drinks and coffee. The entry is unfortunately located between two adult/sex stores, so is a bit unsightly. However, the interior of the apartment was really nice, lots of storage space, a big kitchen counter top, full bath and shower.
Place is just as shown in pictures and in a very nice location. The beds were especially comfortable and the view was amazing.
Had a great stay here with friends! great location and beds were super comfy!
Lovely aparment with nice view. Great location. Maria is very helpfull host.

We felt like home at Jenny‚Äôs apartment. Jenny was great, really kind and helpful, she made us feel welcome since the first day. The house has everything you may need and it is located in a nice neighborhood where you can find restaurants, coffee shops, supermarkets and bars. We really enjoyed our time at her place and if we ever come back, we would definitely stay at her place again.
Very nice and modern apartment!
Everything was great good location clean house kind and helpful owner

We really enjoyed our stay at Fedon‚Äôs place. It is a very spacious apartment with a nice little balcony. The area is very close to public transit and restaurants. Fedon gave clear check-in instructions which we really appreciated. I wish we could have stayed longer! Would highly recommend.
The place is very conveniently located, all the main attractions of Athens are within walking distance! Fedon is very responsive and the apartment is very homey.
That is a good apartment. Marilena is very kind. And she help us save ohr luggage. That is a nice experience.

We stayed for 2 nights at Marilena's apartment.
Our flight was delayed but Marilena sorted out our cab brilliantly and the driver was there with a name card to meet us and took us straight to the door, and only at the same cost as a normal cab too. The arrival and self service entry was plain sailing all the way and Marilena's instructions were spot on too.
The apartment is spotlessly clean, in a really cool area and has everything you'd need for a short on long stay in Athens. Marilena even supplied us with a few hints and tips for cool things to seem, places to eat, drink and just take in the vibe in Athens which was a really nice extra.
We only had 2 nights before leaving for the Greek islands but wish we'd had longer.
Thanks Marliena for your hospitality and if we are every in Athens again we will be back and will make sure our friends know of you too.

We had a lovely stay at Sophias apartment in athens. The apartment itself is lovely with an amazing balcony and the area was really buzzy with lots of cafes and bars and easy walking to other parts of the city.

My wife and I had a nice stay at Sophia‚Äôs place.
We loved the neighborhood / location and would gladly return. This was our main concern before coming to Athens and Exarcheia and couldn‚Äôt have been happier. The neighborhood was lively and we enjoyed spending time at various cafes / bars / restaurants. This spot is close to the main touristy parts of town, we walked everywhere.
We found Sophia to be a kind and responsive host. The apartment is large and we loved the terrace. The only cons we experienced were that the apartment was not the cleanest and a variety of minor things in the apartment were kind of broken: the toilet seat being loose, washing machine handle broken off (still works but tricky to open), door knob coming out, door curtain coming off, etc.
I still recommend a stay here because of the location and communication with the host but wanted to share the above as we were surprised considering the really high reviews previously given.
Had a great stay at Sophia's apartment, well located nearby the center and with nice restaurants and bars around
Really liked the place was nice to be surrounded by local culture with only a 10 minute walk to the main popular areas. Great place!

Cozy apt, located a bit far from the city center but super close to metro and a supermarket. The kitchen was also well equipped. Evangelos was very helpful and accessible (although we have not met in person). I would recommend for a couple rather than for friends as there was only one bed to sleep.

We enjoy the stay here, bed was very comfortable, apartment was warm with extra heating device, owner reacts very very fast and also change a new water boiler after we found former one does not work.
Around 5-10 min walking from the Metro station, I took bus line 1/5/10 just 3min walking distance everyday to visit the attractions, which is very convenient.
Would suggest with the price.
Possible to store luggage in their office just several hundred meters away.
Would suggest
Place was great and location was perfect! It can be dodgy towards Filopappou hill at night time so be extra careful if you are planning on a night walk over there.

This is honestly the best nocarz I have stayed in. The home is beautiful! We really enjoyed the outdoor courtyard and the location was perfect.  Akrivi, our host,  was amazing.

Amazing nocarz!  You are right on the main walking path around Athens.  Great restaurants, stores, & bars that are all easily accessible.  The view of Acropolis was stunning!  Rachel communicated with me any time I had questions.  10/10 recommend this nocarz and I‚Äôve stayed all over the world!

Lovely apartment, beautifully restored and decorated. Great location for walking to everything. Our family of 4 were very comfortable, it is quiet and AC worked well.
Rachel is a great host, quick and easy to communicate with and arranged taxi from airport for us.

Athene is fantastisch en dit appartement heeft een geweldige ligging om deze stad te ontdekken! Je loopt zo naar de restaurants, winkels en bezienswaardigheden. De buurt voelde ook heel veilig.
Het appartement was schoon en mooi ingericht.
Bedden konden gescheiden worden tot 1-persoonsbedden en hadden heerlijke matrassen. We hebben heerlijk geslapen. Ruime slaapkamers ook.
Je hoort wat straatlawaai af en toe, maar voor lichte slapers was het met de ramen dicht en het keukenraam aan de achterkant open voor frisse lucht prima slapen.

The apartment was very clean, well furnished, at walking distance from the Acropole and the Metro station and located in a very quite pedestrian area. Panos is extremely kind and helpful. I recommend it to everybody !

Anastasia‚Äôs apartment is at a very nice location - in a quiet and relaxed neighborhood, while being close to the center of Athens. The apartment is very clean and well organized. Anastasia has been an amazing host in terms communication and accuracy. I would strongly recommend Anastasia‚Äôs apartment to anyone visiting Athens!

Panagiotis‚Äôs place was everything and more. The pictures do not do it justice. He was very easy to communicate with, showed and left instructions and recommendations. The space is absolutely beautiful and has everything you‚Äôll need for your stay.  Conveniently located near the Metro and a 12 min walk to the center of Athens. The balcony views from the front of the street, and the rooftop view is out of this world. This was one of the best nocarz‚Äôs I‚Äôve ever stayed at. I will definitely stay here every time I‚Äôm in Athens.

The owner cares about every detail and is always very kind. That made me feel really good when I was here. The room and wifi are great and the bed is comfortable! Except for loud sounds from cars and motorcycles. But I can sleep well after I use earplugs and play music all night :)

Amazing nocarz, impressively clean and well furnished. The location is convenient - about 15 mins walk from the Monastiraki Square. The hosts Kevin and Sokol were so accommodating. Would definitely recommend!!

Our stay at the Air BnB was great! It was an amazing location right near the city centre, restaurants, markets etc. The view from the rooftop of the Acropolis & Parthenon was breath taking! My sister and I felt safe in the Air BnB and the host was great! He let us store our luggage in a secure place before check-in and the house keeping staff took it to our room. When we checked out they secured it as well and the host even arranged for a taxi for us which was half the price of the one we paid for from the airport. Highly recommend using his taxi driver both ways (around ‚Ç¨40). The room was so cute, clean and looked newly renovated. The host was very responsive and as two young females travelling, it gave us peace of mind knowing we had someone we could ask questions to. We were comfortable and really enjoyed our stay and the air conditioning was definitely a plus in August. Amazing for the price as well! Highly recommend.

Great location and very quiet considering it‚Äôs centrality.

This was a lovely place to stay. It is walkable to all the sites without being in the touristy area. The restaurants nearby are excellent and there‚Äôs also a grocery ~1min walk away. The apartment is clean, comfortable and aesthetically pleasing. Sophia is a friendly, helpful and communicative host and elevated the experience further! As others have noted the bathroom is very small and the ceilings in the second floor space are a bit low so if you are especially tall those are just things to be aware of, but overall I highly recommend Sophia‚Äôs place!

Central apartment in Plaka, not far from main attractions. Dimitris kindly agreed to refund one night's stay when my plans changed at the last minute. Luggage can also be stored at the building after check out.
Exactly as described & accurate photos! Great patio, air conditioning and has blackout curtains. Perfect location, would absolutely stay here again!
It‚Äôs a lovely apartment. The host answered all the questions very quickly and gave us good advices about where to eat. The location is perfect, probably the best place to stay in Athens.

Great place, superb location. Spacious, clean, easy check in and check out. Would stay again.
We had a great stay here! The host was very communicative and accommodating. The location is excellent, the apartment was clean, and we appreciated the use of a washing machine and dryer.
Wonderful location, beautiful apartment. Nefali is a very gracious and helpful host. Highly recommended!

Apartment was centrally located to everything and clean! The view from the back patio was amazing. Getting in was very easy thanks to Nefeli setting up the lockbox, and communication was pefect. Thank you for a great stay Nefeli!

My third time in Athens and had the best view and best times at Nefeli‚Äôs place. The view of Acropolis was gorgeous. We had everything we need in the kitchen when we decided to eat in due to the rain one day.

Very well kept property. Reasonably priced and has all the ammenities. The grocery store location is a 10 min walk. If you are reaching at odd hours please come with stuff to get your day started.

Bill's communication was perfect. He made sure everything was perfect for us. I recommend this host!

This nocarz is absolutely gorgeous, and in a prime location for visiting Athens. I can't recommend it enough; it is dead silent inside (a rarity in this area!) and has double doors opening to a courtyard. The style is minimalist yet gorgeous and curated. The hosts were extremely accommodating with check-in times, and gave great recommendations in terms of food, things to do, tips (like buying acropolis tickets in advance), etc. Definitely cannot be beat for the price!

Great location - walking distance of bars, restaurants and historical sites.  Bill provided us detailed instructions and local tips which were very useful. He was very responsive and friendly. The apartment vas very spacious and clean! Overall, great experience. We would totally visit again.

I recommend 100% !
Gregory‚Äôs place was a great stay. Great location for our night in Athens. We walked to the Acropolis and local restaurants around town. Perfect for our short stay

A great place to stay in Athens- very convenient so possible to nip back in the early afternoon when it is most hot before going out again later in the day. Fantastic location  for all local amenities and the quiet location and air conditioning unit was wonderful given the high temperatures outside whist we were there.

Nice small apartment in the center of Athens. You can walk to all the main attractions. There are also good restaurants and supermarket near it. Since it's located on a busy street in the city center, it sometimes gets noise at night, so it might be not comfortable for those who like to sleep when it's completely quiet.

Beautiful apartment in Athens city center! Great view of the Acropolis from the balcony and directly above all restaurants and bars. I‚Äôd recommend this as a great stay for two!

Gregory's place was perfect! For a very reasonable rate, Gregory picked us up from the airport and checked us into his place. He was super responsive via WhatsApp and even gave us a ride back to the airport as well. His place was clean and cute! He even had a bottle of wine for us to enjoy. In terms of location: there's a lot of little cafes and restaurants nearby, and the city as a whole is very walkable -- we were able to walk to everything we wanted to see! I would definitely stay here again.
Great location, the apartment is spotless, our host was very quick to respond to any questions. Everything is in walking distance from food to archeological sites. It's perfect!

Great location! Close to tons of restaurants, shops, and the sights. The apartment is clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay again!
Great place, right in the heart of Athens.
Good location and clean apartment. The only thing to be aware is that the apartment lacks some natural light and ventilation is a bit tricky.

Gregory was extremely accommodating and was quick to respond. We had never been to Athens before, so he gave us a lot of great recommendations and told us the best way to get to and from places. The nocarz is beautiful and can easily sleep three people. There is also a great outdoor area if you want to enjoy coffee or some cocktails outside!

Our stay at Stelios‚Äô place in Athens was absolutely fantastic!  The location was amazing, just the perfect base for my Athens adventure.  The restaurants below were great, offering delicious meals just steps away from the apartment.  The host was super communicative and friendly, ensuring a smooth and pleasant experience throughout my stay.  The apartment itself was comfortable and had lovely cool A/C, which was a blessing after a day of exploring.  I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Athens!
Great location to be amongst everything , clean space with everything you would need and the annotated map and information about the city was very useful! A fantastic trip!

My recent stay in Athens was an absolute delight, and it wouldn't have been possible without this amazing nocarz experience. From the moment I stepped foot into the apartment, I felt at home. The location was ideal, situated right in the heart of Athens.

Great located and friendly apartment. Metro-line Syngrou-Fix is a few steps across the streets, also restaurants & caf√©s are nearby. You can walk to the Akropolis entrance in about 15min. Big terrace, comfortable bed. Kitchen & bathroom are not brand new but everything was very clean. Safe neighborhood. Thanks for the stay! Happy to come back one day.

Angeliki is an excellent host! Her place is in a great location that was easily walkable to many restaurants and attractions, but still quiet once inside so easy to sleep. Angeliki was very responsive, helpful, and gave recommendations for places to stay during a later part of our trip when her place was no longer available. Angeliki's place had everything we needed.

Perfect apartment in a great location with a lovely view of the acropolis from the balcony.
Theocharis was a great host - really enjoyed the cold drinks in the fridge after a day of travelling in very warm weather. Thank you!
Very nice owner and cozy home!  we really liked it, would definitely stay there again!  Everything matches the description, we are very satisfied!

This place has an AMAZING location! Anything major you want to visit in Athens is a really short distance from the place. Ultra safe, walkable and in the Plaka area where ancient philosophers lived! There is plenty of space in the apartment and Dimitri was awesome making taxi arrangements for us! we had an unforgettable time at this place!

I had to ask for the check-in instructions because Michael didn‚Äôt send them on his own, however he responded quickly so it‚Äôs not a big deal. The place was easy to find and the location is good. When we arrived, we were greeted by an unpleasant odor that was quite off-putting. Next we discovered that all the drains were covered with plastic containers to prevent cockroaches. That was unexpected and it really set us off. Then we disovered that all the cushions looked like they haven‚Äôt been washed for the last ten years. So we sat on the rug on the ground, because that looked the cleanest, and after 20 minutes of polemizing we decided to book a different appartment. I believe that this place could be great for somebody, unfortunately not for us.

The apartment is lovely with a little terrace that catches the morning sun. It is comfortable and beautifully designed. Ioannis responded to any query we had within seconds. We loved it there.

Our stay was very good and the apartment is very nice with a breathtaking view.
Only we found the entrance to the building is a little bit weird.
We will stay here again for sure

This location is very central to down town Athens. Walking distance to all the sight seeing spots. Air conditioning available for those hot days! Would plan on staying here again the next we are in Athens.

We loved staying here! The outside makes you question yourself, especially because the ground floor smells like cigarette smoke and the rest of the building appears (though it isn't) abandond. You do have to walk up a flight of stairs to get to the apartment, but when you do, it's great! The bed is big, the shower is really nice, and the views are *incredible* from every room: you can see the Acropolis out of the windows in the living room/kitchen and bedroom, and from the rooftop you can see both the Acropolis and Lycabbetus. The location is great, really central, though you can't drive right up to it (and if you had a car, parking would be basically impossible in this neighborhood), and it was quiet and clean. I'm not 100% sure if I'd stay here as a single woman (maybe, though), but it was great for us and I felt safe and comfortable having one other person with me when coming home at night.
Perfect apartment, in great central location, all amenities listed in description available. Communication with owners perfect, as well as the check-in and check-out.

The appartment looks exactly like the pictures, really nice and clean as well! With clear instructions it‚Äôs possible to check in at any time, wich was  an advantage for us! Sokol is a great host and will help you with everything. The location is ok, close to the center, but sometimes a little noisy at night. Overall we had a great time and I surely recommend this appartment!
Great apartment and located near plenty of lovely restaurants and bars, a short walk to anything you need. Very clean and Sokol was very thorough on his instructions to check in. Highly recommend!

An elevated perch with amazing views of the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. Cozy and classic Athenian apartment across from a beautiful park and in a mellow and warm neighborhood. Enjoy the vista and strike out on an extended walk in and around the hill.

Week end di 3 giorni ad Atene: posizione ottima, appartamento pulito e Sokol e Marilena sono stati disponibili e sempre presenti per qualsiasi cosa! Vivamente consigliato!!

The location was lovely, view was incredible from the balcony, which is a lot bigger than it looks in the pictures.
Mattress was a bit too hard for us and some other amenities would be nice (e.g. more towels), but I'm sure they'd have been provided if we had stayed longer.
The host was very responsive and helpful.

Nadia's apartment was everything we needed for our stay in Athens. It is located in a vibrant neighbourhood, with lots of restaurants and bars in the vicinity. The acropolis is easily reached by bus or the very cheap taxi's. Nadia is the perfect host, she made us feel very welcome with a bottle of wine and some sweets we enjoyed on the balcony and gave us directions for the public transport and some nice restaurants in the neighbourhood. I highly recommend staying here.

I had a great stay at this nocarz! While the neighborhood might not be the best, the location more than makes up for it. It's incredibly close to all the major attractions like the city center, Monastiraki, Plaka, Syntagma, and the Acropolis, which made sightseeing super easy. There are also plenty of cafes and restaurants within 100 meters of the property, which was really convenient.
The house is a bit small, but it's very neat and clean, offering a comfortable place to unwind after exploring the city. One minor suggestion would be to add a side table for convenience, but overall, it‚Äôs a great place for a city break. The hosts were fantastic‚Äîsuper responsive and helpful, even before I checked in. Plus, Monastiraki metro station is only a 5-minute walk away, which made getting around a breeze!

Fantastic stay! Great location and we were greeted with a lovely smile! Have recommended to people already, would stay again. Very friendly and helpful (especially the receptionist!)

The stay was great, we really appreciate the attention, they‚Äôre so sweet and kindly. The place was perfect for 4 persons, the location it‚Äôs close to the metro station, so getting to everywhere is to easy.
We definitely hope to be back soon ü•∞
Only a 5 min walk from the city center, great apartment, very clean and super hospitality from the host. Warmly recommended!

Great place to stay in the middle of the action. Walking distance to the Acropolis, restaurants, bars, and ice cream shops!! Clean rooms with everything you need. Alexander makes sure you have everything you need from taxis to best tourist sites!! Would return to this hotel if in Athens again!
Tout simplement parfait !

This is a great place in the heart of Athens and within a 5 minute walk of many bars and restaurants. I would happily recommend people staying here. It was clean, tidy and Sokol is an excellent, responsive host. Thank you!

Apartment was modern, spacious, and clean with working AC and wifi. We were able to walk to most all the attractions we wanted to see. The neighborhood is more residential/local, but a short walk takes you into the town area. We never felt unsafe while walking.

Really great location of flat, walkable to most of the sites. Good facilities and room was very clean. Only small issue was the shower head has to be held which makes it difficult to wash your hair. Otherwise great apartment and fantastic value for money. Also fantastic communication from host.
Comfy and cute space. Great location with great restaurants within walking distance. Check in was easy!

Sokol‚Äôs place was really well placed, having stayed in Athens before, I love how it was close to all tourist spaces but also in a more quiet neighborhood. Our hosts were super responsive and super accommodating!
amazing property

Great place for young people. Location with a lot of great street food, bars and shops.  Comfortable interior: big bed, clean bathroom, little but handy kitchen. Lot of usable things: conditioner, tv with netflix and youtube, hair dryer, good dishes. Big balcony with nice view to Lycabettus.

Awesome place located perfectly with many great restraints and site seeing.

Great and cosy apartment in the heart of Athens. Close to many taverns and bars, metro station and easy walk to the Acropolis.
Communication with the host was super easy and the details to get in the appartement were really step by step and accurate. Yorgos also gave us a lot of local adresses to enjoy food, a drink or simply to get to the closest shop !
Great host, great apartment, great stay !

We had an amazing time staying at MyGreekVacations. Great apartment in a superb location within 10mins of fantastic restaurants and bars, plus a great view of the acropolis.
Apartment was very clean and well looked after. Large living space with tvs and air con in each room. Large balcony and kitchen area too. Bathrooms were very clean and supplied with shower gels/shampoos.
Great communication with the hosts. They also supplied details for transfer from the airport and supplied a handy guide book with their recommendations of restaurants/things to do. The apartment was very easy to get in to, with just a code needed. They also have a gym, playroom and laundry room free to use.
Overall a fantastic place to stay, great value for money, in a great location. I would highly recommend to anyone visiting Athens for the first time.

Lovely apartment, great furnishings and amenities, and very clean. Easy to walk to many historical sites and restaurants and public transport is very accessible. Instructions and recommendations were thorough and helpful.
Lovely place in a quiet neighborhood. The host was very responsive and polite. I definitely recommend the place.
Nice apartment in good place 2 minutes from syntagma square

Abbiamo trovato l'appartamento estremamente pulito e ben tenuto. Appartamento 4.1 √® al 4^ piano con ascensore, ha una bella terrazza abbastanza grande per fare colazione o aperitivo. Cucina con tutto il necessario per cucinare piatti leggeri.  Il divano in cui hanno dormito i miei figli √® un p√≤ scomodo ma dormendo al contrario abbiamo rimediato. E' un po' rumoroso il week end perch√® c'√® una disco di fronte ma la camera √® sul retro quindi silenziosa. La posizione √® strategica si trova a pochi metri dalla via principale Ermou e da Piazza Syntagma e comunque a pochi minuti a piedi dall'Acropoli, Plaka e Monastiraki. L'unico problema riscontrato √® che ogni tanto soprattutto la sera c'√® un odore molto sgradevole nel bagno. Qualit√†/prezzo ottimo. Lo consiglio.
Exactly as Describtion. Perfect stay for a few days.
Nice apartment, very cozy and and comfortable. Clean and in a really nice place near subway station. The host was great, easy to find and communicate. Good choice and highly recommend!
Great appartment, nice location, nice vibe, great communication.

I loved this space so much I have already booked to return in a few weeks for a longer stay. Perfectly located in the most interesting neighborhood of Athens, and with views of the entire city. The apartment is very compact but well equipped with everything we needed for our stay. We spent most of our time on the incredible wrap-around balcony, perfect for relaxing meals, happy hour and sunset vibes. Marina was super sweet, responsive and flexible with both a late check in and check out time. Would absolutely recommend!
My second time staying at Marina's place, this time for a longer stay, because I love it much. Unmatched views and vibes. Would return, again!
Mary‚Äôs place was very nice and well located. The balcony is big and the shower was very good! It has a gym and clothes washing facilities within the building which is great.
Really nice place to stay in Zagreb!
Nice small apartment in a very convenient location. 10 mins walk from Monastiraki Square. Clean flat with nice touches.

The building itself was easy to find and the lobby of the building was clean and well maintained. The inside of the flat was laid out like the photos, but it has not been maintained.
All of the couch cushions and chairs are badly stained. The wall covering in the hall is peeling away and needs to be repaired. There was hair on the floor and one set of towels. We always check the mattresses and beds of any place we stay, and when we checked the first one, the top of the bed was covered in dirt and matted hair. The mattress itself was stained and had food/dirt in the seams. The host apologized and sent the cleaner. She vacuumed the floor and replaced the questionable towels.
While talking with the host, we contacted nocarz customer service and requested a refund. We were able to cancel and get a full refund. The host was very apologetic and professional. They responded quickly and worked with us and nocarz for a resolution. Parking is terrible.
Highly recommended. This place is perfect. You have everything you need and the place is well located. Everyone who wants to do some workout/fitness during holiday --> book this!

True Greek Neighborhood with elderly Ladies watching every step from their adjoined balconies and super sweet. Helpful and friendly, especially when you start waving at them. The place is super professional and clean, feels like a boutique Hotel.
Amazing location with a very short walk before you hit the promenade surrounding the Ancient sites. No need for a car - its a wonderful modern and clean place in the middle of authentic Athens and 2 blocks off the beaten path. So calm and real - yet so close to the attractions. You can not beat the price of this gem and Mary, Esmeralda and their team are available in an instant and have great communication skills.

Un super endroit pour s√©journer quelques jours √† Ath√®nes ! Ma famille et moi avons s√©journ√© 3 nuits dans l‚Äôappartement de Spiros, et nous avons beaucoup appr√©ci√© l‚Äôespace tr√®s spacieux, tr√®s bien d√©cor√©, l‚Äôimmense terrasse et le confort de la literie. La climatisation est aussi tr√®s appr√©ciable, il faisait tr√®s chaud et cela nous a permis de faire des ¬´¬†pauses fra√Æcheurs¬†¬ª dans la journ√©e entre deux ballades. Le quartier n‚Äôest pas extraordinaire, mais pratique, c‚Äôest central et √† deux pas du m√©tro.

This apartment was perfect for our stay in Athens! The pictures show exactly what you‚Äôll get. Plenty of space to spread out and the outside balcony is extra large and provides great sunset views! Nice and quiet at night too! The communication was very timely and helpful. We would stay here again :)

We had a great stay at Marilou‚Äôs flat. The location was very close to the city center and the host provided us with great tips for our night there. We particularly like the  ¬´¬†Couleur locale¬†¬ª rooftop cafe with great views on the Acropolis and the Traditional tavern.
Dimitris was very welcoming and informative upon our arrival. The apartment was clean and walking distance to many top attractions in Athens. I highly recommend staying here.

Had a great stay and Dimitris was an incredibly responsive host.  Answered all questions and provided helpful recommendations about restaurants.  I was there for work, but I think the location would be great for vacationers.  Very close to the Acropolis.
Cozy-small room/apartment very well located :)
Good appartment, close to cafes and reasturants at monastiraki but as many places in athens the neighborhood could be dangerous at night. Nothing happened to us though.
Good option in Athens for the price.

The amenities are some of the best I have seen in an nocarz - although it was too hot for us to use the sauna or steam shower function while we visited. Fortunately the air conditioning was strong, the beds were comfortable, and there are blackout shades for good rest after long days exploring Athens. The location was so good that we mostly walked everywhere.
Todo muy limpio, Mag fue muy amable y servicial.

Emplacement parfait dans le quartier de Plaka dans une rue au calme , proche de tout les sites touristiques .Christina et ses co-gestionnaire sont tr√®s r√©actifs lorsque nous avions des questions , ou pour la r√©servation de taxi!
Perfekt beliggenhed

Stavros is a very helpful and friendly person. His respond was also very quick. The apartment was nice and quite as well. Clean and enough towels. The bathroom was very nice and warm shower. AC was working perfectly and still there was an extra blankets.
The kitchen equipments were enough and a big supermarket was close by. We cooked and enjoyed our stay there.
There was only one window and not much of day light when we were inside, still very cozy and nice place to do remote job. The internet connection was just ok and needed to restart the router sometimes but it did not bother at all. I definitely recommended it to everyone and thank you Starvros. ‚úåüèºü§óüéÑ üéâ üåü ‚ú®

Amazing Host!! Thank you!!

Mon s√©jour de 3 mois √† Ath√®nes a √©t√© une r√©ussite une grande partie gr√¢ce √† ce logement. Propre, tout √©quip√©, dans un quartier excellent, tr√®s safe pour une femme seule, je n‚Äôai rien eu √† redire. Tout est pr√™t √† votre arriv√©e, pour cuisiner ou pour le m√©nage. L‚Äôh√¥te a √©t√© d‚Äôune extr√™me gentillesse, je recommande fortement ce logement !
Great stay. Have already stayed at Pagonas place several times and it is always a pleasure. Great places with the best locations. Super clean. Especially this one is a great deal üëåüèº

Lovey apartment in fantastic location.  Apartment is spotless, thoughtfully appointed and very comfortable.  Our family of 5 used every available space.  We enjoyed the great location, with easy walks to plaka, the Acropolis and other parts of the city.  When we were tired, the apartment was a great place to find a few minutes of respite and cool comfort.  The host was exceptionally responsive and pleasant to work with.   Thank you for a great stay!

Thank you very much for sharing that fantastic apartment with us. Comfortable, clean, tidy, good neighborhood, we had a great time!
Many thanks Evi !

We had an amazing stay!  We were met at the airport with a driver to take us to the apartment.  When we arrived, a host walked us through the apartment showing us around.  The apartment is in a great location with walkable access to restaurants, bars, shopping and sights!  The apartment is extremely spacious and comfortable.  The rooms are large with natural light.  The air conditioning and comfortable beds were great too! I would highly reccommend this apartment!

Thank you for a wonderful stay in Athens. The location was next to many different restaurants and cultural opportunities and allowed us to explore most of Athens on foot. Thank you for your help in getting us to locations outside of Athens such as the temple of Poseidon. I would definitely recommend Pagona's home as the perfect base as well as being a well appointed, comfortable apartment. More than anything t felt like a home away from home.

Location is 10/10, the hosts are super friendly, they welcomed us personally for the check in, which was super nice. The place is super clean, you got everything you need and like I already said - it‚Äôs the best location for a trip to Athens.
Amazing location! Wonderful hosts!
Very friendly and great host, quite neighborhood, Close to the center, and indeed great value for the money

The checkin process was extremely easy and hassle free , a simple message was sent via host with 2 passcodes to enter building & apartment. Apartment was clean, extremely comfortable bed, shower was hot, handy having access to a kitchen with all the amenities. Loved having access to a balcony . Location for us was key, and the apartment was located not far from Athens main centre, bars and restaurants.
free parking available outside apartment, just recommend you hire a small car as spaces can be tight .
perfect location and perfect place. thank you very much!!
The host is so kind! The flat is super cozy, beautiful, clean and location is perfect! One of the best flats i ever been! Highly reccomended!

Angelos and Vagia were lovely hosts. The most kind and genuine couple you could meet, and I am so thankful that I was a guest in their lovely apartment. The apartment is spacious and perfect for a couple or small family. The place was clean and immaculate when I arrived and there was free WIFI which worked extremely well. Although the apartment is not in the historic tourist centre, it is only a 5 minute walk from Agia Nikolaos metro and it‚Äôs an easy walk into Kipseli when you will find lots of bars and restaurants in a pedestrian area (Fokionos Negri).
I felt safe staying in the apartment, and felt comfortable walking around the neighbourhood.
The balcony is spacious, the photos do not do it justice. It was nice to sit out on a morning whilst enjoying a coffee.
I would not hesitate to rebook and recommend to those who want to experience staying in an authentic Athenian neighbourhood.
P.S there is a cafe close by that has an open air cinema in it‚Äôs back yard. üôè

This is the place you want to go! Don't bother looking at any other ones, this nocarz has it all! I've stayed at 3 nocarzs in Athens before... and this one is the BEST!
Tia and Mike are AMAZING hosts! They are so fast at responding and they give thorough instructions. I was in a crisis where I did not have accomadations for 2 nights. I panicked and searched at different nocarzs, last minute, and I found Tia and Mike. They responded immediately to me, within seconds.
The room is better in real life than the pictures. It is very modern compared to most nocarzs. It is a perfect location and is very cozy for those days you're exhausted.
Thank you, thank you, thank you guys! I wish I could give you a 10000 star rating!
Everything was as promised. Great communication and easy check-in/check-out. Location is good, close to city center but felt like a safe place aswell. Would absolutely recommend!

Very well located and comfy apartment :)
Easy check in and check out!

Nice little studio outside the tourist areas.
Impeccably clean.
Excellent air-conditioning, good shower, mini-fridge, all the basics.
The budget studio where I stayed was facing the street, ground floor, right on the sidewalk - but ok if I kept the blinds closed.
Carrefour mini-market plus bakery just one block away.

We had a wonderful stay in Stella and Nikos' gorgeous apartment in its amazing location. It is right next door to the Acropolis metro station and therefore basically at the base of the Acropolis and the Acropolis Museum. Nikos met us even though it was late, so check-in was a breeze. There is a lift to make luggage easy. It's a lovely neighbourhood with many restaurants and charming small streets. We did a great free walking tour from the nearby Hadrons Arch. The apartment itself is funky and spacious, plenty of room for our family of six. The beds are comfortable and the apartment cosy even on the coldest winters days, also has airconditioners for the warmer months. The washer/dryer, coffee pod machine and huge TV are great additions. We had no concerns but Stella and Nikos kept in touch in case there was anything we needed, nothing seemed like too much trouble. We would highly recommend this apartment for a great value stay in central Athens and would definitely stay again if we return, which we intend to as we loved Athens and there's so much more to explore.
We enjoyed our stay immensely. We were close to everything we wanted to explore, and the view from the roof was a special treat. A very warm and personal welcome, too.

Stella is an amazing host, took care for everythingwe needed, and supported our pleasant stay.
The apartment is in great location, clean spacious and comfortable.
A great start for our Greek vacation.
Thank you Stella !!!

- well appointed
- spacious and pleasant
- very well located (central and safe)
- quiet
- responsive host
great stay, thank you very much
Would recco

Spacious apartment in a great location for seeing the tourist sights in Athens. Great communications with Stella who sorted out our transportation, and other queries.
Apartment is a very short walk to the Acropolis site and museum, letting us make the most of a short time in the city. Very clean with plenty of space for the 3 of us.
Super easy to communicate with and clear instructions.  Rooms on both floors were great - had everything we needed.  In the center of night life but very quiet inside apartment
The flat was great and in an amazing location. We stayed in both flats and the toilet in the flat on the 4th is a bit small. The host was amazing and very helpful.

Stella and Nico were wonderful guests. We loved the place!  Would recommend to anyone. Right in the middle of everything but at the same time very quiet and private when in. Thank you for being such great  hosts.
Great place at a perfect location
Very nice, clean, great price, and perfect location. Host was very responsive!

Le logement est un peu √©loign√© des centres d'int√©r√™t touristiques, mais la maison est spatieuse et agr√©able. L'accueil de l'h√¥te est tr√®s chaleureux. Costas est amical et tr√®s r√©actif, pr√™t √† partager de bons plans.

This was a very pleasant experience. The interior of the apartment was very clean, full of art works and well organized. The host was able to help us during the check-in (easy and quick) and check-out. We forgot a purse inside the apartment and the host was able to return it promptly and with no problems. The location of the apartment is perfect and very convenient. The Acropolis and the Acropolis Museum were just a few blocks away. Many places close by for food, groceries and souvenir shopping. We would definitely recommend this place, hopefully we can return soon.

we really enjoyed our stay in this apartment! It has great amenities and is walking distance to most of Athens sites but also far enough away that you didn't feel in a super touristy area. Really handy to have a washing machine and dishwasher when traveling with kids.

We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay here again. The rooftop pool is amazing!

This was our first time in Athens and we could not hope for a better location.  We were a little skeptical at first because of the neighborhood that was supposedly fears, but not at all.  The neighborhood is very well attended.  The apartment has everything you need.  Even a hair dryer and an iron.  Miniettes are located just below the building.  I recommend it 100%.
