Panagiotis is a really nice, super-responsive host. It was a joy to interact with him. His place really has a lot of location advantages. It is close to a market, a bakery, and good Greek food. It is also near both the Metro and Train station. We felt very connected.
We did experience some plumbing and repair problems while there. But the host responded quickly and efficiently. He also is seeking to repair some security issues involving inoperative security shutters--but could not get it scheduled until we left.
Panagiotis' place is in need of freshening up (which he may have already done by the time you read this), but if you are looking for a convenient location at a competitive price-point, this is a good choice.

Very spacious and great location

This apartment in Athens is amazing! Such a unique space in a very cool neighborhood with lots of bars and restaurants, and far less touristy than Plaka. The Acropolis is also only a ~15 min walk and the apartment has some nice views of it from the terrace and balconies. We stayed with a group of 10 (6 adults & 4 kids) and it was absolutely perfect. There is also a grocery store directly across the street.
I‚Äôll add that the hosts were unbelievably responsive and helpful for everything from drivers to booking chefs and other recommendations. Some of the best we‚Äôve had on nocarz.

This nocarz exceeded our expectations. It is central, was exceptionally clean with modern decor; the view of the acropolis from the roof terrace was breathtaking. Sokol was a fabulous host, attending to our every need to ensure our stay was perfect. 10/10 would recommend!

Stathis's apartment was a great stay. The shower was a delight, the AC was effective and the place was spotless. The location is a little far from the centre but the bus is right outside and takes you to Victoria station. The nearby park is very nice.
The only issue was the wifi cut out intermittently.

This place was a 10/10 in many ways! Thankful for the AC on super hot days, very comfy bed, and the view from the hot tub was exceptional. Also the most ideal place to stay in Athens as it is central and super close walking distance to everything. Would definitely love to stay here again!
This was the best nocarz we ever had - worldwide. Perfectly located & well designed.

We loved this nocarz! My husband and I stayed here for a couple nights on our honeymoon. Location was perfect, walkable to everything in Athens! Absolutely amazing view of acropolis from balcony and jacuzzi. George & John gave us many recommendations of places to eat, drink, things to do, and maps to everywhere! Athens is busy and crowded, but this place was an escape from the noise with incredible views. 10/10 would recommend!!! Thank you for everything!!

Je recommande !

Highly recommend this nocarz to anyone traveling to Athens! The host was extremely responsive, helped us store our bags, and gave us wonderful recommendations. The flat is located close to Monastiraki square and close to wonderful restaurants. We encourage you to try Seychelles (authentic Greek food) and Po'Boys BBQ (lots of yummy things on their menu). Also, the view from the roof access you get with this nocarz is spectacular!! No need to search any further because you have found the best nocarz in Athens- book it while you can!
Location is great in the heart of the Athens. Host is extremely helpful and responsive. Appartment is tiny but equipped with everything needed for the comfort living.

Great host, great place ! As good as in the pictures . Near the public transportation and the center, really great overall

Vasiliki‚Äôs place is an amazing place near the acropolis. It is on a quiet street lined with orange trees & coffee houses. Everything is walkable from here and things are close by. We reached Athens pretty late in the evening, and Vasiliki had arranged for a taxi pickup who dropped us right outside the apartment. The instructions given by Vasiliki were very clear & we got into the apartment without any issues. We were surprised to see a welcome cake & wine waiting for us in the apartment. Vasiliki also provides detailed instructions on how to get to different places, maps on the table with great restaurant recommendations & must sees etc were there. We enjoyed the trip and our stay and will definitely come back !
Perfect location to visit Athens, near the Acropolis, and great value !

first of all: this apartment is amazing!!

With a lot of tips and helping us to rent a scooter, we could plan our perfect Holidsy!
I would recomend the Apartment everytime and I will defently book it the next time in Athens again!
This lovley Family takes nocarz really serious!

Very clean, good communication/responsiveness and most importantly, very convenient to the sites/attractions. We were looking for a little space in the city that we could easily navigate around from and this was exactly what we were looking for!

The space is a 2nd floor clean apartment with a very comfortable bed, and air conditioning. You enter via a lockbox and code. The location was perfect, 2 minutes walking to the Acropoli station. There is also a small shop next door for drinks or snacks. There is a balcony overlooking the road. The apartment was quiet in the evening. There is good WiFi. Only instant coffee and black tea were provided which could be improved. Also, the shower is extremely small and flooded the bathroom floor despite the curtain. Overall the place was nice, convenient, and worth the value, primarily due to the location.
Bessie is super helpful, sweet, and warm. The room is clean and has everything we need, we had a great time there, will definitely stay here again next time when we visit Athens!
clean appartement, excellent location, smooth communication hence real good value!

You cannot ask for a better location in Athens - extremely close to incredible restaurants, cafes, and bars/clubs. I would recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Athens and I would gladly book with Petros again.

We stayed here for 2 nights after a very long trip and it was a very pleasant stay. The area is close to metro stations and public parkings, it is also within walking distance from the main historical sites. The owners and team were great, always in communication and willing to help with anything that was needed.

The place was exacto like the pictures! It was beautiful and it looked brand new. The kitchen was very clean and the washrooms too.
We went with a 90 year old and the apartments were everything we were looking for when travelling with an elderly person.
Nikos was a great guide and helped us with everything.

DE: Sehr saubere und modernisierte Unterkunft, sehr zentral, allerdings keine Parkm√∂glichkeit, daher empfehlen wir einen privaten Parkplatz in Anspruch zu nehmen der bei ca.7 ‚Ç¨ pro Tag liegt. Der Vermieter hat uns auch aufgrund einer spontanen Ver√§nderung der Miettage mit einem anderen Zimmer geholfen, bei allen Anliegen wurde uns schnell und effektiv geholfen, gerne wieder kann man nur weiterempfehlen.
Great spot to see Athens! Super close to cool restaurants and bars and only a short walk to all of the major sights.

Manos is an exceptional host. He ensured we had a very comfortable stay in Athens and gave us great tips for places nearby to eat and to see. Additionally, the bed is VERY comfortable and guarantees a great night's sleep after a long day of travels or sightseeing.

Manos is a warm, attentive and welcoming host and his family's pastry shop (right I front of the apartment) is amazing: everything tastes delicious. The apartment is spacious and luminous and the neighborhood's location is very convenient, since it is at a walkable distance to the Acropolis. There is a nice terrace above to hang out. Thank you very for everything, Manos!

Great location at the heart of the city. You can walk to anything. The nightlife below can be loud until late in the evening so bring some earplugs if you have a hard time falling asleep.
Clean, easy check in process with taxi drivers and the hosts speaking excellent English.
We needed to find a atm and the host walked us to two different banks and helped us when one ATM machine ate my card. He called the bank and told us to retrieve it from the bank in the morning. Thank you Visilis aka ‚ÄúBill‚Äù!
Nice old apartment in a good location!
Best location. Every tourist attraction is within minutes walk. Host is very available via messaging. Responded to all questions within an hour. Assisted with transport from Airport. Will stay again!

Great place to stay in central Athens - walking distance to everything.
The host Petros was great at communicating.

Our stay was great. The apartment is centrally located and within walking distance from Syntagma and Monastiraki. It is equipped with the essential staff and with modern furniture. Our communication with the host was ok. Everything was perfect, except the noise from the bars in the street.

Zeer goede ligging. Rustig. Ruim appartement met vriendelijke ontvangst.
Zeer goede prijs/kwaliteit voor groep van 8 personen.
Excellent. Only issue was waiting on the host to let us in. They had the keys. Other than that it was amazing. Comfy beds!
Great location for a week in Athens. We found the kitchen area a bit too small for cooking a full meal‚Äîbut there are plenty of restaurants near by if you‚Äôre looking to eat out for every meal.
Wonderful place , very comfortable

You have the full view of the acropolis that you can enjoy both during the day and at night when it‚Äôs all lit up! I wish I had more time to enjoy their place! I would have just sat in the spacious  balcony with a book and coffee with Acropolis right in front of me! The jacuzzi is a nice touch - super easy to use!!! I highly recommend their place! Stella was so responsive and made sure we were well taken care of the entire time from start to finish. She was very accommodating and did everything she could to make sure we had a fantastic stay! Thank you Stella!!!
Awesome location, clean, great air conditioning - powerful and quiet. Easy pin code check-in

The location is perfect , walking distance to all major landmarks . Many restos and bars to choose from . The small kitchen with all the necessities is a cute set up . Great
Shower . I would‚Äôve given this place a 5 star but the overpowering , lingering smell of cigarettes in the building and in the room made it unbearable to stay indoors . It was like waking into a smoking chamber 24/7. The cigarette smell was overpowering . I did mention it to the host but that went unnoticed. We are non smokers and that was of the reasons we chose this place because in the description it said non smoking. That was a the big and only negative part of our stay in this place .

Look no further! The location is 10 star, quite central to the historic attractions and tonnes of eating out options and its in the pedestrian area therefore we had no issue of street noise in the evening. The amenities and built is quite modern and we had no hiccups with wifi, hot water, Air conditioning etc. All in all a super comfy stay. Can only recommend!

Perfect location & walking distance to everything! About a 20-25 min walk to Parthenon, 10 min walk to Monastiraki Square & 5 min walk to all the street food. amazing, felt like a home away from home. Very close to market and amazing restaurants. It is a great location everything was within walking distance. I would book again

prachtig appartement met veel ruimte! De bereikbaarheid met het centrum van de stad en de bezienswaardigheden is perfect! Het appartement ligt gelegen binnen het uitgaans gebied waardoor er savonds nog leven op straat is en je nog harde muziek kunt horen.

We experienced a significant break-in and burglary at this nocarz. While we were out, the unit was accessed with a key (no forced entry) and our passports and valuables were stolen. While there was a security camera in the hallway, it was turned away and did not capture the perpetrator entering the unit. The host, Thodoris, was very responsive and helpful in getting us in contact with the police, covering a new place to stay for the night, and checking in to make sure we were okay. However, we encourage anyone considering this nocarz to ask him how he has updated the security measures to ensure an incident like this does not happen again. It is a busy building with many people coming and going, so unfortunately an easy target for theft in a touristy area.
Perfect location and beautiful apartment. The hosts are responsive and helpful. I‚Äôve stayed in a few apartments during my stays in Athens and this was the best. Highly recommend!

A very cute place in an excellent location. We where in walking distance of restaurants, shops, and the acropolis. Host provided detailed directions on how to find the location. Would recommend to anyone who would like to be in a lively area.
Sehr angenehme Wohnung in sehr guter Lage!
Lovely apartment, great location with a east 15 minute walk to all the sights. Great communication. Lovely and clean and the beds are super comfortable!

it's in a great location, less than 10 min walk to the acropolis and so many cute shops and cafes nearby. the room at so many personal touches, soap, snacks, instructions on how to work things in the room. And she was so responsive when i had questions!
Very comfortable place to stay and close to all the restaurants and Acropolis. Would recommend to anyone!
the apartement ist wonderful an Any is a very good host. We enjoyed our stay!!
The view is the best part! Went to the rooftop bar across the street, but we found that we still had the better view. :)

Amazing little boutique stay right next to Monastiraki Square with shops and restaurants right downstairs. Easy check-in with codes and lockboxes. Great view of the Acropolis on their rooftop and very walkable to Acropolis (20min) through Plaka. We were able to check in early cause our room was ready and they were very accommodating with moving our bags down when we checked out early before their office opened (10am). Just a 2 minute walk from Monastiraki metro station which links direct to the airport. The apartment was very comfortable with a powerful shower room. Right in the middle of Athens above a bustling cluster of bars. Just round the corner is an ice cream shop you should not miss called Kokkion and visit daily for the latest flavours like we did!

Had a wonderful stay at this lovely flat, I was in Athens for work and really enjoyed staying here. It is near good places to eat, attractions, and everything you could wish for.

The place is clean and spacious in a safe location.

Spectacular hosts! Clean and very comfortable. In the heart of a Greek neighborhood with amazing restaurants everywhere! Christos, the driver was the icing on the cake! Great location for access to restaurants, bars, the library etc‚Ä¶ Responsive host, lots of detail provided to acclimate to the space. The lower rating is for the lack of cleanliness. The apt was so muggy the air felt unhealthy to breathe. We opened the windows up, but the positioning of the building limits airflow and there are no fans, so it was very hard to get fresh air in. Concern for future mold problems.

But otherwise we absolutely loved everything about the apartment. It was clean, spacious, the view is just incredible, better than we even imagined !!! We spent every evening on the balcony, and as it was a chillier time of year the blankets that were provided were the perfect addition to be able to enjoy the outside space in the late hours.
There were a couple of small issues which Romanos sorted very quickly and efficiently when we messaged no trouble at all. He was very helpful and it made the stay so much more enjoyable. Especially all of the great local information he gave us on arrival, which was so useful!
We have already recommended this apartment to friends, and would love to come back again. Thank you for a memorable amazing stay! The flat made our trip!

Host was beyond great.  Due to a delayed flight we arrived at 3:30am where the host met us and ensure we were in the room and comfortable.  View is over the top.  Place could use a bit of an update.  Location was also great.   I would stay here again.

We enjoyed the stay in Katerinas apartment a lot. The apartment is close to Evangelismos metro station and very central, all important locations were walking distance. The apartment was very clean and cozy, we will be back.

I had a very pleasant stay, the apartment is clean, convenient and  nicely decorated with a personal touch,  the bed is comfortable for a relaxing sleep. The view to a green park and to Lykabettus hill is also a plus. Metro station with direct connection to the airport is close and most important just 2 streets away one of the most lively and hip but also authentic neighborhoods of Athens Pagkrati) with restaurants, bars, cafes and other hidden small stores. As I like walking I also visited the national garden and acropolis on foot in a short time. Communication with host has been easy and I have to thank for the flexibility. Overall a great choice for central Athens (second time for me). Would love to come back again soon!

The place was spotless and spacious and matched the description and photos exactly. It was walking distance to every tourist attraction we wanted to see in Athens, and has amazing restaurants all around. The building area felt safe, and we had no issues walking back at night (~10pm-12am). Basic toiletries (shampoo and body soap), necessities (coffee, sugar), and even condiments were provided.
Additionally, Romanos is a standout host. He was basically always online when we needed to ask any questions. He helped book us a cab from the airport to the apartment and was completely understanding when our flight was delayed by several hours, helping us to update the taxi driver as well. He also recommended us luggage storage facilities near to the apartment on our last day, and then helped us book the (same) cab again to take us back to the airport. Having been overcharged by taxi drivers before as tourists, we‚Äôre incredibly grateful for his help. Thank you Romanos and the team!
Wonderful flat in a fantastic location. Julia had some lovely treats left out for us and was very welcoming. Would highly recommend this place.

My second stay in Julia's place. Fantastic from start to finish. Incredible attention to detail. The flat is on a pedestrianised road with lots of cafes and bars and you can really enjoy the vibe of the Athens night life without it being disturbing to sleep due to the soundproof door in the bedroom. Location is fantastic, easy to walk to any central Athens part. Bed is incredibly comfortable. And Julia is easily available for any questions.
Me and my family enjoyed our stay at Ioanna's apartment. Nikos was very helpful while checking in.
Great apartment with a beautiful view. Would stay here again!
I really enjoyed ny staying even for one night. The place is exacto y like the photos, it is very clean and Vassilis was really kind and helpful. The location is also very convenient.
If you are looking for beautiful view, this apartment is for you :-) I recommend

My family had a wonderful stay at Nicholas‚Äôs apartment. Everything was very clean and comfortable and we really appreciated that he provided a crib for my 1-year old. Check-in and check-out instructions were clear and detailed. Nicholas‚Äôs co-host Evi was also super communicative and graciously helped us arrange our airport transfers. We only stayed 1 night on our way out of Greece, but we would have happily stayed longer!

The apartment is in a super great location. You have great restaurants, bars and everything that you need just within walking distance. However, there is a downside: being that central means in Athens, it is super loud. You hear everything from the streets, musicians, cars, and the people in the bars and restaurants but also inside the apartment the isolation is not good. I believe this apartment is not suitable for families with kids. In the apartment is not much storage space. You will only get one key to access the apartment and the lockboxes are not that easy to unlock/use.
Central location - perfect for exploring Athens! Not the best Wi-Fi if you need to take video calls but otherwise perfect.

I chose this location as a long-term stay during the COVID19 pandemic when we were mandated to spend more time than usual at home.
In my opinion, it was a wonderful apartment, very well suited for extended periods inside. The place was spacious, quiet, benefited from a lot of natural morning and afternoon sun (both on the terrace and in the sun-facing rooms), and was in one of the best central, but not touristy, parts of Athens.
Working was facilitated by a very comfortable large table in the lounge as well as a working 'shelf' in the second bedroom. Wifi was available everywhere, although due to the size of the apartment, it was naturally strongest near the router in the lounge.
Nearby the apartment there are plenty of transport options, plus a good selection of supermarkets and specialist food shops, and for when everything is open again, ample bars, restaurants and other amenities. The neighborhood of Koukaki is a superb, livable neighborhood where you can get a good sense of really living in Athens rather than just merely visiting. One of the nicest aspects of the neighborhood was its proximity to the acropolis and the hills surrounding the ruins, which served as an easily accessible break from work in the middle or at the end of the day.
The agency managing the property answered queries very promptly and were very accommodating when I needed a flexible checkout. They also responded to and acted upon a request for an additional kitchen tool rapidly, making the experience seamless.
Highly recommended, both during and, I am sure, after pandemics ;)
Excellent apartment, everything was as advertised. Will definitely stay here again if I am back in Athens.

Georgios' accomodation made for seamless ending to my Greek trip. He was communicative throughout the whole process and checked in if I needed anything daily. The room itself has all the right amenities, is centrally located, and secluded just enough that you can enjoy your peace at the same time. If you visit Santorini during your trip, the room has all the right styling and comforts to take you there while being in the middle of Athens. Highly recommend.
Thank you Argyro. It was a pleasant stay.

Tornata adesso da Atene, 3 giorni meravigliosi nell‚Äôappartamento di Harry. Siamo stati accolti da Stella, simpatica, disponibile e sempre pronta a darci dei consigli durante il viaggio. I enjoyed my stay at Manos's apartment. As a solo traveller, I felt safe there as there is a security lock and Manos and his partner live next door. The Internet connection was good and I was able to work online without issues. Manos kindly gave me two Wifi networks to connect to, so it was good to have a backup if needed.
The apartment has a "lived in" feel in the sense that the furniture and appliances aren't brand new. Instead of feeling like you are staying in a generic hotel room, you feel like you're staying in a real Athenian apartment. The building and surrounding area could be noisy at times (the usual sounds of neighbours sharing a building, plus a nearby barking dog), but Manos kindly provided earplugs.
The neighbourhood is really nice. Lots of restaurants, cafes, bakeries and shops (larger and smaller supermarkets). It is less than 10 minutes walk to the metro, which connects you with Athens city centre, the port and the airport.

Very helpful hosts who offered to help with taxis and lots of information relevant to our stay. We would highly recommend this great apartment.

This place is a great value for your money. It has two spacious bedrooms with comfy beds, a large sunny balcony to eat your breakfast and a small kitchen that gets the job done with a lot more appliances than on the photos (coffee maker, toaster, kettle and some others in the cupboard that we didn‚Äôt even use besides the microwave and the portable induction hob), making a breakfast or a small dinner is easy when we didn‚Äôt want to eat out. We really enjoyed having plenty of space and having an elevator to reach the 3rd floor was also a blessing after long days of walking around. The place was clean as well, although some furniture has started to show the wear and tear of guests coming and going every couple of days. Two metro stops (green and blue line) are within 10 minutes, we used those a lot, but pretty much any attraction can also be reach on foot. (On the downside green runs in front of the house and can be noisy before midnight and early in the morning.) The AB supermarket is also just minutes away across the tracks and it has a huge selection, but smaller markets are also available nearby even late at night. Would stay again.

We‚Äôve been here before and chose to return because we really liked the city and the apartment is perfect for our needs. It‚Äôs a nice residential neighborhood away from the hoards of tourists but still easy to walk to most places or take two different metro lines nearby. The flat is spacious, has a well functioning kitchen that we used a lot (there‚Äôs a large AB supermarket just across the tracks to get supplies if you don‚Äôt want to eat out every meal) and a nice sunny balcony to people watch while having your morning coffee. Overall we found it‚Äôs a great value for our money, and we would be happy to return any time.

Anna‚Äôs place is in a great location. Just steps away from Athens center and archaeological sites with lost of restaurants and cafes around. The apartment is spacious, elegant and very clean. Anna is a great host. Communication was seamless. She made sure we didn‚Äôt miss anything.
Ok
Really nice flat, perfect location in a calm street but really close to restaurant and bars and metro station. Marily is really understanding and kind üòä

Great place with excellent location.  Loved the spa at night to soak tired feet.

Apartment wie beschrieben, sehr schick und modern. Besonders hervorzuheben ist der tolle Whirlpool auf der Terrasse :-). Die Lage ist perfekt - im Gegenzug hat man nat√ºrlich Umgebungsger√§usche bis tief in die Nacht. Wer einen leichten Schlaf hat sollte vielleicht Ohropax mitnehmen. Was ein wenig schwierig ist: eine Ablage f√ºr die nassen Handt√ºcher zu finden, da gibts nur im 2. Bad eine kleine M√∂glichkeit -> bei schlechtem Wetter wird es schwierig, wenn man die Terrasse nicht daf√ºr nutzen kann. Wir konnten uns f√ºr 3 Tage gut behelfen.

Yannis & Tax's apartment was amazing. The location could not have been better in a great part of Athens. It was in an amazing neighborhood and we were able to walk to some great shopping streets and restaurants in Plaka. It was also only a 10 minute walk to The Acropolis - the only taxis we ever got in the whole trip was from the ferry and to the airport. Otherwise, we walked everywhere.
The apartment was well stocked with essentials, and was perfect for two adults and two young children. We really enjoyed all of the other modern amenities especially the plunge pool on the balcony. It was so nice to come back and enjoy after a long day sightseeing in the summer heat!
Yannis & Tax were easy to communicate with, and offered to help with anything we needed. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend staying here if you visit Athens. We will definitely be back!
This nocarz is in a great location! Yannis and Tax were very helpful with their recommendations and even helped booked reservations and taxis. Check in was easy and beds were comfy!

The apartment is amazing! Fully equipped kitchen, terraces on every floor and one on the roof where we enjoyed the sun, fun artsy touches throughout the apartment and very clean and comfortable to be in. Spyros was a great host throughout the stay, always easy to communicate with and helped us with a late check-out on the day of our departure which was a great help. The area around the apartment had several busy streets but is very close to the metro line or within walking distance of some great sights and areas in the city. 10/10 would recommend their home to anyone traveling to Athens.

AMAZING place, couldn't recommend staying here more. The rooftop terrace provides the most incredible views over Athens, watched sunrise each morning which was beautiful and it's a perfect sun trap too.
Lovely and clean, plenty of space, would 100% stay here again as couldn't find anywhere that even comes close to this apartment.
Amazing house!

This place is lovely & relatively central to the main attractions of Athens. There was plenty of room and could comfortable fit 6-8 people if needed. A perfect place for our stay. We had 1x night stay in Athens, and the location was perfect; great restaurants, cute shops ands within a few minute walk of the Acropolis
Overall the air b n b had great charm and character and was extremely clean. A few small touches really made it feel like a hotel too!
The only thing like previous comments was the noise; we had a super busy day so we went to bed earlier than what we normal would which I think contributed to this.

Sparkling clean, Modern Beautiful Design combined with Functionality are just the start of what makes this place the best place for you to stay in Athens.
This studio is like a 5-star Hotel Suite, situated in the heart of Athens and within walking distance of anything you could imagine.
The Host responded to messages within a couple of minutes and sometimes just seconds regardless the time of day. It was evident that he wanted you to have the best experience possible, and that's what he accomplished for me.
I will definitely stay again here, I highly recommend it to everyone who plans on visiting Athens.
Would also love to check out the other Apt in Mykonos.

Fantastic place located very central and close to everything ( walking distance feom all major attractions). Communication with Andreas was excelent and he even allowed us for a late check out. Hard to say anything bad about this place. It‚Äôs in a fantastic location, has everything you need, is modern, spacious, clean, stylish. Would book again.

One of my best nocarz experiences and outstanding communication with Andreas.
Location great. Really perfect!
A great suite in a fantastic location. Dont hesitate to book it. Would definitely come back.

This apartment is s no brainer providing terrific value for money. It‚Äôs central location is ideal for all manner of travellers.
Book this one out

We had a really nice stay at the appartment. We had a delay of one houre but still got a friendly welcome.
The location is great. Only a 15min walk from the center of Athens, Akropolis.
We enjoyed our stay and really reccomand this place for a week of Athens!

The apartment was fantastic! Everything was spot clean. The was also relaxing music playing when I entered the apartment which made it feel more like home. The location is also ideal for walks near the city center. The metro/taxi and bus station are only 2-3min away. Finally, Andreas-Ilias was an exceptional host and responsive and I will definitely book another stay when I visit Athens again. Highly recommended!
Amazing location, easy to get to and central. Host was very helpful and extremely responsive.
I really enjoyed my stay, the house was very clean and stylish. The hosts were very helpful and polite. I would definitely recommend!

Gracious space close to city center and museums. Great restaurants!

Adonis is a very friendly host. He met me in front of the apartment and showed me and explained everything. He prepared a folder with recommendations and helpful information about Athens. When we need anything, he responded quickly. The apartment is very clean, comfortable, compact with a modern interior and good facilities. It was nice to find beer and water in the fridge. The balcony has a great view, and it was a pleasure sitting and drinking booze after a long day. We found the location excellent and within walking distance of a Metro station and many popular places like the Acropolis and Plaka. It was really nice to have our luggage after the check-out time. I would recommend Adonis' house to anyone visiting Athens and looking to stay in the centre.

Despite being there during the lockdown, I had a wonderful time sitting outside and enjoying the autumn sun. Amazing apartment which was well stocked with everything you need. Balcony is perfect for watching the world go by. Excellent location, the area has a great buzz to it but also is quite at night offering a good nights sleep.

This apartment is wonderfu! Location is within easy walking distance to many places, and close to a metro station if one needs to travel to less popular, more distant locations. Location allowed us to see easily everything we had on our wish list in a six day period. Lots of Greek restaurants within short walking distance.
Hosts are helpful and responsive. Place is clean, and though basically a studio, is roomy enough for two people. Shower is very spacious. We loved the apartment and it will be our first choice if we visit Athens again.
Everything was fine

We paid around 8 euros for a taxi to get to Syntagma Square, but there is also a metro station nearby. The neighborhood is very safe, with markets and cafes nearby. The house was very clean and exactly like the photos. The only downside was that the bathroom was small, but we had no issues with it. The house had a cute little balcony. If you've ever wanted to stay in an amazing art gallery for the night...this is your chance, don't let it pass you by. The heART house is full of positive energy and good vibes. It was the true highlight of my week in Athens.  Yes, all the museums and Acropolis were great so was Delphi, but I'm laid-back and chill so it was perfect for me. I relaxed in the pool, took outside showers, listened to music, cooked good foods, watered the garden, walked all around Kolonos district. The grocery store is 3 minutes walk away. The heART house is truly a hidden gem of Athens. I would never be able to speak highly enough of Angie and Stravos kindness and genuine love for me.
A beautiful and very stylish apartment in a central location. Very good communication with Fillipos who was very helpful ! Was also super clean- would definitely stay again !
Apartment was lovely and very clean.  The location couldn't have been better and was perfect for our short stay in Athens to explore the Acropolis.  Everything we needed was within walking distance.
Located in the lively part of Athens. Liked it!

I will start with good bit. The apartment looks exactly as on the pics - clean, well equipped etc. But, the area leaves a lot to wish. We were two girls, frightened no matter what time of day (not to mention the night..) to leave and enter the building. Yes, few streets down you have a nice square with restaurants and bars, however walk into the street around the corner and you will find yourself in a bad place. The amount of homeless, dependent on drugs and in many cases, mentally ill people left to themselves on the streets is horrifying! I am a writer and it really gave me a strong feeling of the crisis in Greece. Not sure if you want to experience that going on holiday though, to relax. We have been approached daily by man in a questionable state, with proper blood stains on clothes etc..twice I had to get inside of my car and lock the doors to escape. Still, the guy kept banging on my window and I had to drive away. I will spare other stories.. you can imagine it made our stay miserable and exposed to extra costs since we had to leave the car at some point in the city on the secured parking to be able to sleep at night. Also, didn't even stay at the place for 2 nights cause we were scared to go back late - after one night, another terrible experience... I don't like to give bad opinions, everyone wants to make a business. But I feel responsible to let anyone who's planning to stay here know, what they're signing up for.
Everything was perfect. Thank you!
Very good. Accurate depiction of the apartment. Only issue is noise from others in the building.

Very recommended

the room is very well located (if you want to be in the center center) spacious, has a nice AC and is well equipped.

The apartment is stylish and bright, with lots of natural light; something I really enjoy. Well-placed mosquito nets so the balcony door and kitchen window can be opened for natural airing and cooling. (They have an A/C but we preferred not to use it.)
The bathroom is simply gorgeous. The bath is perfect for two (including a tall person who usually finds baths uncomfortable!) and sheer luxury to indulge in! The water is hot and plentiful.
Mike and Maria were super responsive and helpful. We arrived on an early morning flight and they let us check in early, which was a godsend. We were able to leave our luggage safely in their foyer (they own the whole building) when we checked out.
There's a well-stocked supermarket close by, which is handy. Cooking facilities are basic, but there's a kettle for hot water and a coffee machine, which covered what we needed, as we ate out.
Would happily recommend and gladly return!
Great host and cozy apartment

We've stayed in a number of Air BnBs, and this is the best of them! We have already recommended it to our friends for their future trips.
The pictures are true to what the villa offers. It's lovely and charming, and the location cannot be beat!Truly so close to the Acropolis; it's magical to look out from our windows at the walls and so convenient to walk up to the entrance early in the morning to beat the crowds.
This rental is at the top of the Plaka neighborhood ‚Äî convenient to many cafes and shops but above the crowds and bustle that congest the lower parts of the neighborhood. Every evening we retreated to the back patio and could hear music and performances from various parts of the city, but were above it all (and once we closed the doors, did not hear any outside noises when it was time for bed).
The interior is nicely appointed and we appreciated the full kitchen and two bathrooms. If we had traveled with more people than just the two of us, the fold-out beds downstairs would have been very handy. As it was, we enjoyed the very comfortable master bedroom with plenty of light and a very comfortable bed and pillows.
The best thing of all about this rental was the outdoor space. In searching for a place to stay in Athens I was hoping to find someplace with a terrace or balcony or patio ‚Äî¬†this has four!! There are two small balconies, one off the front and one off the back, with just enough room for two chairs and a small table on each, perfect for sipping your morning coffee. There is also the amazing front courtyard, which has ruins beneath the thick glass floor (tourists will frequently stop to look over the fence in amazement). But the best of all is the large back terrace off the bedroom, with its amazing view of the city, nice couches, jacuzzi tub and shower. This was our favorite place to enjoy the evenings.
For Americans, you should bear in mind that this is Europe and everything may be a bit smaller than you're used to. If you don't mind ducking your head to get through the patio door and can appreciate the charm of making the most of a sometimes limited space (as is true everywhere in Europe), you will love this rental as much as we did!
The host was incredibly responsive to our requests and inquiries, always responding quickly, and sending many recommendations in advance for things to do and see and places to eat. He provided great information on the various transportation options from the airport and even arranged a taxi for us in advance (more convenient and a little cheaper than it would have been for us to do ourselves). There was even a bit of coffee in the kitchen, a bottle of cold water in the fridge, and a gift of wine awaiting our arrival. It couldn't have been nicer!

Esperia was a wonderful host! She‚Äôs very quick to respond to all my questions. She arranged a taxi driver to take us to the airport at 6am. This space is very clean, exactly as pictured. The view of the Acropolis is splendid! About 10-15 min walk to the center. I def would recommend this place!

Booking and check in was easy.
The apartment was adequate for its location however there were several issues. The first and most dangerous was the washing machine that did not function from day one and electrocuted my partner when he tried to use it as did the electric oven in the kite hen. Secondly, the lamp next to the bed exploded as soon as it was plugged in, producing smoke. Combined with the washing machine/ over it seems there is an electrical fault with the apartment making it unsafe, especially so when you realise there are no smoke alarms!
The water in the bathroom toilet never stopped running meaning you have to turn it off at the mains as soon as you are finished.

The balcony was covered in old pigeon poo with no effort to clean it up. To top it off, you are visited regularly by feral, starving cats begging for food and at night you will spend hours listening to a lonely dog howling in what seems like pain, a few doors down.
Host asked for passport details I assume for tax reasons, however, there is no legal requirement for a passport holder to divulge their private information to essentially a stranger, for this the host has downgraded their review.
We left the apartment 5 days early as it was just a horrible experience in the end, sadly.
We stripped the bed/ sofa for easy cleaning and swept/ mopped through the apartment as an act of kindness before leaving but this was received negatively by the host, again sadly.
I‚Äôd think carefully before booking this property, unfortunately it‚Äôs not up to standard.

The location was phenomenal, it could not be any better! It was very walkable even for my 82 year old mother in law! We stayed three nights and two full days and didn‚Äôt need to use public transportation at all to see everything we wanted to see. The host Lilly was always very responsive from the time I booked this place! She was also very helpful with arranging our transfers for our family of five from the airport and to the port! The driver came both times on time and was helpful with luggage and showing us around the city! We could not have the better experience with Toni‚Äôs apartment! Would recommend this place 100% and we will stay again in this very spacious apartment if we ever visit this beautiful and vibrant city on the future!

This is a really lovely apartment with sensational views of the Acropolis. The 2 balcony areas are perfect for soaking up the sun, and have great views of the city of Athens too. We enjoyed our stay at Romanos‚Äôs place. it is very nice and clean. it is in a colorful neighborhood. The host is very helpful and responsive.

The apartment was very nice but we were uncomfortable with all the graffiti around the place. We felt unsafe as we were not used to the colorful graffiti all around. A lot if Uber drivers also did not help with their negative comments about the surroundings.

Great place! Easy to access once you get the hang of it, but Manos provides very detailed instructions. Apartment itself is pretty big and the bed & pullout are both very comfortable. Thankfully some people that stayed in other apartments in the building were coming in so they let us in the building but it‚Äôs very confusing and maybe a video should be made walking you through the check in process and all the different doors you have to go into just to get into the apartment.
Other than that the place was good. Just beware that check in could be a little more if a hassle than other places.
Overall I would recommend this place.

Tax and Yannis were incredibly helpful hosts. They arranged airport pickup and drop off for us - we were a family of four with buggy and more bags than usual. They were also incredibly responsive even when asked a silly question like how to turn on the hob (I was being daft not working it out). The location is perfect for the main tourist sights in Athens. We walked everywhere. But the street you are on is pretty quiet. The apartment is also exactly as pictured. The only reason it was four stars for us is that with a young family we did more cooking at home than others might and while the kitchen has everything you need there isn't a lot of room for cooking. For most people - especially those who plan to eat out mostly (and there are a lot of fine restaurants around) it would probably be five stars.  For those who do plan to cook at home, there are a couple of larger supermarkets within five minutes walk of the apartment that are worth seeking out rather than the smaller closer ones.

Billy's place was an ideal location. We were in Athens for 3 full days and never had to take any public transportation to get to where we wanted. The place is right in the middle of plenty of action. Plenty of coffee shops and restaurants right next to us and a short walk to Monastiraki Square.

The apartment is equipped with all the necessary things that you will need on your stay‚Ä¶ toaster, water heater, hair drier, even wash machine powder ( that we unfortunately saw the last day), oil, coffee, sugar etc. The host is always in touch with you to answer any questions and giving you advises about the area and whatever else you need. Very helpful and very kind. If you need pick up or drop off from and to the airport the host can provide you with a taxi driver that costs 40 e. We will for sure choose this place again and we thank Sokol for the pleasant stay.

I have almost no regrets choosing Paula and Billy's apartment for my solo visit to Athens, due to its safe location, stunning views, easy walking distance to the centre of the City and Paula's empathetic and quick response to some of my difficulties.  She could not be kinder! However, had he been with me, my late husband and I would definitely have struggled to cope with the VERY comfortable but still very small double bed.   The enduring limitation which I couldn‚Äôt resolve was the lack of a suitable chair or table to accommodate a meal, which is undeniably made clear on the advertisement, but I was sufficiently distracted by the views and the promise of a microwave not to process the implications of this. True to my independent nature, I also didn‚Äôt like to always have to ask Paula for help eg when I couldn't work the microwave or find the cork screw.  This was entirely my fault but it also helps explain why  I couldn't sleep on the first night, because I was so very cold ...

100% would recommend to anyone looking to explore Athens, situated walking distance from a lot of the sights, plenty of cafes, bars and restaurants. And close to the metro for those things further out of the city! The accommodation was beautiful with a great view, and the host is not only very responsive should you need anything but also very helpful with things like step by step instructions to get to the listing from the airport, restaurant picks (we went to some of the suggestions and they were beautiful) and kept in touch to ask if there was anything that could be done to make my stay even better.  Unfortunately nocarz is limited to 5 star else I would give more!

We had an amazing stay in Athens at Four Streets! Vasileios was very communicative and and even set up dinner for our group at a local taverna that he goes to. The apartments looked just like the pictures and had a luxurious feel to them. Having four apartments together in one building was perfect for our large group as we could hang out together or have our own space as we wanted. We also loved the location. The apartments are right in the middle of a popular shopping location in Athens but are just off the main street enough that they feel more secluded and were pretty quiet at night. We loved that we could walk to he acropolis and around Plaka very easily. Overall, I can't recommend these apartments enough! We hope to be back soon.

Stay here! This was a luxury apartment in Athens, conveniently located and including beautiful finishes. Giolena was helpful, clear and successfully helped us coordinate a ride to and from the airport. Thanks for a great stay!

This was a great location from which to explore Athens - we only had a couple of days so that was much appreciated. Once we were in Athens, the host was responsive, offering local recommendations, information and flexibility about baggage at check-out. The air conditioning was very effective and much needed.

Our stay was incredible from start to finish. The host was very communicative and accessible throughout. The apartment was exactly as described and in superb condition when we checked in. Check in was quick and easy thanks to the clear and easy to follow instructions. The apartment is ideally located next to the Acropolis museum and a very short walk into Plaka. The roof terrace was amazing as well with breathtaking views of the Parthenon and acropolis. We cannot recommend this accommodation highly enough and we will definitely be returning.

Steve's place is just wonderful.
First of all, it's Kolonaki. I've lived here for 40 days back in 2017, but I was much closer to Lycabettus. I wouldn't recommend that: even though living up high looks nice, it takes a lot of energy to get home, especially if you're with groceries. Steve's place is right next to the Kolonaki square. It's around 8-10 minutes walk to the Syntagma square (the center of Athens), there are 3 grocery stores very close: OK, Kretikos and Sklavenitis, and there are plenty of restaurants, shops, cafes, and bars just a few minutes away. Kolonaki is the safest area in Athens, it's probably one of the most expensive too, but there are many reasons to pay for it more. Once you live here for a bit, you won't choose any other area.
How about the place itself? It's good. It's clean, it looks modern, the internet is quick enough even for me (I come from Lithuania, so you can trust me on the Internet speeds). It has a fridge, shower, cooking stove, coffee machine, washing machine, iron, hairdryer, TV, pretty much everything you might need even for a long stay.
And it simply looks nice. Mostly black & white, minimalist style. The way I like it. All in all, it's a 10/10 apartment, and Steve's communication is exceptional too, you won't have any problems. If you're looking for the best experience for a moderate price, this is your best bet.
I really enjoyed staying in Steve‚Äòs apartment! Especially the location was amazing!

We had a lovely stay in Athens and really enjoyed the flat. We especially loved the neighborhood, which is filled with lively streets and cozy bars/restaurants. The flat is close to everything we needed: several supermarkets, great restaurants, and within walking distance to the touristic district while still feeling authentic and calm. The flat was spacious and clean and we had a great time. A note for future visitors: be very careful with anything of value if you decide to come by metro; we got pickpocketed despite being very careful and vigilant.

perfect ideal location for getting around everywhere! We walked the entire trip and Konstantina was especially accommodating, she helped us with our airport transport and suggestions. A great warm representative of our entire Greece vacation, very warm loving people.

I can‚Äôt imagine staying anywhere else in Athens. The views are better than the photos depict. The design and aesthetic are so thoughtful and well executed. Please try Dopios it was fantastic (we ate there 3 times). Also for breakfast, the Overoll Coissanterie down the street was great and The Maker (a few doors down) was MAGIC. If you want proximity to everything, amazing food within a 2 minute walking distance and a boutique hotel feeling then this is your jam!

We absolutely recommend it!

Unfortunately I cannot recommend this place. It is not just loud, it‚Äôs in the loudest street in Psyrri. We were very happy with everything about our stay at Maria‚Äôs apartment. She has an exceptionally clean and well appointed place on a quiet street, just a couple blocks from a wonderful park and in close walking distance to the best of Kypseli, and Exharia too. Communication and check in were a breeze. (And Maria was a big help when we accidentally left 2 wheels of cheese in the fridge, saving them for us until we could pass back through Athens.) We would certainly stay again.

Yiorgos is the perfect host. I had a different place reserved but I couldn't reach the host then I contacted Yiorgos to book his place and he was there within 10 minutes to check me in. He also gave me tips and guides to everything in Athens. He also dropped us off at the airport despite the very early flight.
The place is sparkling clean and cozy, good internet and hot water. In a very safe area I felt as if I was home, exactly 9 minutes away from the acropolis, has restaurants and shops all around it.
I would definitely recommend a stay with Yiorgos.

What a great stay at Yannis and Tax‚Äôs place! The apartment itself has recently been fully renovated so everything in it was brand new, modern, spacious and clean. I liked the whole decor, which I found to be both elegant and cozy. Since I‚Äôm not the easiest sleeper I was happy to see that the mattress was very comfortable and that there were blackout curtains in the bedrooms. Having been to Athens before I know that having hot water all day and still being able to take a hot shower in the evening is not always a given depending on where you stay. Thankfully, this was not the case here and I had more than enough hot water every day. The kitchen was fully stocked and the wine and cookies left by the hosts were a very nice touch!
The outdoor space is huge! Larger than expected. Both bedrooms and living room have direct access to it by sliding door. The plunge pool was definitely a highlight, and the hosts made sure that it remained clean and warm throughout my stay.
This was my first time staying in that area of Athens (aptly named the ‚ÄúAcropolis‚Äù area) and I‚Äôm glad I discovered it. The apartment is quite close to the Acropolis museum and Acropolis ‚Äúwalk‚Äù (a 5 mins walk tops) which is great in itself but also allows you to easily find your way to other neighbourhoods such as Plaka. The apartment is located downtown so it‚Äôs at a walking distance to all services such as shops, groceries restaurants, cafes, pharmacies, metro, etc.
Yannis and Tax are amazing, professional hosts, they really went out of their way to make sure that I had everything I needed. They arranged a very nice transfer from the airport and were very adaptable when I had to delay my arrival. I enjoyed my stay so much that I decided to extend it. Overall a positive experience all the way!
We had an excellent stay, the place was amazing and the team super responsive!

Yannis and Tax's nocarz in Athens is a dream! It's right in the heart of the city within 5 minutes walking distance to the Acropolis Museum and within 15 minutes walking distance to the top of the Acropolis, plus close to a variety of other monuments, ruins, shops, great streets, tasty restaurants, etc. The locations is excellent! Their communication is superb. They do everything to ensure you have an excellent and smooth stay. They'll even arrange airport transfers for you, if you'd like. As for the place itself, it's wonderful. Such a great aesthetic, very clean, and with a gorgeous view of the Acropolis. There were four of us (two couples) staying and we had plenty of space to spread out, spend some time at the nocarz, and then explore the city. Overall, wonderful place with outstanding hosts in a fantastic location. Highly recommend booking with Yannis and Tax! They are great!

They provided lots of great recommendations and check in details were thorough. They even assisted with scheduling taxi rides to and from the rental which was a huge stress relief! The nocarz is walkable to everything you could need or want, with an amazing view of the Acropolis. Honestly I couldn‚Äôt critique one thing about this whole experience! Thank you again, Yannis and Tax! We appreciated you very much!

Beautiful apartment with breathtaking views! Location is solid with lots of restaurants and bars close by, especially the metro for getting to and from the airport. Enjoyed our stay!
Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in der Unterkunft. Die Aussicht auf die Akropolis war fantastisch :-)!
Location is near the tourist places, bars, stores, eateries. Very beautiful apartment, clean with a lovely view

Such an amazing place to stay. Especially if you want the nightlife. You are walking distance to lots of restaurants, cafes, parks and museums. The view of Acropolis at night is absolutely stunning. Everything was very clean and tidy and we had everything we needed here. The host arranged us transportation to and from the airport and that made our traveling so easy. I highly recommend staying here and I hope to be back again!

An amazing stay at a beautiful apartment! The views, large balcony / patio space, and contemporary design were beyond awesome. Loved the neighborhood and liveliness that showed us a different side of Athens. When we had an accommodation request last minute after checking in, they were quickly on top of it to get just what we needed - going above and beyond. Amazing responsiveness and communication, would definitely stay here again. Thank you!

The apartment was definitely a must-see. We enjoyed our stay quite much. The apartment was clean, organized and central. Although we couldn‚Äôt find much to do around the apartment specifically it is just 1 metro station or like 25 min walk away from the center of Athens so it was real easy to go around. Hosts are very responsive.

The place looks great for the small space that it had available and Sokol was a great host, letting us do an earlier checkin since the the previous clients were already gone. It has indeed a small balcony for smoking, but I would recommend to go on the rooftop and enjoy the view, it's much better. You can find a lot of restaurants and cafes within 5 min of walking.
Comfortable apartment and good location

We booked this apartment after there was an issue with our original choice. I thought the location would not be an issue but the dual carriage way really had an impact - the noise could be heard all the time in the apartment and we hated crossing the road. Previous reviews stated the noise was not an issue but I dispute that. There was also major building work taking place at the hotel next door which meant it was noisy from 08 00 and the builders smoking created a terrible smell throughout the apartment, particularly in the bathroom. We were compensated but I would have preferred it if we had been informed ahead of making the booking. I am sure the hosts would have been told when the work was going to start by the hotel.

Positive: Lydia‚Äôs spot was really close to everywhere. We love how walkable it was and the neighborhood felt safe. Good amount of space in the apartment. Very easy check in. Apartment was on the 4th floor.
Suggestion for Improvement: we did notice some mold in the bathroom, making it smell musty, and bed was ok/ somewhat comfortable. A deep bleaching of the shower and maybe mattress topper would help these tow issues. The door window in the living room also didn‚Äôt properly lock, but we travel with a door jam alarm, so we still felt safe. we unfortunately also had some noisy neighbors on night 2 of our stay that partied from 10 pm until 6am. Im a heavy sleeper and was able to sleep through it with my ear plugs, but it did wake my partner up a few times. We notified Lydia and unfortunately she could not help as she did not know this neighbour. She also mentioned that this is not the norm for her apartment and it is typically a quite complex.

no one really welcomed me in to the apartment, because I arrived late at night. But It was unexpected that the taxi driver the The Host called, helped us into the apartment and gave us an introduction for the entire flat.
I think it would have been more secure for me and feel prepared, if the host let me know in advance that the Driver will be showing me all the how-to‚Äôs.
The building is old and industrialized, apartment is renovated. Creative interior design! provided with some Great self-guide booklets!
The biggest problems were, their bedrooms smell funky from not getting direct sunlights. And there were many mosquitoes in the bathroom, because the window there can not be closed or (was not closed up) so‚Ä¶.. very unexpectedly, you will get bitten by big mosquitoes multiple times‚Ä¶but the host had sprays prepared for you, which was nice‚Ä¶. Also, there is a very strange mannequin in second bedroom, which can look pretty scary at night it should be removed, just because it‚Äôs very strange‚Ä¶.
Otherwise, great view and sung lights in the living room. Many good restaurants down the street five minutes walk away!
Nice to have all the machines, for coffee , washing machine and etc, very convenient.

I would give this apartment a 10/10!
It was the cleanest apartment I have ever had with nocarz. Everything you needed was there and it is decorated with love. It is very well located so you can walk to all the interesting areas. Vasileios responded within minutes and welcomed me at the apartment even though my flight was delayed for 2h. All in all I cannot recommend this even more and I would for sure come back. Thanks!!!
Great location, beautiful aesthetic with all the practical details for a comfortable stay. Loved the view and reslly appreciated the fast internet. Highly recommended.

I had the opportunity to stay in this apartment after having been amazed by another of Yannis and Tax‚Äôs properties and deciding to extend my stay. This apartment is great and to be honest I‚Äôm almost hesitant to give it the stellar review it deserves because I want to keep the spot available for my future trips to Athens!
Since the place has been very newly remodelled, everything is brand new, modern and clean. The decor is beautiful and the furniture very comfortable. The floor to ceiling windows in the main living area offer great city views day and night. The outdoor space is perfect for relaxing with the heated plunge pool (kept optimally warm and clean by Tax), I will definitely miss it. Aside from this, the apartment is well stocked, comes with the amount of towels you want (both bath and pool towels) and has plenty of hot water (not a given in Athens).
The location is hard to beat as you are right downtown. The Acropolis museum and Acropolis ‚Äúwalk‚Äù are 5 mins away. From there, it takes an easy 10-15 mins to walk to Plaka and Syntagma (I would recommend taking the much more beautiful Acropolis walk to get there instead of the road that Google maps usually suggests that follows the highway). There are plenty of shops in the area as well as restaurants, cafes, pharmacies, etc.
Yannis and Tax organized a very nice transfer for me from the airport and made sure that the check in and out processes went smoothly. They remained available, helpful and friendly throughout my stay and made sure that I had everything needed. Overall I consider my experience to have been positive on every level and I‚Äôm looking forward to going back!
very nice and clean apartment in the center of athens. the hosts are helpful and kind.
Such a beautiful apartment. Yannis & Tax were above all expectations. Answered quickly, helped with anything we needed and were just real lovely. We really enjoyed and we can‚Äôt wait to come back

I am more than pleased with my stay. The host was very kind to meet us later in the evening. The apartment feels cosy and has a big balcony. Great for relaxing after all sightseeing.

Had a phenomenal stay in Andreas' place in Athens. The location is ideal to be able to access all of the tourist sites that Athens has to offer, but also provides a private location that you can get away from it all and feel like a local. Maria was an absolute pleasure to communicate with. Her prompt responses and helpful suggestions made my stay feel effortless.
The apartment's location was truly unbeatable. It was a short stroll to the iconic Acropolis, the vibrant Plaka neighborhood, and the convenient Metro station.
I loved exploring the city's historic sites and indulging in delicious local cuisine.
I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Athens. It's the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and authentic Athenian charm.

We loved our stay at Maria‚Äôs place. It was about 5 minutes walking from the Acropolis and even less to the Acropolis museum and train station . The street was nice and quiet but the neighbourhood had everything we needed.
Maria was very helpful and quick to respond. The place was clean and nicely furnished. We appreciated the Netlix and air conditioning.
If I had to pick out one small negative, it would be the lack of natural light. The apartment is a basement suite with only one window opening to an enclosed courtyard. There was virtually no natural light, however, that is beyond the owners control. Regardless, I would absolutely book this space again.
Amazing stay for our short time in Athens, would love to come back!

Words cannot describe how fantastic it was to stay here. Constantine and his co-host Nina were amazing, helpful, easy to reach & so friendly. The neighbourhood is fantastic with lots to do. The apartment itself is stunning, clean & comfortable. We will miss it a lot. Thank you so much for having us Constantine! :)

Four of us visiting Athens before heading to sailing the Ionian Isles and we loved this efficiency apartment! Minimal, well equipped and enough room for all of us. Constantine‚Äôs communication was fantastic from booking to check in. Nina(manager) was responsive and helpful in settling us in. Great location close to so much without being touristy. Busy area with a lot of local shops and necessities. Suggesting updated instructions on the washer\dryer for short, cold washes and better drying(not steaming.) Also, the recommendation guide is very long and meaty - I actually attempted to reorganize it to make it more readable and gave up after an hour. Perhaps update and reorganize it?
Overall, a really great alternative to a hotel.
PS Europe IKEA is better than US and we ll loved the minimalist and stylish look of all of the items, cabinets, etc installed.

If you‚Äôre planning to visit Athens, the Cave is the perfect home base. It is located on one of the most beautiful streets in the city, just steps away from many shops and restaurants, and a super short walk from all the major archeological sites. The location made it so easy to stop by the nocarz for breaks throughout the day, and the rooftop was the perfect spot for unwinding and watching the sunrise and sunset. Amalia was so helpful in ensuring we had everything we needed during our stay, and gave great local recommendations. Next time I‚Äôm in Athens, I would love to stay here again.

We only stayed a night and we wished we could stay there a little longer. Only there as we made our way from Meteroa to Mykonos but it was well worth it! Close to the metro. Cute space. Thoughtful touches like coffee and croissants. Thank you for having us!

Even coffee and filter were there and also tea. There is nothing to improve, we would come back anytime!

We had a great stay!

Nice apartment in an excellent location. Safe neighbourhood with excellent restaurants, cafes and supermarkets very close by.  Close enough to the central areas to walk (20-30 mins) or if you prefer use ubers for around 5-6 euros. Nice big balcony which we didn't use but would be great in warmer weather. Parking space is very handy. Rooms and especially the 2 bathrooms are a bit small and cramped, but this may be the norm in Athens. We had some maintenance issues (broken toilet seat, 2 bedroom door handles not working, 3 balcony doors and windows not locking) which were annoying but not the end of the world. Host did offer to send someone to fix these issues but we declined as we only had 2 days left. Wifi is not the fastest but adequate. Overall we enjoyed our stay and I'm sure the maintenance issues will be sorted for future guests.

The place was very clean, almost sterile. Most nocarz‚Äòs have more of a personalized touch and this was basic white walls and no decorations. The space was extremely large, so would be perfect for people traveling in a group. The check in is NOT self check in, although it claims to be. You actually check in with the front desk and it requires formal paperwork as though you‚Äôre staying at a hotel. The bathroom shampoo and conditioner bottles were basically empty, it was almost like they filled them with an ounce so there was enough for one night‚Äôs stay. I didn‚Äôt love that there was a fridge that required payment for items inside of it, it‚Äôs better to leave it empty if that‚Äôs the case since there is no way to pay upon check out, especially because we were leaving extremely early.  Also notable that the building has an elevator but there are still stairs required to get to and from the elevator landing.  Important if you have lots of luggage or mobility issues.  Overall nice place, if you are looking for more of a hotel stay!

We had a great stay at this nocarz, it was as described. Easy location to trams and to the older and lovelier parts of Athens. The apartment was beautifully clean and we were so lucky to have Kyrikos (co-host) greet us and spend time with us making recommendations re: sites etc.
Note that 2 of the bedrooms have aircon and two have fans.
The icing on the cake was sunset on the second floor with an amazing view of the Acropolis. Great value for money.
thanks you !!

We stayed as a group of 5 and would say it was well worth the money. This particular apartment was on the top floor, had a working elevator and was walking distance to the acropolis.
Some things to be aware of:
The area can be noisy. Not all rooms have ac so the rooms with single beds can be very warm (mid sept). Learn to use hot water in that it's not endless, and you will need to stagger showering in larger groups.
Overall the apartment was perfect for what we needed. The host also offers all services you need as travelers at a price cheaper then most local services. So I would recommend you use the host offerings if you need them.

The apartment was as promised. The apartment is close to restaurants and next to a tram stop. However, it is quiet in the evening as there are mostly car repair shops in the close by streets that obviously closed during the evenings. It seemed like a safe location and very good location even though the first impression might not be that fancy when you walk to the apartment from the tram stop. Nothing bad to say about the apartment. It's spacious, clean and nice. You even have a view of the Acropolis from one of the bedrooms.

This was the perfect place to stay for exploring Athens! In a lovely neighbourhood, not far from the centre of town and really clean! Joanne was a great host, so friendly with some great recommendations - thank you Joanne!

Lovely location, very safe, quiet at night, clean, has a nice little outdoor sitting area, and is in a lovely part of the city. Lycabettus hill is right behind the apartment and you can walk to the top of it for a beautiful view of the city. It is also easy to get to other parts of the city by taxi or walking. I enjoyed walked to the Acropolis, National Gardens, and other sites right from the apartment.  Joanne is a wonderful host -- she is very communicative and super helpful with any questions. Very enjoyable stay!

There isn‚Äôt much in the way of restaurants near by, but with the ease of the metro we just travelled to different areas for food. Shops/pharmacies are near by though. This is the perfect location within walking distance of everything. The room is easy to access but secure and it has a beautiful outdoor balcony area, and A/C! There is an elevator that goes from the lobby straight to inside your room which was nice for us. The hostis so kind and polite. We would definitely stay here again.

We absolutely loved our stay here.
The location was amazing, walking distance to pretty much everything and so useful having a metro so close by for links to the airport. The area was buzzing and interesting, but when you retreated to the apartment we couldn‚Äôt hear a thing! We had a great nights sleep.
The place itself has everything you need and is comfy and stylish. The balcony was such a nice extra to have and we enjoyed a coffee on it most mornings!

Thanks again!

We loved our stay! The apartment is lovely. There's a well stocked little kitchen area, which we found practical. The balcony is spacious and comfortable: a great place for coffee and breakfast or a nightcap. The bed is comfortable and the shower is awesome. Our host gave us a great list of interesting things to do nearby and checked in with us regularly to make sure everything was okay which we really appreciated. Speaking of things to do nearby... there is so much! We did almost everything on foot for our week-long stay. Museums, art galleries, archaeological sites, shopping, and neat parts of town are all within a short walk. It's a wonderful apartment in a super convenient location. I cannot recommend it enough!
appartamento bellissimo, pulitissimo e host veramente accoglienti

A fantastic, brand new top floor 'nest' with beautiful tree canopy views and a large terrace in a quiet residential part of central Athens. The hosts - Mary and Dimitri - are incredibly hospitable, reliable and accommodating (I was able to check-in at midnight).
Kolonaki and the Hilton Hotel are merely a 10-minute walk away. Overall a well appointed flat of 50m2, not counting the spacious outdoor area. Lovely modern shower room, excellent storage space, great light, and a kingsize bed with cotton sheets, a superb mattress with mattress pad, and wonderful feather-down pillows and down comforter or blanket. Supermarkets, cafes, and restaurants are a stone's throw away, and if takeaway is preferred - WOLT (Greece's most popular answer to Uber Eats) is another highlight to indulge in.
Needless to say - I really enjoyed my stay and am (literally) looking forward to returning soon. 10/10

I liked staying at Mary and Dimitris' recently refurbished flat so much I came back for a second (longer) stay and it felt like home. Bright, clean, clutterless and airy with a fabulous rooftop terrace overlooking the nearby urban woods (which I frequented for my daily runs). Super comfortable mattress, oodles of closet space, wooden floors, plenty of hot water and yet, despite its central location with only a 7-minute equidistant walk from the popular 5-star hotels Athens Hilton and Divani Caravel, this apartment is in a very quiet residential neighbourhood. A couple of mini-marts and supermarkets are close-by, for any and all other deliveries -- there is WOLT.
Would happily return...

This is a true home not your usual real estate company renting out artificially generated home atmosphere:-).
Beautiful flat, beautiful district, very friendly hosts, wonderful location. GO FOR IT!
10/10  highly recomended üëç

Valerie was an excellent host! From the very beginning she was very helpful to promptly answer any questions I had about her place. I was with a friend with a knee injury and she was very specific about the amount of steps to entrance and elevator availability. As soon as we arrived she had fabulous transportation waiting for us. The apartment itself was very clean and we felt very safe and comfortable. If you want PRIME location- it doesn‚Äôt get much better than this! Amazing shops, restaurants and historical sites are just footsteps away! And there are perfect photo opportunities at very turn. She was the most perfect host, giving us a list of great recommendations and even arranged for our transport back to the airport. Valerie, thank you so much for helping to make our Athens experience so memorable! We loved it!

The apartment is bland and run not by two people but an organisation. As soon as we arrived, we saw a cross trainer machine stuck next to the sofa - not in the pictures. The shower is sadly woeful and not of the standard I expect for this rate. It is an old bath tap and I would have to use a spoon to operate the button that switched the water to the shower head. The shower head itself never fitted in its holder and would quite often fall off. A terrible experience. While the bed was very comfortable, the frame for the mattress is too high for it. It is therefore only suitable for very tall people. There are two wardrobes but only one coat hanger was provided, so pretty useless. The hosts did come to look at the shower but never did anything about it. We did receive a refund of 200 Euros off the amount for the week but the entire process was very stressful. No real local tips were provided so just as well we knew the area ourselves. Not recommended, sadly. Love the area though.
Nice place located very centrally and in close proximity to the metro station as well as all the main attractions in Athens. Also very clean and easy self check in

The good: the place is in the heart of the old town, in Plaka. You are in the mix of everything, restaurants and shops. Terrace view onto Acropolis is great - and can be very relaxing in the evening.
The bad: this is not an owner-run place like nocarz was meant to be. It's managed like a hotel by a management crew, but unfortunately they don't have the skill to run it properly.
I received no less than 7 automated reminders and check-in instructions prior to arriving, and when we finally got there, we discovered an apartment with an open door, some random people taking a shower there, garbage from previous guests in the kitchen and no linens on any bed.
Shocking. Upon further investigation, turned out people taking a shower were neighbors in the apartment next door who arrived shortly before us and the key to their place was not even in the lockbox. They just came all the way from South Africa to run into a closed door and no key. With our apartment clearly vacated, they decided to take a quick shower because they had to leave for a show at Odeon shortly.
So, two apartments that have not been cleaned, one missing a key and one wide open for anyone to use.
Despite multiple messages through nocarz, nobody responds in chat - don't expect any responses. Luckily I had a Greek SIM card and was able to call. At 8 in the evening they picked up, apologized for the mix up and promised to try and get ahold of the cleaning crew. Knowing Greece I was not optimistic that anyone would indeed come late on a Saturday night and was prepared to search for a hotel.
But, the crew did indeed come, rather frazzled - clearly some internal communications were broken. They did a quick clean and left fresh towels and bath accessories. Unfortunately, working in a hurry, they still left garbage in the kitchen and the linens were stained.
We only stayed for one night transiting to the islands, so we didn't care as long as we had a place to spend the night. But if this were my primary stay in Athens, I would avoid at all costs.

However, there was a small of damp throughout the full stay and the bathroom was continuously soaking wet due to no shower door or curtain.
Two females stayed and there was only one mirror which was in the bathroom and was constantly wet and covered with steam.
