The place was exactly what I was looking for! The location was great and safe. It was very close to the metro, restaurants and stores. It was also good walking distances to many nice places. Very private, clean and had everything you need. It had two balconies, big TV perfectly positioned in front of the bed, good bed and the bathroom was very clean and nice. There is a street right outside and you could briefly hear the traffic, however it didn't bother me the slightest. Communication with the host was also excellent. At first I didn't get hot water to work so I wrote to the host. Within 30 minutes they responded and gave me clear instructions on how to turn on the heater, which was basically just a power switch. I would definitely book this apartment again!!

I stayed in Stefano's apt for a week. The response rate is very quick to any inquiry you may have.  Everyone knows Koukaki is one of the great neighborhoods in Athens. Clearly a lot of thought went into decorating the apt and it seems to have been recently renovated or else has been very well maintained. It is situated on the first floor and so, It is not naturally, but the lighting is plentiful, tasteful and strategic and it worked fine for me.  All the rooms are spacious and there are 2 WC's with shower and wonderful stone sinks. I definitely enjoyed my stay and would recommend it to anyone. Very comfortable and upscale. This is not one of those rentals with sheets draped over the furniture for "slipcovers."

We loved the neighbourhood - walking distance / short cab ride to main attractions but a lovely quiet place to come back to after the hustle of the main sites. There‚Äôs a nice square at the end of the street with restaurants and cafes and bars. We would highly recommend this nocarz!

S√©jour confortable, bon positionnement g√©ographique proche du m√©tro et aussi pour aller √† pied dans les quartiers de centre d'Ath√®nes.
Un merci sp√©cial √† Luciano pour ses bonnes recommandations bars, restaurants : petit d√©jeuner chez Min√∫, little tree coffee (notre pr√©f√©r√© !), ...

Very convenient location. Check in process was easy. However, it is very inconvenient that you can‚Äôt keep the electricity on in the apartment without the keys, and there is only one set of keys. Georgio was very kind and accommodating in working to find a solution for this, but unfortunately we were only there for one night and by the time we got it sorted out we had given up our evening plans.

Extremely friendly and easy to reach host. He booked us the taxi for the ferry and it went spotless!
Apartment was very spacious especially for its central location!
Only minus point is it is very noisy in the night, though that is part of its central location.
Very good place
Amazing location with walking distance to everywhere. Very friendly and caring management, we were able to check in earlier than expected. Great rate per night, I highly recommend this place!
Excellent hospitality and amazing location.  I highly recommend you stay here.
Perfect stay in Athens. Quiet and accessible, I would recommend the location 100%. The room was lovely, perfectly clean and Petros is really kind and accessible. Awesome first experience in Athens !

The apartment is located in a neighborhood fool of restaurants and bars, very close to the metro staton and Athens attractions. If you like to make a coffe of cook everything is there in the apartment. Very charming roof top terrace!  Easy check in and check out (codes to the place). If you look for a perfect spot tho explore Athens then you‚Äôve found it!

Excellent accueil de la part de Pietros. Pietros est bienveillant, accessible, a r√©pondu tr√®s vite √† toutes nos interrogations, et a pris de nos nouvelles tous les jours lors de notre s√©jour.
De plus, le logement est d‚Äôune tr√®s bonne qualit√©, excellent emplacement, propret√© au top.
Nous recommandons Pietros et son logement a 100% pour un court ou long s√©jour √† Ath√®nes. Merci √† lui

The location was great and the place was very nice.  However, the manager of the building must have been watching our coming and going and reported that we had more people there.  They were family and came to eat and pick us up to go on adventures.  Our communication concerning that was terse.   Petros was also concerned that we used more then the two bath and two hand towels that were left out for us for four night stay.

A great find for a few nights in Athens. So many nice bars and restaurants within a 5-10 minute walk. Loved the area and how convenient it was to get around Athens and see the sights. Super friendly and responsive host made check in very easy and the flat itself was as pictured and quite spacious. Overall really happy with the stay and would recommend!

Wow! Such a beautiful apartment in an incredibly walkable part of the city. Konstantinos was so quick to communicate and was very responsive to all of my questions. I would recommend this spot to everyone, and will book again when I‚Äôm back in town :)

Ioannis is super welcoming and always ready to give good adresses ! The patio is the Crown of the Jewel of this fresh and nicely decorated room! i would definitevely recommend this appartement for anyone looking for a quiet Space in the center of the city!
Nice classic apartment, great location to get around the center. A little loud street, the a/c didn‚Äôt work properly. Host was reachable and very attentive
Awesome place! Great view of Acropolis from balcony and rooftop!

This place was awesome! Stelios was not only a great host, he communicated extremely well and accommodated our schedule. The place AND location were amazing. I really can‚Äôt say enough good about it. Perfect for our family of 4, all the creature comforts and even some food/coffee on site to use. Also so nice to be able to do a load of laundry before heading home.
If we ever get back to Athens, we will absolutely sorry here again.

Molto carino, pulito, nuovo e ben attrezzato. La posizione √® buona a circa 5 min. dalla stazione metro Acropoli e a 20 minuti a piedi da piazza Syntagma. Zona silenziosa sebbene a pochi metri ci siano strade a traffico intenso. Per arrivare all'appartamento ci sono scale e salite che √® bene considerare se si hanno bagagli pesanti. Noi ci siamo trovati molto bene e lo consigliamo!

The apartment is lovely and as described. The host is friendly and took great care of us. The street is noisy and heard if opening the windows.
We found the neighborhood not safe as we saw some drug addicts on the street next to the street of the apartment.
Our stay was smooth.
Great location, great apartment.

Anna's place was lovely, we had a great stay. It is within a few blocks of the Acropolis and there are great restaurants, coffee shops, a gelato house, and markets right outside your door. We honestly fell in love with the neighborhood, which made a couple of country dwellers long for the city. The bed could have been softer - I had a hard time getting good sleep; I also recommend putting in a shelf in the shower for holding soaps and such. Otherwise the privacy, the patio, the price, and again the neighborhood made some of the smaller imperfections totally tolerable. I do think a new bed and shower shelving would be great investments, though! Otherwise, boy oh boy, what a wonderful intro to Athens, Greece. Thank you, Anna, we are very grateful for the experience

Cozy apartment right in the middle of the city. We were able to arrive at 18:30, check in, and walk to the Olympic Stadium before they sold the last ticket at 19:00. We only spent a night here but it was clear that a lot of thought was put into making full use of the space. It was well organized and stocked with everything we could have needed. The outdoor living area was also beautiful. Thanks for the great stay, George and Joanna!
worked already great location. Communication was quick and helpful. Would recommend to everyone.
Excelente apartamento para disfrutar Atenas y el host muy amigable

My stay at Andreas's place was very good, the apartment was very clean, smelled nice and was comfortable enough for the price paid. I even enjoyed the view from the 5th floor. Would definitively recommend!
Apartment was great, in a very well-located area. Extremely well equipped, with every amenity we needed to feel at home and comfortable. Thank you so much!

Nicely furnished studio with everything you need and very central. Good WiFi, quiet at night and hot water. I enjoyed my stay there and didn't miss anything. Only negative point was that in winter (January) the floor is very cold.
Awesome stay! Close to everything, beautiful updated room.
This apartment was super modern, clean and spacious. I would not hesitate to stay here again in the future

Gregory was such an amazing host. He sent clear and concise instructions to follow. The apartment was clean and comfortable! It was extremely easy to get into central Athens via the train. This place is well worth the price! We loved it!

I recently stayed at an nocarz in Athens and was blown away by the amazing hospitality offered by the owner. Upon arrival, the owner kindly gave me a walk-around of the apartment and showed me everything I needed to know. The apartment was equipped with all the essentials I could ever need, including a full kitchen with supplies, a washing machine, and an ironing board. I was even thrilled to learn that Netflix was available for the times I needed to take a break from exploring.
The apartment was not only comfortable but also strategically located, making it easy to access nearby shops, restaurants, and tourist attractions. The only concern I have is the limited hours for hot water. There is a timer set for two hours a day with hot water. However the host let is override if you choose to do so.
I would highly recommend this nocarz to anyone looking for a comfortable, thoughtfully equipped, and centrally located apartment in Athens.
The kindest and most helpful hosts! Location was excellent and we enjoyed their restaurant and bar recommendations!

Excellent location. It was wonderful walking out on the deck and seeing the Acropolis, especially at night and early morning when it was lit. Great host that was very accommodating and fast replying. Would definitely stay again.

This is the nocarz you hope to find when you travel.  The hosts were great about communicating, and the place was full of the little touches that make a great spot.  It was beautiful and I only wish we could have stayed longer.

We had a really good time. The only inconvenience was to get the apartment by small elevator (barely fit two people) and then stairs but the view was worth it when you get to the apartment. Also, hot tub was def a plus. Thank you Yannis & Tax.

We stayed the weekend in Athens at the apartment. It's very close to Fillopapou hill and walkable to the Acropolis. The apartment was clean and had the amenities that we needed. Communication with the owner was very smooth, he replied quickly and gave clear instructions for checkin and check out. The key was in the safe so we didn't meet him.
It's a great place, all you need, but it's on the first floor with 2 windows with a street and pavement right next to it so we didn't have our blinds open a lot. There was little natural light because of that. We could have stayed in another apartment with a view but it would be more expensive, it's your own choice.
Overall, we enjoyed our stay :)

Location is fantastic, only 5 minutes from Acropolis and the Metro. The accommodation was affordable and exceeded expectations.
Host was very good and responsive. He fixed any of our problems within an hour.
The house is in a good location, very clean and cozy. Everything you need has been thought. The owner is helpful.

The studio was amazing, very clean, spacious and fully equipped! I missed not having the basics while cooking like salt or oil, but all the rest was amazing ! Will definitely book it again!
Spyros made check in very easy with detailed instructions. It is nicely tucked away and quiet but central to Plaka, restaurants and the acropolis.

Great place to stay before our early flight. Place was clean

Comfortable space- just a little tricky to find! The area around is convenient because of location near metro, but at night felt a little dicey at times (just be aware and it should be fine). The water is hot only for a short time so be prepared for shorter showers. Other than that, it was a good stay!
Just as described. Clean and comfortable, great location.  Good communication.

on a good note super clean  bright apartment , fairly good location, entrance to the building between  smelly trash bins by the busy eatery, some tolerable noise, unpleasant host, extra ‚Ç¨15  for leaving my bag in theirs own office, unpleasant assistant unable to take ‚Ç¨15 additional charges refused to accept ‚Ç¨12.50 i had on me, held me hostage for 20 minutes,, missed train to the airport almost missed the flight,, i use air b&b several times never have i ever seen this ,,, seriously?!? all this for ‚Ç¨15 after i paid u over ¬£200  for accommodation,  sad, good luck with this kind of attitude,

The apartment was fine, looked like the pics but the shower was so slow to drain it would overflow and spill over the lip onto the bathroom floor if you don't turn off the water every few minutes.
But the big issue was that they tried to charge extra fees for no reason. They consider the second bed in the living room (the pullout couch) an EXTRA AMENITY WITH AN EXTRA CHARGE. They make no mention of this anywhere on their listing or in their communication after booking. They listed the apt for up to 4 people with 2 beds. I booked with two people, with me in the bedroom and my friend on the pullout couch. When we checked in they tried to charge ‚Ç¨135 extra to use the pullout. Again, NO MENTION OF THIS IN THEIR LISTING OR COMMUNICATION PRIOR, So it was deceitful and a scam. The apt is nice but DO NOT BOOK WITH THEM, deceitful people trying to nickle and dime you after you've already booked and are checking in.

This place is close to the action but please note it is very loud at night. The location is right by a bar that blasts music until like 3am. Also the water was cold at night so we couldn‚Äôt shower. On the other hand, the host was very responsive, the place was clean, and check-in was a breeze. Overall place was decent.

We stayed for 4 days to adventure around Athens and for it this place was perfect. Everything was nearby (Akropolis and museum) and that was the reason we looked into it. Bed was comfortable and the lighting was nice extra to set the mood. It was nice to come back after a day under the Sun, as the AC helps to keep the apartment cool. We got fresh clean sheets and towels. As a Finn, we can say that the sauna worked well. Also the host was helpful, and he responded fast.
Unfortunately we encountered the smell of cat piss, especially in the Sauna. There was some uncleaned spots in the corners of the studio. Hot and cold water were not consistent in the shower.
Overall, the studio is good for a short visit, but too pricy for a longer stay.

Dina is an amazing and kind woman, I couldn‚Äôt ask for a better host.
The place is beautiful and the location is amazing. Highly recommend!

The flat is really nice, in a nice area .
Really close to restaurants, flea market , monastiriki is around the corner.
The rooftop with the jacuzzi and view on the acropole is the cherry on the top.
All is well decorated, clean and welcoming, harry was a good host and gave us good recommandations.

Amazing space. Great if you‚Äôre just staying a few days or more in Athens. CENTRAL, which I absolutely loved. Everything is super walkable. Visited Akropolis, Ancient Agora and more, all on foot from the apartment. Host was communicative and accommodating. I‚Äôd super recommend.

I cannot recommend this apartment enough. It is right near Monastiraki Square (less than 5 min walk) I would like to emphasize how clean the apartment felt from the bathroom, shower, and bed. It felt like a nice hotel. There is free wifi. There are a couple codes you need to enter to get inside the apartment, so it feels very safe, even being very centrally located. There are plenty of shops nearby if you happen to forget to bring something. There is one queen bed and a sofa. The metro from the airport to the apartment is fairly easy even for being someone who hasn't used a metro that often. While in Athens, there was no need to use the metro because all the main sites were within walking distance.
Amelie made the check-in process very easy and responded to my messages very quickly and gave me advice on how to get from airport to the apartment.
This apartment is an incredible value for the price and would highly, highly recommend booking it for your stay. Thank you Amelie for providing a place to stay that made our trip to Athens even better!

Spacious, clean apartment equipped with all the comforts. The terrace is also convenient. Close to the metro. Lively neighborhood with many restaurants and bars open until late at night. The Acropolis and Plaka are quickly reachable on foot. Polite and helpful host. Recommended.

My favorite is a 1.9-meter king bed made from two single beds. The mattress is very comfortable and the landlord even made four quilts specially for my request. I searched hundreds of apartments in downtown Athens, and it was the only one with a king size bed. All the others had beds that were too small at 1.6 meters.
The whole building is owned by the landlord, so it has a beautiful rooftop with a view of the Acropolis, and of course a separate laundry room on the rooftop, as well as a place to dry clothes, which avoids the clutter of washing in the apartment and drying on the balcony.
The landlord opened a jewelry store on the ground floor, selling souvenirs.
Every time I come to Athens in the future, I will choose this apartment .

Constantinos's place is amazing. It is a walkable distance from the metro. It is on the Airport metro line.
Everything was as described in the listing and photos.
He is a very responsive host.
We were very touched by the sweet gesture of finding cake, eggs, biscuits, beer, condiments etc. in the kitchen.
The bathroom had all the amenities with a lot more things than expected. I must say a very thoughtful host as there were wet wipes in case there's a baby, ear buds, cotton, even lense cleaner ..

A small balcony with chairs to sit out with tea/ coffee or wine overlooking trees is a good place to relax.
Would highly recommend and love to come back when in Greece.
Thank you Constantinos

The place is in a decent neighborhood with a couple, good restaurants and caf√©s very close,
although if you‚Äôre not used to it, it may not look that way since it is full of graffiti.
The place does not look like the entrance you might be expecting. There is a metal rollup door with an electric motor that is accessed with a key that you are provided (when somebody brings it to you when you‚Äôre outside the location) and it must be closed each time after you open it.
Interior of the apartment is modern-ish, the stairs leading up to it are very narrow about 20ish inches or so wide.
And when someone showers and water goes against the glass door, it is not sealed well and runs on to the bathroom floor, although there is an additional drain there for that reason.
All in all an OK stay but you must have an open mind.

What a place to stay in Athens!!
Dimitra's apartment is beautifully and tastefully appointed. The facilities are fantastic for 2 couples as we were. 2 bedrooms & 2 ensuites. Everything works well. There is everything you need to prepare your own meals, which we didn't because there are so many fabulous eateries within very easy walking distance.
The immediate restaurants are somewhat touristy as you expect in this location with the view to the Acropolis but food is still excellent. As is often the case in cities like Athens which has so many visitors, just venture a few streets off the main tourist routes and the prices decrease whilst the honesty and quality of food increases.
Dimitra's communication excellent and she is quick reply to any request.
We thoroughly enjoyed our 3 nights at Dimitra's apartment and would love to stay gain when we visit Athens and the Greek Islands again, which hopefully won't be too far in the future.
From start to finish Dimitra was responsive and friendly and easy to work with. The location of this apartment in Athens is incredible. Views of the acropolis at full moon were magical.

There's a whole floor of apartments/studios, within a locked door (with a code). There's a shared room with a washer/dryer & lockers. The feel of the place is like a hotel, in terms of decor, monogrammed towels, etc. It's all very tastefully done, a lovely room to be in.
As others have said, the lockers are great! My medium suitcase, my husband's backpack and a few smaller bags fitted with some room to spare. We were there for one night and had a late flight the next day, so this feature came in very handy - and was one of the main reasons I chose to stay here.

I want to start off by saying we had a wonderful experience with the cleaning lady, she was very good at her job and very kind and apologetic about the wait. which brings me to the fact that we had to wait for 40 minutes after check in time (which had also been communicated to the hosts the day before our arrival) because our room wasn't ready. we weren't the only ones waiting either. This home was perfect for our stay in Athens. Location can't be beat, everything is walkable including to the Acropolis. Step outside and there are restaurants everywhere.

We stayed here for our first trip to Athens. I was worried about the narrow streets but taxis could carefully maneuver themselves straight to the door! I was impressed. Check in instructions were clear, and Elena was very responsive and friendly by messaging. You are close to the heart of Plaka and the Acropolis, which as someone only staying a couple days was great. We got our steps in and got to see a lot of the heart of Athens! It felt like a safe area. Didn‚Äôt get a chance to use the tub but maybe next time! And nice to have a washer to use with a drying rack.

When we entered the apartment, we saw more than five full garbage bags inside the apartment. We saw dirty dishes in the kitchen, beds and linens dirty and messy on the floor. We saw that dirty towels and dirty clothes were on the floor in the bathroom. We encountered that the hall was messy and dirty, and when we mentioned this situation, we received a response saying "sorry, the cleaning team has forgotten it." Apart from these, they asked us for an extra fee of 30 Euros because we left the apartment a little late. We were very surprised that they asked for extra money despite all these negative situations. As far as I understand, they only see their staying guests as money. I hope they will be more respectful towards other guests.

There is a pan ready to be thrown away in the garbage and not for use. Windows very dirty and wall paint damaged especially in the bathroom due to humidity. This was officially the best nocarz I have ever stayed in. The place looked even better than it did in the pictures, the location was fantastic and the best part of it all is that everything functioned properly: the washer, the dryer, the iron, the heating and the hot water. I never in my wildest dreams thought that I'd find a place with running hot water all day in Greece, but as a spoiled American I found this to be the best perk. Not having to deal with a water heater that only keeps the water hot for 10 minutes like in other nocarzs was literally like being in heaven!
Now about Victoria. What can I say besides that she's an amazing super host. She always responded immediately to my inquiries and questions, I so appreciate her.

Our stay at Akan's place was amazing.  Huge apartment, clean, cool cafe on the corner, and most of all the location was awesome.  Bunch of bars, restaurants around, centrally located in Athens.  We had a blast.

Probably, the best overnight stay we had for quite some time!! I so fell in love with this place! Tasteful decorations, spotless clean throughout, so comfortable and well equipped! Our kids were amazed too (and thankfully were well-behaved, leaving the place as we found it!). We had the most relaxing sleep and we were delight to woke up within such luxury!! We felt safe all the time, yet we so much enjoyed the multicultural surroundings of this part of Athens! I loved that I could hear a train whistling somewhere far! Made me mind-travel! Commuting around was super easy and walking to the metro and back was nothing but a short stroll. I wish we had more time there, however, we are going back the soonest! Alexandra was so kind and willing! She was always there for us, answered all of our questions and was happy to provide more than we asked! Big applause to this hostess and this exceptionally beautiful house! I cannot but strongly recommend this piece of a gem! Totally worth it!
We stated here with 4 couples and it was incredibly comfortable. The balcony is huge, and we enjoyed sitting out there under the shade.

Gorgeous upscale penthouse apartment, tastefully decorated with high quality furniture (the dining room table is fantastic), and superbly comfortable beds made for a perfect stay. There were 8 of us traveling together and everyone in our group was impressed with this apartment. Also, the little things like art on the walls, good wine glasses, quality bedding, decorative planters, patio furniture (there are multiple seating areas) made our stay so pleasant. The apartment was spacious and spotless. We could not have asked for anything more. I feel lucky we found this apartment and it was available for our group. Thank you.

We had a wonderful stay in Athens at Stela and Nikos' apartment. We were made to feel very welcome from the moment we booked - everything we needed to know, the offer of a dedicated taxi to pick us up from the airport, someone waiting for us to hand over the keys and show us around. The bedrooms had been set up as requested and the fridge had some welcome drinks waiting for everyone.
The location is perfect - situated two minutes' walk from Acropolis metro, we were able to get around to everywhere we wanted - all of the key sites are within walking distance, and even getting to the coast is only a 30 min tram ride away.
We would definitely recommend Stella and Nickos' apartment for anyone looking to stay in Athens

We had a really nice time staying here. It was a nice neighbourhood with everything we need closeby. The view of Acropolis from the apartment was gorgeous. Apartment was really cute and cozy. We basically walked everywhere. Evan&Anetta were quick to answer any question we had. Thanks for this lovely stay!

Best Acropolis view I‚Äôve had in Athens ever! Everything is as listed, which makes you feel right at home. nocarz sits in a great location close to all the attractions & the metro station. Thank you for having us!

The apartment is spacious, clean and has the amenities it offered on the web (Bathrooms and toilets a bit on the small side). Very well located, only a short walk from many of the key Athens tourist sites and many restaurants are nearby. The Acropolis Museum and the Acropolis are only a short walk away. We had one issue with a faulty bed that was sorted out by Nikos within the hour of being notified. Very nice two-level apartment on fairly quiet side street near plenty of restaurants, cafes and shopping. Less than a 10-minute walk from Neos Kosmos Metro Station, just two stops from the Acropolis and Athens centre. Also near Nea Smyrni 'plah-tee-ah' (square), a popular dining and shopping destination.
The apartment itself has a youthful vibe and almost anything you could ask for. There is a big screen TV in the living room, plus a smaller one in the upstairs bedroom, which also has a private balcony, in addition to the huge balcony off the living room. Both feature an unobstructed view of the Acropolis!
Water pressure in both the bathroom and kitchen was good. No annoying leaks, drips or sounds. Appliances worked fine, at least the ones I used (electric kettle, microwave, stovetop burner, fridge, washing machine). All in all, an excellent value for someone looking to be close to the action, but not necessarily in the thick of it.

Stunning apartment with unreal space & views. The space itself felt like true luxury, while the 360 views with outdoor hot tub unbeatable. Also located right next to the main Plaka areas. Thanks so much!!

During our trip to Greece, we stayed in two different nocarzs and a hotel. Autosilos was the best experience. To begin with, it‚Äôs located in the heart of the city, amazing restaurants are bar right around the corner.

The apartment was very old, everything was vintage. The bed was small, if you're taller than 1.87m, you touch the end.
The furniture was also very old, the garden was not well maintained, and there were mosquitoes everywhere‚ÄîI got bitten constantly. The bathroom furniture was old, there was nothing to hang the showerhead on, and the shower door didn't close properly. The toilet brush was broken. When we used the washing machine, the cable connecting it to the electricity was lying on the floor. If there had been a water leak from the shower, my partner would have been at risk of electrocution. I do not recommend this apartment for families with children. most of the electrical outlets in the apartment were old. And don't even get me started on the unbearable smell in the courtyard and hallway.this appartement really need renovation. However, it‚Äôs very spacious and well located. I want to thank Marina for hosting us, but we will not be returning to this apartment.

Anastasios' place was as described, it was spotless and well furnished for 1-2 people. The location is very good - on public transport lines, and within walking distance of the center of Athens, as well as to great restaurants, cafes, pharmacies and minimarkets. It is in a nice building on a main street but faces the other side so you really don't hear traffic and I slept well. Anastasios himself was pleasant and very quick to reply to questions and to resolve issues. I was the first person to stay here, and there was an issue with the hot water heater. He acted promptly to address it - once it is resolved the shower itself will be ideal as the water pressure and showerhead are amazing.

If I have to nitpick, I would count small elevator and too many doors before you reach the apartment but easily they are insignificant mostly for anyone wishing to stay in this lovely apartment.
Pedros as a host is very friendly and highly responsive.

We loved staying at this nocarz, felt like a home away from home right away.
It has everything you need, it is spacious and extremely tastefully decorated. Super clean, all in all, far above a normal nocarz standard. It is way bigger than the pictures make think!!
It is nicely located in the heart of Kypseli and close to Fokionos negri; a pedestrian street, filled with green park area, bars and restaurants 1 minute walk from the apartment - perfect for our family with small kids. It is a local neighborhood and you don't have the feeling that you are in a very touristic city, which elevates the whole experience to another level for us.
The famous sights of Athens can be reached quickly by Bus or Metro. If you decide to walk, within half an hour- 40 minutes you will be right at the Acropolis.
The air conditioning is charged extra after use, which is understandable and seems fair (electric is costly).
If we come back to Athens, we hope to book again here. Thank you for everything <3

Olga and Sarantis were incredible hosts from the moment I completed my booking! Friendly, professional, very helpful and responsive, they ensured I would have everything I needed for my stay. I felt so welcome and safe in the apartment and neighborhood, which is very quiet for being right in the heart of Athens. It is perfect for women traveling alone! It is just a short walking distance to the Acropolis metro and everything this strategic location has to offer.
Overall, I was extremely happy with my stay here and could not recommend this suite highly enough ‚Äî a huge thank you to Olga and Sarantis for their generosity and hospitality!

Olga and Sarantis are full of great hospitality. They were part of making me feel very welcome in Athens. I am grateful they could transport me to and from the apartment. The apartment location is ideal in a very chill neighborhood with great restaurants right around the corner. It was so quiet at night I could forget I was in a huge city! Bed was super comfy. Black out shutters also awesome. And the flat has an elevator. It is a small place but had everything I needed for a very comfortable stay. I would be happy to stay with Olga and Sarantis if I am ever in Athens again.

Great flat to stay in - the space was very clean and tidy with a nice little balcony to hang out at with your morning coffee. We also had a great view out of our balcony with the Acropolis in the distance. The area itself where the block of flats is located was quite industrial rather then it being in a city environment or anything like that but it didn't bother us as me and my friend were mostly out and about around the whole of Athens. The area was accessible with a good bus connection and taxis. There were also a couple really nice restaurants nearby which were walkable and had fantastic food. We also had a few days where we cooked / made food ourselves and there's a big supermarket within a 10 minute walk. Overall, really happy with the accommodation and the welcome provided !

I have never written any negative reviews so far, but with this review I want to warn future guests about a massive problem they will have when booking this nocarz. As cool as it is to have your location in the city centre, the location of this nocarz is the worst. The room is in the first floor of a building, where the ground floor is a bar with extremely loud music every day of the week! Right next to this bar, there is an even louder bar, where people dance, shout, scream and laugh until 4 or 5am. Every night. The house is quite old, so if you are laying in your bed it doesn't only feel like you're at the party - you actually are at the party. It was impossible to sleep even with ear plugs or noise cancelling airpods. So either plan your sleep cycle accordinglyt to 5am - 8am, because at 8am the noisy street starts to do its job. Or do yourself a favor and book another location.

I do recommend to go there if you want to experiment a great stay and feel all the real Greek experience.

Let's start with the good, the communication with the host was kind and fast, the place was clean and beautiful

The biggest problem starts with the hot water, The water is enough for up to 20 minutes max of running water in the shower. That means 4 people can never shower at the same time, Not to mention filling the pool with hot water which is ‚Öõ full and then there is already cold water, In addition, the electricity went out a few times. This is an old building that has been upgraded. It is not possible to apply too heavy a load on the electricity. And as for the doors, they are all made of glass, although they look nice, but there is no privacy, they cannot be locked in the toilet and bathroom.
One more little thing, It's a shame that the host didn't bring more tissue paper, linens and towels, it felt lacking. there are also a security issue.

The place is nice furnished and decorated with passion. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Koukaki. The apartment is in a quiet residential area, filled with the beautiful scent of orange blossom from trees that line the streets. We felt safe walking at night in this area. It is within 10-15 minutes walking distance of the Acropolis and Acropolis Museum. The apartment is very clean. The beds are comfortable. The bathroom is quite small but manageable. The shower was good with complimentary shower gels etc. There are bakeries and supermarkets close by. We ate locally twice and had good meals. We used the taxi service organised by Homer and Isabella and it was well worth it. As hosts, Homer and Isabella they were brilliant, responding  quickly to any questions.
Great location walkable to mostly everything you need to do in Athens. Hotel like service! Liroy was great with communication. The AC units were super quiet. Highly recommend!
We had a wonderful stay. Perfect location and brilliant host! Would definitely recommend and stay again!
The apartment was great! The check in was smooth and easy. The apartment was very clean. Very comfortable in nice area. Great price for that what they offer!
Lovely apartment, clean, spacious near public transport and close to the acropolis!

The aesthetic decoration of the space was truly stunning. The apartment was situated in a vibrant community with delicious traditional Greece cuisines and chill brunch. The convenience to both the airport and historic attractions was a major plus, which saved so much time on transportation. Moreover, the host's attention to considerate details was impeccable - the variety of coffee machines and snacks provided. I highly recommend this place to fellow travelers.
Super hote, reactif, bon emplacement et logement propre.
heerlijke lokatie voor paar dagen athene.  ruim appartement behoorlijk dicht bij de akropolis. Hani was snel bij vragen

The appartment was perfectly nice and clean. The host were reachable at any moment and replied to messages really fast. They provided very clear instructions regarding the check in, check out and were also proactive to help if there is anything needed. 5 star recommendation!

I stayed here with a group of 8 adult family members and we were all in awe of this place. The apartment was beautiful and the views were incredible. The rooftop terrace was our favorite part, and we could even hear the concerts happening in the Odeon from up there. The staff at Heloni apartments was so kind and responsive. They always got back to me right away when I had a question. They provided us with options for storing luggage at their office and for checking in early, though there was a small upcharge. When the elevator broke right as we were checking in and hauling our luggage up, they sent someone to fix it within 5 minutes. We were pleasantly surprised by the food available in the apartment. All around, this was a fantastic place to stay and we loved our experience there.

It was a very unpleasant stay, so many things went wrong. First, we didn't get the instructions of how to get in and we had to wait for 2 hours in front of the flat, as the owner was not replying to our messages.  After we got in, we noticed that lots of furniture is broken. The worst was a glass table in the kitchen with only 3 legs which fell on us when we touched it. The wifi and the kettle didn't work. After our complaint to nocarz the company sent a technician and the table and wifi got repaired. Unfortunately, later I got bitten by some insects, most probably bed bugs (I was sleeping on a couch bed). My arms were all covered in red spots in lines. It could not have been mosquitoes as I don't get a reaction like this, also we kept windows closed. I made another complain to nocarz, unfortunately I couldn't get a partial refund because I couldn't find the actual insects. I visited a doctor and he prescribed antibiotics. It was a very unpleasant experience for a high price.

Quiet, safe neighborhood right under the Acropolis. Bed was comfortable. Bedroom/kitchen windows look out onto close building behind. Kitchen was lacking with 1 broken sharp knife, only giant pots. I had to call nocarz to get help learning how to work the very modern shower on my first night. I found the hosts rude as their response was "we've never had this problem before" instead of oh I am so sorry you are having trouble, let me help. I also was annoyed because I asked for an early check in, and they allowed me to drop off luggage but insisted the keys must be in the lockbox for the cleaning lady to come before my 3PM check in. When I left my luggage, the place was clean and ready, and I still had to wait to check in for whatever reason. The hosts also sent lots of messages barking orders in capital letters about no partying etc. and I asked them to stop and got no response about it. The flat was nice enough, but I wouldn't stay there again because of the hosts attitude.

This is a very nice, clean, updated flat. The private terrace wraps around two sides of the apartment, and is on the top floor. One thing to note is that this is NOT a private residence that the host is renting while out of town. The host is a company that owns the entire building and is renting out all flats on nocarz. This kind of rental has been driving up housing costs in Athens, and apparently there have been protests and riots over it in Exarcheia, the neighborhood the building is in. Consider doing some research and decide if this is something you want to contribute to before booking.

This place was pretty much perfect and Taisser was no doubt the best nocarz host I have ever had. He responded promptly to my many inquiries for which I am very grateful.
Location is great, however if you are one that likes to stay out late, keep in mind that everyone else in the building is a regular local that goes on about their daily life so starting at 7am you'll start hearing the tenants getting ready for work, school, etc.
There's a pharmacy and grocery store literally next door to the building too which is fantastic, and the 'Kato Patisia' train station is across the street, though I walked to the city center a couple of times because that's how much I love Athens.
This place also had the best hair dryer I have ever had in an nocarz, so Taisser, when you get a chance, I'd love to know which dryer it was so that I can buy it next time I'm in Greece!
Will definitely stay again, thanks Taisser for your wonderful hospitality!

We had a very pleasant stay at the villa. The location was good with some great places nearby (at a walking distance), and central Athens / Ermou St very close. Our stay at Katerina's place was fantastic! The apartment is spotless! New or newly renovated, well equipped kitchen with all appliances, cookware, silverware.  There were even some groceries in the fridge so in case of late arrival there would be no problem getting a bite. Katerina was excellent at communicating before and during our stay, she was there when we arrived and explained how to enter the building and apartment, walked us through the apartment explaining things. In addition there was a folder with clear instructions for the washer, dish washer, doors, AC, etc. The apartment location is excellent: 5mins walk to Monastiraki square and Metro station, walking distance to the Acropolis. Perfect! The last night we had a rental car, so where to park? There's a small parking lot right next door, so no problem! I was a bit nervous of a new place with no reviews yet, but I couldn't have been happier! Highly recommend Katerina's place.

This place was everything I expected and exceeded my expectations. The host helped with recommendations and even provided me with little things such as a mini sewing kit for my broken pants.  This place is amazing and I will stay again if I visit Athens!

The appartement was perferct.. Close to all the main area's in athens..
It was super clean and had everthing in it.
Katerina was great.. Communication was superb.
Highly recommended A++
Perfect place to stay

We had a very nice stay at the apartment! It was very clean and looked very cosy. We really enjoyed the wine aswell, thank you!The location is perfect; tourist attractions and restaurants are closeby.

This apartment is in a great location, so much to do and see. My husband and I stayed with our 3 young adult daughters - the apartment was perfect for our needs, clean and comfortable. Ada was an amazing host. She arranged transportation for us to and from the airport and provided a dinner spot recommendation. Our youngest daughter is staying in Athens for a semester of university and Ada provided her contact information if she needed anything during her stay. So sweet! We would stay here again!
Awesome place. Great host. Will definitely stay again.
Great place to stay for small groups, AC in every room, close to restaurants, walkable distance to sites. Five stars!

Aliki's place is truly amazing! We were impressed by the level of detail that went into the decoration and organization of a space like this. Keep in mind that it is more like a complete suite or studio with a small kitchen, but don't let that factor stop you from booking it. The use of the space is brilliant and highly tastefully designed. We stayed for one night before heading to Santorini. The Wi-Fi worked perfectly for working remotely. I highly recommend you book Aliki's place; it was the perfect beginning to a magical trip in Greece.
Great pad for a nights stay in Athens, in a peaceful neighbourhood located within walking distance of the metro and Plaka. Some good choices to eat close by.

This nocarz was just as advertised, the place itself is so clean, and has everything you need. Catalin's communication was great and she was responsive. They let us check in early so that was a big help and really appreciated it.

Giannis was incredibly helpful with check in, gave clear instructions and left our room in a great condition for our stay. The terrace is worth it, for sunrise and sunset, good amounts of sun and proportionate shade. The Acropolis shines bright and makes for a very romantic dinner setting. The TV is fabulous, the bed very comfortable and a very pleasant bathroom. Omonoia is known for being a dodgy area but I would argue that the masses of danger that has been alluded to before is not extraordinarily riskier here than in areas elsewhere in the city, the main square has clearly been built up very recently and there are always people around. I would say that the building itself is not the nicest, not well lit (especially where the penthouse room is) and the entrance to the building sometimes had homeless people blocking the door to get in at night which felt uncomfortable, but manageable. You are near to Omonoia metro stop, and some great souvlaki street food places and coffee spots!
Great stay and spacious apartment!

He offered, and we accepted private transport to the port.
We only wish we had a couple of days more to enjoy the city.
5 stars! *****
Thank you, again, Nasos.

Our previous nocarz had plumbing problems and we had to book this place last minute. The host was nice enough to let us drop off bags early at 1pm ish The issues arrived when we saw the place after the last guests left it. I smelled strong of cigarettes that we could barely stand being in there. We left and came back at 3pm for the official check in after the cleaning person came through. We arrived and they told us they needed another hour or so to finish cleaning. The places still smelled so bad of cigarettes that we could not possibly stay there anymore because there was no way to air out the place fast enough. We canceled not even worried about getting money back and just re booked. The cleaning lady was very kind and we knew she would do a good job cleaning but cigarette smells are hard to get rid of. great place to stay and best location .  walking distance to shops and restaurants and Metro.

A comfortable apartment  on a quiet street for a short stay in a nice part of Pangrati close Platia Varnava with it's cafes and tavernas and from which you can walk into the centre via the National Gardens in just over 30/40 minutes at Syntagma. The only issue I had was not being able to lock one of the shutters completely on one side - the host offered to fix it straight away. I stayed for too short a time for it to bother me. The view is of a backyard but given how close you are to a lovely platia it is not an issue. Comfortable bed, good WIFI, well stocked kitchen etc.

As a family we found the location great to grab the hop on hop off bus. Lots of food and shopping nearby. Close to train station too. I have been to Greece 3x and always stay close to this location it‚Äôs fantastic. Pictures exactly like the place we stayed.

Un ospite eccezionale! L'appartamento era molto carino, centralissimo e arredato con sempie gusto. Perfettamente pulito, materasso e cuscini comodissimi. Asterios ci ha dato eccellenti consigli per i ristoranti, bar e anche per il locker in cui depositare i bagagli.
Ioannis was a great host, extremely friendly, understanding and flexible. Very responsive which helped make the stay even better!
It was better than expected, I highly recommend this place.
All was great. Only sofa must be a bit larger. It is not enough for 4 people.

Has been an amazing experience at the Penthouse. location was amazing, very convient to travel around Athens. communication and instructions have been clear and detailed. Would recommend anyone to stay here.

Had a lovely stay. Situated near the centre in a nice neighbourhood and comes with complimentary breakfast.
Thanks for having me!
I truly enjoyed my stay. The hosts are great people who only want the best for their guests. This is why I always choose this accommodation when I am in Athens. Thank you

Giannis was a very friendly and helpful host. Always responded to my questions and needs. Really clean and fresh place. Good location with a lot to do nearby. The place had really good aesthetic and vibes. One of the best places I have stayed in Athens.

The place is centrally located within walking distance from many of Athens finest attractions. It is situated in a quiet street in a neighbourhood with lots of intimate little local cafes, restaurants and neighbourhood shops.  On Friday there is a street food market on your doorstep, yet its hubbub cannot be heart inside.  the flat was immaculately clean without any clutter.  Giorgos responded immediately to all our requests and even brought over some snacks... We had a great stay - highly recommended.

This nocarz apartment in the heart of Athens offers an incredible view of the Acropolis. The location is perfect for exploring the city, and the apartment is stylish and comfortable. The hosts were incredibly friendly, attentive, and made sure our stay was perfect from start to finish. A truly unforgettable stay!

My stay at this nocarz in Athens was nothing short of magical. The view was absolutely breathtaking, and the apartment felt like a true home away from home. It‚Äôs a warm, spacious, clean, and bright place that wraps you in comfort from the moment you arrive. I genuinely fell in love with it so much that I felt a deep sadness on the day I had to leave. Alexandra, the host, was outstanding‚Äîher communication was flawless, and she‚Äôs one of the kindest and friendliest people I‚Äôve had the pleasure of interacting with. This place will forever hold a special place in my heart, and I can‚Äôt wait to return someday. Highly recommend it to anyone looking for a memorable stay in Athens!

It was a true pleasure staying here! The large top floor terrace is the greatest asset: every morning we had breakfast bathing in sunlight,  and in the evenings we could enjoy the evening breeze overlooking the park and the candy mountain. It's a small but practical appartment and the interiour shows the refined taste of Magdalini: the most kind and welcoming host! She even gave us a bottle of olive oil from her family estate as a welcoming present. The neigbourhood is one of the most vibrant areas of Athens. Top place!

I had a great stay. The apartment is in the middle of everything.  Close to major shops and boutiques, restaurants, and cafes. The apartment is clean, comfortable, and nicely designed. The host was welcoming and communicative. I recommend this place to anyone visiting Athens and I‚Äôll be sure to book this place again the next time I am in here.
